[01] vuddhilakkhaṇā āyato apetattā ^b^apāyo,^eb^ avuddhi. ^b^tattha kosalla^eb^nti tasmiṃ atthahānianatthuppattilakkhaṇe apāye kosallaṃ kusalatā ^b^apāyakosallaṃ^eb^. tampi pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ ^b^``ime dhamme''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^idaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti yā imesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ anuppajjananirujjhanesu, akusaladhammānaṃ vā uppattiṭṭhitīsu paññā, idaṃ apāyakosallaṃ nāmāti vuccati. āyakosallaṃ tāva paññā hotu, apāyakosallaṃ kathaṃ paññā nāma jātāti? evaṃ maññati ``apāyuppādanasamatthatā apāyakosallaṃ nāma siyā''ti, taṃ pana tassa matimattaṃ. kasmā? paññavā eva hi ``mayhaṃ evaṃ manasi karoto anuppannā kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti, uppannā ^a^V2.0076^ea^ nirujjhanti. anuppannā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā pavaḍḍhantī''ti pajānāti, so evaṃ ñatvā anuppanne akusale na uppādeti, uppanne pajahati. anuppanne kusale uppādeti, uppanne bhāvanāpāripūriṃ pāpeti. evaṃ apāyakosallampi paññā evāti.

[03] ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu. ^b^tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti sattānaṃ taṃtaṃhitasukhadhammānaṃ. ^b^taṅkhaṇappavatta^eb^nti accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pavattaṃ. ṭhānena uppatti etassa atthīti ^b^ṭhānuppattikaṃ,^eb^ ṭhānaso eva uppajjanakaṃ. ^b^tatrupāyā^eb^ti tatra tatra karaṇīye upāyabhūtā.

[03] ^b^gahetvā^eb^ti ``idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpa''ntiādinā pariggaṇhanavasena gahetvā. ^b^ubhayaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ``ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā''ti ubhayaṃ anupubbato pariggahetvā. atha vā ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti ekappahāreneva sabbepi pañcakkhandhe avibhāgena pariggahetvā. ayaṃ pana tikkhavipassakassa mahāpuññassa bhikkhuno vipassanābhiniveso.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ ^b^dukkhasaccaṃ ārabbhā^eb^ti dukkhasaccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā, tappaṭicchādakasammohavidhaṃsanavasena ca ^b^pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhe ñāṇaṃ. dukkhasamudayaṃ^eb^ ^b^ārabbhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0081^ea^ etthāpi eseva nayo. tathā sesapadadvayepi. paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hi catusaccaṃ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṃ nāma, tatiyaṃ pana maggañāṇaṃ, itarasaccāni vipassanāñāṇanti pākaṭameva.

[03] ``atthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇānī''ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pāḷivaseneva vivarituṃ ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā^eb^ti yaṃ atthappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ, ayaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā nāma. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^dhammapaṭisambhidā^eb^. niruttippabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ niruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^niruttipaṭisambhidā^eb^. paṭibhānappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ paṭibhāne pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā^eb^. niruttipaṭibhānappabhedā tabbisayānaṃ atthādīnaṃ paccayuppannatādibhedehi bhinditvā veditabbā.

[03] nibbānampi ^a^V2.0077^ea^ sampāpakahetuanusārena arīyati, adhigammatīti attho. ^b^``yaṃ kiñci paccayasambhūta''^eb^nti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni dukkhādīni gahitāni. saccapaccayākāravāresu nibbānaṃ, pariyattivāre bhāsitattho, abhidhammabhājanīye vipāko, kiriyā cāti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca atthā veditabbā. ^b^dahatī^eb^ti vidahati, nibbattakahetuādīnaṃ sādhāraṇametaṃ nibbacanaṃ. tadatthaṃ pana vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``pavatteti vā sampāpuṇituṃ vā detī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tesu purimo attho maggavajjesu daṭṭhabbo. bhāsitampi hi avabodhanavasena atthaṃ pavatteti, maggo pana nibbānaṃ pāpetīti tasmiṃ pacchimo attho. nibbānaṃ hi pattabbo attho, bhāsitattho ñāpetabbo attho, itaro nibbattetabbo atthoti evaṃ tividho hoti.

[03] ^b^``yo koci phalanibbattako hetū''^eb^ti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni samudayādīni gahitāni, saccapaccayākāravāresu maggo, pariyattivāre bhāsitaṃ, abhidhammabhājanīye kusalākusalanti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca dhammā veditabbā. tattha ^a^M2.0082^ea^ maggo sampāpako, bhāsitaṃ ñāpako, itaraṃ nibbattakoti evaṃ tividho hetu veditabbo. ettha ca kiriyānaṃ avipākatāya dhammabhāvo na vutto. yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvopi na vattabbo? na, paccayuppannabhāvato. evaṃ sati kusalākusalānampi atthabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? nāyaṃ doso appaṭisiddhattā. vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo eva tesaṃ vutto. kiriyānaṃ paccayabhāvato dhammabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? nāyaṃ doso appaṭisiddhattā. kammaphalasambandhassa pana hetubhāvassābhāvato dhammabhāvo na vutto. apica ``ayaṃ imassa paccayo, ayaṃ paccayuppanno''ti etaṃ bhedamakatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale, vipākakiriyādhamme ca paccavekkhantassa dhammatthapaṭisambhidā hontīti tesaṃ atthadhammatā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^ayameva hi attho^eb^ti yvāyaṃ atthadhammānaṃ pañcadhā vibhajanavasena attho vutto, ayameva abhidhamme vibhajitvā dassitoti sambandho.

[03] ``dhammaniruttābhilāpe''ti ettha dhamma-saddo sabhāvavācakoti katvā āha ^b^``sabhāvaniruttī''^eb^ti, aviparītaniruttīti attho. tenāha ^b^``abyabhicārī vohāro''^eb^ti, tassa tassa atthassa bodhane paṭiniyatasambandho saddavohāroti attho. ^b^tadabhilāpe^eb^ti tassa sabhāvaniruttisaññitassa ^a^V2.0078^ea^ abyabhicārivohārassa abhilāpane. sā panāyaṃ sabhāvanirutti māgadhabhāsā. atthato nāmapaññattīti ācariyā. apare pana yadi sabhāvanirutti paññattisabhāvā, evaṃ sati paññatti abhilapitabbā, na vacananti āpajjati. na ca vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ uccāretabbaṃ atthi. atha phassādivacanehi bodhetabbaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ, evañca sati atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati. phassoti ca sabhāvanirutti, phassaṃ phassāti na sabhāvaniruttīti dassitovāyamattho. na ca avacanaṃ evaṃpakāraṃ atthi. tasmā vacanabhūtāya eva tassā sabhāvaniruttiyā abhilāpe uccāraṇeti attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^niruttipaṭisambhidā,^eb^ ``evamayaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇā ^a^M2.0083^ea^ nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā''ti (vibha0 aṭṭha0 718) ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattatīti vadanti. ``niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā''ti (vibha0 749) ca vacanasaddaṃ gahetvā pacchā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. evaṃ pana aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ vuttanti āpajjati. yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussādisaddabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ taṃtaṃsaddavibhāvakaṃ, evaṃ sabhāvāsabhāvaniruttinicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ paccuppannasabhāvaniruttisaddārammaṇaṃ taṃvibhāvakaṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho. ``taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassā''ti ca ``paccuppannasaddārammaṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattentassā''ti na nasakkā vattuṃ. tañhi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventameva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayahetubhāvato niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti pabhedagatampi hotīti.

[03] ^b^sabbattha ñāṇa^eb^nti sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ, sabbampi ñāṇanti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``ñāṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇa''^eb^nti. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti vā sabbesu atthādīsu, tīsu, catūsupi vā pavattattā, kusalakiriyābhūtāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya dhammatthabhāvato tīsu eva vā pavattattā ``sabbattha ñāṇa''nti vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``yathāvuttesu vā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^sagocarakiccādivasenā^eb^ti sagocarassa, kiccādikassa ca vasena ``idaṃ ñāṇaṃ idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ iminā nāma ^a^V2.0079^ea^ kiccenā''ti jānanaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena lakkhaṇapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānabhūmiādīnaṃ saṅgaho. tenevāha ``imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī''tiādi.
[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ^b^pabhedaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti anekabhedabhinnesu ārammaṇesu tesaṃ yāthāvato taṃtaṃpabhedāvabodhanasamatthataṃ upagacchanti.
[03] mahāsāvakānañca asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatāti sāmaññavidhinā dassitamatthaṃ apavādena nivattetuṃ ^b^ānandatthera^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.

[03] ^b^etā^eb^ paṭisambhidā. sekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedagamanaṃ appavisayaṃ, asekkhabhūmiyaṃ bahuvisayanti āha ^b^``adhigamo nāma arahattappattī''^eb^ti, sātisayaṃ vā adhigamaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. sekkhena pattānampi hi imāsaṃ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti ^a^M2.0084^ea^. pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi yathāyogaṃ sekkhāsekkhapaṭisambhidāvisadatāya kāraṇatā yojetabbā. atthadhammādīnaṃ anavasesasaṅgaṇhanato buddhavacanavisayā eva pariyattiādayo dassitā. pāḷiyā sajjhāyo ^b^pariyāpuṇanaṃ,^eb^ tadatthasavanaṃ ^b^savanaṃ,^eb^ parito sabbaso ñātuṃ icchā ^b^paripucchā^eb^ti āha ^b^``pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu gaṇṭhipadātthapadavinicchayakathā''^eb^ti, padatthato, adhippāyato ca duviññeyyaṭṭhānaṃ vitthārato sanniṭṭhānakathāti attho. yassa hi padassa attho duviññeyyo, taṃ ^b^gaṇṭhipadaṃ,^eb^ yassa adhippāyo duviññeyyo, taṃ ^b^atthapadaṃ. ādi^eb^-saddena khandhādipaṭisaṃyutte kathāmagge saṅgaṇhāti. bhāvanānuyogasahitaṃ gataṃ, paccāgatañca etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatiko, tassa bhāvo, tena ^b^gatapaccāgatikabhāvena^eb^. vasanaṭṭhānato yāva gocaragāmo, tato ca yāva vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyuttoti attho. ^b^yāva anulomagotrabhusamīpa^eb^nti saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇamāha. tañhi tesaṃ samīpappavattaṃ.

[03] ^b^satthesū^eb^ti anavajjesu sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahesu ganthesu. tathā ^b^sippāyatanesū^eb^ti etthāpi. pubbakāle ekasatarājūnaṃ desabhāsā ^b^ekasatavohārā^eb^. dhammapade (dha0 pa0 1 ādayo) yamakavaggo ^b^opammavaggo^eb^ti vadanti, mūlapaṇṇāse (ma0 ni0 1.325 ādayo; 439 ādayo) yamakavaggo ^b^opammavaggo^eb^ evāti apare. ^b^sutapaṭibhānabahulāna^eb^nti bahussutānaṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ.

[03] ^b^sabbānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0080^ea^ pubbe vuttāni pañca, pacchā vuttāni aṭṭhapi vā. sekkhaphalavimokkhapariyosāne bhavā ^b^sekkhaphalavimokkhantikā^eb^. ṭhānāṭhānañāṇabalādīni sabbabuddhaguṇesu sakiccato pākaṭatarānīti vuttaṃ ^b^``dasa balāni viyā''^eb^ti, aññe vā sabbaññutaññāṇādayopi sabbe bhagavato guṇavisesā ^b^asekkhaphalavimokkhantikā^eb^ eva.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ ^b^imāya paññāyā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya. ^b^bhūmi^eb^ sallakkhaṇādiggahaṇavasena pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āhārādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. kasmā panete evaṃ bahudhammā bhūmibhāvena gayhanti, nanu khandhādīsu ekenāpi ^a^M2.0085^ea^ atthasiddhi hotīti? na, tividhasattānuggahatthaṃ khandhādittayaggahaṇaṃ kattabbaṃ, aññathā sabbasādhāraṇo anuggaho na kato siyā. tividhā hi sattā rūpasammūḷhā arūpasammūḷhā ubhayasammūḷhāti. tesu ye arūpasammūḷhā, tadatthaṃ khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ catudhā vibhattattā. ye rūpasammūḷhā, tadatthaṃ āyatanānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ addhekādasadhā vibhattattā. ye pana ubhayasammūḷhā, tadatthaṃ dhātūnaṃ ubhayesampi vibhattattā. tathā indriyabhedena tikkhindriyā majjhimindriyā mudindriyā, saṃkhittarucī majjhimarucī vitthārarucīti ca tividhā sattā, tesampi atthāya yathākkamaṃ khandhādiggahaṇaṃ katanti yojetabbaṃ. indriyaggahaṇaṃ pana kāmaṃ ete dhammā issarā viya sahajātadhammesu issariyaṃ ādhipaccaṃ pavattenti, taṃ pana nesaṃ dhammasabhāvasiddhaṃ, na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo ``suññā ete avasavattino''ti anattalakkhaṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ. taṃ panetaṃ catubbidhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva upakārāvahaṃ, na aññathāti saccādidvayaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena gahitadhammesupi ayaṃ nayo netabbo. ^b^mūlaṃ^eb^ patiṭṭhābhāvato. sati hi sīlavisuddhiyaṃ, cittavisuddhiyañca ayaṃ paññā mūlajātā hoti, nāsatīti. ^b^sarīraṃ^eb^ paribrūhetabbato. imissā hi paññāya santānavasena pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā diṭṭhivisuddhiādikā imā pañca visuddhiyo avayavena samudāyūpalakkhaṇanayena ``sarīra''nti veditabbā.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ ^b^pañca khandhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^pañcā^eb^ti gaṇanaparicchedo, tena na tato heṭṭhā, na uddhanti dasseti. ^b^khandhā^eb^ti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. yasmā cettha khandha-saddo rāsaṭṭho ``mahāudakakkhandho''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.51; 6.37) viya, tasmā atītādivibhāgabhinnaṃ ^a^V2.0081^ea^ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ rāsivasena buddhiyā ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ``rūpameva khandho rūpakkhandho''ti samānādhikaraṇasamāso daṭṭhabbo. ``tīhi khandhehi iṇaṃ dassāmā''tiādīsu viya koṭṭhāsaṭṭhe pana khandha-sadde nibbānassāpi khandhantarabhāvo āpajjatīti? nāpajjati atītādivibhāgābhāvato. na hi ekassa niccassa sato nibbānassa atītādivibhāgo atthīti. paṭhamenatthena rūparāsīti attho, dutiyena rūpakoṭṭhāsoti. ^b^vedanākkhandho^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. kasmā panete khandhā pañceva vuttā iminā eva ca kamenāti? bhājanabhojanabyañjanabhattakārakabhuñjakavikappadassanato ^a^M2.0086^ea^, yathoḷārikayathāsaṃkilesūpadesato cāti veditabbaṃ. vivādamūlahetubhāvaṃ saṃsārahetutaṃ, kammahetutañca cintetvā vedanāsaññā saṅkhārakkhandhato nīharitvā visuṃ khandhabhāvena desitā.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu pañcasu khandhesu. ^b^yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. ^b^ruppanalakkhaṇa^eb^nti atippasaṅganiyamanaṃ. yaṃ-saddena hi sanipātena kiṃ-saddena ca gahitena aniyamatthatāya atippasaṅge āpanne taṃ ruppanasaddo nivatteti, tena rūpassa anavasesapariggaho kato hoti. ^b^sītādīhī^eb^ti sītuṇhajighacchāpipāsādīhi. hetuatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. ruppanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. dhammo eva ^b^dhammajātaṃ^eb^. ruppanañcettha sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppatti. nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamāgame visadisuppatti labbhatīti? saccaṃ labbhati, na pana vibhūtataraṃ. vibhūtataraṃ hettha ruppanaṃ adhippetaṃ sītādiggahaṇato. yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ brahmaloke rūpasamaññā? tatthāpi taṃsabhāvānativattanato hotiyeva rūpasamaññā, anuggāhakapaccayavasena vā. virodhipaccayasannipāte yo attano santāne bhinne bhijjamānasseva visadisuppattihetubhāvo, taṃ ruppananti aññe. imasmiṃ pakkhe rūpayati vikāraṃ āpādetīti rūpaṃ, purimapakkhe pana ruppatīti. saṅghaṭṭanena vikārāpattiyaṃ ruppanasaddo niruḷhoti keci. imasmiṃ pakkhe arūpadhammesu rūpasamaññāya pasaṅgo eva natthi saṅghaṭṭanābhāvato. paṭighāto ruppananti apare. ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā^eb^ti rāsaṭṭhaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vadati.
[03] ^b^bhūtopādāyabhedato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0082^ea^ ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādāyarūpanti ^b^bhūtaṃ^eb^. bhūtāni upādiyateva, na pana sayaṃ tehi, aññehi vā upādīyatīti ^b^upādāyaṃ^eb^.

[03] kāmaṃ catudhātuvavatthāne vacanatthāditopi bhūtāni vibhāvitāneva, sabhāvadhammānaṃ pana lakkhaṇādivibhāvanāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānī''^eb^ti. tattha padaṭṭhānassa avuttattā āha ^b^``padaṭṭhānato panā''^eb^tiādi. avacanañca tassa tassatthassa paccayatoti ettha pakārantarena vibhāvitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^sabbāpī^eb^ti catassopi dhātuyo. āposaṅgahitāya tejonupālitāya vāyovitthambhitāya ^a^M2.0087^ea^ eva pathavīdhātuyā pavatti, na aññathāti sā sesabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānā, evamitarāpīti āha ^b^``avasesadhātuttayapadaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^catuvīsatividha^eb^nti gaṇanaparicchedo balarūpādīnaṃ paṭisedhanattho. tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. cakkhatīti ^b^cakkhu,^eb^ viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti attho. ^b^cakkhatī^eb^ti hi ayaṃ ^b^cakkhati^eb^-saddo ``madhuṃ cakkhati, byañjanaṃ cakkhatī''tiādīsu viya assādanattho. vuttañhetaṃ ``cakkhuṃ kho, māgaṇḍiya, rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasamudita''nti (ma0 ni0 2.209). aṭṭhakathāyampi vuccati ``rūpesu āviñchanarasa''nti (visuddhi0 2.433; dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 600). satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārammaṇādibhāve niruḷhattā dassane eva cakkhu-saddo pavattati padumādīsu paṅkajādisaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. atha vā ^b^cakkhatī^eb^ti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ viya hotīti attho. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ``vibhāveti cā''ti (mahāni0 aṭṭha0 13; vibha0 aṭṭha0 154) vuttaṃ. taṃ anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ vibhāvanatthatāpi cakkhati-saddassa sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. suṇāti etena, viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ sayaṃ vā suṇātīti ^b^sotaṃ^eb^. ghāyati etena, sayaṃ vā ghāyatīti ^b^ghānaṃ^eb^. rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitanimittaṃ āhāraraso jīvitaṃ, tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti ^b^jivhā^eb^ niruttinayena. kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti ^b^kāyo^eb^ anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu, kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā. tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti. kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti ^b^kāyo^eb^ vutto. vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ rūpayatīti ^b^rūpaṃ,^eb^ rūpamiva pakāsaṃ karoti saviggahamiva ^a^V2.0083^ea^ dassetīti attho. anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo. sappatīti ^b^saddo,^eb^ udāharīyati, sakehi vā paccayehi sappīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ upanīyatīti attho. gandhayatīti ^b^gandho,^eb^ attano vatthuṃ sūcayati apākaṭaṃ ``idaṃ sugandhaṃ, duggandha''nti pakāseti ^a^M2.0088^ea^, paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphaphalādiṃ ``idamettha atthī''ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho. rasanti taṃ sattāti ^b^raso,^eb^ asādentīti attho.

[03] itthiyāva indriyaṃ ^b^itthindriyaṃ,^eb^ tathā ^b^purisindriyaṃ^eb^. jīvanti tena sahajātadhammāti jīvitaṃ, tadeva indriyaṃ ^b^jīvitindriyaṃ^eb^. hadayañca taṃ vatthu ca, hadayassa vā manoviññāṇassa vatthu ^b^hadayavatthu^eb^. copanakāyabhāvato kāyo ca so adhippāyaviññāpanato viññatti cāti ^b^kāyaviññatti^eb^. copanavācābhāvato, adhippāyaviññāpanato ca vacī ca sā viññatti cāti ^b^vacīviññatti^eb^. viggahābhāvato na kassati, kasituṃ chindituṃ na sakkā, na vā kāsati dibbatīti akāsaṃ, akāsameva ākāsaṃ, tadeva nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena ^b^ākāsadhātu. rūpassā^eb^ti nipphannarūpassa. lahubhāvo ^b^lahutā^eb^. sayaṃ anipphannatāya ``rūpassā''ti visesitaṃ. esa nayo sesesupi. ayaṃ pana viseso -- kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo ^b^kammaññatā^eb^. paṭhamaṃ, upari ca cayo pavatti ^b^upacayo^eb^. pubbāparavasena sambandhā tati pavatti ^b^santati^eb^. aniccassa vināsino bhāvo ^b^aniccatā^eb^. kabalaṃ karīyatīti ^b^kabaḷīkāro^eb^. āharatīti ^b^āhāro^eb^. evaṃ tāva upādāyarūpaṃ saddatthato veditabbaṃ.

[03] kamato pana sabbesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvena mūlabhūtattā paṭhamaṃ bhūtarūpāni uddiṭṭhāni. itaresu ajjhattikabhāvena attabhāvasamaññāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīni pañca ādito uddiṭṭhāni. tesaṃ visayīnaṃ ime visayāti dassetuṃ rūpādīni cattāri uddiṭṭhāni. phoṭṭhabbaṃ pana anupādārūpattā, bhūtaggahaṇena gahitattā ca idha na gahitaṃ. svāyaṃ attabhāvo imehi ``itthī''ti vā ``puriso''ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ itthipurisindriyadvayaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. ``iminā jīvatī''ti vohāraṃ labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ tato jīvitindriyaṃ. tassa imaṃ nissāya viññāṇappavattiyaṃ attahitādisiddhīti dassanatthaṃ hadayavatthu. tassa imāsaṃ vasena sabbe kāyavacīpayogāti dassanatthaṃ viññattidvayaṃ. imāya rūpakāyassa paricchedo, añjaso cāti dassanatthaṃ ākāsadhātu. imehissa sukhappavatti, uppattiādayo ^a^V2.0084^ea^ cāti dassanatthaṃ lahutādayo. sabbo cāyaṃ catusantatirūpasantāno iminā upatthambhīyatīti dassanatthaṃ ante kabaḷīkāro āhāro uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.

[03] 433^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0089^ea^ yathāuddiṭṭhāni upādārūpāni lakkhaṇādito niddisituṃ ^b^``tattha rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇa''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu upādārūpesu. rūpe, rūpassa vā abhighāto rūpābhighāto, taṃ arahatīti rūpābhighātāraho, rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvo catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo ^b^rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādo,^eb^ evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cakkhūti attho. yasmā paccayantarasahito eva cakkhupasādo rūpābhihananavasena pavattati, na kevalo. tasmā taṃsabhāvatāva pamāṇaṃ, na rūpābhighātoti dassanatthaṃ rūpābhighātārahatā vuttā yathā vipākārahaṃ kusalākusalanti. abhighāto ca visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ abhimukhībhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ abhighāto viyāti katvā. so rūpe cakkhussa, rūpassa vā cakkhumhi hoti. tenāha ``yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā''ti, ``yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati vā''ti (dha0 sa0 597) ca ādi. paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇāyatanattabhāvanibbattakassa kammassa nidānabhūtā kāmataṇhā, rūpataṇhā ca tadāyatanikabhavapatthanābhāvato daṭṭhukāmatādivohāraṃ arahatīti dutiyanayo sabbattha vutto. tattha daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ etesanti ^b^daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānāni^eb^. evaṃvidhānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo ^b^daṭṭhukāmatā...pe0... pasādo,^eb^ evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cakkhu. tassa tassa hi bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā taṇhā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti kāmataṇhādīnaṃ daṭṭhukāmatādivohārārahatā vuttā.

[03] ^b^daṭṭhukāmatā^eb^ti hi daṭṭhumicchā, rūpataṇhāti attho. ettha ca daṭṭhukāmatāya, sesānañca taṃtaṃattabhāvanibbattakakammāyūhanakkhaṇato sati purimanibbattiyaṃ vattabbaṃ natthi, asati pana maggena asamugghātitabhāvoyeva kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. yato maggena asamucchinnaṃ kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa paccayabhāvūpagamanato vijjamānamevāti uppannatā atthitā pariyāyehi vuccati ``ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne ^a^M2.0090^ea^ pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.156), ``santaṃ ^a^V2.0085^ea^ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ `atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando'ti pajānātī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.382; ma0 ni0 1.115) ca evamādīsu.

[03] ^b^rūpesu^eb^ puggalassa, viññāṇassa vā ^b^āviñchanarasaṃ. ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nissayapaccayabhāvato. ^b^daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ yesaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo, tevassa āsannakāraṇanti katvā. ettha ca taṃtaṃattabhāvanipphādakasādhāraṇakammavasena purimaṃ cakkhulakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ kāraṇavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā. ``evarūpaṃ nāma me cakkhu hotū''ti evaṃ nibbattitāaveṇikakammavasena dutiyanti vadanti. satipi pana pañcannaṃ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa pasādabyāpārassa vasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ. pasādakāraṇassa satipi kammabhāvasāmaññe, ekatte vā attano kāraṇabhedena bhedadassanavasena dutiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. sotādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.

[03] etthāha -- cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kiṃ ekakammunā uppatti, udāhu nānākammunāti? ubhayathāpīti porāṇā. tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visese vattabbaṃ natthi kāraṇassa bhinnattā. ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṃ kathaṃ nesaṃ visesoti? kāraṇassa bhinnattā eva. taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammassa vicittabhedataṃ vidahati. yato tadāhitavisesaṃ taṃ tathārūpasamatthatāyogenānekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekaṃ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti. na cettha samatthatā samatthabhāvato aññā veditabbā kāraṇavisesena āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanayogyatāmattato. ayañca ekassapi kammassa anekindriyahetutāvisesayogo yuttito, āgamanato ca parato āgamissati. apica ekasseva kusalacittassa soḷasādivipākacittanibbattihetutā vuccati. lokepi ekasseva sālibījassa paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇataṇḍulāataṇḍulaphalanibbattihetutā dissateva, kiṃ vā etāya yutticintāya. yato kammaphalaṃ cakkhādīni, kammavipāko ca sabbaso buddhānaṃyeva ñāṇassa visayoti.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ ^b^kecī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0091^ea^ mahāsaṅghikesu ekacce. tesu hi ^b^vasudhammo^eb^ evaṃ vadati ``cakkhumhi tejo adhikaṃ, sote vāyu, ghāne pathavī, jivhāya āpo, kāye sabbepi samā''ti. cakkhādīsu tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṃ tadadhikatāyāti dassento ^b^``tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0086^ea^ ^b^pasādo cakkhū''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^kāyo sabbesa^eb^nti ko ettha viseso, nanu tejādiadhikānañca bhūtānaṃ pasādā sabbesaṃyevāti? saccametaṃ, idaṃ pana ``sabbesa''nti vacanaṃ samānānanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti anuvattamānassa ekadesādhikabhāvassa nivāraṇavasena vuttattā. tejādīnaṃ hi paccekaṃ adhikabhāve viya dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ekakādivasena labbhamānāya omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti pākaṭoyamattho. tasmā catunnampi bhūtānaṃ samabhāvena kāyappasādo hotīti sabbasaddo idha samabhāvadīpako daṭṭhabbo. ^b^tejādīna^eb^nti padīpasaṅkhātassa tejassa obhāsarūpena, vāyussa saddena, pathaviyā gandhena, kheḷasaṅkhātassa udakassa rasenāti purimavāde, pacchimavāde ca yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehi anuggayhabhāvato, rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇe upakāritabbatoti attho. ālokādisahakārīkāraṇasahitānaṃyeva cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādiavabhāsanasamatthatā, vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇūpanissayabhāvo guṇoti tesaṃ laddhi. tejādīnaṃ viya pana vivarassa bhūtabhāvābhāvato yathāyoga-ggahaṇaṃ. atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti parādhippāye tejassa ālokarūpena, ākāsasaṅkhātassa vivarassa saddena, vāyussa gandhena, udakassa rasena, pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti evaṃ yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanato^eb^ti aggimhi rūpassa pabhassarassa, vāyumhi saddassa sabhāvena suyyamānassa, pathaviyā surabhiādino gandhassa, āpe ca rasassa madhurassāti imesaṃ visesayuttānaṃ dassanato ``rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā''ti paṭhamavādī āhāti. tasseva ^b^``iccheyyāmā''^eb^tiādinā uttaramāha. imināva upāyena dutiyavādinopi niggaho hotīti. atha vā rūpādivisesaguṇehi tejāakāsapathavīāpavāyūhi cakkhādīni katānīti vadantassa ^b^kaṇādassa^eb^ vādaṃ uddharitvā ^a^M2.0092^ea^ taṃ niggahetuṃ ^b^``athāpi vadeyyu''^eb^ntiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. āsave upalabbhamānopi gandho pathaviyā āposaṃyuttāya kappāsato visadisāyāti na kappāsagandhassa adhikabhāvāpattīti ce? na, anabhibhūtattā. āsave hi udakasaṃyuttā pathavī udakena abhibhūtā, na kappāsapathavīti tassa eva gandhena adhikena bhavitabbaṃ. uṇhodakasaṃyutto ca aggi upalabbhanīyo mahantoti katvā tassa phasso viya vaṇṇopi pabhassaro upalabbheyyāti uṇhodake vaṇṇato agginā anabhisambandhassa sītodakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti etassa ubhayassa abhāvā. tadabhāvena hi rūpādīnaṃ tejādivisesaguṇatā nivattitā. tannivattanena ``tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato''ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ nivattitanti evaṃ ^a^V2.0087^ea^ paramparāya ubhayābhāvo visesaparikappanapahānassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``tasmā pahāyeta''^eb^ntiādi. ekakalāpepi rūparasādayo visadisā, ko pana vādo nānākalāpe cakkhādayo bhūtavisesābhāvepīti dassetuṃ rūparasādinidassanaṃ vuttaṃ.

[01] yadi bhūtaviseso natthi, kiṃ pana cakkhādivisesassa kāraṇanti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ aññamaññassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ekampi kammaṃ pañcāyatanikattabhāvabhavappatthanānipphannaṃ cakkhādivisesahetutāya aññamaññassa asādhāraṇanti ca kammavisesoti ca vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. na hi taṃ yena visesena cakkhussa paccayo, teneva sotassa paccayo hoti indriyantarābhāvappattito. ``paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo''ti (paṭṭhā0 2.12.78) vacanena paṭisandhikkhaṇe vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati. nānācetanāya hi tadā indriyuppattiyaṃ sati parittena ca mahaggatena ca kammunā nibbattitaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyyāti. na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hotīti siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotīti.

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ anallīno nissayo etassāti ^b^anallīnanissayo,^eb^ rūpasaddasaṅkhāto visayo. gandharasānaṃ nissayā ghānajivhānaṃ nissaye allīyantīti ^a^M2.0093^ea^ te nissayavasena allīnā. phoṭṭhabbaṃ sayaṃ kāyanissayāllīnaṃ bhūtattā. aparo nayo -- cakkhusotāni appattavisayaggāhakāni sāntare, adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato. sotampi sampattavisayaggāhīti keci. yadi sotaṃ sampattaggāhi, cittajo saddo sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ na siyā. na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ uppatti atthi. ^b^pāḷiya^eb^ñca avisesena saddārammaṇassa sotaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvo vutto. kiñca disādesavavatthānañca saddassa na siyā, attano visayipadesassa eva gahetabbato gandho viya. tasmā yattha uppanno saddo, tattheva ṭhito. sace sotapathe āpāthamāgacchati, nanu dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyantīti? na dūrāsannānaṃ yathāpākaṭe sadde gahaṇavisesato. yathā hi dūrāsannānaṃ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭe gahaṇavisesato ākāravisesānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ, gahaṇañca hoti, evaṃ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa ādito pabhuti yāva avasānā kamena pākaṭībhūte, dūrassa ca avasāne, majjhe vā piṇḍavasena pavattipākaṭībhūte nicchayaggahaṇānaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṃ visesato lahukaṃ suto ``cirena suto''ti adhimāno hoti. so pana saddo yattha uppanno, tannissitova attano vijjamānakkhaṇe sotassa āpāthamāgacchati ^a^V2.0088^ea^. yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi, kathaṃ paṭighosuppattīti? dūre ṭhitopi saddo aññattha paṭighosuppattiyā, bhājanādicalanassa ca ayokanto viya ayocalanassa paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ pubbe lakkhaṇādinā vibhāvitampi cakkhuṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānādito vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``cakkhu cetthā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha cakkhu sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. ^b^ca^eb^-kāro byatirekattho, tenassa vuccamānameva visesaṃ joteti. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu yathāniddiṭṭhesu pañcasu upādārūpesu. ^b^``sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidese''^eb^ti etena avasesaṃ kaṇhamaṇḍalaṃ paṭikkhipati. snehamiva ^b^satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā^eb^ ṭhitāheva attano nissayabhūtāhi ^b^catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ^eb^ tannissiteheva āyuvaṇṇādīhi anupālitaṃ parivāritaṃ tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi ^b^utucittāhārehi^eb^ ^a^M2.0094^ea^ ^b^upatthambhiyamānaṃ tiṭṭhati^eb^. sattākkhipaṭalabyāpanavacaneneva cakkhussa anekakalāpagatabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^pamāṇato ūkāsiramatta^eb^nti ūkāsiramatte padese pavattanato vuttaṃ. cakkhuviññāṇassa ^b^vatthubhāvaṃ^eb^ nissayabhāvato āvajjanasampaṭicchanādīnaṃ tadārammaṇāvasānānaṃ ^b^dvārabhāvaṃ^eb^ samavasaraṭṭhānato. taṃ panetaṃ cakkhu adhiṭṭhānabhedato, tatthāpi paccekaṃ anekakalāpagatabhāvato anekampi samānaṃ sāmaññaniddesena āvajjanāya ekattā, ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva ca kiccakarattā ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. evampi bahūsu kathamekasseva kiccakarattaṃ. yaṃ tattha visadaṃ hutvā rūpābhighātārahaṃ, taṃ viññāṇassa nissayo hotīti gahetabbaṃ. phoṭṭhabbaviseso viya kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇabhāve.
[03] ^b^manupassatī^eb^ti ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro, atha vā ^b^manū^eb^ti macco.
[03] ^b^aṅgulivedhakaṃ^eb^ aṅgulīyakaṃ.

[03] visamajjhāsayatāya cakkhu vammikachiddābhiratasappo viya, bilajjhāsayatāya sotaṃ udakabilābhiratakumbhīlo viya, ākāsajjhāsayatāya ghānaṃ ajaṭākāsābhiratapakkhī viya, gāmajjhāsayatāya jivhā gāmābhiratakukkuro viya, upādinnakajjhāsayatāya kāyo āmakasusānābhiratasiṅgālo viya passitabboti dassento ^b^``vammi...pe0... daṭṭhabbā''^eb^ti āha. visamajjhāsayatā ca cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttā, cakkhumato vā puggalassa ^a^V2.0089^ea^ ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. esa nayo sesesupi. sabbopi ca yathāvutto papañco sotādīsupi yathārahaṃ veditabbo.

[03] 437^b^.^eb^ cakkhumhi, cakkhussa vā paṭihananaṃ cakkhupaṭihananaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. paṭihananañcettha yathāvutto abhighātova. ^b^visayabhāvo^eb^ ārammaṇapaccayatā. kāmaṃ sā eva gocaratā, tathāpi visayagocarānaṃ ayaṃ viseso -- anaññatthabhāvo, tabbahulacāritā ca cakkhuviññāṇassa. visayabhāve cassa yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. ^b^yattha pana^eb^ kāyaviññattiādike.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ itthiyā ^a^M2.0095^ea^ bhāvo, ``itthī''ti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ, abhidhānañcāti itthibhāvo, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^itthibhāvalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. tato eva ``itthī''ti taṃsahitaṃ santānaṃ pakāsentaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``itthīti pakāsanarasa''^eb^nti. vaṭṭaṃsatā avisadahatthapādāditā ca ^b^itthiliṅgaṃ^eb^. thanamaṃsāvisadatā, nimmassudāṭhitā, kesabandhanaṃ, vatthaggahaṇañca ``itthī''ti sañjānanassa paccayabhāvato ^b^itthinimittaṃ^eb^. daharakālepi suppakamusalakādīhi kīḷā, mattikatakkena suttakantanādi ca ^b^itthikuttaṃ,^eb^ itthikiriyāti attho. avisadaṭṭhānagamanādiko ākāro ^b^itthākappo^eb^. aparo nayo -- itthīnaṃ muttakaraṇaṃ ^b^itthiliṅgaṃ^eb^. sarādhippāyā ^b^itthinimittaṃ^eb^. avisadaṭṭhānagamananisajjākhādanabhojanādikā ^b^itthikuttaṃ^eb^. itthisaṇṭhānaṃ ^b^itthākappo^eb^. imāni ca itthiliṅgādīni yathāsakaṃ kammādinā paccayena uppajjamānānipi yebhuyyena itthindriyasahite eva santāne taṃtadākārāni hutvā uppajjantīti itthindriyaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``itthiliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna''^eb^nti. itthiliṅgādīsu eva ca kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā, indriyasahite santāne itthiliṅgādiākārarūpapaccayānaṃ aññathā anuppādanato, itthiggahaṇassa ca tesaṃ rūpānaṃ paccayabhāvato.

[01] yasmā pana bhāvadasakepi rūpānaṃ itthindriyaṃ na janakaṃ, nāpi anupālakaṃ, upatthambhakaṃ vā, na ca aññesaṃ kalāparūpānaṃ, tasmā taṃ jīvitindriyaṃ viya sakalāparūpānaṃ, āhāro viya vā kalāpantararūpānañca ``indriyātthiavigatapaccayo''ti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ. yasmā ca paccayantarādhīnāni liṅgādīni, tasmā yatthassa ādhipaccaṃ, taṃsadisesu matacittakatarūpesupi taṃsaṇṭhānatā dissati. esa nayo purisindriyepi. yaṃ panettha visadisaṃ, taṃ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ ^a^V2.0090^ea^. tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekasmiṃ santāne saha na pavattati ``yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? no''tiādi (yama0 3.indriyayamaka.188) vacanato, tasmā ubhatobyañjanakassāpi ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. ye pana ``sarīrekadesavutti bhāvarūpa''nti vadanti, tesampi taṃ micchāti dassetuṃ ^b^``tadubhayampi...pe0... byāpakamevā''^eb^ti vatvā yadi evaṃ kāyappasādena saṅkaro siyāti āsaṅkaṃ nivattento ^b^``na ca kāyappasādenā''^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho -- yadipi ^a^M2.0096^ea^ sakalasarīrabyāpitāya kāyappasādena aṭṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati, tena pana bhinnanissayattā ṭhitokāse ṭhitantipi vattabbataṃ nāpajjatīti ayameva cettha nippariyāyakathā. ^b^``rūparasādayo viyā''^eb^ti etena samānanissayesupi nāma ^b^saṅkaro natthi^eb^ lakkhaṇabhedato, kimaṅgaṃ pana bhinnanissayasabhāvesūti dasseti.

[03] 439^b^.^eb^ ^b^sahajarūpānupālanalakkhaṇa^eb^nti attanā sahajātarūpānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ. jīvitindriyassa ekantakammajattā sahaja-ggahaṇeneva anupāletabbānampi kammajabhāvo siddhoti kammaja-ggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinopi kammajarūpassa pavattihetubhāvena taṃ anupālakaṃ, tasmā sahajarūpānupālanalakkhaṇaṃ. na hi kammajānaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ arahati āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya. kiṃ kāraṇā? taṅkhaṇābhāvato. ^b^tesa^eb^nti sahajarūpānaṃ. ^b^pavattanaṃ^eb^ yāpanaṃ. ^b^ṭhapanaṃ^eb^ ṭhitihetutā. attanā anupālanavasena yāpetabbāni pavattetabbāni bhūtāni etassa padaṭṭhānanti ^b^yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ. anupālanalakkhaṇādimhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pavattanarasādimeva saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^atthikkhaṇeyevā^eb^ti anupāletabbānaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva. asati anupāletabbe uppalādimhi kiṃ udakaṃ anupāleyya. yadi kammajānaṃ ṭhitihetumantarena ṭhiti na hoti, jīvitindriyassa ko ṭhitihetūti āha ^b^``saya''^eb^ntiādi. yadi kammajānaṃ ṭhānaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ, atha kasmā sabbakālaṃ na ṭhapetīti āha ^b^``na bhaṅgato''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tassa tassa^eb^ anupālanādikassa ^b^sādhanato^eb^. taṃ sādhanañca jīvamānatāvisesassa paccayabhāvato. indriyabaddharūpassa hi matarūpato kammajassa, tadanubandhabhūtassa ca utusamuṭṭhānādito jīvitindriyakato viseso, na kevalaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitiyā eva, pabandhānupacchedassāpi jīvitindriyaṃ kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, itarathā āyukkhayato maraṇaṃ na yujjeyyāti.

[03] 440^b^.^eb^ ^b^manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthū^eb^ti kathametaṃ viññātabbanti? āgamato, yuttito ca. ``yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca ^a^V2.0091^ea^ pavattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo''ti ^a^M2.0097^ea^ (paṭṭhā0 1.1.8) evamādi āgamo. yadi evaṃ, kasmā rūpakaṇḍe taṃ na vuttanti? tattha avacanaṃ aññakāraṇaṃ. kiṃ pana tanti? desanābhedo. yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇādīni ekantato cakkhādinissayāni, na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantena hadayavatthunissayaṃ. nissitavasena ca vatthudukādidesanā pavattā ``atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu, atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa na vatthū''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 584). yampi ekantato hadayavatthunissayaṃ, tassa vasena ``atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū''tiādinā dukādīsu vuccamānesupi na tadanuguṇā ārammaṇadukādayo sambhavanti. na hi ``atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa''nti sakkā vattunti vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyunti ekarasā desanā na bhaveyya. ekarasañca desanaṃ desetuṃ idha satthu ajjhāsayo. tasmā tattha hadayavatthu na vuttaṃ, na alabbhamānattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] yutti pana evaṃ veditabbā -- nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dhātudvayaṃ pañcavokārabhave. tattha rūpāyatanādīnaṃ, ojāya ca indriyabaddhato bahipi pavattidassanato na taṃnissayatā yujjati, itthipurisindriyānampi tadubhayarahitepi santāne dhātudvayadassanato na taṃnissayatā yujjati, jīvitindriyassāpi aññakiccaṃ vijjatīti na taṃnissayatā yujjati evāti pārisesato hadayavatthu, tesaṃ nissayoti viññāyati. sakkā hi vattuṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dhātudvayaṃ pañcavokārabhave rūpapaṭibaddhavuttibhāvato. yaṃ yañhi rūpapaṭibaddhavutti, taṃ taṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ diṭṭhaṃ yathā ``cakkhuviññāṇadhātū''ti. ``pañcavokārabhave''ti ca visesanaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuvasena kataṃ. manodhātu pana catuvokārabhave nattheva. nanu ca indriyanissayatāyapi sādhanato viruddho hetu āpajjatīti? na diṭṭhabādhanato. diṭṭhaṃ hetaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa viya dhātudvayassa vatthuno mandatikkhādiananuvidhānaṃ. tathā hissa pāḷiyaṃ indriyapaccayatā na vuttā. tena tadanuvidhānasaṅkhātā indriyanissayatā bādhīyati. hotu dhātudvayanissayo hadayavatthu, upādāyarūpañca, etaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ, paṭiniyatakiccaṃ, hadayapadese ṭhitamevāti kathaṃ viññāyatīti? vuccate -- vatthurūpabhāvato ^b^kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ cakkhu viya, tato eva ^a^M2.0098^ea^ ^b^paṭiniyatakiccaṃ,^eb^ vatthurūpabhāvatoti ca viññāṇanissayabhāvatoti attho. aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā kiñci cintentassa hadayassa khijjanato tatthetamavaṭṭhitanti viññāyati. ^b^tāsaññeva dhātūna^eb^nti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃyeva ^a^V2.0092^ea^. nissayabhāvato upari āropetvā vahantaṃ viya paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^ubbahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ abhikkamo ādi yesaṃ te abhikkamādī. ādi-saddena paṭikkamasamiñjanapasāraṇaukkhepanāvekkhepanādikā sabbā kiriyā pariggayhati. tesaṃ abhikkamādīnaṃ pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā ^b^abhikkamādippavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,^eb^ vāyodhātu. tassā yaṃ sahajarūpakāyassa thambhanasandhāraṇacalanasaṅkhātaṃ kiccaṃ, tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso kāyaviññatti nāmāti dassento āha ^b^``abhikkamādi...pe0... kāyaviññattī''^eb^ti.

[03] kassa pana ākāravikāroti? sāmatthiyato vāyodhātuadhikānaṃ cittajamahābhūtānaṃ. kiṃ taṃ sāmatthiyaṃ? cittajatā, upādāyarūpatā ca. atha vā vāyodhātuyā ākāravikāro sahaja...pe0... paccayoti sambandhitabbaṃ. yadi evaṃ viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo na yujjati. na hi upādāyarūpaṃ ekabhūtasannissayaṃ atthi. ``catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa''nti hi vuttaṃ, nāyaṃ doso catunnaṃ vikāro catūsu ekassāpi hoti catusādhāraṇadhanaṃ viya. vāyodhātuadhikatāya ca kalāpassa ``vāyodhātuyā''ti vacanaṃ na virujjhati. evaṃ adhikatā ca sāmatthiyato, na pamāṇato. aññathā hi avinibbhogavuttitā na yujjeyya. vāyodhātuyā evāti keci. tesaṃ matena viññattiyā upādāyarūpatā durupapādā. na hi ekassa vikāro catunnaṃ hoti. sā panāyaṃ hatthacalanādīsu phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaramaviññāyamānantarena manodvārajavanena gayhati. phandamānavaṇṇavinimutto koci vikāro atthi. tassa ca taggahaṇānantaraṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti kathametaṃ viññāyatīti adhippāyaggahaṇato. na hi viññattivikārarahitesu rukkhacalanādīsu ``idamesa kāreti maññe''ti adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0099^ea^ diṭṭhaṃ, hatthacalanādīsu pana diṭṭhaṃ. tasmā phandamānavaṇṇavinimutto koci vikāro atthi adhippāyassa ñāpakoti viññāyati. ñāpako ca hetu ñāpetabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ gahito eva ñāpeti, na vijjamānatāmattenāti vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ vikāraggahaṇampi anumānato viññāyati. tathā hi vadanti --
[21] ``visayattamanāpannā, saddā nevatthabodhakā.
[22] na sattāmattato atthe, te aññātā pakāsakā''ti..

[03] yadi ^a^V2.0093^ea^ vikāraggahaṇameva kāraṇaṃ adhippāyaggahaṇassa, kasmā aggahitasaṅketānaṃ adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ na hotīti? na kevalaṃ vikāraggahaṇameva adhippāyaggahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ, atha kho purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca imassa upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. thambhanasandhāraṇacalanāni viññattivikārasahitāya vāyodhātuyā hontīti vuttaṃ. kiṃ sabbāva vāyodhātū sabbāni tāni karontīti? nayidamevaṃ. sattamajavanasambhūtā hi vāyodhātu purimajavanasambhūtā vāyodhātuyo upathambhakapaccaye labhitvā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajarūpaṃ, na itarā. itarā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattaṃ karontiyo tassā upakārāya honti. desantaruppatti eva calananti nimitte ca kattubhāvo samāropitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. aññathā dhammānaṃ abyāpāratā, khaṇikatā ca na siyā. sattahi yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭamettha ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ nidassitaṃ. cittajarūpe pana calante taṃsambandhatāya utukammāhārajarūpampi calati nadīsote pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍaṃ viya phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ viññattiggahaṇassa vuttattā. kiṃ calanakarā eva vāyodhātu viññattivikārasahitāti? nayidamevaṃ, tathā calayitumasakkuṇantiyopi thambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā paṭhamajavanādisambhūtāpi vāyodhātuyo viññattivikārasahitā evāti gahetabbaṃ. yena disābhāgenāyaṃ abhikkamādiṃ pavattetukāmo, tadabhimukhavikārasabbhāvato. adhippāyasahabhāvī hi vikāro viññatti. evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakavacanaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati. yathāvuttavikāraggahaṇamukhena taṃsamaṅgino adhippāyo viññāyatīti vuttaṃ ^b^``adhippāyappakāsanarasā''^eb^ti.

[03] kāyavipphandanassa ^a^M2.0100^ea^ hetubhūtāya vāyodhātuyā vikārabhāvato pariyāyena viññatti ^b^kāyavipphandanahetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ vuttā. ^b^cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātupadaṭṭhānā^eb^ti ca vāyodhātuyā kiccādhikatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā^eb^ti kāyavipphandanena karaṇabhūtena adhippāyassa viññāpanahetubhāvato kāyaviññattīti vuccatīti sambandho. ayañhettha attho -- viññāpetīti viññatti. kiṃ viññāpeti? adhippāyaṃ. kena? kāyena. kīdisena? vipphandamānenāti. dutiyanaye pana yathāvuttena kāyena viññāyatīti ^b^kāyaviññatti^eb^. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] atthāvabodhanasamattho vacīviseso ^b^vacībhedo^eb^. tena vāyuvanappatinadīghosādiṃ nivatteti. tassa pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā ^b^vacībhedappavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,^eb^ pathavīdhātu. tassā yaṃ upādinnasaṅkhātassa ^a^V2.0094^ea^ akkharuppattiṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭanasaññitaṃ kiccaṃ, tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso vacīviññatti nāmāti dassento āha ^b^``vacībhe...pe0... vacīviññattī''^eb^ti.

[03] idāni ``kassa pana ākāravikāro''tiādi kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ayaṃ pana viseso -- yathā tattha ``phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantara''nti vuttaṃ, evamidha ``suyyamānasaddasavanānantara''nti yojetabbaṃ. idha ca thambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato ``sattamajavanasambhūtā''tiādinayo na labbhati. ghaṭṭanena hi saddhiṃ saddo uppajjati. ghaṭṭanañca paṭhamajavanādīsupi labbhateva. ^b^ghaṭṭanaṃ^eb^ paccayavasena bhūtakalāpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āsannataruppādo. ^b^calanaṃ^eb^ ekassāpi desantaruppādaparamparatāti ayametesaṃ viseso. yathā ca vāyodhātuyā calanaṃ kiccaṃ, evaṃ pathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``pathavīdhātuyā upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayo''^eb^ti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^yathā hī^eb^tiādi kāyavacīviññattīnaṃ anumānavasena gahetabbabhāvavibhāvanaṃ. ^b^yathā hi ussāpetvā baddhagosīsādi^eb^rūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā gosīsādīnaṃ udakasahacārippakārasaññāṇākāraṃ gahetvā udakaggahaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānavaṇṇasadde gahetvā tadanantarapavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā purimasiddhasambandhagahaṇūpanissayasahitāya sādhippāyavikāraggahaṇaṃ hoti.

[03] 442^b^.^eb^ rūpāni ^a^M2.0101^ea^ paricchindati, sayaṃ vā tehi paricchijjati, rūpānaṃ vā paricchedamattaṃ rūpaparicchedo, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti ^b^rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇā^eb^. ayaṃ hi ākāsadhātu taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindantī viya hoti. tenāha ^b^``rūpapariyantappakāsanarasā''^eb^ti. atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ hutvā gayhati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``rūpamariyādapaccupaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti. yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ paricchedo, teheva ^b^asamphuṭṭhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^. vijjamānepi hi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ so paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhova. aññathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito. abyāpitā hi asamphuṭṭhatā. tenāha bhagavā ``asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehī''ti (dha0 sa0 637, 724). kaṇṇacchiddamukhavivarādivasena ca ^b^chiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vā^eb^. yesaṃ rūpānaṃ paricchedo, tattheva tesaṃ paricchedabhāvena labbhatīti vuttaṃ ^b^``paricchinnarūpapadaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti. ^b^``yāya paricchinnesū''^eb^tiādinā ākāsadhātuyā taṃtaṃkalāpānaṃ kalāpantarehi asaṅkarakāraṇataṃ dasseti.

[03] 443^b^.^eb^ ^b^adandhatā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0095^ea^ agarutā. ^b^vinodanaṃ^eb^ vikkhipanaṃ, apanayananti attho. ^b^athaddhatā^eb^ti akathinatā. attano mudubhāveneva sabbakiriyāsu ^b^avirodhitā^eb^. mudu hi katthaci na virujjhati. tīsupi ṭhānesu paṭipakkhe ^b^a^eb^-kāro dandhatādihetūnaṃ paṭipakkhasamuṭṭhānattā lahutādīnanti keci. apare pana ``sattāpaṭisedhe''ti vadanti. sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ anukūlatāsaṅkhātakammaññabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti ^b^sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā^eb^. akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma hotīti kammaññatā ^b^adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ vuttā.

[03] lahutādīnaṃ aññamaññāvijahanena duviññeyyanānattatā vuttāti taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehi taṃnānattappakāsanatthaṃ ^b^``evaṃ santepī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^dhātukkhobho^eb^ vātapittasemhapakopo, rasādidhātūnaṃ vā vikārāvatthā. dvidhā vuttopi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃyeva vikāroti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^paṭipakkhapaccayā^eb^ sappāyautuāhārāvikkhittacittatā. te ca taṃtaṃvikārassa visesapaccayabhāvato vuttā, avisesena pana ^a^M2.0102^ea^ sabbe sabbesaṃ paccayā. yato nesaṃ aññamaññāvijahanaṃ, iddhivaḷañjanādīsu viya vasavattanaṃ ^b^maddavappakāro. suparimadditacammasudhantasuvaṇṇa^eb^gahaṇañcettha mudukammaññasadisarūpanidassanamattaṃ, na taṃ idha adhippetaṃ mudutākammaññatāsabbhāvato. na hi anindriyabaddharūpasantāne lahutādīni sambhavanti, indriyabaddhepi rūpabhave na santi dandhattakarādidhātukkhobhābhāvato. sati hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhānāhi lahutādīhi bhavitabbanti keci, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. na hi vūpasametabbapaccanīkāpekkho tabbirodhidhammasamuppādo, tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvova siyā. kasmā pana kammajarūpesu lahutādayo na hontīti? paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā. aññathā sabbadābhāvīhi lahutādīhi bhavitabbaṃ siyāti.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ ādi cayo, īsaṃ vā cayoti ācayo, yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato āgatassa viya cayoti vā ācayo, tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ācayo lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^ācayalakkhaṇo. rūpassa upacayo^eb^ paṭhamuppādo, vaḍḍhi ca ``upaññattaṃ upasitta''ntiādīsu viya upa-saddassa paṭhamūpariatthassa nidassanato. ^b^pubbantato^eb^ti pubbakoṭṭhāsato, anāgatabhāvatoti attho. uppajjamāne rūpadhamme uppādo anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``ummujjāpanaraso''^eb^ti. tathā so ``ime rūpadhammā''ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti āha ^b^``niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno''^eb^ti. ^b^paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā^eb^ ``uparicayo upacayo''ti imassa atthassa vasena ^a^V2.0096^ea^ veditabbā. ^b^pavattilakkhaṇā^eb^ti rūpānaṃ pavattananti lakkhitabbā. ^b^anuppabandhanarasā^eb^ti pubbāparavasena anu anu pabandhanakiccā. tato eva anupacchedavasena gahetabbato ^b^anupacchedapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^.

[03] ^b^ubhayampī^eb^ti upacayo santatīti ubhayampi. ^b^jātirūpassevā^eb^ti rūpuppādasseva ^b^adhivacanaṃ^eb^. yadi evaṃ kasmā vibhajja vuttāti āha ^b^``ākāranānattato''^eb^ti, jātirūpassa pavattiākārabhedatoti attho. veneyyavasena vibhajjakathane kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati. kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ, pavattiākāranānattato jātirūpassa bhedo, na sabhāvatoti ^a^M2.0103^ea^? niddesatoti dassento ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yo āyatanāna^eb^nti yo aḍḍhekādasannaṃ rūpāyatanānaṃ ādicayattā ^b^``ācayo''^eb^ti vutto. ^b^so^eb^ eva ^b^upacayo^eb^ paṭhamuppādabhāvato upa-saddo paṭhamatthoti katvā. ^b^yo^eb^ pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā ^b^upacayo, sā^eb^ eva ^b^santati^eb^ anupabandhavasena uppattibhāvato. atha vā ^b^yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo^eb^ paṭhamabhāvena upalakkhito uppādo, so pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā ^b^upacayo,^eb^ vaḍḍhīti attho. upacayo vaḍḍhibhāvena upalakkhito uppādo, ^b^sā^eb^ eva ^b^santati^eb^ pabandhākārena uppattibhāvato. tenāha ^b^``aṭṭhakathāyampī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^evaṃ kiṃ kathita^eb^nti ``yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 641) niddesena kiṃ atthajātaṃ kathitaṃ hoti? āyatanena ācayo kathito. ācayupacayasantatiyo hi nibbattibhāvena ācayo evāti āyatanehi ācayādīnaṃ pakāsitattā tehi ācayo kathito. āyatanānaṃ ācayādivacaneneva ācayasabhāvāni uppādadhammāni āyatanānīti ācayena taṃpakatikaṃ āyatanaṃ kathitaṃ. lakkhaṇañhi uppādo, na rūparūpanti.

[03] ^b^rūpaparipāko^eb^ rūpadhammānaṃ jiṇṇatā. ^b^upanayanarasā^eb^ti bhaṅgupanayanakiccā. ^b^sabhāvānapagamepī^eb^ti kakkhaḷatādisabhāvassa avigamepi. ṭhitikkhaṇe hi jarā, na ca tadā dhammo sabhāvaṃ vijahati nāma. ^b^navabhāvo^eb^ uppādāvatthā, tassa apagamabhāvena gayhatīti āha ^b^``navabhāvāpagamapaccupaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti. ^b^``arūpadhammāna''^eb^nti idaṃ tesaṃ jarāya suṭṭhu paṭicchannatāya vuttaṃ. rūpadhammānampi hi khaṇikajarā paṭicchannā eva, yā avīcijarātipi vuccati. ^b^esa vikāro^eb^ti khaṇḍiccādivikāramāha. so hi arūpadhammesu na labbhati. yā avīcijarā nāma, tassāpi ^a^V2.0097^ea^ esa vikāro natthīti sambandhitabbaṃ. natthi etissā jarāya vīcīti ^b^avīcijarā,^eb^ navabhāvato duviññeyyantarajarāti attho.

[03] parito sabbaso ``bhijjana''nti lakkhitabbāti ^b^paribhedalakkhaṇā^eb^. niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ, rūpaṃ pana khaṇabhaṅgitāya yena bhaṅgena na niccanti aniccaṃ, so aniccassa bhāvoti ^b^aniccatā^eb^. sā pana yasmā ṭhitippattaṃ rūpaṃ vināsabhāvena ^a^M2.0104^ea^ saṃsīdantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``saṃsīdanarasā''^eb^ti. yasmā ca sā rūpadhammānaṃ bhaṅgabhāvato khayavayākāreneva gayhati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``khayavayapaccupaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti.

[03] 445^b^.^eb^ ^b^ojālakkhaṇo^eb^ti ettha aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sāro upathambhabalakaro bhūtanissito eko viseso ojā. kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti ^b^kabaḷīkāro^eb^. āharīyatīti ^b^āhāro,^eb^ kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharīyatīti attho. idaṃ pana savatthukaṃ ojaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā eva ajjhattikāhāro rūpaṃ uppādeti, so pana rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro. tenāha ^b^``rūpāharaṇaraso''^eb^ti. tato eva ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppādanena imassa kāyassa ^b^upathambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^. ojāya rūpāharaṇakiccaṃ bāhirādhīnanti āha ^b^``āharitabbavatthupadaṭṭhāno''^eb^ti.

[03] 446^b^.^eb^ ^b^balarūpa^eb^ntiādīsu imasmiṃ kāye balaṃ nāma atthi, sambhavo nāma atthi, rogo nāma atthi, ``jāti sañjātī''ti (vibha0 191) vacanato jāti nāma atthi, tehipi catūhi mahābhūtehi vinā abhāvato upādāyarūpehi bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. ^b^ekaccāna^eb^nti abhayagirivāsīnaṃ. ^b^paṭikkhitta^eb^nti ettha evaṃ paṭikkhepo veditabbo -- middhaṃ rūpameva na hoti nīvaraṇesu desitattā. yassa hi nīvaraṇesu desanā, taṃ na rūpaṃ yathā kāmacchando. siyā panetaṃ duvidhaṃ middhaṃ rūpaṃ, arūpañcāti. tattha yaṃ arūpaṃ, taṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ ``na rūpa''nti? taṃ na, visesavacanābhāvato. na hi visesetvā middhaṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ, tasmā middhassa duvidhataṃ parikappetvāpi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ nivattetuṃ. sakkā hi vattuṃ ``yaṃ taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ, tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvattā itaraṃ middhaṃ viyā''ti.

[03] bhavatu ^a^V2.0098^ea^ nīvaraṇaṃ, ko virodhoti ce? nīvaraṇañca pahātabbaṃ. pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya ``addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā''ti (su0 ni0 546) vacanato. appahātabbañca rūpaṃ ``katame dhammā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā? catūsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ, catūsu bhūmīsu vipāko, tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ, rūpañca nibbānañca. ime dhammā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā''ti ^a^M2.0105^ea^ (dha0 sa0 1407) vacanato. na cettha tadārammaṇakilesappahānaṃ adhippetaṃ ``rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahathā''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 3.34) viya kāmacchandādīnaṃ tathā pahānassa anadhippetattā. tasmā na middhaṃ rūpaṃ. yadi middhassa rūpabhāvaṃ na sampaṭicchatha, kathaṃ bhagavato niddā. middhañhi ``niddāpacalāyikā''tiādinā vibhaṅge vibhattattā niddāti? na middhaṃ niddā, niddāhetubhāvato pana taṃ ``niddā''ti vibhattaṃ yathā itthiliṅgādi. evampi niddāhetuno middhassa abhāvato kathaṃ bhagavato niddāti? niddā bhagavato sarīragilāniyā, na middhena. sā ca natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ ``piṭṭhi me āgilāyati, tamahaṃ āyamissāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 2.22) vacanato. na cettha evamavadhāraṇaṃ middhameva niddāhetūti, niddāhetu eva middhanti evamavadhāraṇā. tasmā aññopi atthi niddāhetu, ko pana soti? sarīragilāniyā. tena vuttaṃ ``niddā bhagavato sarīragilāniyā, na middhenā''ti.

[03] niddā ca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ ``abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ aggivessana...pe0... divā supitā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.387) vacanato. itopi na middhaṃ rūpaṃ sampayogavacanato. vuttañhi ``thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇena nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā''tiādi (dha0 sa0 1176). na cettha yathālābhabhavanaṃ? sakkā paccetuṃ ``sakkharakathalikampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī''tiādi (dī0 ni0 1.249) viya appasiddhatāya rūpabhāvassa. siddhe hi tassa rūpabhāve sambhavato yathālābhapaccayo yujjeyyāti. itopi na rūpaṃ middhaṃ āruppesu uppajjanato. vuttampi cetaṃ ``nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā''ti (paṭṭhā0 3.8.8) imassa vibhaṅge ``āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ uppajjatī''ti vitthāro. tasmā ``na middhaṃ rūpa''nti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ supaṭikkhittameva.

[03] ^b^itaresū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0099^ea^ balarūpādīsu. kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi rogassa visabhāgapaccayasamuppanno dhātukkhobho āsannakāraṇaṃ, pageva itarassa. so ca atthato rūpadhammānaṃ vikārāvatthāṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu eva siyāti vuttaṃ ^b^``rogarūpaṃ jaratāaniccatāgahaṇena gahitamevā''^eb^ti. ^b^upacayasantatigahaṇena gahitamevā^eb^ti tabbinimuttassa rūpuppādassa abhāvato. upādāvatthāya ^a^M2.0106^ea^ ca aññā jāti nāma nattheva. sambhavo kāmadhātuyaṃ ekacciyasattānaṃ indriyaparipākapaccayo āpodhātuyā pavattiākāravisesoti āha ^b^``sambhavarūpaṃ āpodhātuggahaṇena gahitamevā''^eb^ti. kāyabalaṃ nāma atthato vāyodhātuyā pavattiākāraviseso tassā vipphārabhāvato. yato naṃ ``pāṇabala''nti vadanti, tenāha ^b^``balarūpaṃ vāyodhātuggahaṇena gahitamevā''^eb^ti. kasmā pana nesaṃ ayathākkamato paṭikkhepo katoti? ^b^visuṃ natthī^eb^ti katvā anupalabbhamānattā anādaradassanatthaṃ, middhapaṭikkhepo vā mahāpañhoti paṭhamaṃ kato. tadanusārena paṭilomanayena itaresampi abhāvo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^``itī''^eb^ti idaṃ ^b^``aṭṭhavīsatividha''^eb^nti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ, iminā vuttakkamena aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ hotīti. so ca kho pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayenevāti anūnatā veditabbā. anadhikabhāvo pana dassito eva.

[03] 447^b^.^eb^ sampayuttadhammarāsi hinoti etena patiṭṭhahatīhi ^b^hetu,^eb^ mūlaṭṭhena lobhādiko, alobhādiko ca, tādiso hetu na hotīti ^b^nahetu^eb^. nāssa hetu atthīti ^b^ahetukaṃ,^eb^ sahetukapaṭiyogibhāvato hetunā saha na uppajjatīti attho. ahetukameva hetunā vippayuttatāya ^b^hetuvippayuttaṃ^eb^. dhammanānattābhāvepi hi saddatthanānattena veneyyavasena dukantaradesanā hotīti dukapadavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. paccayādhīnavuttitāya saha paccayenāti ^b^sappaccayaṃ^eb^. attano paccayehi loke niyuttaṃ, viditanti vā ^b^lokiyaṃ^eb^. ā bhavaggaṃ, ā gotrabhuṃ vā savantīti āsavā, saha āsavehīti ^b^sāsavaṃ,^eb^ āsavehi ālambitabbanti attho. ādisaddena saṃyojanīyaṃ oghanīyaṃ yoganīyaṃ nīvaraṇīyaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ acetasikaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ nārūpāvacaraṃ nāpariyāpannaṃ aniyataṃ aniyyānikaṃ aniccanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[01] āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. taṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā ^a^V2.0100^ea^, indriyabaddhadhammā, tesu bhavaṃ ^b^ajjhattikaṃ,^eb^ cakkhādi. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttanayena ajjhattameva ^b^ajjhattikaṃ^eb^ yathā venayikoti ^a^M2.0107^ea^ (a0 ni0 8.11; pārā0 8) imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattika''^eb^nti. ^b^sesaṃ^eb^ tevīsatividhaṃ. ^b^``tato bāhirattā''^eb^ti idaṃ ajjhattikalakkhaṇābhāvato vuttaṃ. ^b^ghaṭṭanavasenā^eb^ti visayī, visayo ca hutvā saṅghaṭṭanavasena. ^b^sesaṃ^eb^ soḷasavidhaṃ. ^b^viparītattā^eb^ti ghaṭṭanavasena agahetabbato. ^b^duppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā^eb^ti sukhumabhāvena duviññeyyasabhāvattā. ñāṇassa āsanne na hotīti ^b^dūre. terasa^eb^ hadayavatthupariyosānāni. ^b^sabhāvenevā^eb^ti ``rūpassa paricchedo, rūpassa vikāro, rūpassa upacayo''tiādinā aggahetvā attano sabhāveneva kakkhaḷattādinā ñāṇena paricchijja gahetabbato. ^b^sesaṃ^eb^ dasavidhaṃ. ^b^tabbiparītatāyā^eb^ti sabhāvena apariggahitabbato. sotādīnampi cakkhuno viya pasannasabhāvattā eva yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇapaccayatāti dassento āha ^b^``cakkhādi...pe0... pasādarūpa''^eb^nti. ^b^viparītattā^eb^ti tabbidhurasabhāvattā. ^b^adhipatiyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ettha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ādhipateyyaṃ tesaṃ paṭumandabhāvānuvattanato, itthipurisindriyadvayassa sakicce jīvitindriyassa sahajarūpānupālane. tadubhayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^upādinnattā^eb^ti gahitattā. kammanibbattañhi ``mametaṃ phalaṃ''nti kammunā gahitaṃ viya hoti apaṭikkhepato.

[03] 448^b^.^eb^ ^b^sanidassanakammajādīnaṃ tikāna^eb^nti sanidassanattikassa, kammajādittikānañca. ^b^oḷārike^eb^ti dvādasavidhe oḷārikarūpe. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti rūpāyatanaṃ. daṭṭhabbabhāvasaṅkhātena saha nidassanenāti sanidassanaṃ, paṭihananabhāvasaṅkhātena saha paṭighenāti sappaṭighaṃ, sanidassanañca taṃ sappaṭighañcāti ^b^sanidassanasappaṭighaṃ^eb^. tattha yassa daṭṭhabbabhāvo atthi, taṃ ^b^sanidassanaṃ^eb^. cakkhuviññāṇagocarabhāvova ^b^daṭṭhabbabhāvo^eb^. tassa rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ ``saha nidassanena sanidassana''nti. dhammabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso, so añño viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto. evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho hotīti. yo sayaṃ, nissayavasena ca sampattānaṃ, asampattānañca paṭimukhabhāvo aññamaññaṃ patanaṃ, so ^b^paṭihananabhāvo,^eb^ yena byāpārādivikārapaccayantarasahitesu cakkhādīnaṃ ^a^M2.0108^ea^ visayesu vikāruppatti. ^b^sesaṃ^eb^ ekādasavidhaṃ oḷārikarūpaṃ. tañhi sanidassanattābhāvato ^b^anidassanaṃ,^eb^ vuttanayeneva ^b^sappaṭighaṃ^eb^. ubhayapaṭikkhepena ^b^anidassanāppaṭighaṃ. kammato jāta^eb^nti ettha yaṃ ekantakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhindriyāni, hadayañcāti navavidhaṃ rūpaṃ, yañca navavidhe catusamuṭṭhāne kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ navavidhameva rūpanti ^a^V2.0101^ea^ evaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhampi kammato uppajjanato ^b^kammajaṃ^eb^. yañhi jātañca yañca jāyati yañca jāyissati, taṃ sabbampi ``kammaja''nti vuccati yathā duddhanti. ^b^tadaññapaccayajāta^eb^nti kammato aññapaccayato jātaṃ utucittāhārajaṃ. ^b^nakutocijāta^eb^nti lakkhaṇarūpamāha. viññattidvayaṃ, saddo, ākāsadhātu, lahutādittayaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānāni avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ pañcadasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ^b^cittajaṃ^eb^. ākāsadhātu, lahutādittayaṃ, āhārasamuṭṭhānāni avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ^b^āhārajaṃ^eb^. ettha saddaṃ pakkhipitvā terasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ututo samuṭṭhitaṃ ^b^utujaṃ^eb^. sesaṃ kammajatike vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 449^b^.^eb^ diṭṭhādicatukkavasena, rūparūpādicatukkavasena, vatthādicatukkavasenāti pāṭekkaṃ catukkasaddo yojetabbo. yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ adakkhi yaṃ passati yaṃ dakkhissati yaṃ passeyya, taṃ sabbaṃ ^b^diṭṭhaṃ^eb^ nāma diṭṭhasabhāvānātivattanato yathā duddhanti. esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^dassanavisayattā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyattā. ^b^savanavisayattā^eb^ti sotaviññāṇaviññeyyattā. ^b^gandharasaphoṭṭhabbattaya^eb^nti gandho raso phoṭṭhabbanti etaṃ tayaṃ. ^b^mutaṃ^eb^ nāma mutvā patvā gahetabbato. tenāha ^b^``sampattaggāhakaindriyavisayattā''^eb^ti.

[01] kimidaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ nāmāti? pathavītejovāyodhātuttayaṃ. kasmā panettha āpodhātu aggahitā, nanu sītatā phusitvā gayhati, sā ca āpodhātūti? saccaṃ gayhati, na pana sā āpodhātu. kiñcarahīti? tejodhātu eva. mande hi uṇhabhāve sītabuddhi. na hi sītaṃ nāma koci guṇo atthi, kevalaṃ pana uṇhabhāvassa mandatāya sītatābhimāno. kathametaṃ viññātabbanti ce? anavaṭṭhitattā sītabuddhiyā yathā pārāpāre. tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhitānaṃ chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi hoti, tattheva pana pathavīgabbhato uṭṭhitānaṃ uṇhabuddhi. yadi hi sītatā āpodhātu siyā, ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ upalabbheyya, na ca upalabbhati. tasmā viññāyati na āpodhātu sītatāti ^a^M2.0109^ea^. idañca bhūtānaṃ avinibbhogavuttitaṃ icchantānaṃ uttaraṃ, anicchantānampi pana catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe kiccadassanena sabhāgavuttitāya sādhitāya uttarameva. ye pana ``vāyodhātuyā lakkhaṇaṃ sītatā''ti vadanti, tesampi idameva uttaraṃ. yadi hi vāyodhātu sītatā siyā, ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ sītatā upalabbheyya, na ca upalabbhati. tasmā viññāyati na vāyodhātu sītatāti. yesaṃ pana dravatā āpodhātu, sā ca phusitvā ^a^V2.0102^ea^ gayhatīti dassanaṃ. te vattabbā ``dravabhāvopi phusīyatīti āyasmantānaṃ adhimānamattaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ viyā''ti. vuttañhetaṃ purātanehi --
[21] ``dravatā sahavuttīni, tīṇi bhūtāni samphusaṃ.
[22] `dravataṃ samphusāmī'ti, lokoyamabhimaññati..
[21] ``phusaṃ bhūtāni saṇṭhānaṃ, manasā gaṇhate yathā.
[22] `paccakkhato phusāmī'ti, ñātabbā dravatā tathā''ti..

[03] ^b^sesa^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ rūpādisattavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ. ^b^viññāṇassevā^eb^ti manoviññāṇasseva. avadhāraṇena rūpāyatanādīnampi manoviññāṇaviññeyyatte niyamābhāvato na viññātarūpatāti saṅkarābhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^nipphannarūpaṃ panettha rūparūpaṃ nāmā^eb^ti yadettha aṭṭhavīsatividhe rūpe ``nipphanna''nti vuttaṃ rūpaṃ, tadeva rūpalakkhaṇayogato rūpaṃ. ruppanaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti yathā arisasoti, rūpaguṇayogato vā yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīlaṃ vatthanti. svāyaṃ rūpasaddo ruḷhiyā ataṃsabhāvepi pavattatīti aparena rūpasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``rūparūpa''^eb^nti yathā tilatelaṃ, dukkhadukkhanti (visuddhi0 2.539) ca, ruppanasabhāvaṃ rūpanti attho. yadi evaṃ, ākāsadhātuādīnaṃ kathaṃ rūpabhāvoti? nipphannarūpassa paricchedavikāralakkhaṇabhāvato taggatikamevāti ``rūpa''ntveva vuccati.

[03] vasanti ettha cittacetasikā pavattantīti ^b^vatthu,^eb^ cittataṃsampayuttānaṃ ādhārabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ. taṃ pana chabbidhaṃ. tattha hadayarūpaṃ vatthu eva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhāvato. ^b^na dvāraṃ^eb^ aññanissayānaṃ cakkhādi viya. yathā hi cakkhādīni sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pavattiyā dvāraṃ honti, na ^a^M2.0110^ea^ evaṃ hadayavatthu. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``yaṃ panettha hadayarūpaṃ nāma, taṃ vatthu, na dvāra''^eb^nti. ^b^viññattidvayaṃ dvāraṃ^eb^ kammadvārabhāvato. tannissitassa cittuppādassa abhāvato ^b^na vatthu. pasādarūpaṃ vatthu ceva^eb^ attasannissitassa cakkhuviññāṇādikassa, ^b^dvārañca^eb^ aññanissitassa sampaṭicchanādikassa. ^b^sesaṃ^eb^ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ vuttavipariyāyato ^b^neva vatthu na ca dvāraṃ^eb^.

[03] 450^b^.^eb^ ekato ^a^V2.0103^ea^ eva jātaṃ ^b^ekajaṃ^eb^. nanu ca ekato eva paccayato paccayuppannassa uppatti natthīti? saccaṃ natthi, rūpajanakapaccayesu ekatoti ayamettha adhippāyo. na hi rūpuppatti rūpajanakato aññaṃ paccayaṃ apekkhati. ^b^dvija^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^imesa^eb^nti imesaṃ pabhedānaṃ ^b^vasena. kammajamevā^eb^ti kammato eva jātaṃ. ^b^cittajamevā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^cittato ca ututo ca jāta^eb^nti kālena cittato, kālena ututoti evaṃ cittato ca ututo ca jātaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^taṃ dvijaṃ^eb^ dvīhi jātanti. parato dvīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^saddāyatanamevā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ cittajaṃ saddāyatanaṃ, taṃ saviññattikamevāti eke. aviññattikopi atthi vitakkavipphārasaddoti porāṇā.

[03] vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti hi evaṃ pavattamahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ nissāya cittasamuṭṭhānassa saddassa viññattiyā vināpi uppatti icchitabbā. na hi viññatti ``kāyavācāya viññattī''ti vacanato asotaviññeyyena saddena saha uppajjati, evaṃ sante cittajenāpi saddanavakena bhavitabbaṃ. so ca vādo ``saddo ca hoti, na sotaviññeyyo cā''ti viruddhamevetanti maññamānehi saṅgahakārehi paṭikkhitto. apare pana mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā tassa adhippāyaṃ vaṇṇenti. kathaṃ? ``jivhātālucalanādikaṃ vitakkasamuṭṭhitaṃ viññattisahajameva sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatī''ti sutte, paṭṭhāne ca oḷārikaṃ saddaṃ sandhāya sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo vuttoti iminā adhippāyena vitakkavipphārasaddassa asotaviññeyyatā vuttāti. ^b^taṃ^eb^ catujaṃ. ^b^avasesa^eb^nti avinibbhogarūpena saddhiṃ ākāsadhātumāha.

[03] ^b^lakkhaṇarūpaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0111^ea^ ^b^pana nakutocijāta^eb^nti kutocipi paccayato na jātaṃ, nāpi sayameva jātaṃ paccayehi vinā sayameva jātassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato. kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ na jāyatīti? lakkhaṇābhāvato. uppattimantānaṃ hi rūpāyatanādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjanti, na evaṃ jātiādīnaṃ. tasmā viññātabbametaṃ jātiādīni na jāyantīti. siyā panetaṃ ``jātiādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjantī''ti? taṃ na, kasmā? tathā sati anavaṭṭhānāpattito. yadi hi jātiādīni jātiādimantāni siyuṃ, tānipi jātiādimantāni, tānipi jātiādimantānīti anavaṭṭhānameva āpajjati. tasmā suṭṭhu vuttaṃ ``jātiādīni ^a^V2.0104^ea^ na jāyantī''ti. tenāha ^b^``na hi uppādassa uppādo atthi, uppannassa ca paripākabhedamattaṃ itaradvaya''^eb^nti, jarāmaraṇanti attho.

[01] tattha ^b^``uppādo natthī''^eb^ti etena uppādassa jarāmaraṇābhāvamāha. asati uppāde kuto jarāmaraṇanti ^b^matta^eb^ggahaṇena jarāmaraṇassa uppādābhāvampi. yadi evaṃ jātiyā kutoci jātatāvacanaṃ kathanti āha ^b^``yampī''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattā^eb^ti ye te cittādayo rūpāyatanādīnaṃ rūpānaṃ janakapaccayā, tesaṃ taduppādanaṃ pati anuparatabyāpārānaṃ yo so paccayabhāvūpalakkhaṇīyo kiccānubhāvakkhaṇo, tadā jāyamānānaṃ rūpāyatanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena upalabbhamānataṃ sandhāya veneyyapuggalavasena jātiyā kutoci paccayato jātattaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anuññātaṃ yathā taṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatādi viññattiādīnaṃ. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- yehi paccayadhammehi rūpādayo uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ paccayabhāvūpagamanakkhaṇe upalabbhamānā rūpādayo tato pure, pacchā ca anupalabbhamānā tato uppajjantīti viññāyanti, evaṃ jātipi veditabbā. yadi evaṃ nippariyāyato jātiyā kutoci jātatā siddhā, atha kasmā veneyyapuggalavasenāti vuttanti? nayidamevaṃ jāyamānadhammavikārabhāvena upalabbhamānattā. yadi hi dhammo viya upalabbheyya jāti, nippariyāyova tassā kutoci jātabhāvo, na evamupalabbhati, atha kho vikārabhāvena. tasmā vuttaṃ ``veneyyapuggalavasenā''ti.

[03] tadā kira sotūnaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ ``ayaṃ jāti sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhavo, sayañca na kutoci jāyati yathā taṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakatī''ti, taṃ ^a^M2.0112^ea^ nesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ vidhamento satthā ``upacayo santatī''ti dvidhā bhinditvā kutoci paccayato jātañca katvā desesi, na pana jarāmaraṇaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe adassanato. yadi evaṃ kathaṃ ``jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna''nti (saṃ0 ni0 2.20) vuttaṃ? yasmā paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ paripākabhaṅgatāya tesu santesu honti, na asantesu. na hi ajātaṃ paripaccati, bhijjati vā, tasmā taṃ jātipaccayataṃ sandhāya ``jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna''nti (saṃ0 ni0 2.20) pariyāyena suttesu vuttaṃ. yo panettha kāmabhavādīsu kammādinā paccayena yonivibhāgato paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavattiyañca rūpadhammānaṃ pavattibhedo vattabbo, so parato paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissatīti na vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
[06] iti rūpakkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.

[03] 451^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0105^ea^ ^b^kiñcī^eb^ti anavasesapariyādānadīpakena padadvayena vedayitassa bahubhedataṃ dassento vuccamānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ ulliṅgeti. vedayitaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ. sabbaṃ taṃ^eb^ dhammajātanti adhippāyo, pubbe vā rūpakkhandhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ adhikārato ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^ekato katvā^eb^ti atītādibhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ buddhiyā ekato katvā. evañhi rāsaṭṭhassa sambhavo. nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ, ``nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa''nti (dha0 sa0 615) ca ādinā saññuppādavasena jānanaṃ gahaṇaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ. abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ^eb^ āyūhanaṃ byāpārāpatti, abhisandahanaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi cetanāpadhānatāya saṅkhārakkhandhassa evaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇa''^eb^nti. tathā hi ^b^suttantabhājanīye^eb^ saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā ``cakkhusamphassajā cetanā''tiādinā (vibha0 21) cetanāva vibhattā. minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya yena sañjānanākāravisiṭṭhena ākārena visayaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhisaṅkhātaṃ vijānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. itare vedanākkhandhādayo suviññeyyā hontīti viññāṇena ekuppādādibhāvato, samānajātiādivibhāgato ca.

[03] attanā ^a^M2.0113^ea^ ``vijānanalakkhaṇa''nti vuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ kiñcī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. yathāpaccayaṃ pavattimattametaṃ, yadidaṃ sabhāvadhammoti dassetuṃ ^b^``vijānanalakkhaṇa''^eb^nti bhāvasādhanavasena vuttaṃ. dhammasabhāvā vinimutto koci kattā nāma natthīti tasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vijānātī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ, tadeva cintanādiatthena ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ mananaṭṭhena ^b^mano^eb^ti pariyāyatopi naṃ bodheti. ettāvatā ca khandhato, bhedato, pariyāyato ca viññāṇaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hoti.

[01] jāyanti ettha visadisāpi sadisākārāti ^b^jāti,^eb^ samānākāro. sā panāyaṃ jāti kāmaṃ anekavidhā nānappakārā, taṃ idhādhippetameva pana dassento ^b^``kusalaṃ, akusalaṃ, abyākatañcā''^eb^ti āha. tattha kusalaṭṭhena ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. koyaṃ kusalaṭṭho nāma? ārogyaṭṭho anavajjaṭṭho sukhavipākaṭṭho. ārogyaṭṭhenāpi hi kusalaṃ vuccati ``kacci nu bhoto kusala''ntiādīsu (jā0 1.15.146; 2.20.129). anavajjaṭṭhenāpi ``katamo pana, bhante, kusalo kāyasamācāro? yo kho, mahārāja ^a^V2.0106^ea^, anavajjo kāyasamācāro''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.361). sukhavipākaṭṭhenāpi ``kusalānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ samādānahetū''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.80). kusalacittañhi rāgādīnaṃ cetasikarogānaṃ avajjasabhāvānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato, sukhavipākavipaccanato ca arogaṃ, anavajjaṃ, sukhavipākañcāti.

[03] saddatthato pana kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kammeti viddhaṃsetīti ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. kucchitena vā ākārena sayantīti kusā, pāpadhammā, te kuse lunāti chindatīti ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. kucchitānaṃ vā sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma, tena lātabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ pavattetabbanti ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. yathā vā kuso ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthapadesaṃ lunāti, evamidaṃ uppannānuppannavasena ubhayabhāgagataṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunāti chindati, tasmā kuso viya lunātīti ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. kucchitānaṃ vā sāvajjadhammānaṃ salanato saṃvaraṇato ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. kusaladhammavasena hi akusalā pavattinivāraṇena, appavattibhāvāpādanena ca manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu appavattiyā saṃvutā pihitā honti. kucchite vā pāpadhamme salayati kampeti apanetīti ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. kucchitānaṃ vā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ ^a^M2.0114^ea^ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā, dosalobhādayo. dosādīnañhi vasena cetanāya tikkhabhāvappattiyā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjatā, te kuse lunāti chindatīti ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. kucchitānaṃ vā sānato antakaraṇato vināsanato kusāni, puññakiriyavasena pavattāni saddhādīni indriyāni, tehi lātabbaṃ pavattetabbanti ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. ``ku'' iti vā bhūmi vuccati, adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisassa attano nissayabhūtassa rūpārūpappabandhassa sampati, āyatiñca anudahanena vināsanato kuṃ siyantīti kusā, rāgādayo, te viya attano nissayassa lavanato chindanato ^b^kusalaṃ^eb^. payogasampāditā hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindantīti.

[03] na kusalanti ^b^akusalaṃ,^eb^ kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho. na kusalanti hi kusalapaṭikkhepena akusalapadassa avayavabhedena atthe vuccamāne yathā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ na arogaṃ, na anavajjaṃ, na sukhavipākaṃ, na ca kosallasambhūtaṃ, taṃ akusalanti ayamattho dassito hoti, evaṃ yaṃ na kucchitānaṃ salanasabhāvaṃ, na kusānaṃ lavanasabhāvaṃ, na kusena kusehi vā pavattetabbaṃ, na ca kuso viya lavanakaṃ, taṃ akusalaṃ nāmāti ayampi attho dassito hoti. ettha ca yasmā kusalaṃ akusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ, yato cetasikarogapaṭipakkhādibhāvato arogādipariyāyenapi ^a^V2.0107^ea^ bodhitaṃ, tasmā akusalaṃ pana kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti vuttaṃ ``kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho''ti. taṃ pana yathākkamaṃ pahāyakapahātabbabhāvenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[01] na byākatanti ^b^abyākataṃ,^eb^ kusalākusalabhāvena akathitanti attho. tattha ^b^kusalabhāvo^eb^ anavajjasukhavipākaṭṭho. ^b^akusalabhāvo^eb^ sāvajjadukkhavipākaṭṭho, tadubhayabhāvena avuttanti vuttaṃ hoti. eteneva arogasarogādibhāvena ca avuttatā vaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbā. ettha ca ``kusalaṃ akusala''nti ca vatvā ``abyākata''nti vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva avuttatā viññāyati, na pakārantarena. avuttatā cettha na tathā avattabbatāmattena, atha kho tadubhayavinimuttasabhāvatāya tesaṃ dhammānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. tathā hetaṃ ``avipākalakkhaṇa''nti vuccati.

[03] 452^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhūmibhedato^eb^ti bhavanti ettha dhammāti bhūmi, ṭhānaṃ, avatthā ca. avatthāpi hi avatthāvantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati, evaṃ nesaṃ sukhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti ^a^M2.0115^ea^. tattha lokiyā bhūmi ṭhānavaseneva veditabbā, lokuttarā avatthāvasena. lokiyā vā ṭhānāvatthāvasena, lokuttarā avatthāvaseneva. ^b^kāmāvacara^eb^nti ettha vatthukāmo kilesakāmoti dve kāmā. tesu ^b^vatthukāmo^eb^ visesato pañca kāmaguṇā kāmīyantīti, ^b^kilesakāmo^eb^ taṇhā kāmetīti. te dvepi sahitā hutvā yattha avacaranti, taṃ ^b^kāmāvacaraṃ^eb^. kiṃ pana tanti? ekādasavidho kāmabhavo. idaṃ yebhuyyena tattha avacarati pavattatīti ^b^kāmāvacaraṃ^eb^ ekassa avacarasaddassa lopaṃ katvā. evaṃ ^b^rūpārūpāvacarāni^eb^pi veditabbāni rūpataṇhā rūpaṃ, arūpataṇhā arūpanti katvā. atha vā kāmataṇhā kāmo uttarapadalopena, avacarati etthāti avacaraṃ, kāmassa avacaraṃ ^b^kāmāvacaraṃ^eb^. evaṃ ^b^rūpāvacarārūpāvacarāni^eb^pi veditabbāni. lokato uttaratīti ^b^lokuttaraṃ^eb^ kusalassa adhippetattā. itaraṃ pana lokato uttiṇṇanti ^b^lokuttaraṃ^eb^.

[01] ^b^somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato^eb^ti ettha somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā, ñāṇasaṅkhārabhedo pana kathanti? nāyaṃ doso ñāṇasaṅkhārakato bhedoñāṇasaṅkhārabhedo, so ca tesaṃ bhāvābhāvakatoti katvā. sobhanaṃ mano, sundaraṃ vā mano etassāti sumano, sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, mānasikasukhā vedanā ruḷhiyā, somanassena uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, sampayuttanti attho. ^b^somanassasahagatatā^eb^ cassa ārammaṇavasena veditabbā. iṭṭhārammaṇe hi cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hoti. nanu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ lobhassa vatthu, kathaṃ ^a^V2.0108^ea^ tattha kusalaṃ hotīti? nayidamekantikaṃ iṭṭhepi ābhogādivasena kusalassa uppajjanato. yassa hi catusampatticakkasamāyogādivasena yonisova ābhogo hoti, kusalameva ca mayā kattabbanti kusalakaraṇe cittaṃ niyamitaṃ, akusalappavattito ca nivattetvā kusalakaraṇe eva pariṇāmitaṃ, abhiṇhakaraṇavasena ca samudācaritaṃ, tassa iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe alobhādisampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti, na lobhādisampayuttaṃ.

[03] ñāṇena ^a^M2.0116^ea^ samaṃ pakārehi yuttanti ^b^ñāṇasampayuttaṃ^eb^. ekuppādādayo eva cettha pakārāti veditabbā. tattha kammūpapattīndriyaparipākakilesadūrībhāvā ñāṇasampayuttatāya kāraṇaṃ. yo hi paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, anavajjāni sippāyatanakammāyatanavijjaṭṭhānāni sikkhāpetīti evamādikaṃ paññāsaṃvattaniyaṃ karoti, tassa kammūpanissayavasena kusalacittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. tathā abyāpajje loke uppannassa upapattiṃ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. vuttañhetaṃ ``tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, dandho, bhikkhave, satuppādo, atha kho so satto khippaṃyeva visesabhāgī (a0 ni0 4.191) hotī''ti. tathā paññādasakapattassa indriyaparipākaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. yena pana kilesā vikkhambhitā, tassa kilesadūrībhāvaṃ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. vuttampi cetaṃ ``yogā ve jāyate bhūri, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo''ti (dha0 pa0 282). attano vā parassa vā samussāhajanitaṃ cittapayogasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkharaṇaṃ saṅkhāro, so etassa natthīti ^b^asaṅkhāraṃ^eb^. tena pana saha saṅkhārena pavattatīti ^b^sasaṅkhāraṃ^eb^. ñāṇena vippayuttaṃ virahitanti ^b^ñāṇavippayuttaṃ. vippayogo^eb^ti cettha ñāṇassa abhāvo appavattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. upekkhatīti upekkhā, vedayamānāpi ārammaṇaṃ ajjhupekkhati majjhattatākārasaṇṭhitattāti attho. atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā. atha vā iṭṭhe ca aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavatīti upekkhā, tāya sahagatanti ^b^upekkhāsahagataṃ^eb^. sesaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] evaṃ aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacittāni uddisitvā idāni tesaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yadā hī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^paṭiggāhakādisampatti^eb^nti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena desakālakalyāṇamittādisampattiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^aññaṃ vā somanassahetu^eb^nti ettha aññaggahaṇena saddhābahulatā, visuddhadiṭṭhitā, kusalakiriyāya ānisaṃsadassāvitā, somanassapaṭisandhikatā, ekādasa ^a^V2.0109^ea^ pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammāti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^ādinayappavatta^eb^nti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena na kevalaṃ ``atthi yiṭṭha''ntiādīnaṃ (ma0 ni0 1.441; 2.95) navannaṃyeva sammādiṭṭhivatthūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ, atha kho dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyādīnampi ^a^M2.0117^ea^ saṅgaho veditabbo. ^b^purakkhatvā^eb^ti pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena ``manopubbaṅgamā dhammā''tiādīsu (dha0 pa0 1-2) viya sampayogassa adhippetattā. ^b^asaṃsīdanto^eb^ti silokamacchariyādivasena puññakiriyāyaṃ saṃsīdaṃ saṅkocaṃ anāpajjanto, tena muttacāgatādiṃ dasseti. ^b^anussāhito^eb^ti kenacipi na ussāhito. sarasato hi puññapaṭipattidassanamidaṃ. ^b^parehī^eb^ti pana pākaṭussāhanadassanaṃ.

[03] ^b^dānādīnī^eb^ti dānaṃ sīlaṃ yāva diṭṭhijukammanti imāni dānādīni dasa puññāni, ^b^dānādīnī^eb^ti vā dānasīlabhāvanāmayāni itaresampi sattannaṃ etthevantogadhattā. yattha sayaṃ uppajjanti, taṃ santānaṃ punanti, pujjaṃ bhavaphalaṃ nibbattentīti vā puññāni. ^b^assa^eb^ puññacetanāsamaṅgino. ^b^amuttacāgatā^eb^ deyyadhamme sāpekkhacittatā. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sīlasamādānādīsu anadhimuttatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^tadevā^eb^ti somanassasahagatādinā sadisatāya vuttaṃ. sadisampi hi ``tadevā''ti voharīyati yathā ``sā eva tittirī, tāniyeva osadhānī''ti. ^b^imasmiñhi atthe^eb^ti līnassa cittassa ussāhanapayogasaṅkhāte atthe. ^b^eta^eb^nti ``saṅkhāro''ti etaṃ padaṃ. ^b^pubbapayogassā^eb^ti puññakiriyāyaṃ saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittapayogassa, pubbaggahaṇañcettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena so saṅkhāro hotīti katvā vuttaṃ, na tassa saṅkhārassa pubbakālikattā. ``atthi dinna''ntiādi (ma0 ni0 1.441; 2.95) nayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā asambhavadassanatthaṃ ^b^bāla^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ. saṃsīdanussāhanābhāvadassanatthaṃ ^b^sahasā^eb^-gahaṇaṃ. ^b^somanassarahitā honti^eb^ puññaṃ karontāti adhippāyo. ^b^somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgammā^eb^ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. majjhattārammaṇatathārūpacetosaṅkhārādayopi hi upekkhāsahagatatāya kāraṇaṃ hontiyevāti.

[03] ^b^eva^eb^ntiādi nigamanaṃ. tayidaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kāmāvacaraṃ kusalacittaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti chasu ārammaṇesu yaṃ vā taṃ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ. tattha ^a^M2.0118^ea^ ñāṇasampayuttāni cattāri yadā tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ uppādenti, tadā soḷasa vipākacittāni ^a^V2.0110^ea^ phalanti. yadā pana duhetukaṃ, tadā dvādasa tihetukavajjāni. ahetukaṃ pana paṭisandhiṃ tihetukāni na uppādenteva, duhetukāni pana duhetukapaṭisandhidānakāle dvādasa, ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ dānakāle aṭṭha phalanti. tihetukā pana paṭisandhi duhetukehi na hotiyeva. ^b^``aṭṭha phalantī''^eb^ti cetaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janakakammavasena vuttaṃ. aññena pana kammunā ``sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo''ti (paṭṭhā0 3.1.102) vacanato sahetukampi vipākacittaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhikassa hotiyeva. imasmiṃ ca pakkhe balavatā paccayena uppannaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, dubbalena sasaṅkhāranti veditabbaṃ. ye pana āgamanato ca vipākassa asaṅkhārasasaṅkhārabhāvaṃ icchanti, tesaṃ matena dvādasa, aṭṭha ca phalantīti yojetabbaṃ. evaṃ tidhā phalaṃ dadantañcetaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ upapattiṃ, sugatiduggatīsu bhogasampadañca karoti. nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi hi yaṃ devabhogasampattisadisaṃ bhogajātaṃ uppajjati, tampi kāmāvacarakusalasseva phalaṃ. na hi akusalassa iṭṭhaṃ phalaṃ atthīti.

[03] ^b^rūpāvacaraṃ panā^eb^ti ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesatthajotako. tena yathā kāmāvacaraṃ kilesānaṃ tadaṅgappahānamattakaraṃ, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana vikkhambhanappahānakaraṃ. yathā vā taṃ vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhadhā bhijjati, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana tato aññathā vāti vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. taṃ panetaṃ savatthukaṃ, sāsavaṃ, vinīvaraṇañca rūpāvacaranti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^``savatthukaṃ evā''^eb^ti hi iminā arūpāvacaraṃ nivatteti, ^b^``sāsava''^eb^nti iminā paṭhamamaggacittaṃ, ^b^``vinīvaraṇa''^eb^nti iminā paṭighasahitadvayaṃ. katthaci pañca jhānaṅgāni, katthaci cattāri, katthaci tīṇi, katthaci dve, katthaci aparāni dveti evaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``seyyathida''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā ^b^jhānakathāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.79 ādayo) vuttameva. tayidaṃ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā vuttanayena pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ ālambitvā yathārahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttakusalānantaraṃ uppajjati, hīnādibhedabhinnaṃ panetaṃ yathākkamaṃ brahmapārisajjādīsu soḷasasupi brahmalokesu upapattinipphādakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
