[03] ^b^vuttanayamevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0158^ea^ abhidesena lakkhaṇato dūrasantikaṃ dassitanti āha ^b^``okāsatopettha upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā''^eb^ti. tattha kittakato paṭṭhāya rūpaṃ okāsavasena santike nāma, kittakato pana paṭṭhāya dūre nāma? pakatikathāya kathentānaṃ dvādasa hatthā savanūpacāro nāma, tassa orato santike, parato dūre. tattha sukhumarūpaṃ dūre hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi dūre hoti, santike hontaṃ pana okāsatova santike hoti, na lakkhaṇato. oḷārikarūpaṃ santike hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi santike hoti, dūre hontaṃ okāsatova hoti, na lakkhaṇato. ``upādāyupādāyā''ti pana vuttattā attano rūpaṃ santike nāma, antokucchigatassāpi parassa dūre. antokucchigatassa santike, bahi ṭhitassa dūreti ^a^V2.0148^ea^ evaṃ antogabbhapamukhapariveṇasaṅghārāmasīmāgāmakhettajanapadarajjasamuddacakkavāḷesu tadantogatabahigatānaṃ vasena dūrasantikatā veditabbā.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadekajjha^eb^nti taṃ ekajjhaṃ ekato. ^b^abhisaṃyūhitvā^eb^ti saṃharitvā, samūhaṃ vā katvā. ^b^abhisaṅkhipitvā^eb^ti saṅkhipitvā saṅkhepaṃ katvā. ^b^``sabbampi rūpaṃ...pe0... dassitaṃ hotī''^eb^ti iminā rūpakhandhasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇasamāsabhāvaṃ dasseti. tenevāha ^b^``na hi rūpato añño rūpakkhandho nāma atthī''^eb^ti.
[03] 498^b^.^eb^ rāsibhāvūpagamanena vedanākkhandhādayoti dassitā hontīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^santativasena, khaṇādivasena cā^eb^ti ettha addhāsamayavasena atītādivibhāgassa avacanaṃ sukhādivasena bhinnāya atītādibhāvavacanato. na hi sukhā eva addhāvasena, samayavasena ca atītādikā hoti, tathā dukkhā eva, adukkhamasukhā eva ca kāyikacetasikādibhāvena bhinnā, tena vedanāsamudāyo addhāsamayavasena atītādibhāvena vattabbataṃ arahati samudāyassa tehi paricchinditabbattā, vedanekadesā pana gayhamānā santatikhaṇehi paricchedaṃ arahanti tathā paricchinditvā gahetabbato. ekasantatiyaṃ pana sukhādīsu anekabhedabhinnesu yo bhedo paricchinditabbabhāvena gahito, tassa ekappakārassa ^a^M2.0159^ea^ pākaṭassa paricchedikā taṃsahitadvārālambanappavattā, avicchedena taduppādakekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā ca santati bhavituṃ arahatīti tassā bhedantaraṃ anāmasitvā paricchedakabhāvena gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, lahuparivattino vā arūpadhammā parivattaneneva paricchedena paricchindanaṃ arahantīti santatikhaṇavaseneva paricchedo vutto. ekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā divasampi buddharūpaṃ passantassa, dhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattasaddhādisahitavedanā ^b^paccuppannā. ``pubbantāparantamajjhattagatā''^eb^ti etena hetupaccayakiccavasena vuttanayaṃ dasseti.

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ sabyāpārasaussāhasavipākatā kusalādīhi tīhipi sādhāraṇāti asādhāraṇameva dassetuṃ ^b^``sāvajjakiriyahetuto''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sāvajjakiriyahetuto^eb^ti pāṇātipātādigārayhakiriyānimittato. ^b^kilesasantāpabhāvato^eb^ti kilesapariḷāhena sadarathabhāvato ^a^V2.0149^ea^. vūpasantasabhāvāya kusalāya vedanāya ^b^oḷārikā. sabyāpārato^eb^ti saīhato. tena yathā pavattamānāyassā vipākena bhavitabbaṃ, tathā pavattiṃ vadanto vipākuppādanayogyatamāha. ^b^saussāhato^eb^ti sasattito, tena vipākuppādanasamatthataṃ. ^b^savipākato^eb^ti vipākasabbhāvato, tena paccayantarasamavāyenassā vipākanibbattanaṃ. tīhipi padehi vipākadhammataṃyeva dasseti. kāyakammādibyāpārasabbhāvato vā ^b^sabyāpārato,^eb^ javanussāhavasena ^b^saussāhato,^eb^ vipākuppādanasamatthatāvasena ^b^savipākato^eb^ti evamettha attho veditabbo. vipākaṃ anuppādentīpi kiriyā kusalā viya sabyāpārā, saussāhā eva ca hotīti tadubhayaṃ anāmasitvā kiriyābyākatavāre ``savipākato'' icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^sabyābajjhato^eb^ti kilesadukkhena sadukkhato. ^b^vuttavipariyāyato^eb^ti anavajjakiriyahetuto, kilesasantāpābhāvato, abyābajjhato ca vūpasantavuttīti evaṃ akusalāya vuttavipallāsato. ^b^yathāyoga^eb^nti yogānurūpaṃ. tīsu kāraṇesu yaṃ yaṃ yassā yassā yujjati, tadanurūpanti attho. kusalākusalavedanāhi vipākabyākatāya tīhipi kāraṇehi ^b^oḷārikā^eb^. kiriyābyākatāya savipākato savipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato vāti. ^b^vuttapariyāyenā^eb^ti vipākabyākatā abyāpārato ^a^M2.0160^ea^, anussāhato, avipākato ca tāhi kusalākusalavedanāhi sukhumā. kiriyābyākatā avipākato, avipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato vāti evaṃ kusalākusalāya vuttavipallāsena. kammavegakkhittā hi kammapaṭibimbabhūtā ca kāyakammādibyāpāravirahato nirussāhā vipākā. saussāhā ca kiriyā avipākadhammā. savipākadhammā hi sagabbhā viya oḷārikāti.

[03] 500^b^.^eb^ ^b^nirassādato^eb^ti assādābhāvato sukhapaṭikkhepato. ^b^savipphārato^eb^ti saparipphandato, anupasantatoti attho. ^b^abhibhavanato^eb^ti ajjhottharaṇato. sukhāya majjhattatā natthi, upekkhāya sātatā. santatādayo pana sabbattha sukhupekkhāsu labbhantīti ^b^``yathāyoga''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^pākaṭato^eb^ti sukhito dukkhitoti disvāpi jānitabbattā vibhūtabhāvato. ^b^sā^eb^ adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
[03] 501^b^.^eb^ ^b^asamāpannasamāpanna^eb^-ggahaṇena cettha bhūmivasenāpi vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā vuttāti veditabbā. ^b^itarā^eb^ samāpannassa vedanā.

[03] ^b^oghaniyato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0150^ea^ oghehi ārammaṇaṃ katvā atikkamitabbato. tathā ^b^yoganiyato, ganthaniyato cā^eb^ti etthāpi ganthova ganthanaṃ, tassa hitaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena sambandhanatoti ^b^ganthaniyaṃ^eb^. evaṃ ^b^nīvaraṇiyaṃ, upādāniyañca^eb^ veditabbaṃ. saṃkilese niyuttā, saṃkilesaṃ vā arahantīti ^b^saṃkilesikā. sā^eb^ anāsavā.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti yathāvuttāya oḷārikasukhumatāya. ^b^sambhedo^eb^ti saṅkaro. ``oḷārikā, sukhumā''ti ca vuttānampi jātiādivasena puna sukhumoḷārikabhāvāpattidoso yathā na hoti, tathā ^b^pariharitabbo^eb^. jātivasena sukhumāya vedanāya sabhāvapuggalalokiyavasena oḷārikataṃ pāḷivasena dassetuṃ ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^evaṃ sukhādayopī^eb^ti ettha akusalā vedanā ^b^jātivasena oḷārikā, sabhāvavasena sukhumā^eb^. kusalajjhānasahagatā sukhā vedanā jātivasena oḷārikā, samāpannassa vedanāti katvā puggalavasena sukhumāti evamādinā yojetabbā. ^b^``na parāmasitabbo''^eb^ti etena jātiādayo ^a^M2.0161^ea^ cattāro koṭṭhāsā aññamaññaṃ avomissakā eva gahetabbā. evaṃ sambhedassa parihāro, na aññathāti dasseti. yathā abyākatamukhena, evaṃ kusalākusalamukhenapi, yathā ca jātimukhena, evaṃ sabhāvādimukhenapi dassetabbanti imamatthaṃ ^b^``esa nayo sabbatthā''^eb^ti atidisati.

[03] idāni jātiādikoṭṭhāsesupi mitho akusalādīnaṃ upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^``nissayadahanato''^eb^ti iminā dosasahagatāya pākaṭaṃ kurūrappavattiṃ dasseti. ^b^niyatā^eb^ti micchattaniyāmena niyatā, ānantariyabhāvappattā kappatiṭṭhanakavipākatāya ^b^kappaṭṭhitikā^eb^ devadattādīnaṃ viya. ^b^asaṅkhārikā^eb^ sabhāvatikhiṇatāya ^b^oḷārikā. diṭṭhisampayuttā^eb^ mahāsāvajjatāya ^b^oḷārikā. sāpi^eb^ diṭṭhisampayuttā ^b^niyatā oḷārikā,^eb^ tato ^b^kappaṭṭhitikā,^eb^ tato ^b^asaṅkhārikā^eb^ti tividhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ekajjhaṃ vuttā visuṃ visuṃyeva yojetabbā. tenāha ^b^``itarā sukhumā''^eb^ti. ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti dosasahagatā, lobhasahagatāti abhedena. ^b^akusalā bahuvipākā^eb^ dosussannatāya ^b^oḷārikā^eb^. tathā ^b^kusalā appavipākā^eb^. mandadosattā akusalā ^b^appavipākā sukhumā^eb^. tathā ^b^kusalā bahuvipākā^eb^.

[03] oḷārikasukhumanikantivatthubhāvato kāmāvacarādīnaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā, lokuttarā pana ekantasukhumāva. tatthāpi ca vibhāgaṃ parato vakkhati. ^b^bhāvanāmayāpī^eb^ti bhāvanāmayāya bhedanena ^a^V2.0151^ea^ dānasīlamayānampi bhedanaṃ nayato dassitanti veditabbaṃ. bhāvanāya paguṇabalavakālādīsu kadāci ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi manasikāro hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``bhāvanāmayāpi duhetukā''^eb^ti. ^b^taṃtaṃbhūmivipākakiriyāvedanāsū^eb^ti ettha ``kāmāvacaravipākā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarā sukhumā''tiādinā yāva arahattaphalā netabbaṃ. ``kāmāvacarakiriyā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarakiriyā sukhumā''tiādinā kāmāvacarā ca ``dānākārappavattā oḷārikā, sīlākārappavattā sukhumā''tiādinā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā netabbaṃ. yathā ca jātikoṭṭhāse ayaṃ vibhāgo, evaṃ sabhāvakoṭṭhāsādīsupīti dassetuṃ ^b^``dukkhādī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] sabbo ^a^M2.0162^ea^ cāyaṃ vibhāgo lakkhaṇasannissito vuttoti katvā āha ^b^``okāsavasena cāpī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^sukhāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena adukkhamasukhaṃ sampiṇḍeti. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbāsu bhūmīsu. ^b^yathānurūpa^eb^nti yā yā vedanā yattha yattha labbhati, tadanurūpaṃ. ^b^vatthuvasenā^eb^ti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha vedanā pavattati, tassa vasenāpi. ^b^hīnavatthukā^eb^ti hīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kaṅgubhattaṃ bhuñjantassa vedanā hīnavatthukatāya ^b^oḷārikā^eb^. sālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjantassa paṇītavatthukatāya ^b^sukhumā^eb^ti.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādinā nayenā^eb^ti sabbaṃ pāḷigatiṃ āmasati. jātiādivasena asamānakoṭṭhāsatā ^b^visabhāgatā^eb^. dukkhavipākatādivasena asadisakiccatā ^b^asaṃsaṭṭhatā,^eb^ na asampayogo. yadi siyā, dūravipariyāyena santikaṃ hotīti saṃsaṭṭhatā santikatā āpajjati, na ca vedanāya vedanāsampayogo atthi. santikapadavaṇṇanāya ca ``sabhāgato ca sarikkhato cā''ti vakkhatīti vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. asadisasabhāvatā ^b^asarikkhatā. sabbavāresū^eb^ti oḷārikasukhumabhede vuttanayānusārena vattabbesu sabbesu vāresu. jātiādivasena samānakoṭṭhāsatā ^b^sabhāgatā,^eb^ dukkhavipākatādivasena pana sadisasabhāvatā ^b^sarikkhatā^eb^. tenāha ^b^``akusalā pana...pe0... santike''^eb^ti.
[06] iti vedanākkhandhassa atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ ^b^eta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0152^ea^ evaṃ atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhaṃ. ^b^ñāṇabhedattha^eb^nti nānappakāraṃ ñāṇappabhedatthaṃ. ^b^kamato^eb^ti desanākkamato, yena kāraṇenāyaṃ desanākkamo kato, tatoti attho. ^b^visesato^eb^ti bhedato, khandhupādānakkhandhavibhāgatoti attho. ^b^anūnādhikato^eb^ti pañcabhāvato. ^b^upamāto^eb^ti upamāhi upametabbato. ^b^daṭṭhabbato dvidhā^eb^ti dvīhi ākārehi ñāṇena passitabbato. ^b^passantassatthasiddhito^eb^ti ^a^M2.0163^ea^ yathā passantassa yathādhippetatthanipphattito. ^b^vibhāvinā^eb^ti paññavatā.

[03] ^b^uppattikkamo^eb^ti yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjantānaṃ uppajjanapaṭipāṭi. ``dassanenapahātabbā''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 tikamātikā 8, 9) paṭhamaṃ pahātabbā paṭhamaṃ vuttā, dutiyaṃ pahātabbā dutiyaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ ^b^pahānakkamo^eb^. sīlavisuddhiṃ paṭipajja cittavisuddhi paṭipajjitabbā, tathā tato parāpīti āha ^b^``sīlavisuddhi...pe0... paṭipattikkamo''^eb^ti, anupubbapaṇītā bhūmiyo anupubbena vavatthitāti ayaṃ ^b^bhūmikkamo^eb^. ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''tiādiko (vibha0 355) ekakkhaṇepi satipaṭṭhānādisambhavato ^b^desanākkamo^eb^ ca. dānakathādayo anupubbukkaṃsato kathitā, uppattiādivavatthānābhāvato pana dānādīnaṃ idha desanākkamavacanaṃ. uppattiādivavatthānahetukatāya hi ``paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hotī''tiādikā (saṃ0 ni0 1.235; kathā0 692) desanāpi samānā uppattiādikamabhāveneva vuttā. yathāvuttavavatthānābhāvena pana anekesaṃ vacanānaṃ sahapavattiyā asambhavato yena kenaci pubbāpariyena desetabbatāya tena tena adhippāyena desanāmattasseva kamo ^b^desanākkamo^eb^ daṭṭhabbo. ^b^pubbāpariyavavatthānenā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ rūpakkhandho, tato vedanākkhandhoti evaṃ pubbāpariyavavatthānena anuppattito. ^b^appahātabbato^eb^ti khandhesu ekaccānaṃ pahātabbatāva natthi, kuto pahānakkamo. sati hi sabbesaṃ pahātabbatāya pahānakkamena nesaṃ desanā siyā. ^b^appaṭipajjanīyato^eb^ti sammāpaṭipattivasena na paṭipajjitabbato. ^b^``catubhūmipariyāpannattā''^eb^ti iminā vedanādīnaṃ aniyatabhūmikataṃ dasseti. niyatabhūmikānañhi bhūmikkamo sambhaveyya.

[03] ^b^abhedenā^eb^ti rūpādīnaṃ bhedaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā ekajjhaṃ piṇḍaggahaṇena. ^b^attagāhapatita^eb^nti attagāhasaṅkhāte diṭṭhoghe nipatitaṃ. ^b^samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanenā^eb^ti rūpato arūpaṃ vivecento rūpārūpasamūhe ^a^V2.0153^ea^ ghanavinibbhujjanadassanena. ^b^cakkhuādīnampi visayabhūta^eb^nti ekadesena samudāyabhūtaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ vadati. yā ettha iṭṭhaṃ, aniṭṭhañca rūpaṃ saṃvedeti, ayaṃ vedanākkhandhoti iṭṭhāniṭṭharūpasaṃvedanikaṃ vedanaṃ desesīti sambandho. evaṃ sabbattha. iṭṭhamajjhattāniṭṭhamajjhattānampi iṭṭhāniṭṭhasabhāvattā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaggahaṇeneva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathāvuttanayena. saññāya gahitākāre ^a^M2.0164^ea^ visaye abhisaṅkhārappavattīti āha ^b^``saññāvasena abhisaṅkhārake''^eb^ti. yathā viññāṇassa sampayuttadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvo pākaṭo, na tathā vedanādīnanti āha ^b^``vedanādīnaṃ nissaya''^eb^nti. ``manopubbaṅgamā dhammā (dha0 pa0 1-2), cittānuparivattino dhammā (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 62), chadvārādhipati rājā''ti (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 2.181 erakapatthanāgarājavatthu) vacanato ^b^viññāṇaṃ^eb^ adhipati.
[03] 505^b^.^eb^ rūpakkhandhe ^b^``sāsavaṃ upādāniya''^eb^nti vacanaṃ anāsavānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabbhāvato rūpakkhandhassa taṃsabhāvatānivattanatthaṃ, na anāsavarūpanivattanatthaṃ.
[03] ^b^anāsavāva khandhesu vuttā^eb^ti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto ^b^eva^eb^-saddo, anāsavā khandhesveva vuttāti attho. ^b^idha pana^eb^ visuddhimagge ^b^sabbepete^eb^ khandhāpi upādānakkhandhāpi.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ sabhāgena ekajjhaṃ saṅgaho ^b^sabbasaṅkhatasabhāgekasaṅgaho^eb^. sabhāgasabhāvena hi saṅgayhamānā sabbasaṅkhatā pañcakkhandhā honti. tattha ruppanādisāmaññena samānakoṭṭhāsā sabhāgāti veditabbā. tesu saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ āyūhanarasāya cetanāya balavanti sā ``saṅkhārakkhandho''ti vuttā. aññe ca ruppanādivisesalakkhaṇarahitā phassādayo saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇasāmaññenāti daṭṭhabbā, phusanādayo pana sabhāvā visuṃ khandhasaddavacanīyā na hontīti dhammasabhāvaññunā tathāgatena phassakkhandhādayo na vuttāti veditabbā. ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti, sabbe te ime eva pañcupādānakkhandhe nissāya paṭicca, etesaṃ vā aññatara''nti evamādisuttānañca vasena attattaniyagāhassa etapparamatā daṭṭhabbā. etena ca vakkhamānasuttavasena ca khandhe eva nissāya parittārammaṇādivasena na vattabbā ca diṭṭhi uppajjati khandhanibbānavajjassa sabhāvadhammassa abhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti ruppanasabhāvaṃ dhammajātamāha. ^b^vedana^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ``sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho''tiādi (dī0 ni0 3.355) vacanato ^a^V2.0154^ea^ aññesañca khandhasaddavacanīyānaṃ ^a^M2.0165^ea^ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ sabbhāvato na pañcevāti codanaṃ nivattetumāha ^b^``aññesaṃ tadavarodhato''^eb^ti.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``nivāsaṭṭhānato''^eb^ti. dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhatāvasena vedanāya ābādhakattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. rāgādisampayuttassa vipariṇāmādidukkhassa itthipurisādiākāragāhikā taṃtaṃsaṅkappamūlabhūtā saññā ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. pittādi viya rogassa āsannakāraṇaṃ ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. utubhojanavisamatāvisamaparihārādi viya mūlakāraṇaṃ ^b^nidānaṃ^eb^. cittassa aṅgabhūtā cetasikāti viññāṇaṃ gilānūpamaṃ vuttaṃ. kuṭṭharogavato siniyhanaṃ tassa bhiyyobhāvāya viya bālassa puññābhisaṅkhārādivasena pavatti vedanādukkhāvahā asappāyasevanasadisī. ^b^vedanattāyā^eb^ti vedanāsabhāvatthaṃ, vedanattalābhāyāti attho. kāraṇaṭṭhānatāya, bhojanādhāratāya ca ^b^cārakūpamaṃ, bhājanūpama^eb^ñca rūpaṃ. subhasaññādivasena vedanākāraṇassa hetubhāvato, vedanābhojanassa chādāpanato ca ^b^aparādhūpamā, byañjanūpamā^eb^ ca saññā. vedanāhetuto ^b^kāraṇakārakūpamo, parivesakūpamo^eb^ ca saṅkhārakkhandho. bhattakāro eva yebhuyyena parivisatīti parivesakaggahaṇaṃ. vedanāya vibādhitabbato, anuggahetabbato ca ^b^aparādhikūpamaṃ, bhuñjakūpama^eb^ñca viññāṇaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ ``pañca vadhakā paccatthikā ukkhittāsikāti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana''nti ^b^āsīvisūpame^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 4.238) vadhakāti vuttā, ``bhāroti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana''nti ^b^bhārasutte^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 3.22) bhārāti, ``atītampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva rūpena khajjiṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi. ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ, anāgatampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva rūpena khajjeyyaṃ, seyyathāpi...pe0... khajjāmī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 3.79) ^b^khajjanīyapariyāye^eb^ khādakāti, ``so aniccaṃ rūpaṃ `aniccaṃ rūpa'nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 3.85) ^b^yamakasutte^eb^ aniccādikāti. yadipi ``idha pana sabbepete ekajjhaṃ katvā khandhāti adhippetā''ti vuttaṃ, bāhullena pana upādānakkhandhānaṃ tadantogadhānaṃ daṭṭhabbatā veditabbā. vipassanāya bhūmivicāro hesoti.

[03] ^b^pheṇapiṇḍo^eb^ ^a^M2.0166^ea^ ^b^viyā^eb^tiādīsu rūpādīnaṃ evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍādisadisatā daṭṭhabbā, yathā pheṇapiṇḍo ^a^V2.0155^ea^ nissāro paridubbalo agayhupago; gahitopi kiñci atthaṃ na sādheti, chiddāvachiddo anekasandhisaṅghaṭito bahūnaṃ pāṇakānaṃ āvāso anupubbūpacito sabbāvatthanipātī avassaṃbhedī, evaṃ rūpampi niccasārādivirahato nissāraṃ pheggu viya, sukhabhañjanīyato dubbalaṃ, niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā na gahetabbaṃ, gahitampi tathā na hoti, bahuchiddaṃ asītisatasandhisaṅghaṭitaṃ anekakimikulāvāsaṃ kalalādivasena anupubbūpacitaṃ kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsupi avatthāsu vinassati, avassameva ca bhijjati. ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.3.95; vibha0 aṭṭha0 26 kamādivinicchayakathā) pana parimaddanāsahanameva upamūpameyyasambandho vutto.

[03] yathā pubbuḷo nissāro paridubbalo agayhupago, gahitopi na kiñci atthaṃ sādheti, na ciraṭṭhitiko, tathā vedanāpi. yathā ca pubbuḷo, udakatalaṃ, udakabinduṃ, udakajallikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca jāyati, evaṃ vedanāpi vatthuṃ, ārammaṇaṃ, kilesajallaṃ, phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati. yathā hi udakatale bindunipātajanito vāto udakajallikasaṅkhātaṃ udakalasikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā pubbuḷaṃ nāma karoti, evaṃ vatthumhi ārammaṇāpāthagamanajanito phasso anupacchinnaṃ kilesajallaṃ sahakārīpaccayabhāvena saṅkaḍḍhitvā vedanaṃ nāma karoti. idañca kilesehi mūlakāraṇabhūtehi, ārammaṇassādanabhūtehi ca nibbattaṃ vaṭṭagataṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena vā cattāro paccayā vuttā, ūnehipi pana uppajjateva. idha muhuttaramaṇīyatā upamopameyyasambandho vutto.

[03] yathā pana ^b^marīcikā^eb^ asārā agayhupagā. na hi taṃ gahetvā pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ sakkā, evaṃ saññāpi asārā agayhupagā. yathā ca marīcikā vipphandamānā sañjātūmivegā viya khāyantī mahājanaṃ vippalambeti, evaṃ saññāpi ``nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa''ntiādinā ārammaṇe pavattamānā sabhāvamatte aṭṭhatvā ``subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca''ntiādimicchāgāhassa kāraṇabhāvena lokaṃ vippalambeti.

[03] yathā ^a^M2.0167^ea^ ^b^kadalikkhandho^eb^ asāro agayhupago. na hi taṃ gahetvā gopānasīādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā, upanītampi tathā na hoti, bahuvaṭṭisamodhāno ca hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhopi ^a^V2.0156^ea^ asāro agayhupago. na hi taṃ niccādivasena gahetuṃ sakkā, gahitampi tathā na hoti, bahudhammasamodhāno ca. aññadeva hi phassassa lakkhaṇaṃ, aññaṃ cetanādīnaṃ, te pana sabbe samodhānetvā saṅkhārakkhandhoti vuccati.

[03] yathā ca ^b^māyā^eb^ asārā agayhupagā. na hi taṃ gahetvā kiñci atthaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ sakkā, ittarā lahupaccupaṭṭhānā amaṇiādimeva maṇiādirūpena dassentī mahājanaṃ vañceti, evaṃ viññāṇampi asāraṃ ittaraṃ lahupaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, teneva cittena āgacchantaṃ viya, gacchantaṃ viya, ṭhitaṃ viya, nisinnaṃ viya ca katvā gāhāpeti, aññadeva cittaṃ āgamane, aññaṃ gamanādīsūti. evaṃ viññāṇaṃ māyāsadisaṃ.

[03] pañcapi upādānakkhandhā asubhādisabhāvā eva saṃkilesāsucivatthubhāvāditoti asubhādito daṭṭhabbā eva, tathāpi katthaci koci viseso sukhaggahaṇīyo hotīti āha ^b^``visesato cā''^eb^tiādi. tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhānā catuvipallāsappahānakarāti tesaṃ gocarabhāvena rūpakkhandhādīsu asubhādibhāvena daṭṭhabbatā vuttā.
[03] 509^b^.^eb^ ^b^khandhehi na vihaññati^eb^ parividitasabhāvattā. vipassakopi tesaṃ vipattiyaṃ na dukkhamāpajjati, khīṇāsavesu pana vattabbameva natthi. te hi āyatimpi khandhehi na bādhīyantīti.

[03] ^b^kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parijānātī^eb^ti ``āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.56,57) vacanato ajjhattikarūpe chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassa samudayabhūte kabaḷīkārāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatīti attho. ayaṃ ^b^pahānapariññā^eb^. ajjhattikarūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto tassa paccayabhūtaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhātīti ^b^ñātapariññā^eb^. tassa ca udayabbayānupassī hotīti ^b^tīraṇapariññā^eb^ ca yojetabbā. evaṃ pariññattaye sijjhante ime vipallāsādayo vidhamīyanti evāti āha ^b^``asubhe subhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī''^eb^tiādi. tattha kāmarāgabhūtaṃ abhijjhaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``abhijjhākāyagantha''^eb^nti. asubhānupassanāya hi kāmarāgappahānaṃ hoti ^a^M2.0168^ea^, kāmarāgamukhena vā sabbalobhappahānaṃ vadati. ^b^na upādiyati^eb^ na gaṇhati na uppādeti.

[03] ``phassapaccayā ^a^V2.0157^ea^ vedanā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.126; saṃ0 ni0 2.39; mahāva0 1; udā0 1; netti0 24) vuttattā ``vedanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassā paccayabhūte phassāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatī''tiādinā āhāraparijānane vuttanayena phassaparijānanaṃ yojetabbaṃ. vedanāya dukkhato dassanena tattha ^b^sukhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati^eb^. sukhatthameva bhavapatthanā hotīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahanto ^b^bhavoghaṃ uttarati^eb^. tato eva ^b^bhavayogena visaṃyujjati. bhavāsavena ca anāsavo hoti,^eb^ sabbavedanaṃ dukkhato passanto attano parena apubbaṃ dukkhaṃ uppāditaṃ, sukhaṃ vā vināsitaṃ na cinteti, tato ``anatthaṃ me acarī''tiādi (dha0 sa0 1237; vibha0 909) āghātavatthuppahānato ^b^byāpādakāyaganthaṃ bhindati^eb^. ``sukhabahule sugatibhave suddhī''ti aggahetvā gosīlagovatādīhi suddhiṃ parāmasanto sukhapatthanāvaseneva parāmasatīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahantopi ^b^sīlabbatupādānaṃ na upādiyati^eb^.

[03] manosañcetanā saṅkhārakkhandho, saññā pana taṃsampayuttāti saññāsaṅkhāre anattato passanto manosañcetanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahati, tañca pariggaṇhāti, tīreti cāti ^b^``saññaṃ saṅkhāre...pe0... parijānātī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. saññāsaṅkhāre anattāti passanto attadiṭṭhimūlakattā sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ viya sabbadiṭṭhiyopi vidhamatīti dassento ^b^``diṭṭhoghaṃ uttarati...pe0... attavādupādānaṃ na upādiyatī''^eb^ti āha.

[03] ^b^viññāṇaṃ aniccato passanto^eb^ aniccānupassanāmukhena tissopi anupassanā ussukkanto tīhipi pariññāhi ^b^viññāṇāhāraṃ parijānāti^eb^. visesato panettha ^b^anicce niccanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati^eb^. tattha niccaggāhabāhullato avijjāya viññāṇe ghanagahaṇaṃ hotīti ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā taṃ aniccato passanto ^b^avijjoghaṃ uttarati^eb^. tato eva avijjāyogena visaṃyutto ^b^avijjāsavena anāsavo ca hoti^eb^. mohabaleneva sīlabbataparāmasanaṃ hotīti taṃ pajahanto ^b^``sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ bhindati^eb^.

[02] ``yañca ^a^M2.0169^ea^ kho idaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati cittaṃ itipi, mano itipi, viññāṇaṃ itipi, tatrāssutavā puthujjano nālaṃ nibbindituṃ, nālaṃ virajjituṃ, nālaṃ vimuccituṃ. taṃ kissa hetu? dīgharattaṃ hetaṃ, bhikkhave, assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ ^a^V2.0158^ea^ parāmaṭṭhaṃ `etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā'''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 2.62) --
[03] vacanato yathā viññāṇaṃ niccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ upādiyati, evaṃ taṃ aniccato passanto ^b^diṭṭhupādānaṃ na upādiyatī^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^evaṃ mahānisaṃsanti^eb^ vuttappakārena vipallāsādisakalasaṃkilesavidhamanupāyabhāvato evaṃ vipuludayaṃ. ^b^vadhakādivasenā^eb^ti ukkhittāsikavadhakādivasena. ^b^passeyyā^eb^ti ñāṇadassanena paccakkhato passeyya.
[06] khandhaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti cuddasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ ``khandhāyatanā''tiādinā ^a^M2.0170^ea^ ^a^V2.0159^ea^ heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhāni paduddhāravasena ``āyatanānī''ti vatvā gaṇanaparicchedenāha ^b^``dvādasāyatanānī''^eb^ti. tattha vattabbaṃ parato sayameva vakkhati. ^b^cakkhāyatana^eb^ntiādi nesaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ.

[01] ^b^attho^eb^ nāma saddattho, bhāvattho pana ^b^lakkhaṇameva^eb^. so pana saddattho duvidho -- asādhāraṇo sādhāraṇoti. tattha asādhāraṇo cakkhādisaddattho, sādhāraṇo āyatanasaddattho dvādasannampi samānattā.

[03] tesu asādhāraṇaṃ tāva dassento ^b^``visesato tāvā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^visesato^eb^ti visesatthato, cakkhādisaddatthatoti attho. ^b^assādetī^eb^ti cakkhati-saddo ``madhuṃ cakkhati, byañjanaṃ cakkhatī''ti rasasāyanattho atthīti tassa vasena atthaṃ vadati. ``cakkhuṃ kho pana, māgaṇḍiya, rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita''nti (ma0 ni0 2.209) vacanato cakkhu ^b^rūpaṃ assādeti^eb^. satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve yo ``yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 597) pāḷiyaṃ, ``rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇa''ntiādinā (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 600; visuddhi0 2.433) aṭṭhakathāyañca vutto atthaviseso, tattheva niruḷhattā cakkhumhi eva cakkhusaddo pavattati gavādīsu gosaddādi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^vibhāveti cā^eb^ti saddalakkhaṇasiddhassa cakkhati-saddassa vasena atthaṃ vadati. ^b^cakkhatī^eb^ti hi ācikkhati, abhibyattaṃ vadatīti attho. nettassa ca vadantassa viya samavisamavibhāvanameva ^a^V2.0160^ea^ ācikkhananti katvā āha ^b^``vibhāveti cāti attho''^eb^ti, anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ vibhāvanatthatā ca cakkhati-saddassa daṭṭhabbā. rattaduṭṭhādikālesu kakaṇṭakarūpaṃ viya, uddarūpaṃ viya ca vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ rūpayati rūpamiva pakāsaṃ karoti, saviggahamiva katvā dassetīti attho. vitthāraṇaṃ vā ^a^M2.0171^ea^ rūpasaddassa attho, vitthāraṇañca pakāsanamevāti āha ^b^``pakāsetīti attho''^eb^ti. anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo. vaṇṇavācakassa rūpasaddassa rūpayatīti nibbacanaṃ, rūpakkhandhavācakassa ruppatīti ayaṃ viseso. ^b^udāharīyatī^eb^ti vuccatīti atthe vacanasaddo eva gahito siyā, na ca vacanasaddo evettha saddo, atha kho sabbopi sotaviññeyyoti. ^b^sappatī^eb^ti sakehi paccayehi sappīyati, sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti attho.

[03] ^b^sūcayatī^eb^ti attano vatthuṃ apākaṭaṃ gandhavasena ``idaṃ sugandhaṃ, duggandha''nti pakāseti, paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphādivatthuṃ ``ettha pupphamatthi, campakādiphalamatthi, ambādī''ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho. rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitahetumhi āhārarase ninnatāya ^b^jīvitaṃ avhayatīti jivhā^eb^ niruttilakkhaṇena. ^b^kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo^eb^ti visesena ^b^kāyo^eb^ vutto anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu, kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesatarasāsavapaccayattā. tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti. ^b^uppattideso^eb^ti uppattiṭṭhānanti attho, kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti vuttāti tesaṃ uppattiṭṭhānanti attho.

[03] ^b^munātī^eb^ti nāḷiyā minamāno viya, mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti attho. manate iti vā ^b^mano,^eb^ taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paricchedavasena jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentī^eb^ti ye visesalakkhaṇena āyatanasaddaparā vattabbā, te cakkhādayo tathā vuttāti tato aññe manogocarabhūtā dhammā sāmaññalakkhaṇeneva ekāyatanabhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttā. yathā hi oḷārikavatthārammaṇamananasaṅkhātehi visayavisayībhāvehi purimāni pākaṭāni, tathā apākaṭā ca aññe manogocarā na attano sabhāvaṃ na dhārentīti imassa atthassa dīpanattho dhammasaddo. dhārīyanti sāmaññarūpena avadhārīyantīti vā ^b^dhammā^eb^. yathā hi rūpādayo cakkhuviññāṇādīhi asādhāraṇato eva yathāsakaṃ ^a^V2.0261^ea^ sabhāvato viññāyanti ^a^M2.0172^ea^, na evamete, ete pana anekadhammabhāvato, sādhāraṇato, sabhāvasāmaññatopi manasā viññāyantīti.

[03] 511^b^.^eb^ ^b^sena senā^eb^ti sakena sakena. ^b^uṭṭhahantī^eb^ti uṭṭhānaṃ karonti. ^b^vāyamantī^eb^ti ussahanti, attano kiccaṃ karonticceva attho. imasmiṃ ca atthe āyatanti etthāti āyatanānīti adhikaraṇattho āyatanasaddo, dutiyatatiyesu kattuattho. ^b^te cā^eb^ti cittacetasike dhamme. te hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇesu ayanti gacchanti pavattantīti ^b^āyā. vitthārentī^eb^ti pubbe anuppannattā līnāni apākaṭāni pubbantato uddhaṃ pattharenti pākaṭāni karonti, uppādentīti attho. ^b^idañca^eb^ saṃsāradukkhaṃ. ^b^na nivattatī^eb^ti anuppādanirodhavasena na nirujjhati. ^b^āyatanaṃ āyatana^eb^nti āmeḍitavacanaṃ assā samaññāya cakkhādīsu niruḷhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
[03] 512^b^.^eb^ evaṃ avayavabhedavasena āyatanasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyatopi dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. sādhuphalabharitatāya, aparissayatāya ca ^b^manoramme^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^nivasantī^eb^ti nivasantā viya honti. tenāha ^b^``tadāyattavuttitāyā''^eb^ti. yattha suvaṇṇaratanādīni nivutthāni viya ākiṇṇāni tiṭṭhanti, so padeso tesaṃ ^b^ākaro,^eb^ evaṃ cittacetasikā cakkhādīsūti te tesaṃ ākaroti dassento āha ^b^``cakkhādīsu ca...pe0... ākaro''^eb^ti. ^b^tannissitattā^eb^ti ettha mano manoviññāṇādīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ nissayapaccayo na hotīti tassa tesaṃ dvārabhāvo nissayabhāvoti daṭṭhabbo. ahutvā eva paccayasāmaggivasena uppajjantāpi cittacetasikā aneke ekajjhaṃ tattha labbhamānā samosaṭā viya hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^``vatthudvārārammaṇavasena samosaraṇato''^eb^ti. na hi dhammānaṃ anāgataddhe vijjamānatālesopi atthi. tenāha ``puñjo natthi anāgate''ti (mahāni0 10). ^b^tattheva uppattito^eb^ti tesu cakkhādīsu eva uppattito. uppattiyā paccayabhūte cakkhādike uppattiṭṭhānaṃ viya katvā upacāravasena vuttaṃ. na hi arūpadhammānaṃ nippariyāyato uppattideso nāma atthi. yadaggena vā te ^a^M2.0173^ea^ tesaṃ nissayārammaṇabhūtā, tadaggena ^b^sañjātideso^eb^. na hi paccayabhāvamantarena rūpadhammānampi ādhārādheyyabhāvo atthi. tenāha ^b^``nissayārammaṇabhāvenā''^eb^ti. byatirekapadhānatāya kāraṇalakkhaṇassa ^b^``tesaṃ abhāve abhāvato''^eb^ iccevāha, na ``bhāve bhāvato''ti.

[03] ^b^yathāvuttenatthenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0162^ea^ ``cakkhatī''tiādinā, ``āyatanato āyānaṃ tananato''tiādinā, ``nivāsaṭṭhāna''ntiādinā ca vuttappakārena atthena. dhammāyatanapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahubhāvato yebhuyyena ca te bahū eva hutvā kiccakarāti ^b^``dhammā ca te āyatanañcā''^eb^ti bahuvacananiddeso.
[03] 513^b^.^eb^ tathā tathā lakkhitabbato lakkhīyati etenāti vā ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ,^eb^ sabhāvo.

[03] ^b^tāvabhāvato^eb^ti tattakato, tena anūnādhikabhāvaṃ dasseti. tattha dvādasāyatanavinimuttassa kassaci dhammassa abhāvā adhikabhāvato codanā natthi, salakkhaṇadhāraṇaṃ pana sabbesaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇanti ūnacodanā sambhavatīti taṃ dassento āha ^b^``cakkhādayopi hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto^eb^ti dvikkhattuṃ calitvā pavattabhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto. calanavasena bhavaṅgappavattiyā sati eva āvajjanuppatti, na aññatthāti āvajjanassāpi kāraṇabhūtanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto...pe0... uppattidvāra''^eb^nti. ^b^asādhāraṇa^eb^nti cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ. satipi asādhāraṇabhāve cakkhādīnaṃ dvārabhāvena gahitattā dhammāyatanena aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. dvārārammaṇabhāvehi vā asādhāraṇataṃ sandhāya ``asādhāraṇa''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 514^b^.^eb^ yebhuyyasahuppattiādīhi uppattikkamādīsu ayutti yojetabbā. yebhuyyena hi cakkhāyatanādīni kassaci kadāci ekato uppajjanti. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī''tiādi (yama0 aṭṭha0 āyatanayamaka 18-21). tasmā āyatanānaṃ uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati, na pahānakkamo kusalābyākatānaṃ appahātabbato, na paṭipattikkamo akusalānaṃ ekaccābyākatānañca appaṭipajjanīyato ^a^M2.0174^ea^, na bhūmikkamo aḍḍhekādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ ekantakāmāvacarattā, itaresañca catubhūmipariyāpannattā, ekaccassa lokuttarabhāvato cāti. ^b^``ajjhattikesu hī''^eb^ti etena ajjhattikabhāvena, visayībhāvena ca ajjhattikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbataṃ dasseti, tesupi paṭhamaṃ desetabbesu pākaṭattā paṭhamataraṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ desitanti.

[03] ^b^tato ghānāyatanādīnī^eb^ti ettha bahupakārattābhāvena cakkhusotehi purimataraṃ adesetabbāni, saha vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ekena kamena desetabbānīti ghānādikkamena desitānīti adhippāyo ^a^V2.0163^ea^. aññathāpi hi desitesu na na sakkā codetuṃ, na ca sakkā bodhetabbāni na desetunti. paccuppannārammaṇattā vā cakkhādīni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni ārammaṇato supākaṭānīti, manāyatanaṃ pana kiñci paccunnārammaṇaṃ...pe0... kiñci yāva navattabbārammaṇanti pacchā vuttaṃ. paccuppannārammaṇesupi upādārūpārammaṇāni cattāri paṭhamaṃ vuttāni, tato bhūtarūpārammaṇaṃ. upādārūpārammaṇesupi dūratare dūre, sīghataraṃ sīghañca ārammaṇasampaṭicchanadīpanatthaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ desanākkamo. cakkhusotadvayañhi dūragocaranti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ, tatrāpi cakkhu dūrataragocaranti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. passantopi hi dūratare nadīsotaṃ, na tassa sotapaṭighātasaddaṃ suṇāti. ghānajivhāsupi ghānaṃ sīghataravuttīti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ purato ṭhapitamattassapi bhojanassa gandho gayhatīti. yathāṭhānaṃ vā tesaṃ desanākkamo. imasmiñhi sarīre sabbupari cakkhussa adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tassa adho sotassa, tassa adho ghānassa, tassa adho jivhāya, tathā kāyassa yebhuyyato, mano pana arūpibhāvato sabbapacchā vutto. taṃtaṃgocarattā tassa tassa anantaraṃ bāhirāyatanāni vuttānīti vuttovāyamatthoti evampi imesaṃ kamo veditabbo. gocaro visayo etassāti ^b^gocaravisayo,^eb^ mano. kassa pana gocaro etassa visayo? cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannampi. ^b^viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānato^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ uppattikāraṇassa vavatthitabhāvato savibhattibhāvato. etena cakkhādianantaraṃ rūpādivacanassa ca kāraṇamāha.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅgahitattā^eb^ti gaṇanasaṅgahavasena saṅgahitattā. ^b^jātivasenā^eb^ti cakkhubhāvasamānatāvasena. ^b^paccayabhedo^eb^ kammādibhedo. dānādipāṇātipātādibhedabhinnassa ^a^M2.0175^ea^ hi kusalākusalakammassa, tassa ca sahakārīkāraṇabhūtānaṃ abbhantarānaṃ, bāhirānañca paccayānaṃ bhedena cakkhāyatanaṃ bhinnaṃ visadisaṃ hotīti. nirayādiko, apadādigatinānākaraṇañca ^b^gatibhedo^eb^ gatīnaṃ, gatīsu vā bhedoti katvā. hatthiassādiko, khattiyādiko ca ^b^nikāyabhedo^eb^. taṃtaṃsattasantānabhedo ^b^puggalabhedo^eb^. yā cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ anantappabhedatā vuttā, so eva hadayavatthussa bhedo tādisabhedānātivattanato. tato manāyatanassa anantappabhedatā yojetabbā. yasmā jhānavirahitaṃ nāma lokuttaraṃ natthi, tasmā pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena aṭṭha lokuttaracittāni cattālīsaṃ hontīti tāni ekāsītiyā lokiyacittesu pakkhipitvā āha ^b^``ekavīsuttarasatappabhedañcā''^eb^ti. ^b^vatthū^eb^ti cakkhādivatthu. tappabhedena viññāṇaṃ ^b^anantappabhedaṃ. paṭipadā^eb^ dukkhāpaṭipadādi. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena jhānādhipatibhūmiārammaṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. nīlaṃ nīlassa sabhāgaṃ, aññaṃ ^b^visabhāgaṃ. paccayo^eb^ kammādi. tatthāpi kusalasamuṭṭhānāditā, sītautusamuṭṭhānāditā ^a^V2.0164^ea^ ca bhedo veditabbo. ^b^ādi^eb^saddena gatinikāyabhedo. ^b^sabhāvanānattabhedato^eb^ti sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhāti evamādiko ^b^sabhāvabhedo^eb^. cakkhusamphassajā sotasamphassajāti evamādikaṃ ^b^nānattaṃ^eb^.

[03] 516^b^.^eb^ ``anāgamanato aniggamanato''ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``na hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. pubbantāparantesu avijjamānasarūpattā udayato pubbe kutoci nāgacchanti, vayato ca uddhaṃ na katthaci gacchanti, vijjamānakkhaṇepi ittarakālatāya aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā. tenāha ^b^``atha kho''^eb^tiādi. saparipphandakiriyāvasena īhanaṃ īhā, cintanavasena byāpāranaṃ byāpāro, tattha byāpāraṃ dassento āha ^b^``na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ evaṃ hotī''^eb^ti. īhaṃ dassento ^b^``na ca tānī''^eb^tiādi. ubhayampi pana īhā ca hoti byāpāro cāti uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ. ^b^dhammatāvā^eb^ti sabhāvo eva, kāraṇasamatthatā vā īhābyāpārarahitānaṃ dvārādibhāvo ^b^dhammatā^eb^. imasmiñca atthe ^b^``ya''^eb^nti etassa yasmāti attho. purimasmiṃ sambhavanavisesanaṃ yaṃ-saddo. ``suñño gāmoti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacana''nti (saṃ0 ni0 4.238) vacanato ^b^suññagāmo^eb^ ^b^viya^eb^ ^a^M2.0176^ea^ ^b^daṭṭhabbāni^eb^. annapānasahitanti gahite suññagāme yaṃ yadeva bhājanaṃ parāmasīyati, taṃ taṃ rittakaṃyeva parāmasīyati, evaṃ dhuvādibhāvena gahitāni yoniso upaparikkhiyamānāni rittakāneva etāni dissantīti. tenāha ^b^``dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitattā''^eb^ti. cakkhādidvāresu abhijjhādomanassuppādakabhāvena rūpādīni cakkhādīnaṃ abhighātakānīti vuttāni. ahisusumārapakkhīkukkurasiṅgālamakkaṭā ^b^cha pāṇakā^eb^. visamabilākāsagāmasusānavanāni ^b^tesaṃ gocarā^eb^. tattha visamādiajjhāsayehi cakkhādīhi visamabhāvabilākāsagāmasusānasannissitasadisūpādinnadhammavanabhāvehi abhiramitattā rūpādīnaṃ visamādisadisatā yojetabbā.
[06] iti āyatanānaṃ vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ ^b^cakkhussa viññāṇa^eb^nti cakkhussa kāraṇabhūtassa viññāṇaṃ. kāmaṃ rūpālokamanasikārādayopi ^a^V2.0165^ea^ tassa viññāṇassa kāraṇā, te pana sādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ, cakkhu asādhāraṇanti asādhāraṇakāraṇenāyaṃ niddeso yathā bherisaddo, yavaṅkuroti. tathā hi cakkhu puggalantarāsādhāraṇaṃ, nīlādisabbarūpasādhāraṇañcāti sāmibhāvena niddiṭṭhaṃ.

[01] ^b^vidahatī^eb^ti evaṃ evañca tayā pavattitabbanti viniyuñjamānaṃ viya uppādetīti attho. ^b^vidahatī^eb^ti ca dhātvattho eva visiṭṭho upasaggena dīpīyatīti vināpi upasaggena ^b^dhātū^eb^ti esa saddo tamatthaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbo. kattukammabhāvakaraṇādhikaraṇesu ca dhātusaddasiddhi hotīti pañcāpi te atthā vuttā. lokuttarā dhātuyo saṃsāradukkhaṃ na vidahanti, aññadatthu vidhaṃsentīti katvā ^b^``lokiyā''^eb^ti visesitaṃ. ^b^vavatthitā^eb^ti avatthitā, aññamaññaṃ vā asaṃkiṇṇā. ^b^suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo^eb^ suvaṇṇādīnaṃ bījabhūtā selādayo. ^b^yathāsambhava^eb^nti ettha keci ``lokiyalokuttarāsu dhātūsu yo yo attho sambhavati, tadanurūpa''nti atthaṃ vadanti, tadayuttaṃ ``lokiyā hi dhātuyo''ti visesetvā vuttattā. atthavasena cetaṃ yathāsambhavaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, na dhātuvasena ^a^M2.0177^ea^. kāmaṃ pañcapi atthā cakkhādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ icchitabbā, tathāpi cakkhādīsu yassa yassa dhammassa yadā kattuvacanicchā, na tadā kammabhāvo. yadā pana kammavacanicchā, na tadā kattubhāvo. evaṃ sesesupīti yathāsambhavaggahaṇaṃ. tenāha ^b^``iti cakkhādīsū''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 518^b^.^eb^ ^b^attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo^eb^ti etthāpi dhātīti dhātūti padasiddhi veditabbā dhāraṇattho dhā-saddoti katvā. kattuatthopi cāyaṃ purimena asadiso vidhānadhāraṇatthānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā. nissattasabhāvamattadhāraṇañca dhātusaddassa padhāno atthoti visuṃ vutto. ^b^dhātuyo viya dhātuyo^eb^ti ettha sīhasaddo viya kesarimhi niruḷhā purise selāvayavesu niruḷho dhātusaddo cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo. ñāṇañca ñeyyañca ñāṇañeyyāni, tesaṃ avayavā tappabhedabhūtā dhātuyo ^b^ñāṇañeyyāvayavā^eb^. tattha ^b^ñāṇappabhedo^eb^ dhammadhātuekadeso, ^b^ñeyyappabhedo^eb^ aṭṭhārasāpīti ñāṇañeyyāvayavamattā dhātuyo hontīti. atha vā ñāṇena ñātabbo sabhāvo aviparīto dhātusaddena vuccamāno ^b^ñāṇañeyyo,^eb^ na diṭṭhiādīhi viparītaggāhakehi ñeyyoti attho, tassa ñāṇañeyyassa ^b^avayavā^eb^ cakkhādayo, visabhāgalakkhaṇāvayavesu rasādīsu niruḷho dhātusaddo tādisesu aññāvayavesu cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo. rasādīsu viya vā cakkhādīsupi niruḷho eva. ^b^``nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacana''^eb^nti etena nijjīvamattapadatthe dhātusaddassa niruḷhataṃ dasseti. cha dhātuyo etassāti ^b^chadhāturo^eb^. yo loke purisoti dhammasamudāyo ^a^V2.0166^ea^ vuccati, so chadhāturo channaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ nijjīvamattānaṃ sabhāvānaṃ samudāyamatto, na ettha jīvo vā puriso vā atthīti attho.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ cakkhādīnaṃ kamo pubbe vuttoti idhekekasmiṃ tike tiṇṇaṃ dhātūnaṃ kamaṃ dassento āha ^b^``hetuphalānupubbavavatthānavasenā''^eb^ti. hetuphalānaṃ anupubbavavatthānaṃ hetuphalabhāvo eva, manodhammadhātūnañca manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. kiriyamanodhātu manoviññāṇassa upanissayakoṭiyā, vipākamanodhātu vipākamanoviññāṇassa anantarādināpi, itarassa sabbāpi upanissayakoṭiyā ^a^M2.0178^ea^ ca, dhammadhātu pana vedanādikā sahajātā sahajātādinā, asahajātā anantarādinā, upanissayena, ārammaṇādinā ca manoviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dvārabhūtamanovasena vā. dvārabhūtamanopi hi suttesu manodhātūti vuccatīti tassā vā manodhātuyā manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. tattha ^b^hetū^eb^ti paccayo adhippeto, ^b^phala^eb^nti paccayuppannanti āha ^b^``cakkhudhātū''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 520^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbāsaṃ vasenā^eb^ti yathāvuttānaṃ ābhādhātuādīnaṃ pañcatiṃsāya dhātūnaṃ vasena. aparamatthasabhāvassa paramatthasabhāvesu na kadāci antogadhatā atthīti āha ^b^``sabhāvato vijjamānāna''^eb^nti.

[03] candābhāsūriyābhādikā vaṇṇanibhā evāti āha ^b^``rūpadhātuyeva hi ābhādhātū''^eb^ti. ^b^rūpādipaṭibaddhā^eb^ti rāgavatthubhāvena gahetabbākāro subhanimittanti katvā ``rūpādayo evā''ti avatvā paṭibaddhavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. asatipi rāgavatthubhāve kusalavipākārammaṇaṃ ^b^subhadhātū^eb^ti dutiyo vikappo vutto. ^b^sesā^eb^ti manoviññāṇadhātusampayuttā. ^b^dhātudvayanirodhamatta^eb^nti manoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nirodhamattaṃ catutthāruppacittuppādanirodhabhāvato. tadaññaviññāṇanirodho viya hi viññāṇadhātumanodhātūnaṃ nirodho samāpattibalasiddhoti katvā dhātudvayaggahaṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^``dhammadhātumatta''^eb^nti idaṃ kāmadhātuyā dhammadhātupariyāpannattā vuttaṃ. ^b^kāmapaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti kāmarāgasampayutto, ārammaṇakaraṇena vā kāmaguṇopasaṃhito. ^b^yaṃ etasmiṃ antare^eb^ti ye etasmiṃ avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinne okāse. ogāḷhā hutvā adhobhāge ca okāse carantīti ^b^etthāvacarā^eb^. aññattha carantāpi yathāvutte eva ṭhāne pariyāpannāti ^b^ettha pariyāpannā^eb^.

[01] ^b^nekkhammadhātu^eb^ ^a^V2.0167^ea^ ^b^dhammadhātu eva^eb^ vitakkapakkhe. ^b^sabbepi kusalā dhammā^eb^ti dānamayapuññakiriyato, sīlamayapuññakiriyato, pabbajjato ca paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggādhigamā pavattā sabbepi anavajjadhammā. ^b^vihiṃsādhātu^eb^ cetanā, paraviheṭhanacchando vā. ^b^avihiṃsā^eb^ karuṇā.

[03] ^b^hīnā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0179^ea^ hīḷitā. ^b^paṇītā^eb^ti sambhāvitā. ``nātihīḷitā nātisambhāvitā majjhimā''ti ^b^khandhaniddese^eb^ āgatā hīnadukato eva nīharitvā ^b^majjhimā^eb^ dhātu vuttāti veditabbā. ^b^ubhopī^eb^ti dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo.

[03] viññāṇadhātu yadipi chaviññāṇadhātuvasena vibhattā, tathāpi viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tassa purecārikapacchācārikattā manodhātu gahitāva hotīti āha ^b^``viññāṇadhātu cakkhuviññāṇādisattaviññāṇadhātu saṅkhepoyevā''^eb^ti. anekesaṃ cakkhudhātuādīnaṃ, tāsu ca ekekissā nānappakāratāya nānādhātūnaṃ vasena ^b^anekadhātu nānādhātu loko^eb^ vuttoti āha ^b^``aṭṭhārasadhātuppabhedamattamevā''^eb^ti.

[03] 521^b^.^eb^ ^b^cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātubhedenā^eb^ti bahūsu potthakesu likhitaṃ, kesuci ``cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanomanoviññāṇadhātubhedenā''ti. tattha na cakkhādīnaṃ kevalena dhātusaddena sambandho adhippeto vijānanasabhāvassa pabhedavacanato. viññāṇadhātusaddena ca sambandhe kariyamāne dve manogahaṇāni na kātabbāni. na hi dve manoviññāṇadhātuyo santi. antarā vā manodhātugahaṇaṃ akatvā ``cakkhu...pe0... kāyamanoviññāṇadhātumanodhātū''ti vattabbaṃ atulyayoge dvandasamāsābhāvato. ayaṃ panettha pāṭho siyā ``cakkhu...pe0... kāyaviññāṇamanomanoviññāṇadhātubhedenā''ti. ^b^tassa^eb^ viññāṇassa yebhuyyena attavādino tassa ekamekassa attassa advayataṃ, niccattañca pavedentīti anekatāniccatāpakāsanaṃ tesaṃ jīvasaññāsamūhananāya hoti. khandhāyatanadesanā ^b^saṅkhepadesanā,^eb^ indriyadesanā ^b^vitthāradesanā,^eb^ tadubhayaṃ apekkhitvā ayaṃ ^b^anatisaṅkhepavitthārā^eb^ dhātudesanā. abhidhamme vā ^b^suttantabhājanīye^eb^ (vibha0 172 ādayo) vuttā dhātudesanā atisaṅkhepadesanā, ābhādhātuādīnaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuantānaṃ vasena desetabbā ativitthāradesanā, tadubhayaṃ apekkhitvā ayaṃ anatisaṅkhepavitthārā.
[03] ^b^assa^eb^ ^a^V2.0168^ea^ bhagavato. saddhammatejasā vihataṃ ^b^saddhammatejavihataṃ^eb^.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0180^ea^ gaṇanato. ^b^jātito^eb^ti cakkhubhāvasāmaññato. atha vā ^b^jātito^eb^ti cakkhusabhāvato. tenāha ^b^``cakkhupasādo''^eb^ti. ^b^vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati^eb^ vedanādīnaṃ abhinditvā gahaṇato. ^b^sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasenā^eb^ti ettha abyākatāpekkhāya sesaggahaṇaṃ, kusalākusalaṃ pana sabbaso aggahitamevāti.
[03] 523^b^.^eb^ ^b^tā ca^eb^ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayo ^b^pañcapi^eb^.

[03] ^b^purimehevā^eb^ti anantarādīhi eva. javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā āsevanapaccayenāpi paccayo hotīti vuttovāyamattho. ^b^dhammadhātū^eb^ti pana sahajāto vedanādikkhandho adhippeto. tenāha ^b^``sahajāta...pe0... paccayo hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^avigatādīhī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena manoviññāṇadhātuyā yathārahaṃ hetuadhipatikammavipākāhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayabhāvo saṅgayhati. tenāha ^b^``bahudhā paccayo hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^ekaccā ca dhammadhātu^eb^ sukhumarūpanibbānappakārā, yā ca sampayogānantarabhāvādīnaṃ abhāvena ārammaṇakaraṇe yogyā. pañcadvārikavipākavajjanatthaṃ ^b^``ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, manodvārikā pana vipākāpi tadārammaṇabhūtā ekaccaṃ dhammadhātuṃ ārabbha pavattatīti. atha vā ^b^``ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā''^eb^ti idaṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ abhiññādvayaṃ āruppadvayanti evarūpaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, lokuttaramanoviññāṇadhātuyā pana ekaccā dhammadhātu ārammaṇapaccayoti pākaṭoyamattho. cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ yathāvuttapaccayadhammato atirekepi paccayadhamme dassetuṃ ^b^``na kevala''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^ālokādayo^eb^ti āloko nāma sūriyālokādi. tassa suttantanayena upanissayabhāvo veditabbo, evaṃ sesānipi.

[03] ^b^vivaraṃ^eb^ nāma visesato sotabilaṃ. ^b^vāyu^eb^ gandhūpasaṃharaṇakavāto. ^b^āpo^eb^ mukhe pakkhittāahārassa temanakaudakaṃ. ^b^pathavī^eb^ kāyappasādassa nissayabhūtā pathavīdhātu. ^b^bhavaṅgamanaṃ^eb^ dvikkhattuṃ calitaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ. sabbattha ^b^manasikāro^eb^ āvajjanamanasikāro.

[03] 524^b^.^eb^ avisesato ^a^M2.0181^ea^ ^a^V2.0169^ea^ daṭṭhabbākārassa vuccamānattā āha ^b^``sabbā evā''^eb^ti. visesato vipassanāya bhūmivicāro esoti ^b^``saṅkhatā''^eb^ti visesitaṃ. ^b^pubbantāparantavivittato^eb^ti ettha ``^b^pubbanto^eb^nāma atīto addhā, ^b^aparanto^eb^ nāma anāgato. ubhayattha ca saṅkhatā dhātuyo sabhāvavivittā anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā. ^b^pubbanto^eb^ vā sabhāvadhammassa udayo tato pubbe avijjamānattā. ^b^aparanto^eb^ vayo tato paraṃ abhāvato. tasmā ^b^pubbantāparantavivittato^eb^ti pākābhāvato viddhaṃsābhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudātu^eb^ saddassa viya viññāṇassa nissayabhāvato. ādāsatalādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^yantaṃ^eb^ nāma ucchuyantaṃ. ^b^cakkayaṭṭhī^eb^ti tilamanthaṃ āha. so hi acakkabaṇdhopi taṃsadisatāya cakkayaṭṭhītveva vuccati, cakkabandhameva vā sandhāya tathā vuttaṃ. imāhi ca upamāhi nijjīvāna. bheritaladaṇḍādīnaṃ samāyoge, nijjīvānaṃ saddādīnaṃ viya nijjīvānaṃ cakkhurūpādīnaṃ samāyoge nijjīvānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattīti kāraṇaphalānaṃ dhātumattataṃ, kārakavedakavirahañca dasseti.

[03] ^b^purecarānucarā viyā^eb^ti nijjīvassa kassaci keci nijjīvā purecarānucarā viyāti attho. manodhātuyeva vā attano khaṇaṃ anativattantī attano khaṇa anativattantānaṃyeva cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ avijjamānāyapi purecarānucarābhisandhiyaṃ anantarapubbakālāparakālatāya purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.

[03] channañhi viññāṇadhātūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anekānantarapaccayābhāvato ekajjhaṃ uppattiabhāvo viya aññamaññānantarapaccayatābhāvato anantaruppattipi natthi. yadi siyā, chaḷārammaṇasannidhāne manasikāramantarenāpi chaḷārammaṇūpaladdhi siyā, na ca hoti, tasmā dassanādianantaraṃ savanādīnaṃ abhāvo viya manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ na dassanādīni, na ca dassanādianantaraṃ manoviññāṇadhātu hoti. tattha bhavaṅgassa, dassanādīnañca bhinnārammaṇatāya manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ dassanādīni, dassanādīnaṃ anantarañca savanādīni na uppajjantīti yuttametaṃ. dassanādīnaṃ, pana santīramaṇassa ca abhinnavisayatāya dassanādianantaraṃ na manāviññāṇadātu hotīti ayuttanti ^a^M2.0182^ea^? nayidamevaṃ niyatāniyatavisayānaṃ bhinnavisayabhāvupapattito. yadi ca dassanādianantaraṃ kāci viññāṇadhātu uppajjeyya, sāpi dassanādidvāratāya ^a^V2.0170^ea^ dassanādiviññāṇadhātu eva siyā, na manoviññāṇadhātu, tato ca dassanādikiccavidhuraṃ cintanaṃ manananti manodvārappavattānaṃ mananakiccāpariccāgo viya dassanaviññāṇadhātuyā dassanakiccāpariccāgo āpajjati. tathā tadanantarassāti sabbāyapi dassanaviññāṇabhāvato ca viññāṇakāyā na bhaveyyuṃ.

[03] yathā pana manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ manodhātu, tato cakkhuviññāṇādīni, evaṃ dassanaviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ manodhātu, tato sotaviññāṇādīni hontīti ce? na, manodhātuyā dassanadhātubhāvappasaṅgato. yathā hi manaso nibbisesāvatthā mananamattatāya manodhātu, evaṃ dassanassa nibbisesāvatthā dassanamattatāya dassanadhātu siyā. tañca cakkhūviññāṇaṃ rūpavisayanti saddādivisayābhogābhāvato savanaviññāṇādīnaṃ asambhavo. tato ca rūpārammaṇapasutameva viññāṇaṃ siyā manoviññāṇānaṃ viya dassanaviññāṇādīnaṃ samānavatthubhāvappasaṅgato, aññavatthusannissitañca viññāṇaṃ na siyā, na cetaṃ yuttaṃ. tasmā sukhadukkhānaṃ viya upekkhā cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ, manoviññāṇassa ca byavadhāyikā ^b^manodhātu^eb^ daṭṭhabbā, na cassā upekkhāya viya adukkhamasukhatā adassanādiamananatā, ata kho mananakiccāvisesato manoviññāṇasabhāgatā. mano hi hadayavatthumhi vattamāno aññavatthusannissitānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ visayaṃ dassetvā nivattamāno aggi viya usumamatte mananamatte ṭhatvā nivattati, aññavatthusannissitaviññāṇanirodhe ca uṭṭhahanto aggi viya usumamatte uṭṭhahati. paccayānurūpapavattikāni ca mananamattāni manoviññāṇadhātuyā antāni honti. paṭighasaññāsahagatānañhi pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ indriyārammanapaṭighātajatāya abhinipātamattakiccaṃ, mananalakkhaṇindriyasamuppannassa ca manoviññāṇassa visayavicintanāsambhūtatāya tadanurūpācintanā. tasmā abhinipātappaccayapaṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsabalena bhavaṅgalakkhaṇaṃ cittaṃ calanāvatthaṃ hutvā nivattamānaṃ cintanāvisesavirahato abhinipātānuguṇaṃ cintanāvasānaṃ mananamattaṃ uppādeti.

[03] dassanādipi ^a^M2.0183^ea^ abhinipātamattaṃ dutiyaṃ khaṇaṃ anativattamānaṃ attānuguṇaṃ cintanāmananasamaññāvirahato dassanādiabhinipātavisesavicittaṃ cittabhāvādinā samānaṃ cintanādimananamattaṃ aññavatthusmiṃ nibbatteti, tasmā vatthukiccehi taṃ manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitāpi manodhātu manodvāranikkhamapavesabhūtā ārammaṇantare dvārantaramanasikāratabbisayasampaṭicchanabhāvena ^a^V2.0171^ea^ pañcannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ yathākkamaṃ purecarā, anucarāti ca vuttā. sā panāyaṃ satipi viññāṇabhāve manaso sambhūya visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato dhātubhāvasāmaññena manomattā dhātu ^b^manodhātū^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] yathāvutteneva ca hetunā matta-saddalopaṃ katvā viññāṇaṭṭhayogato manomattaṃ viññāṇanti manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahopi cassā yujjati eva. aññaviññāṇehi pana dvārārammaṇehi ca visesanatthaṃ ``manodhātū''ti vuttāti. ^b^manoviññāṇadhātū^eb^ti pana viññāṇadhātuvisesanaṃ manogahaṇaṃ. dhātuvisesanatthe ca manoviññāṇaggahaṇe viññāṇavisesanaṃ dvārabhūtamanodassanamevāti dvārasamaññārahattā na manodhātūti vuccati. tañhi manodvārantogadhaṃ, na ca dassanādipurecarānucaranti manaso viññāṇadhātu, manaso viññāṇanti ca manodvārasamaññārahaṃ, savisesañca tassa mananakiccaṃ, viññāṇakiccañcāti mattasaddassa lopamantarena ``manoviññāṇa''nti, nijjīvabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ ``manoviññāṇadhātū''ti ca vuccatīti.

[03] ^b^sallamiva sūlamiva^eb^ tividhadukkhatāsamāyogato ^b^daṭṭhabbo. vedanāsallasūlayogā^eb^ti vedanāsaṅkhātasallasūlayogato. ^b^āturā viyā^eb^ti tena āturibhūtā puggalā viya. āsāyeva dukkhaṃ ^b^āsādukkhaṃ,^eb^ āsāvighātaṃ dukkhaṃ vā. saññā hi asubhādikampi subhādito sajjānantī āsaṃ, tassā ca vighātaṃ āsīsitasubhādiasiddhiyā janetīti. vanamigo tiṇapurisaṃ purisoti gaṇhanto ^b^ayathābhūccanimittaggāhako,^eb^ tathā saññāpīti āha ^b^``vanamigo viyā''^eb^ti. kammapadhānā saṅkhārāti ^b^``paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^jātidukkhānubandhato^eb^ti attanā nibbattiyamānena jātidukkhena anubandhatā. bhavapaccayā jāti hi jātidukkhanti. padumaṃ viya dissamānaṃ khuracakkaṃ viya rūpampi ^a^M2.0184^ea^ itthiādibhāvena dissamānaṃ nānāvidhupaddavaṃ janeti. sabbe anatthā rāgādayo, jātiādayo ca visayabhūtā, anupasantā, sappaṭibhayā cāti. tappaṭipakkhabhūtattā ^b^asaṅkhatā dhātu amatādito^eb^ daṭṭhabbā.

[03] ^b^vavatthānābhāvo^eb^ ``idameva imassa ārammaṇa''nti niyamābhāvo, tena yathā araññamakkaṭo kenaci anivārito gahitaṃ ekaṃ rukkhasākhaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti, tampi muñcitvā aññanti katthaci anavaṭṭhito paribbhamati, evaṃ gahitaṃ ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ, tampi muñcitvā aññanti anavaṭṭhitatā, ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā pavattituṃ asamatthatā ca makkaṭasamānatāti ^a^V2.0172^ea^ dasseti. aṭṭhivedhaviddhopi uppathaṃ anugaccchanto duṭṭhasso ^b^assakhaḷuṅko. yatthakāmanipātito^eb^ti yattha katthaci icchitārammaṇe nipātibhāvato. nānāvesadhārī ^b^raṅganaṭo^eb^.
[06] āyatanadātuniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti pannarasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ ^b^bāvīsatī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0185^ea^ ^a^V2.0173^ea^ gaṇanaparicchedo. ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. ^b^cakkhundriya^eb^ntiādi tesaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. tattha cakkhudvāre indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti cakkhudvārabhāve taṃdvārikehi attano indabhāvaṃ paramissarabhāvaṃ kārayatīti ^b^cakkhundriyaṃ^eb^. tañhi te rūpaggahaṇe attānaṃ anuvatteti, te ca taṃ anuvattanti. sesesupi eseva nayo. tasmā sotaghānajivhākāyadvāre indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti. ^b^kāyindriyaṃ^eb^. vijānanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti ^b^manindriyaṃ^eb^. itthibhāvalakkhaṇe, parisabhāvalakkhaṇe, anupālanalakkhaṇe, sukhalakkhaṇe, dukkhalakkhaṇe, somanassalakkhaṇe, domanassalakkhaṇe, upekkhālakkhaṇe, adhimokkhalakkhaṇe, paggahalakkhaṇe, upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe, avikkhepalakkhaṇe, dassanalakkhaṇe, anaññātaṃ ñassāmīti pavatte jānanalakkhaṇe, ñātānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ puna ājānane aññātāvibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti ^b^aññātāvindriyaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^vijāniyā^eb^ti vijāneyya. ^b^bhūmito cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo avuttasampipaṇḍanattho, tena tāvatvaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, taṃ pana tāvatvaṃ parato vaṇṇayissāma. asammasanupagānampi atthibhāvato daṭṭhabbatā idha na gahitā.

[03] ^b^pubbabhāge^eb^ti ariyamaggato pubbabhāge. ^b^anaññāta^eb^nti na aññātaṃ na adhigataṃ. niccatāya natthi etassa mataṃ bhaṅgo, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate maraṇanti amataṃ, pajjitabbato padañcāti ^b^amatapadaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ. ^b^``evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato''^eb^ti etena pubbabhāgavasenetaṃ indriyaṃ evaṃ voharīyatīti dasseti. ^b^ājānanato^eb^ti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvāva jānanato. yena taṃsamaṅgipuggalo, taṃsampayuttadhammā vā aññātāvino honti ^a^V2.0174^ea^, so aññātāvibhāvo pariniṭṭhitakiccajānanakhīṇāsavassa bhāvabhūto hutvā uppattito ^b^``khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] liṅgeti gameti ñāpetīti liṅgaṃ, liṅgīyati vā etenāti liṅgaṃ. kiṃ liṅgeti, kiṃ vā liṅgīyatīti? indaṃ, indo vā. indassa liṅga indaliṅgaṃ, indaliṅgassa attho taṃsabhāvo ^b^indaliṅgaṭṭho,^eb^ indaliṅgameva vā indriyasaddassa ^a^M2.0186^ea^ atthoti ^b^indaliṅgaṭṭho^eb^. sajjitaṃ uppāditanti siṭṭhaṃ, indena siṭṭhaṃ ^b^indasiṭṭhaṃ. juṭṭhaṃ^eb^ sevitaṃ. kammasaṅkhātassa indassa liṅgāni, tena ca siṭṭhānīti kammajāneva yojetabbāni, na aññāni, te ca dve atthā kamme eva yojetabbā, itare ca bhagavati evāti āha ^b^``yathāyoga''^eb^nti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti bhagavato, kammassa ca indattā. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu indriyesu. ^b^ulliṅgenti^eb^ ñāpenti pakāsenti phalasampattivipattīhi kāraṇasampattivipattiavabodhato. ``so taṃ nimittaṃ āsevatī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 9.35) gocarakaraṇampi āsevanā vuttāti āha ^b^``kānici gocarāsevanāyā''^eb^ti. tattha sabbesaṃ gocarikātabbattepi ``kānicī''ti vacanaṃ avipassitabbānaṃ bahulaṃ manasikaraṇena anāsevanīyattā. paccavekkhanāmattameva hi tesu hotīti. ``tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.170) bhāvanā āsevanāti vuttāti bhāvetabbāni saddhādīni sandhāyāha ^b^``kānici bhāvanāsevanāyā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^ādhipaccaṃ^eb^ indriyapaccayabhāvo. asatipi ca indriyapaccayabhāve itthipurisindriyānaṃ, attano attano paccayavasena pavattamāne taṃsahitasantāne aññākārena appavattamānehi liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyabhāve ādhipaccaṃ. imasmiṃ ca atthe indanti parimissariyaṃ karonticceva ^b^indriyāni^eb^. cakkhādīsu dassitena nayena aññesañca jīvitādīnaṃ tadanuvattīsu ādhipaccaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^amohoyeva^eb^ na visuṃ cattāro dhammā, tasmā tassa saṅkhārakkhandhakathāyaṃ vibhāvitāni lakkhaṇādīni tesañca veditabbānīti adhippāyo. ^b^sesāni tattha^eb^ khandhaniddese lakkhaṇādīhi ^b^arūpeneva āgatāni^eb^.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ sattānaṃ ariyabhūmipaṭilābho bhagavato desanāya sādhāraṇaṃ, padānañca payojananti ^a^V2.0175^ea^ āha ^b^``ajjhattadhamme pariññāyā''^eb^tiādi. aññesampi indriyānaṃ attabhāvapariyāpannatāya satipi attabhāvapaññāpanāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīnaṃ sātisayā attabhāvapariyāpannāti vuttaṃ ^b^``attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundiyādīnī''^eb^ti (vibha0 aṭṭha0 219).^b^ abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^eb^itthipurisindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyadesanākkamo vuttoti ^a^M2.0187^ea^ idhāpi ^b^``tato jīvitindriya''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. taṃ indriyayamakadesanāya (yama0 3.indriyayamaka.1 ādayo) sameti. ^b^indriyavibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha0 219 ādayo) pana manindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ purimapacchimānaṃ ajjhāttikabāhirānaṃ anupālakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ tesa majjhe vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^yañca kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ^eb^. yāva ca duvidhattabhāvānupālakassa jīvitindriyassa pavatti, tāva dukkhabhūtānaṃ etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivattīti ñāpanatthaṃ, tena ca cakkhādīnaṃ dukkhānubandhatāya pariññeyyataṃ ñāpeti. ^b^paṭipattidassanattha^eb^nti pubbabhāgapaṭipattidassanatthaṃ. ^b^tassevā^eb^ti anaññātaññassāmītindriyasseva. ^b^tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattā^eb^ti bhāvanāmaggasampayuttaṃ aññindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. dassanāntarā hi bhāvanāti.

[03] ^b^bhedo^eb^ti idha sabhāvato bhedo adhippeto, na bhūmipuggalādivasenāti āha ^b^``sesānaṃ abhedo''^eb^ti. nanu ca jīvitindriyassa anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo, tenassa duvidhassāpi abhedoti? saccametaṃ, tassa pana rūpārūpasabhāvakato bhedo gahito, na evaṃ sesānaṃ koci bhedo atthīti tesaṃ abhedoti bhedābhāvo vutto. nanu cettha vedanā, paññā ca bhinditvā vuttāti? na, yathā desitesu bāvīsatiyā indriyesu bhedābhedassa adhippetattā.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ cakkhundriyādīnaṃ satipi purejātādipaccayabhāve indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbameva kiccaṃ ^b^kicca^eb^nti vuttaṃ tassa anaññasādhāraṇattā, indriyakathāya ca adhikatattā. attano tikkhamandādiākāro attākāro, tassa anuvattāpanaṃ ^b^attākārānuvattāpanaṃ^eb^. tenāha ^b^``tikkhamandādisaṅkhātāttākārānuvattāpana''^eb^nti. atha vā tikkhamandādisaṅkhātassa ca attākārassa ca anuvattāpanaṃ ^b^tikkha...pe0... vattāpanaṃ^eb^. visuṃ attākāraggahaṇena cettha rūpāvabhāsanādikassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. cakkhundriyassa hi rūpābhihananayogyatāsaṅkhāte rūpāvabhāsanasāmatthiye asati na kadācipi cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccaṃ sambhavati. esa nayo sotindriyādīsupi. pubbaṅgamabhāvena manindriyassa ^b^vasāvattāpanaṃ^eb^ hoti, na aññesaṃ. taṃsampayuttānipi hi indriyāni tabbaseneva hutvā attano attano indriyakiccaṃ sādhenti cetasikabhāvato ^a^V2.0176^ea^, na tesaṃ vasena manindriyaṃ ^a^M2.0188^ea^. ayañhissa pubbaṅgamatā. sabbattha ca indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbanti adhikāro anuvattatīti daṭṭhabbo. satipi anuppādane, anupatthambhane ca tappaccayānaṃ tappavattane nimittabhāvo ^b^anuvidhānaṃ^eb^.

[03] chādetvā pharitvā uppajjamānā sukhadukkhavedanā sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā ajjottharitvā sayameva pākaṭā hoti, sahajātadhammā ca tassā vasena sukhadukkhabāvappatā viya hontīti āha ^b^``yathāsakaṃ oḷārikākārānupāpana''^eb^nti. asantassa, apaṇītassapi akusalatabbipākādisampayuttassa yathārahaṃ ^b^majjhattākārānupāpanaṃ^eb^ yojetabbaṃ. samānajātiyehi vā sukhadukkhehi ^b^santapaṇītākārānupāpanaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^paṭipakkhābhibhavana^eb^nti assaddhiyādipaṭipakkhābhibhavanaṃ. ^b^pasannākārādā^eb^ti pasannapaggahitaupaṭṭhitasamāhitadassanākārānupāpanaṃ yathākkamaṃ saddhādīnaṃ. ^b^byāpādādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni gahitāni. maggasampayuttasseva ca aññindriyassa kiccaṃ dassitaṃ. teneva ca phalasampayuttassa taṃtaṃsaṃyojanappaṭippassaddhipahānakiccatā dassitā hotīti. katasabbakiccassa aññātāvindriyaṃ aññassa kātabbassa abhāvā amatābhimukhameva tabbhāvapaccayo ca hoti, na itarāni viya kiccantarapasutaṃ. tenāha^b^ ``amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā cā''^eb^ti.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhūmito^eb^ vinicchayo uttānattho eva. etthāha -- kasmā pana ettakeneva indriyāni vuttāni, etāni eva ca vuttānīti? ādhipaccaṭṭhavasena, ^b^ādhipaccaṃ^eb^ nāma issariyanti vuttamevetaṃ. tayidaṃ ādhipaccaṃ attano attano kicce, phale cāti aññesampi sabhāvadhammānaṃ kasmā na labbhati? paccayādhīnavuttikā hi paccayuppannāti siyā phalahetudhammesu anuvattanānuvattanīyatāti? saccametaṃ, tathāpi atthi tesaṃ viseso. svāyaṃ ``cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi cakkhādīnaṃ siddhamādhipacca''ntiādinā (vibha0 aṭṭha0 219) ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ dassitoyeva. apica khandhapañcake yāyaṃ sattapaññatti, tassā visesanissayo ``cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī''ti tāni tāva ādhipaccattaṃ upādāya ``cakkhundriyaṃ...pe0..ṃanindriya''ntiādito (vibha0 219) vuttāni. svāyaṃ attabhāvo imesaṃ vasena ``itthī puriso''ti samaññaṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ ^a^M2.0189^ea^ bhāvadvayaṃ. tayime upādinnadhammā yena dhammena pavattanti, ayaṃ so dhammo tesaṃ ṭhitihetūti dassanatthaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. svāyaṃ sattasaññito dhammapuñjo pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti ^a^V2.0177^ea^ dassanatthaṃ vedanāpañcakaṃ. tato visuddhikāmānaṃ vodānasambhāradassanatthaṃ saddhādipañcakaṃ. sambhavavodānasambhārā imehi visujjanti, visuddhippattā niṭṭhitakiccāva hontīti dassanatthaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīni tīṇi vuttāni. sabbattha ``ādhipaccattaṃ upādāyā''ti padaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ aggahaṇaṃ.

[03] atha vā pavattinivattīnaṃ nissarādidassanattampi etāniyeva vuttāni. pavattiyā hi visesato mūlanissayabhūtāni cha ajjhattikāyatanāni. yathāha ``chasu loko samuppanno''tiādi (su0 ni0 171). tassa uppatti itthipurisindriyehi visabhāgavatthusarāganimittehi yebhuyyena sattakāyassa abhinibbatti. vuttañhetaṃ ``tiṇṇaṃ kho, mahārāja, sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti mātā ca utunī hoti, gandhabbo ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti, mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā hontī''tiādi (ma0 ni0 1.408; mi0 pa0 4.1.6). avaṭṭhānaṃ jīvitindriyena tena anupāletabbato. tenāha ``āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā''tiādi (dha0 sa0 19). upabhogo vedanāhi. vedanāvasena hi iṭṭhādisabbavisayūpabhogo. yathāha ``vedayati vedayatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā vedanāti vuccatī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.450). evaṃ pavattiyā nissayasamuppādaṭṭhitisambhogadassanattaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ yāva upekkhindriyanti cuddasindriyāni desitāni. yathā cetāni pavattiyā, evaṃ itarāni nivattiyā. vivaṭṭasannissitena hi nibbattitāni saddhādīni pañcindriyāni nivattiyā nissayo. uppādo anaññātaññassāmītindriyena tassa nivattivasena paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. avaṭṭhānaṃ aññindriyena, upabhogo aññātāvindriyena aggaphalasamupabhogato. khīṇāsavāhi visavitāya nibbutisukhaṃ paribhujjanti. evampi etāni eva indriyāni desitāni. ettāvatā yathādhippetatthasiddhito aññesaṃ aggahaṇaṃ. imināva nesaṃ desanākkamopi saṃvaṇṇitoti veditabboti.
[06] indriyaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 529^b^.^eb^ ariyasaddena ^a^M2.0190^ea^ ^a^V2.0178^ea^ visesanaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ saccasaddena uddhiṭṭhānipi ariyasaccāni evāti dassento ^b^``saccānīti cattāri ariyasaccānī''^eb^ti āda. samāññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati, visesatthinā ca viseso anupayujjitabboti. ariyasaccesu vā vicāritesu itarānipi atthato vicāritāneva hontīti vipassanāya ca bhūmibhūtāni, ariyasaccānevāti ca katvā ``saccānī''ti uddharitvāpi ^b^``cattāri ariyasaccānī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[01] ^b^sāsanakkamo^eb^ti ariyasaccāni vuccanti, ariyasaccadesanā vā. sakalañhi sāsanaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ saccavinimuttaṃ natthi pavattinivattitadubhayahetusandassanavasena pavattanato. tasmā saccesu kamati, sīlasamādhipañmāsaṅkhātaṃ vā sāsanaṃ etesu kamati, pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattati, tasmā kamati etthāti kamo, kiṃ kamati? sāsanaṃ. sāsanassa kamo ^b^``sāsanakkamo''^eb^ti saccāni sāsanappavattiṭṭhānāni vuccanti, taṃdesanā ca tabbohārenāti.

[03] ^b^tathā^eb^ti taṃsabhāvā dukkhādisabhāvā. ^b^avitathā^eb^ti amusāsabhāvā bādhanādibhāvena bhūtasabhāvā. ^b^anaññathā^eb^ti aññākārarahitā abādhanādiākāravivittā. dukkhadukkhatātannimittatāhi adhiṭṭhitattā ^b^pīḷanaṭṭho^eb^. samecca sambhūya paccayehi katabhāvo ^b^saṅkhataṭṭho^eb^. dukkhadukkhatātannimittatāhi paridahanaṃ, kilesadāhasamāyogo vā ^b^santāpaṭṭho^eb^. jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvedā vipariṇāmetabbatā ^b^vipariṇāmaṭṭho^eb^. ettha ca pīḷanaṭṭho dukkhassa saraseneva āvibhavanākāro, itare yathākkamaṃ samudayamagganirodhadassanehi āvibhavanākārāti ayaṃ catunnampi viseso. tatratrābhinandanavasena byāpitvā ūhanaṃ rāsikaraṇaṃ dukkhassa nibbattanaṃ ^b^āyūhanaṃ^eb^ ākārassa byāpanatthattā. āgacchati samudayatoti vā āyaṃ, dukkhaṃ, tassa ūhanaṃ pavattanaṃ ^b^āyūhanaṃ,^eb^ ayaṃ saraseneva āvibhavanākāro. nidadāti dukkhanti ^b^nidānaṃ,^eb^ ``idaṃ taṃ dukkha''nti sampaṭicchāpentaṃ viya samuṭṭhāpetīti attho. ayaṃ ^b^nidānaṭṭho^eb^ dukkhadassanena āvibhavanākāro. saṃsāradukkhena saṃyojanaṃ ^b^saṃyogaṭṭho^eb^ ^a^M2.0191^ea^. maggādhigamananivāraṇaṃ ^b^palibodhaṭṭho^eb^. ime ca saṃyogapalibodhaṭṭhā nirodhamaggadassanehi āvibhavanākārā. nissaranti sattā ettha, sayameva vā nissaṭaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ sabbasaṅkhatehi sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggabhāvatoti ^b^nissaranaṃ^eb^. ayamassa ^a^V2.0179^ea^ sabhāvena āvibhavanākāro, itare vivekāsaṅkhātāmataṭṭā, samudayakkharāpaccayāvināsitā vā samudayamaggadukkhadassanena āvibhavanākārā.

[03] saṃsārato niggamanaṃ ^b^niyyānaṃ^eb^. ayamassa sarasena āvibhavanākāro. paribodhūpacchedanena nibbānādhigamova nibbānanimittattā maggassa ^b^hetuṭṭho^eb^. paññāpadhānattā cassa nibbānadassanaṃ, catusaccadassanaṃ vā ^b^dassanaṭṭho^eb^. catusaccadassane, kilesadukkhasantāpavūpasamane ca ādhipaccaṃ karonti maggadhammā sampayuttadhammesūti so maggassa ^b^ādhipateyyaṭṭho^eb^. visesato vā ālambanādhipatibhūtā maggadhammā honti ``maggādhipatino''ti (dha0 sa0 tikamātikā 16) vacanatoti so tesaṃ ākāro ^b^ādhipateyyaṭṭho^eb^. ete hetudassanādhipateyyaṭṭhā samudayanirodhadukkhadassanehi āvibhavanākārā. evamādi āhāti sambandho. ^b^abhisamayaṭṭho^eb^ti abhisametabbaṭṭho. abhisamayassa vā visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭho. atha vā abhisamayassa pavattiākāro ^b^abhisamayaṭṭho^eb^. so cettha abhisametabbena pīḷanādinā dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
[03] 530^b^.^eb^ kucchitaṃ khaṃ ^b^dukkhaṃ,^eb^ gārayhaṃ hutvā asāranti attho.

[01] ^b^``samāgamo sameta''^eb^ntiādīsu kevalassa ^b^āgama^eb^saddassa, ^b^eta^eb^-saddassa ca payoge saṃyogatthassa anupalabbhanato, ^b^saṃ^eb^-saddassa ca saṃyoge upalabbhanato ^b^``saṃyogaṃ dīpetī''^eb^ti āha anvayato, byatirekato ca tadatthajotakatāsiddhito. ^b^uppannaṃ udita^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^aya^eb^-saddo gatiatthe siddho hetusaddoviya kāraṇaṃ dīpeti. attano phalanipphādanena ayati pavattati, eti vā etasmā phalanti ^b^ayo^eb^ti, ^b^saṃyoge uppattikāraṇaṃ samudayo^eb^ti. ettha visuṃ payujjamānāpi upasaggasaddā sadhātukaṃ saṃyogatthaṃ, uppādatthañca dīpenti, kiriyāvisesakattāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^``abhāvo^eb^ ^a^M2.0192^ea^ ^b^ettha rodhassāti nirodho''^eb^ti etena nibbānassa dukkhavivittabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^samadhigate^eb^ tasmiṃ tadadhigamato puggalassa rodhābhāvo pavattisaṅkhātassa rodhassa paṭipakkhabhūtāya nivattiyā adhigatattāti. etasmiñca atthe abhāvo etasmiṃ rodhassāti ^b^nirodho^eb^ icceva padasamāso. dukkhābhāvo panettha puggalassa, na nibbānasseva. anuppādo eva nirodho ^b^anuppādanirodho^eb^. āyatiṃ bhavādīsu appavatti, na pana bhaṅgoti bhaṅgavācakaṃ nirodhasaddaṃ nivattetvā ^a^V2.0180^ea^ anuppādavācakaṃ gaṇhāti. etasmiṃ atthe kāraṇe phalūpacāraṃ katvā nirodhapaccayo nirodhoti vutto.

[03] ^b^paṭipadā ca hoti^eb^ puggalassa dukkhanirodappattiyā. nanu ca sā eva dukkhanirodappattīti tassā eva sā paṭipadāti na yujjatīti? na puggalādhigamassa pattibhāvena, yehi so adhigacchati, tesaṃ kāraṇabhūtānaṃ paṭipadābhāvena ca vuttattā. sacchi kiriyāsacchikaraṇadhammānañhi aññatthābhāvepi puggalasacchikiriyādhammabhāvehi nānattaṃ katvā niddeso katoti. atha vā yaṃ dukkhanirodhappattiyā niṭṭhānaṃ phalaṃ, sayañca dukkhanirodhappattibhūtaṃ, tassa abhisamayabhūtāya dukkhanirodhappattiyā paṭipadatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ ^b^buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhantī^eb^ti ettha paṭividdhakāle pavattaṃ buddhādivohāraṃ ``agamā rājagahaṃ buddho''tiādīsu (su0 ni0 410) viya bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti purimakālepi āropetvā ``buddhādayo''ti vuttaṃ. te hi buddhādayo catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhantīti. ^b^tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī^eb^ti ettha ariyapaṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti purimapade uttarapadalopo ariyasaccānīti vuccantīti attho. tathāgatena hi sayaṃ adhigatattā, paveditattā, tato eva ca aññehi adhigamanīrattā tāni tassa hontīti. ^b^ariyabhāvasiddhitopī^eb^ti ettha ariyasādhakāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti pubbe viya uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^ariyāni saccānītipī^eb^ti ettha avitathabhāvena araṇīyattā adhigantabbattā ariyāni, ariyasamaññā vā avisaṃvādake avitathe niruḷhā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ ^b^bādhanalakkhaṇa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0193^ea^ ettha dukkhadukkhatannimittabhāvo, udayavayapaṭipīḷitabhāvo vā bādhanaṃ. bhavādīsu jātiādivasena, cakkhurogādivasena ca anekadā dukkhassa pavattanameva puggalassa santāpanaṃ, tadassa kiccaṃ rasoti ^b^santāpanarasaṃ^eb^. pavattinivattīsu saṃsāravimokkhesu pavatti hutvā gayhatīti ^b^pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. pabhavati etasmā dukkhaṃ nibbattati, purimabhavena pacchimabhavo ghaṭito saṃyutto hutvā pavattatīti ^b^pabhāvo^eb^. ``evampi taṇhānusaye anūhate, nibbattati dukkhamidaṃ punappuna''nti (dha0 pa0 338; netti0 30) evaṃ punappunaṃ uppādanaṃ ^b^anupacchedakaraṇaṃ^eb^. bhavanissaraṇanivāraṇaṃ ^b^palibodho^eb^. taṇhakkhayādibhāvena sabbadukkhasantatā ^b^santi. accutirasa^eb^nti accutisampattikaṃ acavanakiccaṃ vā. ^b^kicca^eb^nti ca cavanābhāvaṃ ^a^V2.0181^ea^ kiccamiva katvā pariyāyena vuttaṃ, acavanañcassa sabhāvāpariccajanaṃ avikāritā daṭṭhabbā. pañcakkhandhanimittasuññatāya aviggahaṃ hutvā gayhatīti ^b^animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. anusayasamucchindanena saṃsāracārakato niggamanūpāyabhāvo ^b^niyyānaṃ^eb^. sabbakilesānaṃ anuppādanirodhanaṃ ^b^kilesappahānakaraṇaṃ^eb^. nimittato, pavattato ca cittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ hutvā gayhatīti ^b^vuṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ asuvaṇṇādi suvaṇṇādi viya dissamānaṃ ^b^māyā^eb^ti vatthusabbhāvā tassā viparītatā vuttā. udakaṃ viya dissamānā pana ^b^marīci^eb^ upagatānaṃ tucchā. vatthumattampi tassā na dissatīti ^b^visaṃvādikā^eb^ vuttā. marīcimāyāattavidhuro bhāvo ^b^tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo. ariyañāṇassā^eb^ti ariyassa avitathaggāhakassa ñāṇassa, tena paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi gahitaṃ hoti. tesaṃ gocarabhāvo paṭivijjitabbatā, ārammaṇabhāvo ca daṭṭhabbo. ^b^aggilakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ uṇhattaṃ. tañhi katthaci kaṭṭhādiupādānabhede visaṃvādakaṃ, viparītaṃ, abhūtaṃ vākadācipi na hoti. ``jātidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino''ti (a0 ni0 3.39; 5.57) evaṃ vuttā jātiādikā ^b^lokapakati^eb^. ekaccānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ tiriyaṃ dīghatā, manussādīnaṃ uddhaṃ dīghatā, vuddhiniṭṭhaṃ pattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhananti evamādikā ca ^b^lokapakatī^eb^ti vadanti. tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvesu pacchimo ^b^tathatā^eb^. paṭhamo ^b^avitathatā,^eb^ majjhimo ^b^anaññatatā^eb^ti ayametesaṃ viseso,

[03] ^b^dukkhā^eb^ ^a^M2.0194^ea^ ^b^aññaṃ na bādhaka^eb^ nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu taṇhāpi jāti viya dukkhanimittatāya bādhikāti? na, bādhakappabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā. evamhi pavatti, pavattihetu ca asaṅkarato bodhitā honti. atha vā jātiādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvo, dukkhadukkhatā ca bādhakatā, na dukkhappabhavatāti natthi taṇhāya pabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitāya bādhakabhāvapasaṅgo. tenāha ^b^``dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka''^eb^nti. ^b^bādhakattaniyāmenā^eb^ti dukkhaṃ bādhakameva, dukkhameva bādhakanti evaṃ dvidhāpi bādhakattāvadhāranenāti attho. ^b^bādhakattaniyāmenā^eb^ti hi bādhakassa, bādhakatte ca niyāmena. yatā bādhakattassa dukkhe niyatatā, evaṃ dukkhassa ca bādhakatte niyatatāti.

[03] ^b^taṃ vinā nāññato^eb^ti satipi avasesakilesāvasesākusalasāsavakusalamūlāvasesasāsavakusaladhammānaṃ ^a^V2.0182^ea^ dukkhahetubhāve na taṇhāya vinā tesaṃ dukkhahetubhāvo atthi, tehi pana vināpi taṇhāya dukkhahetubhāvo atthi kusalehi vinā akusalehi rūpāvacarādikusalehi vinā kāmāvacarādīhi ca taṇhāya dukkhanibbattakattā. santabhāvassa, santabhāve vā niyāmo santabhāvaniyāmo, tena ^b^santabhāvaniyāmena. tacchaniyyānabhāvattā^eb^ti dvidhāpi niyāmena taccho niyyānabhāvo etassa, na micchāmaggassa viya viparītatāya, na lokiyamaggassa viya vā anekantikatāya atacchoti tacchaniyyānabhāvo, maggo, tassa bhāvo tacchaniyyānabhāvattaṃ, tasmā tacchaniyyānabhāvattā. sabbattha dvidhāpi niyāmena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo vuttoti āha ^b^``iti tacchāvipallāsā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 534^b^.^eb^ saccasaddassa sambhavantānaṃ atthānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ, sambhavante vā atthe vatvā adhippetassa atthassa uddharaṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ ^b^atthudvāro. viratisacce^eb^ti musāvādaviratiyaṃ. na hi aññaviratīsu saccasaddo niruḷho. ye pana ``viratisaccaṃ samādānaviratī''ti vadanti, tesampi na samādānamattaṃ viratisaccaṃ, atha kho samādānāvisaṃvādanaṃ. taṃ pana paṭiññāsaccaṃ musāvādaviratiyeva hoti. ``idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña''nti (ma0 ni0 2.187, 202-203, 427; 3.27-29) pavattā diṭṭhi ``sacca''nti abhinivisanavuttiyā ^b^diṭṭhisaccaṃ^eb^. amosadhammattā nibbānaṃ ^b^paramatthasaccaṃ^eb^. ``amosadhammaṃ nibbānaṃ, tadariyā saccato vidū''ti (su0 ni0 763) hi vuttaṃ, tassa pana taṃsampāpakassa ^a^M2.0195^ea^ ca maggassa pajānanā paṭivedho avivādakāraṇanti dvayampi ``ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthi, yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajāna''nti imissā (su0 ni0 890; mahāni0 119) gāthāya ``sacca''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 535^b^.^eb^ ``netaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti āgaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''ti etena jātiādīnaṃ dukkhāriyasaccabhāve aviparītataṃ dasseti ekanteneva bādhakabhāvato. ``aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti āgaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''ti iminā dukkhāriyasaccabhāvassa jātiādīsu niyatataṃ dasseti anaññatthabhāvato. sacepi kathañci koci evaṃcitto āgaccheyya, paññāpane pana sahadhammena ñāpane attano vādassa patiṭṭhāpane samattho natthīti dassetuṃ ^b^``ahametaṃ...pe0... paññapessāmīti āgaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. jātiādīnaṃ anaññathatā aññassa ca tatābhūtassa abhāvoyevettha ṭhānābhāvo. sacepi koci āgaccheyya āgacchatu, ṭhānaṃ pana natthīti ayamettha suttattho. esa nayo dutiyasuttepi. tattha pana ^a^V2.0183^ea^ attabhāvapaṭilābheneva sattānaṃ jātiādīnaṃ patti, sammukhībhāvo ca hotīti sampattattā, paccakkhatā ca paṭhamatā, yato taṃ bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ, tannimittatā dutiyatā, tadupasamatā tatiyatā, taṃsampāpakatā catutthatāti daṭṭhabbā.

[03] ^b^``etaparamato''^eb^ti etena catūhi ariyasaccehi pavattiādīnaṃ anavasesapariyādānamāha. nibbutikāmena parijānanādīhi aññaṃ kiñci kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ natti, dhammañāṇakiccaṃ vā ito aññaṃ natthi, pariññeyyādīni ca etaparamānevāti cattāriyeva vuttāni. taṇhāya ādīnavadassāvīnaṃ vasena taṇhāvatthuādīnaṃ etaparamatāyāti vuttaṃ. tathā ālaye pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhāte, sakalavatthukāmasaṅkhāte, bhavattayasaṅkhāte vā dukkhe dosadassāvīnaṃ vasena ālayādīnaṃ eteparamatāyāti vuttaṃ.

[03] 536^b^.^eb^ ^b^``oḷārikattā''^eb^ti idaṃ jātiādīnaṃ dukkhabhāvassa pacurajanapākaṭatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na ariyena ñāṇena paṭivijjhitabbākāraṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti dukkhaṃ. ^b^akata^eb^nti anibbattitaṃ, anipphāditakāraṇanti adhippāyo. kāraṇe hi siddhe phalaṃ siddhameva hoti. ^b^``neva akataṃ āgacchatī''^eb^ti ca iminā ahetuvādaṃ ^a^M2.0196^ea^ paṭikkhipati. ^b^``na issaranimmānādito''^eb^ti etena pajāpatipurisapakatikālādivāde paṭikkhipati. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. ^b^``sahetukena dukkhenā''^eb^ti etena dukkhadassanena janitassa saṃvegassa saṃvaḍḍhanamāha. dukkhassa hi sahetukabhāvasavasena balavasaṃvego jāyati yāvāyaṃ hetu, tāva idaṃ dukkhaṃ avicchedena pavattatīti. ^b^assāsajananatthaṃ nirodha^eb^nti saṃvegajātassa assāsaṃ janetuṃ nirodhasaccamāha. nibbinnasaṃsāradukkhassa hi nirodhakathā vuccamānā ativiya ativiya assāsaṃ sañjaneti.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ye te jātiādayo dhammā bhagavatā vuttāti sambandho. kasmā panettha byādhi na gahitoti? anekantabhāvato. tathā hi so kadāci, kesañci ca natthi. yathāha ``tayo rogā pure āsuṃ, icchā anasanaṃ jarā''ti (su0 ni0 313). bākulatterādīnaṃ so nāhosiyeva, dukkhaggahaṇena vā byādhi ettha hitovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. paramatthato hi dhātukkhobhapaccayaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ byādhīti. upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā ^b^``dvādasa dhammā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kāmataṇhābhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā ``dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca''nti ^a^V2.0184^ea^ aññe antogadhabhede anāmasitvā ekarūpena gahitāpi taṇhā sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā, ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatā, diṭṭhivirahitā kevalaṃ kāmassādabhūtā cāti tidhāva bhinditvā vuttā. ^b^``ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo''^eb^ti maggasaccabhāvena ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttāpi sabhāvato bhinnā eva te dhammāti āha ^b^``aṭṭha dhammā''^eb^ti.
[06] saccaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^bhave^eb^ti ādānanikkhepaparicchinno dhammappabandho bhavo, tasmiṃ bhave. so hi jāyati ettha yonigatiādivibhāgoti jātīti vuccati, jāyanti ettha sattā samānanvayāti ^b^jāti,^eb^ nikāyo. ^b^saṅkhatalakkhaṇe^eb^ti yattha katthaci uppāde. so hi jananaṭṭhena jāti. ^b^paṭisandhiya^eb^nti paṭisandhicittakkhaṇe ^a^M2.0197^ea^. ^b^sampātijāto^eb^ti ettha jātisaddena labbhamānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanasaṅkhātaṃ jāyanatthaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``pasūtiya''^eb^nti, abhijātiyanti attho. jāyati etāya khattiyādisamaññāti ^b^jāti,^eb^ kulaṃ.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ sayanti etthāti seyyā, mātukucchisaṅkhāto gabbho seyyā etesanti ^b^gabbhaseyyakā,^eb^ aṇḍajā, jalābujā ca. ^b^itaresa^eb^nti saṃsedajānaṃ, opapātikānañca. ^b^ayampi cā^eb^ti ``paṭisandhikhandhesvevā''ti anantaraṃ vuttakathāpi, pageva ``paṭisandhito paṭṭhāyā''ti vuttakathāyaṃ. tenāha ^b^``tesaṃ tesaṃ paṭhamapātubhāvo jātī''^eb^ti.
[03] ummujjanavasena gayhatīti ^b^ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. vakkhamānavibhāgaṃ dukkhavicittataṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^.

[03] 539^b^.^eb^ ^b^``kasmā panā''^eb^ti vadato codakassāyamadhippāyo -- ekantadukkhe niraye tāva jātidukkhā hotu, aññāsupi vā duggatīsu pāpakammasamuṭṭhānato sukhasaṃvattaniyakammasamuṭṭhānāsu ^a^V2.0185^ea^ pana sugatīsu kathanti. itaro ``nāyaṃ jāti sabhāvadukkhavasena dukkhāti vuttā, na hi kāci paṭisandhi dukkhavedanāsampayuttā atthi, atha kho dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato''ti dassento ^b^``anekesaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato''^eb^tiādimāha. adukkhasabhāvampi pariyāyato dukkhanti vuccatīti dukkhasabhāvaṃ dukkhasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``dukkhadukkha''^eb^nti yathā rūparūpanti.
[03] ^b^dukkhuppattihetuto^eb^ti ``ahu vata me, taṃ vata nāhosī''ti cetasikadukkhuppattihetuto.

[03] ``yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha''nti (saṃ0 ni0 3.15, 45, 76, 77, 85; 2.4.1, 4) vacanato tebhūmakā saṅkhārā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ, tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``udayabbayappaṭipāḷitattā''^eb^ti. yañhi abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷitaṃ, taṃ dukkhamanatāya dukkhanti, vipassanācārassa adhippetattā tebhūmakaggahaṇaṃ.
[03] ^b^dukkhadukkha^eb^nti dukkhadomassupāyāse vadati. ``jātipi dukkhā''tiādinā (vibha0 190) ^b^dukkhasaccavibhaṅge^eb^ āgataṃ.
[03] ^b^bhagavatāpī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0198^ea^ anāvaraṇañāṇavatā accariyāparimeyyadesanākosallavatā bhagavatāpi. ^b^upamāvasena^eb^ti aṅgārakāsūpamādiupamāvasena.

[03] 540^b^.^eb^ ^b^puṇḍarīkādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena na maṇikanakarajatapavāḷādiratanasanniccaye, nāpi aṇḍajameṇḍajavāyajātike subhamanuññasayanatale, nāpi ratanamayakuṭṭimamanohare pāsādatale, nāpi sittasammaṭṭhakusumopahāravati pāsādūpacāre, nāpi muttājālasadisavālikāvikiṇṇe viviṭaṅgaṇe, nāpi haritakambalasadisamudusaddalasamotale bhūmibhāgeti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^paramasambādhe^eb^ti ativiya sambādhe. ^b^tibbandhakāre^eb^ti bahalandhakāre. pittasemhapubbaruhiragūthodariyādi ^b^nānākuṇapasambādhe^eb^. mātā yadi vīsativassā, atha tiṃsa, cattālīsādivassā, tattakaṃ kālaṃ adhotavaccakūpasadisatāya ^b^adhimattajegucche. pūtimacchā^eb^ di sabbaṃ na sadisūpammaṃ tassa vātādivasena ekaccaduggandhāpagamasabbhāvato. ^b^dasa māse^eb^ti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ, yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ tato bhiyyopi ekaccānaṃ tatthāvaṭṭhānasambhavato ^a^V2.0186^ea^. attano adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitasaṅacitahatthadvayassa ukkuṭikasseva nisīdato ^b^samijjanappasāraṇādirahito^eb^.

[03] abhimukhaṃ kaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^ākaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. parito samantato kaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^parikaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. heṭṭhā dhunanaṃ ^b^odhūnanaṃ^eb^. nidhāya nidhāya dhūnanaṃ ^b^niddhūnanaṃ^eb^. ākaḍḍhanādisadisañcettha ^b^``ākaḍḍhanādī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. taruṇavaṇasadisaṃ ativiya sukhumālaṃ gabbhagataṃ sarīraṃ sītādiappakampi na sahatīti sītanarakūpapannatādi nidassitaṃ. tañhi tassa ativiya sītaṃ, ativiya uṇhañca hutvā upatiṭṭhati. sarīraṃ vāsiyādīhi tacchetvā khārāvasecanakaraṇaṃ ^b^khārāpaṭicchakaṃ. dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne^eb^ti gabbhāsayasaññitaṃ tatiyaṃ āvaṭṭaṃ sandhāyāha.

[03] ^b^parivattetvā^eb^ti uddhaṃpādādhosīsabhāvena parivattetvā. ^b^idaṃ vijāyanamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,^eb^ yena maraṇadukkhena ca aṭṭitā vedanāppattā sattā katipayamāsamattātikkantampi pavattiṃ vissaranti, mahandhakāraṃ mahāviduggaṃ pakkhandhā viya honti.
[03] ^b^vadhentassā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0199^ea^ socanaparidevanasīsapaṭihananādinā bādhentassa. khuppipāsā hi ātapāvaṭṭhānādinā ca ^b^ātāpanaṃ^eb^. pañcaggitāpanādinā ^b^paritāpanaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^imassā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa sattavidhassa. ^b^sabbassāpī^eb^ti gabbhakālādīsu tāpanamaddanādinirayaggidāhādisañjanitassa sakalassāpi. ^b^vatthumeva hoti^eb^ tadabhāve abhāvato. tenevāha ^b^``jāyetha no ce''^eb^tiādi.
[03] 541^b^.^eb^ ^b^vicitta^eb^nti vividhaṃ, acchariyaṃ vā.
[06] iti jātiniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03] 542^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhātalakkhaṇa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0187^ea^ ``ṭhitassa aññathatta''nti (saṃ0 ni0 3.38; a0 ni0 3.47; kathā0 214) vuttaṃ khaṇikajaraṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^khaṇḍiccādisammato^eb^ti khaṇḍiccapāliccavalittacatādinā samaññato. ^b^sā^eb^ti khandhapurāṇabhāvasaññitā pākaṭajarā. ^b^khandhaparipāko^eb^ ekabhavapariyāpannānaṃ khandhānaṃ purāṇabhāvo.
[06] iti jarāniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03] 543^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhatalakkhaṇa^eb^nti saṅkhārānaṃ vayasaññitaṃ khaṇikamaraṇamāha. ^b^yaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti yaṃ khaṇikamaraṇaṃ sandhāya, ``jīrāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita''nti (dhātu0 71) ettha ``maraṇa''nti vuttanti attho. ^b^ta^eb^nti jīvitindriyupaccedasaññitaṃ pākaṭamaraṇaṃ. ``cavana''nti lakkhitabbatāya ^b^cutilakkhaṇaṃ. viyogarasa^eb^nti yathādhigatehi sattasaṅkhārehi viyojanarasaṃ. yathūpapannāya gatiyā vippavāsavasena gayhatīti ^b^gativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^.
