[03] ^b^pāpassā^eb^ti pāpayogena pāpassa, upacitapāpakammassāti attho. ^b^pāpakammādinimitta^eb^nti pāpakammakammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ maraṇakāle upaṭṭhitaṃ ^a^M2.0200^ea^ akusalavipākārammaṇaṃ. tamhi passantasseva kassaci anubhavantassa viya mahādukkhaṃ hoti. ^b^bhaddassā^eb^ti bhaddakammassa, katakusalassāti attho. tassa pana kāmaṃ iṭṭhameva ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti, piyavippayogavatthukaṃ pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti, piyavippayogavatthukaṃ pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti āha ^b^``asahantassa viyogaṃ piyavatthuka''^eb^nti. ^b^avisesato^eb^ti pāpassa, bhaddassa ca sāmaññato. ``avisesato''ti vatvāpi ``sabbesa''nti vacanaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ parimadditasaṅkhārānaṃ ekaccānaṃ khīṇāsavānampi hotiyevāti dassanatthaṃ. ^b^vitujjamānamammāna^eb^nti sandhibandhanāvacchedakavāyunā vijjhiyamānamammaṭṭhānānaṃ.
[06] iti maraṇaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03] 544^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti ^a^V2.0188^ea^ soko. ^b^atthato domanassameva hoti^eb^ cetasikantarābhāvato. domanassaviseso pana hoti visayavisese pavattiākāravisesasabbhāvatoti taṃ visesaṃ lakkhaṇādito dassetuṃ ^b^``evaṃ santepī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^anto nijjhānaṃ^eb^ cittasantāpo. ^b^parijjhāpanaṃ^eb^ rāgadosapariḷāhavisiṭṭhaṃ dahanaṃ. katākatakusalākusalavisayaṃ vippaṭisārākārena pavattaṃ anusocanaṃ ^b^kukkuccaṃ,^eb^ ñātibyasanādivisayaṃ kevalaṃ cittasanthāpabhūtaṃ anusocanaṃ ^b^soko^eb^ti anusocanapaccupaṭṭhānattepi ayametesaṃ viseso.

[01] visapītaṃ sallaṃ ^b^visasallaṃ^eb^. sokavasena atisārādi byādhipi hoti, sokabahulassa sarīraṃ na cirasseva jīrati, balavasokābhibhūto maraṇampi pāpuṇātīti āha ^b^``samāvahati ca byādhijarāmaraṇabhedana''^eb^nti.
[06] iti sokaniddesavaṇṇanā.
[03] 545^b^.^eb^ ^b^vacīpalāpo^eb^ti vācāvippalāpo, so atthato saddo eva. ^b^bhiyyo^eb^ti sokadukkhato upari. sokasamuṭṭhāno hi ^b^paridevo^eb^.
[06] iti paridevaniddesavaṇṇanā.
[03] 546^b^.^eb^ jātiādīnampi ^a^M2.0201^ea^ yathārahaṃ dukkhavatthudukkhadukkhatāhi satipi dukkhabhāve kāyassa pīḷanavasena idaṃ savisesaṃ dukkhamanti āha ^b^``dukkhanti visesato vutta''^eb^nti.
[06] iti dukkhaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03] 547^b^.^eb^ ^b^manovighātarasa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0189^ea^ byāpādasampayogavasena manaso vihaññanakiccaṃ. ^b^cetodukkhasamappitā^eb^ti cetasikadukkhasamaṅgino. ^b^āvaṭṭantī^eb^ti āmukhaṃ vaṭṭanti, yaṃdisābhimukhaṃ patitā, taṃdisābhimukhā eva vaṭṭanti. ^b^vivaṭṭantī^eb^ti viparivattanavasena vaṭṭanti. ^b^uddhaṃpādaṃ papatantī^eb^ti uddhaṃmukhapādā hutvā patanti. ^b^satthaṃ āharantī^eb^ti attano sarīrassa vijjhanabhedanavasena satthaṃ upanenti.
[06] iti domanassaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03] 548^b^.^eb^ ^b^dosoyevā^eb^ti kāyacittānaṃ āyāsanavasena dosasseva pavattiākāroti attho, yato bhuso āyāsoti upāyāsoti vuccati yathā bhusamādānaṃ upādānanti. ^b^eko dhammo^eb^ti cuddasahi akusalacetasikehi añño eko cetasikadhammo, yaṃ ``visādo''ti ca vadanti. nitthunanavasena sampajjanato ^b^nitthunanaraso,^eb^ kāye vā nitthunanakaraṇakicco. ``saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato''ti vatvā so panettha sātisayoti dassento ^b^``cittaparidahanato, kāyavisādanato cā''^eb^ti āha.

[03] ete ca sokaparidevupāyāsā viññattiyā vinā, saha ca yathāpaccayaṃ domanassacittuppādassa pavattiākāravisesoti dassetuṃ ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^pāko viyā^eb^ti rajanādino pacitabbavatthuno pāko viya.
[06] iti upāyāsaniddesavaṇṇanā.
[03] 549^b^.^eb^ ^b^samodhānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0202^ea^ ^a^V2.0190^ea^ samāgamo. kāyikadukkhacittavighātādianatthānaṃ atthibhāvassa paccupaṭṭhāno ^b^anatthabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^.
[03] tesaṃ appiyānaṃ kāyikavācasikapayogasaṅkhāto upakkamo tadupakkamo, tato sambhūto ^b^tadupakkamasambhūto^eb^.
[06] iti appiyasampayoganiddesavaṇṇanā.
[03] 550^b^.^eb^ upaddavabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^byasanapaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^.
[06] iti piyavippayoganiddesavaṇṇanā.

[03] 551^b^.^eb^ icchitālābho nāma yassa kassaci attanā icchitassa vatthuno alābho. ``yampicchaṃ na labhatī''ti hi vuttaṃ. matthakappattaṃ pana icchitālābhaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ``jātidhammānaṃ sattāna''ntiādinā niddiṭṭhanti tameva dassetuṃ ^b^``aho vatā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^icchāvā^eb^ti ettha icchāsahito alābhovāti ca vadanti. ^b^tappariyesanarasā^eb^ti tesaṃ alabbhaneyyavatthūnaṃ pariyesanarasā. ^b^appatti^eb^ alābho.
[06] iti icchitālābhaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03] 552^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0191^ea^ ^b^vuttamidhā^eb^ti idha saccaniddese yaṃ sarūpato vuttaṃ. ^b^avutta^eb^nti aññattha ^b^dukkhakkhandhabālapaṇḍitasuttā^eb^dīsu vuttampi idha sarūpato avuttaṃ. tañca sabbaṃ ime upādānakkhandhe vinā na labbhatīti tattha khandhasannissayameva dukkhaṃ khandhe vibādhatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``indanamiva pāvako''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yathā ^a^M2.0203^ea^ vā lakkhaṃ paharaṇapahārassa vatthu, evaṃ khandhā saṃsāradukkhassa. yathā ca gorūpaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādivibādhāya, yathā ca khettaṃ nipphannasassalāyanassa, gāmo ca gāmaghātakavibādhāya, evaṃ khandhā jātiādidukkhassa vatthūti dassetuṃ ^b^``lakkhamivā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. yebhuyyena loke vibādhakā vibādhetabbādhīnā na honti, ime pana vibādhetabbādhīnā evāti dassetuṃ ^b^``tiṇalatādīnī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kāmaṃ anādimati saṃsāre ādi nāma kassaci natthi, ekabhavaparicchinnassa pana khandhasantānassa vasena vuttaṃ ^b^``ādidukkhaṃ jātī''^eb^ti. tenevāha ^b^``pariyosānadukkhaṃ maraṇa''^eb^nti. na hettha samucchedamaraṇameva adhippetaṃ. maraṇassa antike āsanne jātaṃ dukkhaṃ ^b^māraṇantikadukkhaṃ. paridayhanaṃ^eb^ cittasantāpo. ^b^lālappanaṃ^eb^ ativiya vippalāpo. ^b^anutthunanaṃ^eb^ anto nijjhāyanaṃ. ^b^ekameka^eb^nti jātiādīnaṃ antarabhedabhinnānaṃ, jātiādīnameva vā upādānakkhandhapañcakānaṃ vā ekamekaṃ. ^b^saṅkhipitvā^eb^ti samāsetvā, sāmaññaniddesena vā saṅkhepaṃ katvā.
[06] iti dukkhaniddesakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 553^b^.^eb^ ^b^punabbhavakaraṇaṃ punabbhavo^eb^ uttarapadalopena, yathā vā apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko, evaṃ punabbhavakaraṇasīlā, punabbhavaṃ vā phalaṃ arahati, so vā etissā payojananti ^b^ponobhavikā^eb^. nandanato, rañjanato ca nandīrāgabhāvaṃ sabbāsu avatthāsu apaccakkhāya vuttiyā ^b^nandīrāgasahagatā^eb^. tāya ca sattā tattha tattha bhavādike kimikīṭapaṭaṅgādiattabhāvepi nandanti, rūpābhinandanādibhūtāya rañjanti cāti ^b^tatratatrābhinandinī^eb^. tenāha ^b^``nandīrāgena sahagatā''^eb^tiādi. tabbhāvattho hi esa sahagatasaddo. kāmabhavavibhavabhedavasena ^a^V2.0192^ea^ pavattiyā kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā ca veditabbā. kāmataṇhādibhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ taṇhābhāveneva ekabhāvaggahaṇena ekattaṃ upanetvā kassacipi sattassa kenaci sadisatābhāvato taṃtaṃvicittabhāvajanakakammanipphādanena ^a^M2.0204^ea^ ativicittasabhāvā sakalassa dukkhassa hetubhāvato ^b^dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṃ^eb^.

[03] kasmā panettha taṇhāva samudayasaccaṃ vuttāti? visesahetubhāvato. avijjā hi bhavesu ādīnavaṃ paṭicchādentī, diṭṭhiādiupādānañca tattha tattha abhinivisamānaṃ taṇhaṃ abhivaḍḍhentī dosādayopi kammassa kāraṇaṃ honti, taṇhā pana taṃtaṃbhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsasattanikāyakulabhogissariyādivicittataṃ abhipatthentī, kammavicittatāya upanissayataṃ kammassa ca sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchantī bhavādivicittataṃ niyameti, tasmā dukkhassa visesahetubhāvato aññesupi avijjāupādānakammādīsu sutte (dī0 ni0 2.400; ma0 ni0 1.133; 3.374) abhidhamme (vibha0 203) ca avasesakilesākusalamūlādīsu vuttesu dukkhahetūsu vijjamānesu taṇhāva samudayasaccanti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
[06] iti samudayaniddesakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 554^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassāyevā^eb^ti yadaggena taṇhā samudayasaccanti vuttā, tadaggena tassāyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ. sati hi padhānahetunirodhe tadaññahetū niruddhāyeva hontīti byādhinimittavūpasamanena byādhivūpasamo viya hetunirodhena phalanirodhoti āha ^b^``samudayanirodhena dukkhanirodho''^eb^ti. ^b^na aññathā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^anupaddave^eb^ti pāṇakavijjhanasatthappahārādiupaddavarahite. tato eva ^b^daḷhe^eb^ thire. sākhādichedanena ^b^chinnopi. taṇhānusaye^eb^ti kāmarāgabhavarāgānusaye. ^b^anūhate^eb^ti asamupaghāṭite.

[01] yathā sīho yenattani saro khitto, tattheva attano balaṃ dasseti, na sare, tathā buddhānaṃ kāraṇe ^a^V2.0193^ea^ paṭipatti, na phale. yathā pana sārameyyā kenaci leḍḍuppahāre dinne bhussantā leḍḍuṃ khādanti, na ^a^M2.0205^ea^ pahāradāyake uṭṭhahanti, evaṃ aññatitthiyā dukkhaṃ nirodhetukāmā kāyacchedamanuyuñjanti, na kilesanirodhananti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sīhasamānavuttino''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 555^b^.^eb^ virajjati palujjati chijjati samudayo etenāti ^b^virāgo vuccati maggo^eb^. virajjanaṃ palujjanaṃ samucchindanaṃ ^b^virāgoti pahānaṃ vuccati. tasmā^eb^ti yasmā pahānapariyāyo virāgasaddo, nirodhasaddo ca, tasmā. anusayasamugghātato aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti sambandhanīyaṃ. cāgādipadānipi gahetvā vadati ^b^sabbāneva etānī^eb^ti. yasmā ^b^nibbānaṃ vuccati,^eb^ na dukkhassa nirujjhanamattaṃ, tasmā taṇhāya asesavirāganirodhādipadānipi nibbānavevacanānīti. vuttamevatthaṃ samattheti ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādi. yathā virāgādipadāni nibbāne yujjanti, taṃdassanaṃ. tattha ^b^taṃ āgammā^eb^ti taṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena patvā. ^b^taṇhā virajjatī^eb^ti ariyamaggena accantavirāgavasena taṇhā virajjīyati. ^b^nirujjhatī^eb^ti nirodhīyati, tena virāganirodhasaddānaṃ adhikaraṇasādhanatamāha. ^b^tadevā^eb^ti nibbānameva. ^b^cāgādayo hontī^eb^ti cāgādihetuṃ phalavohārena vadati. ^b^``kāmaguṇālayesū''^eb^ti potthakesu likhanti, ``kāmaguṇālayādīsū''ti pana pāṭho.

[03] 556^b^.^eb^ ^b^tayida^eb^ntiādi na porāṇapāṭho, ^b^saccatthadīpane^eb^ pana vuttaniyāmena tato ānetvā pacchā ṭhapitaṃ. tathā hi pubbe vuttānipi lakkhaṇādīni punapi vuttāni. saṃsāradukkhato nibbinnamānasassa assāsaṃ karonto viya hotīti ^b^assāsakaraṇarasaṃ^eb^. rāgādisabbapapañcavūpasamanimittatāya nippapañcataṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^nippapañcapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^.

[03] 557^b^.^eb^ ^b^nattheva nibbāna^eb^nti yadi sāmaññato paṭiññā, attanā adhippetanibbānassapi abhāvo āpajjati, tathā sati paṭiññāvirodho. atha parābhimataṃ nibbānaṃ pati, evaṃ sati dhammiasiddhi, tato ca nissayāsiddho hetu. ^b^anupalabbhanīyato^eb^ti kiṃ paccakkhato, udāhu anumānato? purimasmiṃ pakkhe cakkhādīhi anekantikatā, dutiyasmiṃ paraṃ pati asiddho hetu. tenāha ^b^``na, upāyena upalabbhanīyato''^eb^tiādi. tattha yathā cetopariyañāṇalābhino eva ariyā paresaṃ lokuttaracittaṃ jānanti, tatthāpi ca arahā eva sabbesaṃ, na sabbe, evaṃ nibbānampi ^a^M2.0206^ea^ ^a^V2.0194^ea^ sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātasammāpaṭipattibhūtena upāyena upalabbhatīti atthavacanaṃ cetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na payogavacanaṃ. taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.

[03] 558^b^.^eb^ ^b^natthīti na vattabbaṃ,^eb^ ariyehi upalabbhanīyatoti adhippāyo. saṃsārato saṃviggamānasā sammāpaṭipattiyā nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti sabbasamayasiddhoyaṃ nayo. tattha sāsanikameva nissāya vadati ^b^``paṭipattiyā vañcubhāvāpajjanato''^eb^ti. tenāha ^b^``asati hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^sammādiṭṭhipurejavāyā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamāya. pubbaṅgamatā cassā padhānabhāvato. tathā hi sā paṭhamaṃ desanāruḷhā, na sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. ^b^na cāyaṃ^eb^ sammāpaṭipatti vañjhā, ^b^nibbānapāpanato^eb^ nibbānassa sampāpakato. tava matena pana nibbānasseva abhāvato vañjhabhāvo āpajjatīti yojanā. ^b^abhāvapāpakattā^eb^ti sammāpaṭipattiyā kilesasamucchindanamukhena khandhānaṃ abhāvasampāpakabhāvato, na vañjhabhāvāpattīti ce vadeyyāsīti attho. ^b^na^eb^ iti paṭikkhepe. yaṃ tayā ``abhāvapāpakattā''ti vadantena khandhābhāvo nibbānanti paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ na. kasmā? ^b^atītānāgatābhāvepi nibbānappattiyā abhāvato^eb^. atītānāgatā hi khandhā na santīti tasmiṃ abhāve nibbānaṃ adhigataṃ nāma siyā, so pana natthīti. na kevalaṃ atītānāgatānameva, atha kho vattamānānampīti tiyaddhagatānaṃ sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ abhāvo nibbānaṃ. na hi taṃ ekadesābhāvo bhavituṃ yuttanti vattamānā ce, na na santi, na santi ce, na vattamānāti ``vattamānā, na santi cā''ti vippaṭisiddhametanti āha ^b^``na, tesaṃ...pe0... pajjanato''^eb^ti.

[03] kiñca bhiyyo -- yadi vattamānābhāvo nibbānaṃ, yadā ariyamaggo vattati, tadā tassa nissayabhūtā khandhā vattamānāti katvā tadā nibbānassa abhāvo siyā. tathā ca sati maggakkhaṇepi nibbānasacchikiriyāya abhāvo āpajjatīti dassento ^b^``vattamāna...pe0... dosato''^eb^ti āha. na mayaṃ sabbesaṃyeva avattamānatāya nibbānaṃ vadāma. kiñcarahīti, ^b^tadā^eb^ maggakkhaṇe ^b^kilesānaṃ avattamānattā,^eb^ tasmā ^b^na doso^eb^ yathāvuttadosābhāvoti? yadi kilesānaṃ avattamānatāsaṅkhāto abhāvo nibbānaṃ, evaṃ sati ariyamaggassa niratthakatā āpajjati ^a^M2.0207^ea^ maggakkhaṇato pubbepi tadabhāvasiddhito. tenāha ^b^``ariyamaggassā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tasmā akāraṇameta^eb^nti yasmā na nibbānassa anupalabbhanīyatā, abhāvamattatā, paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvo, atītānāgatābhāve nibbānādhigamo ca āpajjati, vattamānānaṃ abhāvopi na sambhavati ^a^V2.0195^ea^, pageva kilesānaṃ avattamānatā, ariyamaggassa ca niratthakabhāvāpatti, tasmā nibbānassa abhāvasādhanatthaṃ yadidaṃ ``anupalabbhanīyato, abhāvapāpakattā, tadā kilesānaṃ avattamānattā''ti ca kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, akāraṇametaṃ, ayuttiresāti attho.

[03] 559^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādivacanato^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena avasiṭṭhaṃ jambukhādakasuttapadesaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 4.314 ādayo), aññampi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā niddesapāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. tathā hi ``nibbānaṃ nibbānanti, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati, katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso, nibbānanti? yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo, idaṃ vuccati nibbāna''nti ^b^jambukhādakasutte^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 4.314 ādayo), ``tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu? rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo''ti (vibha0 184) ^b^āyatanavibhaṅge^eb^ vuttaṃ. tatrāyamattho -- nibbānaṃ asaṅkhatā dhātu asaṅkhatasabhāvo dhammo. yasmā taṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyanti, tasmā rāgakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayoti ca vuccatīti. ^b^āgammā^eb^ti ca sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho. sacchikiriyamānañhi taṃ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṃ paramassāsabhāvena vinimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādayo khepetīti taṃsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṃ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvā taṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti vuccanti. ekaṃsena cetaṃ evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, itarathā yathārutavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne bahū dosā āpajjantīti te dassetuṃ ^b^``arahattassāpī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. arahattañhi aggaphalapamukhā cattāro khandhāti na tassa rāgādikhayamattatā yuttā. ^b^tampi hi...pe0... niddiṭṭhaṃ^eb^. tattha yathā rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṃ ^b^``rāgakkhayo''^eb^tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti suttassa neyyatthattā. evaṃ nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti nibbānaṃ ``rāgakkhayo''tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti ^a^M2.0208^ea^ imassāpi suttassa neyyatthatā veditabbā. nibbānassa rāgādikkhayamattatāya bahūdosā āpajjantīti dassetuṃ ^b^``kiñca bhiyyo''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^ittarakālādippattidosato^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ khayamattatāya parittakālatā, saṅkhatalakkhaṇatā, payogena vinā saraseneva adhigandhabbatā, rāgādīhi aparimuttatā, ādittatā, dukkhatā, anupasantatā, bahubhāvo, oḷārikatā, gotrabhumaggānaṃ anārammaṇatāti evamādidosāpajjanato ^a^V2.0196^ea^. rāgasseva khayo ^b^rāgakkhayo,^eb^ na dosādīnaṃ. tathā dosakkhayādayopīti añño rāgakkhayo, añño dosakkhayo, añño mohakkhayoti tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khayabhūtāni tīṇi nibbānāni, catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khaye cattāri, pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ khaye pañca, channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ khaye cha, sattannaṃ anusayānaṃ khaye satta, aṭṭhannaṃ micchattānaṃ khaye aṭṭha, navannaṃ taṇhāmūlakānaṃ khaye nava, dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khaye dasa, diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti. rāgādikkhayo nāma andhabālānampi pākaṭo, antamaso dīpimigamakkaṭādīnampi suviññeyyoti oḷārikaṃ nibbānaṃ hoti. gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesakkhayassa abhāvato, maggakkhaṇe ca akhīṇattā, ārammaṇakaraṇassa ca asambhavo eva. ^b^tassa nibbānabhāvato^eb^ti sabbapariyosānassa rāgādikkhayassa nibbānabhāvato. yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ pavatti na hoti, so ``ayaṃ nāmā''ti niyametabbo maggaphalañāṇānaṃ ārammaṇabhūto natthīti āha ^b^``na tādisassa khayassa abhāvato''^eb^ti.

[03] kiñca bhiyyo -- yo pacchimabhavato tatiyattabhāveyeva rāgādīsu ādīnavaṃ disvā jhānabhāvanāya te vikkhambhetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmalokaṃ upapanno, tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā idhāgatopi kāmesu vītarāgova hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto, yo ca paṭhamavaye eva rāgādito nibbinno te ca jhānena vikkhambhetvā pacchimavaye arahattaṃ patto, tesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ vikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya anuppajjanato nirodhasadisatāya anuppattiyeva nirodho. te nibbānappattā nāma siyuṃ, na ca honti, tasmā na tādisassa khayassa nibbānabhāvo. tassāpi ittarakālatādidosasamāyogo evāti āha ^b^``bhāvepi^eb^ ^b^cā''^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0209^ea^.

[03] yadi ``khayo''ti vacanato yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ appavatti, taṃ khayamattaṃ nibbānaṃ maññasi, evaṃ sati ``khaye ñāṇa''ntiādīsu (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 142; 1382) ``khayo''ti vuttattā taduppattito paṭṭhāya ca rāgādīnaṃ anuppattīti maggassāpi nibbānabhāvāpattīti dassento ^b^``ariyamaggassa cā''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] yathā niruddhā na santi, evaṃ anuppannāpīti abhāvasāmaññato nirodhasadisatāya anuppatti eva nirodho ^b^anuppattinirodho^eb^. ayañhi maggena khepetabbākāro, yadidaṃ uppajjanārahassa anuppattidhammatāpādananti ``khayo''ti ca vuccatīti. taṃ itarakhayato visesento ^b^``anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa pana khayassā''^eb^ti āha. anipphannatā pana tassa khayassa ^a^V2.0197^ea^ ^b^pariyāyena upanissayattā^eb^ti vuttaṃ. anuppattinirodhakkhayakarassa hi maggassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ atthato tassa upanissayo viyāti vattabbataṃ labhati. ^b^tadupacārenā^eb^ti atthato phalabhūtakhayavohārena. phalūpacārena hi kāraṇaṃ voharīyati yathā ``āyu ghataṃ, semho guḷo''ti ca.

[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti nibbānassa. ``idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasa''ntiādinā (dī0 ni0 2.64, 66-67; ma0 ni0 2.337; saṃ0 ni0 1.172; mahāva0 7-8) paccavekkhato bhagavato appossukkabhāvāvahanato. ``tañhi te, māgaṇḍiya, ariyaṃ cakkhuṃ natthi, yena tvaṃ ariyena cakkhunā ārogyaṃ jāneyyāsi, nibbānaṃ passeyyāsī''ti (ma0 ni0 2.218) vacanato ariyena cakkhunā passitabbaṃ.

[03] 560^b^.^eb^ yadi nibbānaṃ nāma sabhāvadhammo atthi sattasantānapariyāpanno ca, atha kasmā catumahāpathe sabhā viya sabbasādhāraṇā na labbhatīti āha ^b^``maggasamaṅginā pattabbato asādhāraṇa''^eb^nti. ``asukassa sammāsambuddhassa kāle uppanna''nti evaṃ purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato ^b^appabhavaṃ. maggabhāve^eb^ti ariyamaggassa atthibhāve. ^b^bhāvato^eb^ vijjamānato laddhabbato.

[03] ^b^aṇuādīna^eb^nti aṇupakatikālapurisādīnaṃ. ^b^niccabhāvāpattī^eb^ti sassatabhāvasiddhi. kūṭaṭṭhaniccatā hi idhādhippetā. ^b^hetuno abhāvā^eb^ti upapattiyā sādhanahetuno abhāvā. ^b^niccā te^eb^ aṇuādayo. ^b^nibbānassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0210^ea^ ^b^niccattā^eb^ti apekkhadhammattāti hetulakkhaṇānupapatti. ^b^``aṇuādīnaṃ asiddhattā''^eb^ti etena ``niccā aṇuādayo''ti paṭiññāya dhammiasiddhi, tato ca nissayāsiddho hetūti dasseti.

[03] 561^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathāvuttayuttisabbhāvato^eb^ti ``appabhavattā''ti attanā vuttaṃ hetuṃ sandhāyāha. appabhavatā cassa apaccayatāya daṭṭhabbā, tāya tassa purimāya koṭiyā abhāvo. ^b^``rūpasabhāvātikkamato''^eb^ti etena yathā rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanasabhāvo, paṭighātavantatāya kalāpaso vuttiyā padesasambandho ca sabhāvo, evaṃ nibbānassa katthaci paṭighāto, sappadesatā ca natthīti dasseti. na hi nibbānaṃ ``asukadisāya, asukadese''ti vā niddisīyati, yato taṃ appatiṭṭhamevāti.

[03] ^b^``asithila^eb^ ^a^V2.0198^ea^ ^b^...pe0... gamanīyato''^eb^ti etena nibbānassa ariyānaṃ paccakkhasiddhataṃ dasseti. ^b^``sabbaññuvacanato''^eb^ti etena tadaññesaṃ anumānasiddhataṃ, tadubhayena ``anupalabbhanīyato''ti panassa hetuno asiddhataṃ dasseti. ^b^paramatthena nāvijjamānaṃ^eb^ vijjamānamevāti yathāraddhamatthaṃ nigametvā tadatthasādhanaṃ āgamaṃ dassento ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^nti-. ādimāha.

[03] tattha ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti (udā0 73; netti0 41) cattāripi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ^b^ajātaṃ^eb^. kāraṇena vinā, sayameva ca na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti ^b^abhūtaṃ^eb^. evaṃ ajātattā, abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti ^b^akataṃ^eb^. jātabhūtakatabhāvo ca nāma rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti, na asaṅkhatabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ ^b^``asaṅkhata''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ, tathā na saṅkhataṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti ca ^b^asaṅkhata^eb^nti evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe ``pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya siyā nu kho ekeneva kāraṇena etaṃ kata''nti āsaṅkāyaṃ kenaci na katanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^``akata''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ ``sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta''nti ^a^M2.0211^ea^ āsaṅkāyaṃ taṃ nivattanatthaṃ ^b^``abhūta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattāti dassetuṃ ^b^``ajāta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] evamettha satthā paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ pavedesi. pavedento ca ``ahaṃ dhammissaro dhammassāmī''ti na attano āṇāmattena pavedesi, apica kho pana padaparame anukampamāno yuttitopi pavedesi. yathāha --

[02] ``no cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī''ti (udā0 73; netti0 41).

[03] tassattho ^a^V2.0199^ea^ -- bhikkhave, yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā, idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ anavasesavūpasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya. nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesaṃ saṃkilese samucchindanti, tenettha sabbassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati. evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anugamanavasenapi taṃ dassetvā nigametuṃ ^b^``yasmā ca kho''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tassattho vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] ettha ca yasmā ``appaccayā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 7-8). atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī (udā0 71). idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasaṃ, yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo (dī0 ni0 2.64, 67; ma0 ni0 2.337; saṃ0 ni0 2.172; mahāva0 7-8). asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada''ntiādīhi (saṃ0 ni0 4.366) anekehi suttapadehi ``atthi, bhikkhave, ajāta''nti (udā0 73; netti0 41) iminā ca suttapadena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo sabbalokaṃ anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena pakāsito, tasmā ^a^M2.0212^ea^ yadipi kattha apaccakkhakārīnampi sāsane abhippasannānaṃ viññūnaṃ saṃsayo natthiyeva. ye pana paraneyyabuddhino puggalā, tesaṃ vimativinodanatthaṃ ayamettha adhippāyaniddhāraṇamukhena yuttivicāraṇā.

[03] yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ, rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ sabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ. yañca taṃ nissaraṇaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. kiñca bhiyyo -- saṅkhatadhammārammaṇavipassanāñāṇaṃ, apica anulomañāṇaṃ kilese tadaṅgavasena pajahati, na samucchedavasena pajahituṃ sakkoti. tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati, na samucchedavasena. iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa, sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa ariyamaggañāṇassa tadubhayaviparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu.

[03] tathā ^a^V2.0200^ea^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata''nti (udā0 73; netti0 41) evamādi nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakavacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā. yañhi bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ aviparītatthaṃ yathā taṃ ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā anattā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.353, 356; dha0 pa0 277-279; theragā0 676-678; netti0 5), tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato. seyyathāpi sīhasaddoti evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.

[03] aparo nayo -- yadi pana nibbānaṃ abhāvamattameva siyā, tassa ``gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo''ti (dī0 ni0 2.64, 67; ma0 ni0 2.337; saṃ0 ni0 1.172; mahāva0 7-8) gambhīrāditā, ``asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 4.366) asaṅkhatāditā, ``abyākatā dhammā apaccayādhammā''tiādinā abyākatadhammāditā ca na vattabbā siyā. na hi abhāvassa ^a^M2.0213^ea^ koci sabhāvo atthi, yena so gambhīrāsaṅkhatādiākārato viññāyeyya. abhāvo hi abhāvo eva, kuto tassa gambhīrāsaṅkhātādibhāvasambandho. kiñcāyamabhāvo sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbasattasantānagatānaṃ eko vā bhaveyya aneko vā. yadi eko, ekeneva maggena sabbakilesābhāvo kato, sacchikato cāti aññassa, aññesañca maggānaṃ niratthakatāti na siyā maggabahutā, ekajjhañca sabbasattānaṃ nibbānādhigamo āpajjati. siyā panevaṃ eko eva so nibbānasaññito kilesābhāvo, so pana na maggehi kātabbo, atha kho sacchikātabboti. evaṃ sati visesato maggassa niratthakatā āpajjati, kilesānaṃ appahānatoti ekopi maggo na siyā. asati ca kilesappahāne dukkhassa anupacchedanato kilesābhāvasacchikiriyā kimatthiyā siyā, atha pana maggānaṃ santānagatasaṃyojanattayappahānādipaṭiniyatakiccatāya catūsu maggesu pāṭiyekkaṃ kilesābhāvo. evaṃ sati sabhāvapabhedena vinā na bahubhāvoti so kilesakkhayapariyāyena vutto sabhāvadhammo eva siyā.

[03] yesaṃ abhāvo, tappabhedena abhāve bhedopacāroti ce? yesaṃ abhāvo, tesaṃ sasabhāvatāya tassa sabhāvopacāropi siyā. tathā ca te saṃkilesasaṅkhatatādito kilesasaṅkhatatādiupacārāpi ^a^V2.0201^ea^ siyuṃ. no ce te icchitā, tappabhedena bhedopacāropi na icchitabbo. na ca pahoti upacarito bahubhāvo atthato bahubhāvāya. na hi jalaṃ analanti upacaritaṃ dahati, pacati vā. ekattapañhampi cāyamabhāvo asabhāvatāya na sahatīti na sakkā vattuṃ natthibhāvasāmaññato abhedavohāro yuttarūpoti. ekatte ca pubbe vuttā eva dosā, bahubhāve pana sati vuttanayeneva siddhā sabhāvadhammatā. sabhāvadhammattepi ca bahubhāvo viya bhāvaṃ bhāvopi bahubhāvaṃ na byabhicareyyāti nibbānassa bahubhāvapasaṅgo siyāti ce? na bahubhāvasseva abhāvappasaṅgato. yadi hi yathā kakkhaḷatā bhāvaṃ, evaṃ bhāvopi kakkhaḷataṃ na byabhicareyya. evaṃ sati sabbesaṃ bhāvānaṃ pathavībhāvāpattito kuto bhāvassa bahubhāvo, tasmā lokavohārānaṃ vicittatāya yadipi bahutā bhāvāpekkhā, bhāvatā pana na bahutāpekkhāti na bhāvassa sato nibbānassa bahubhāvo ``ekā niṭṭhā ^a^M2.0214^ea^ na puthu niṭṭhā''ti vacanato. ekasmiṃyeva ca dassanabhāvanādvayaṃ sambhavati.

[03] parinibbutānaṃ paccekaṃ nibbānabhāve sattasantānaniyataṃ nāma nibbānaṃ siyā. tathā ca sati saṅkhatatādidosānativattiyeva, kilesappahānaṃ vā maggakiccaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvo. tassa ca ekatte na maggabahutā kiccantarassa kattabbassa abhāvato. maggabahubhāvo ca maggehi sacchikātabbe ekasmiṃ dhamme indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavapāṭavatarapāṭavatamabhāvena sacchikiriyāvisesena kilesānaṃ pahānabhedena hotīti nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatte eva siyā. abhāvopi ca kilesānaṃ maggena sakiccakatāya kātabbo eva siyā, na sacchikātabbo. ko hi sabhāvo abhāvassa? yo sacchikātabbo siyā, so ce nibbānaṃ ekeneva maggena sabbakilesānaṃ abhāvo eko abhinno kātabbo āpanno. aññathā maggavasena catubbidhabhāve nibbānassa catubbidhabhāvappasaṅgo, nibbānavisesappasaṅgo ca āpajjeyyāti maggakiccassa ekattena maggabahutā siyā. bahubhāve pana tesaṃ so vuttanayena ekasmiṃ dhamme sacchikiriyāvisesatoti siddhā nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatā. khayādhigantabbatāya panetaṃ ``khayo''ti vuttaṃ. ``khaye ñāṇa''nti (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 142; 1382) hi vacanato ariyamaggo khayo nāma. tena cetaṃ adhigantabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ, tasmā ``khayo''ti vuttanti.
[06] iti nirodhaniddesakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 562^b^.^eb^ ^b^aṭṭha^eb^ ^a^V2.0202^ea^ ^b^dhammā^eb^ti ``katamaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca''nti ārabhitvā ``sammādiṭṭhī''tiādinā ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 205) dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese āgatā, tameva ca pāḷiṃ ānetvā uddesavasena idha ca vuttā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha dhammā atthato pakāsitā, na maggasaccaniddesavasenāti adhippāyo. yadi atthato pakāsitā, kimatthiyaṃ pana idha kathananti āha ^b^``idha panā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^``ekakkhaṇe pavattamānāna''^eb^nti idaṃ lokiyakusalacittuppādesu viratiyo nānākkhaṇikā eva ^a^M2.0215^ea^ hontīti katvā vuttaṃ. sesamaggadhammā pana tatthāpi ekajjhaṃ uppajjantiyeva. ^b^visesāvabodhanattha^eb^nti paṭipakkhasamugghātādipavattiākāravisesassa avabodhanatthaṃ. vitthārato maggakathā parato āvi bhavissatīti āha ^b^``saṅkhepato''^eb^ti. ^b^catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassā^eb^ti yathā catusaccābhisamayo hoti, evaṃ sabbaso pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā paripūraṇavasena paṭipannassa. ariyamaggasaṅkhātassa yogassa sabbhāvato ^b^yogino^eb^. kāmaṃ avijjānusayasamugghāte tadekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ lesopi nāvasissati, vijjāya pana avijjā ujuvipaccanīkadhammoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^``avijjānusayasamugghātaka''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. parato micchāsaṅkappādiggahaṇepi eseva nayo. ^b^dhātuppakāsanarasā^eb^ti paramatthapakāsanarasā, catusaccavibhāvanakiccāti attho. maggadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanākāro sātisayaṃ pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhātīti avijjānusayasamugghātakataṃ sammādiṭṭhiyā vatvāpi ^b^avijjandhakāraviddhaṃsanapaccupaṭṭhānatā^eb^ vuttā.

[03] ^b^tathā sampannadiṭṭhino^eb^ti yathā avijjānusayasamugghāto hoti, tathā maggasammādiṭṭhiyā sampannadiṭṭhino. evañhi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yoginoti imamatthaṃ tathā-saddo upasaṃharati. nibbānārammaṇatā pana taṃsampayuttavacaneneva bodhitā. ^b^micchāsaṅkappanighātaka^eb^nti kāmasaṅkappādimicchāsaṅkappasamucchedakaṃ. ^b^appanāraso^eb^ti nibbānārammaṇe maggacittassa samuppādavasena pavattanato appanākicco.

[03] ^b^tathā passato vitakkayato cā^eb^ti vuttappakārāya sammādiṭṭhiyā passato, nibbānārammaṇe ca sammāsaṅkappena cittaṃ abhiniropayato. ^b^vacīduccaritasamugghātikā^eb^ti catubbidhassapi vacīduccaritassa samucchedikā. musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ ^a^V2.0203^ea^ paṭipakkhabhāvato siniddhabhāvena sampayuttadhammānaṃ pariggāhakasabhāvā sammāvācāti āha ^b^``sā pariggahalakkhaṇā''^eb^ti. kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipi samuṭṭhānasabhāvā vuttā. sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ ^b^samuṭṭhāpanaṃ^eb^ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.

[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti yogino. tasmiṃ sati visujjhanato ^b^visuddhibhūtā^eb^. jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā suddhi ^b^vodānaṃ,^eb^ ājīvasseva vā jīvitindriyavuttiyā ^a^M2.0216^ea^. ñāyājīvassa abuddhapaṭikuṭṭhāya sammājīvikāya pavattihetutāya ^b^ñāyājīvapavattiraso^eb^. imassa hi pavattito paṭṭhāya micchājīvo na pavattatīti.

[03] sabbākusalaviddhaṃsakopi sammāvāyāmo ujupaṭipakkhadassanavasena ^b^kosajjasamucchedako^eb^ vutto. saṃkilesapakkhatopi tassa paggaṇhanaṃ ^b^paggaho^eb^. kāyādīsu subhādiākārupadhāraṇavasena pavattā subhasaññādipubbaṅgamā akusalakkhandhā micchāsati, tassā viddhaṃsano ^b^micchāsativiniddhunano. asammoso^eb^ti sammosaviddhaṃsanato tappaṭipakkho. ārammaṇassa yathāsabhāvasallakkhaṇaṃ ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. ``ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā''ti, ``satārakkhena cetasā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.348) ca vacanato visesato sati kusalacittassa ārakkhāti āha ^b^``satiyā saṃrakkhiyamānacittassā''^eb^ti.

[03] 563^b^.^eb^ ^b^saccañāṇassā^eb^ti saccāni ārabbha pavattanakañāṇassa, na paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya sakideva bujjhati, atha kho punappunaṃ uppajjanato anu anu bodho anubodho, anussavākāraparivitakkadiṭṭhinijjhānakkhantianugato vā bodho anubodho, tadeva ñāṇanti ^b^anubodhañāṇaṃ^eb^. na hi taṃ paccakkhato bujjhati, anussavādivasena pana kappanamukhena bujjhati. ^b^kiccato^eb^ti parijānanādito. taṃkiccakaraṇeneva hi pariññeyyādīni viya tānipi tassa pākaṭāni honti. vivaṭṭānupassanāya hi saṅkhārehi patilīyamānamānasassa uppajjamānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ dukkhanissaraṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā dukkhaṃ paricchindati, dukkhagatañca taṇhaṃ pajahati, nirodhañca sacchikaroti phusati. ādicco viya pabhāya sammāsaṅkappādīhi saha samuppannaṃ taṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, na ca saṅkhāre amuñcitvā pavattamānena ñāṇena etaṃ sabbaṃ kātuṃ sakkā nimittapavattehi avuṭṭhitattā. tasmā etāni kiccāni karontaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhādīni vibhāveti ^a^V2.0204^ea^ tattha sammohanivattanenāti ^b^``cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ekapaṭivedhenāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^dukkhasamudayampi so passatī^eb^ti kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce? na, ``yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 5.1100) ekadassino aññattayadassitāvicāraṇāyaṃ taṃsādhanatthaṃ āyasmatā ^a^M2.0217^ea^ ^b^gavampati^eb^ttherena imassa ^b^suttassa^eb^ ānītattā, paccekañca saccesu dissamānesu aññattayadassanassa yojitattā. aññathā anupubbābhisamaye purimadiṭṭhassa pacchā adassanato samudayādidassino dukkhādidassitā na yojetabbā siyā. yojitā ca sā ``yo dukkhasamudayaṃ passati, dukkhampi so passatī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 5.1100). ^b^lokiyaṃ^eb^ saccañāṇaṃ. ^b^tattha^eb^ lokiyañāṇe. pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhāto abhibhavo ^b^pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavo,^eb^ tassa vasena. suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattadassanato sakkāyadiṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ nivatteti. ``lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā, sā na hotī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.15) vacanato samudayadassanaṃ hetuphalapabandhāvicchedadassanato pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti. ``lokanirodhaṃ kho...pe0... passato yā loke atthitā, sā na hotī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.15) vacanato nirodhadassanaṃ hetunirodhā phalanirodhadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti. attakārassa paccakkhadassanato maggadassanaṃ ``natthi attakāre, natthi parakāre, natthi purisakāre''tiādikaṃ (dī0 ni0 1.168) akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. ``natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya, ahetū appaccayā sattā saṃkilissanti, natthi hetu...pe0... visuddhiyā, ahetū appaccayā sattā visujjhantī''tiādikā (dī0 ni0 1.168; ma0 ni0 2.101, 227; saṃ0 ni0 3.212) ahetukadiṭṭhi ca idha akiriyādiṭṭhiggahaṇeneva gahitāti daṭṭhabbā. sāpi hi visuddhimaggadassanena pahīyatīti. dukkhe ñāṇaṃ samudayaphalassa dukkhassa addhuvādibhāvaṃ passatīti ^b^phale vippaṭipattiṃ^eb^ nivatteti.
[03] issaro lokaṃ pavatteti sajjeti nivatteti saṃharatīti ^b^issarakāraṇino^eb^ vadanti. padhānato loko āvi bhavati, tattheva ca patilīyatīti ^b^padhānakāraṇino^eb^.
[21] ``kālo ^a^V2.0205^ea^ karoti bhūtāni, kālo saṃharatī pajā.
[22] kālo sutte jāgarati, kālo hi duratikkamo''ti.. --

[25] ^b^kālavādino^eb^. kaṇṭakassa tikhiṇabhāvo viya, kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ parimaṇḍalatā viya, migapakkhisarīsapādīnaṃ vicittatā viya ca sabhāveneva loko sambhoti, vibhoti cāti ^b^sabhāvavādino. ādi^eb^-saddena aṇūhi ^a^M2.0218^ea^ loko pavattati, sabbaṃ pubbekatahetu, loko niyato acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇisadiso, na ettha kassaci purisakāroti ^b^niyativādino^eb^.
[21] ``yadicchāya pavattanti, yadicchāya nivattare.
[22] yadicchāya sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ, tasmā yādicchakī pajā''ti.. --

[25] ^b^yadicchāvādino,^eb^ ye ^b^adhiccasamuppattivādino^eb^ti ca vuccanti. evamādiakāraṇavādasaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. rāmudakāaḷārādīnaṃ viya, arūpaloke nigaṇṭhānaṃ viya ca lokathūpikāyaṃ apavaggo mokkhoti gahaṇaṃ ^b^apavaggagāho. ādi^eb^-saddena padhānassa appavatti, guṇaviyuttassa attano sakattani avaṭṭhānaṃ, brahmunā salokatā, samīpatā, saṃyogo, diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti evamādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ettha ca ^b^padhānassa appavatti^eb^ mahatādibhāvena apariṇāmo, anabhibyatti vā. ``ahamañño, pakati aññā''ti evaṃ pavattapakatipurisantarajānanena attasukhadukkhamohesu avibhāgaggahaṇe kira nivattite vuttanayena padhānaṃ nappavattati, so vimokkhoti kāpilā. ^b^guṇaviyuttassā^eb^ti buddhisukhadukkhaicchādosappayattadhammādhammasaṅkhārehi navahi attaguṇehi viyuttassāti kaṇādamatānusārino. ^b^salokatā^eb^ brahmunā samānalokatā. ^b^samīpatā^eb^ tassa samīpappavattitā. ^b^saṃyogo^eb^ tena ekībhāvūpagamanaṃ. ``indriyatappanaputtamukhadassanādīhi vinā apavaggo natthī''ti gahetvā tathā pavattanaṃ ^b^kāmasukhallikānuyogo^eb^. anasanakesaluñcanāditapacariyāya naggasīlagosīlakukkurasīlādīhi ca attaparitāpanena mokkho hotīti ^b^attakilamatho^eb^.
[01] svāyaṃ sabbo micchāgāho saccañāṇe sati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhatīti vuttamevatthaṃ saṅgaṇhanto ^b^``loke lokappabhave''^eb^ti gāthamāhāti.
[06] ñāṇakiccato vinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 564^b^.^eb^ ^b^sesā^eb^ ^a^M2.0219^ea^ ^a^V2.0206^ea^ ^b^sabbadhammā^eb^ti sesā ekāsīti lokiyadhammā. ajjhattikabāhiresu dvādasasu āyatanesu kāmabhavavibhavataṇhāvasena dvādasatikā ^b^chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni,^eb^ khuddakavatthuvibhaṅge vā āgatanayena kālavibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā vuttāni. tadāmasane hi aṭṭhasataṃ honti. ^b^asammissa^eb^nti ekakattā kenaci asammissaṃ, kuto tadantogadhappabhedoti adhippāyo. vīmaṃsiddhipādādīnaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ satipi kiccanānatte atthato ekattā sammādiṭṭhiyā saṅgahoti sammādiṭṭhimukhena tadantogadhatā vuttā.

[03] ^b^tayo nekkhammavitakkādayo^eb^ti lokiyakkhaṇe alobhamettākaruṇāsampayogavasena bhinnā, maggakkhaṇe lobhabyāpādavihiṃsāsamucchedanavasena tayoti ekopi vutto. esa nayo ^b^sammāvācā^eb^dīsu. appicchatāsantuṭṭhitānaṃ pana bhāve sammāājīvasambhavato tena tesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. bhavantarepi jīvitahetupi ariyehi avītikkamanīyattā ^b^ariyakantānaṃ^eb^ sammāvācādisīlānaṃ gahaṇena yena saddhāhatthena tāni gahetabbāni, so saddhāhattho gahito eva hotīti tato anaññāni saddhindriyasaddhābalāni tattha antogadhāni vuttāni. chando pana saddhānuguṇoti katvā chandiddhipādassāpi tadantogadhatā vuttā. ^b^tesaṃ atthitāyā^eb^ti saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādānaṃ atthitāya sīlassa atthibhāvato tividhenāpi sīlena te tayopi gahitāti tattha antogadhā. ^b^cittasamādhī^eb^ti cittiddhipādaṃ vadati. ``cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.23, 192; peṭako0 22; mi0 pa0 2.1.9) hi cittamukhena samādhi vuttoti samādhimukhena cittampi vattabbataṃ arahati. cittiddhipādabhāvanāya pana samādhipi adhimatto hotīti vīmaṃsiddhipādādivacanaṃ viya cittiddhipādoti avatvā idha ``cittasamādhī''ti vuttaṃ. ``pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.466; 3.359; saṃ0 ni0 5.376; a0 ni0 3.96; 11.12) vacanato samādhiupakārā ^b^pītipassaddhiyo,^eb^ tasmā samādhiggahaṇena gahitā. upekkhā pana samādhiupakārakato, taṃsadisakiccato ca. tasmā samādhisīsena etesaṃ antogadhatā daṭṭhabbā.
[06] antogadhānaṃ pabhedavinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 565^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhāro^eb^ ^a^M2.0220^ea^ ^b^viya dukkhasaccaṃ^eb^ vighātakattā, saṃharaṇīyavasena vihantabhāvatoti attho. ^b^bhārādānamiva^eb^ tattha tattha bhave uppajjanakavighātassa hetubhāvato. ^b^bhāranikkhepanamiva^eb^ pavattidukkhavūpasamabhāvato ^a^V2.0207^ea^. ^b^rogo viya, dubbhikkhamiva^eb^ ca bādhakattā. ^b^roganidānaṃ viya, dubbuṭṭhi viya^eb^ ca pabhavalakkhaṇattā. ^b^dubbuṭṭhī^eb^ti ca avassanaṃ vā ativassanaṃ vā. ^b^rogavūpasamo viya, subhikkhamiva^eb^ ca santilakkhaṇattā, sukhabhāvato. ``nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha''nti (dha0 pa0 203-204) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^bhesajjamiva, suvuṭṭhi viya^eb^ ca dukkhassa hetupacchedato, tassa ca apagamūpāyabhāvato. niyyānalakkhaṇañhi maggasaccaṃ. aniṭṭhabhāvato, sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayato ca dukkhaṃ verivisarukkhabhayaorimatīrūpamaṃ. ^b^veraṃ^eb^ byāpādo, paccatthikabhāvo vā. ^b^verasamugghāto^eb^ veravūpasamo mettā. ^b^verasamugghātupāyo^eb^ saṅgahavatthūni.
[06] upamāto vinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 566^b^.^eb^ ^b^esa nayo samudayādīsū^eb^ti atthi cettha samudayo, na ariyasaccaṃ, atthi ariyasaccaṃ, na samudayo, atthi samudayo ceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva samudayo na ariyasaccanti. sesasaccadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^na ariyasaccaṃ^eb^ pariññeyyapahātabbāsaṅkhataniyyānabhāvābhāvato. ^b^itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvaya^eb^nti samudayamaggasaccadvayamāha. ^b^siyā dukkhaṃ^eb^ saṅkhāradukkhatāya. tenāha ^b^``aniccato''^eb^ti. ^b^tathattenā^eb^ti tathasabhāvena, pariññeyyabhāvenāti attho. etena taṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ ``siyā dukkhaṃ, na ariyasaccaṃ, siyā ariyasaccaṃ, na dukkha''nti imamatthaṃ dasseti. ariyasaccasaddaparā hi dukkhādisaddā pariññeyyādibhāvaṃ vadanti. teneva ariyasaccasaddānapekkhaṃ dukkhasaddaṃ sandhāya maggasampayuttasāmaññaphaladhammānaṃ ādipadasaṅgaho vutto, ariyasaccasaddāpekkhaṃ pana sandhāya catutthapadasaṅgaho.

[03] ^b^sabbākārenā^eb^ti sabbappakārena. yathā maggasampayuttadhammādayo ekaṅgavikalā, evaṃ ahutvā sabbaṅgayogena dukkhatāya ceva ariyasaccatāya cāti attho. ``upādānakkhandhapañcaka''nti vutte taṇhāyapi saṅgaho siyāti taṃnivattanatthaṃ ^b^``aññatra taṇhāyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ tassā visuṃ ariyasaccabhāvato. samudayādīsu avasesakilesādayo pabhavaṭṭhena samudayo, na ariyasaccaṃ suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā ayanti katvā ^a^M2.0221^ea^. nirodho ariyasaccaṃ, na samudayo. itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā samudayo attano phalassa paccayaṭṭhena, na pana yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena, sabbākārena pana taṇhāsamudayo ceva ariyasaccañca. maggasampayuttadhammā, sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena neva samudayo, na ariyasaccaṃ. saṅkhāranirodho, nirodhasamāpatti ca nirodho, na ariyasaccaṃ. samudayo ^a^V2.0208^ea^ ariyasaccaṃ, na nirodho. itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā nirodho khaṇanirodhasabbhāvato, na pana yassa sacchikiriyāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena. sabbākārena pana asaṅkhatā dhātu nirodho ceva ariyasaccañca. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. ariyamaggato aññāni maggāni maggo, na ariyasaccaṃ. nirodho ariyasaccaṃ, na maggo. itaraṃ pana saccadvayaṃ siyā maggo bhavagāminipaṭipadābhāvato, na pana yassa bhāvanāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena, sabbākārena pana nirodhagāminipaṭipadā maggo ceva ariyasaccañca. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] catukkato vinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 567^b^.^eb^ ^b^suññānī^eb^ti vedakādīhi bāhirakaparikappitehīti adhippāyo. dukkhañhi vedanīyampi santaṃ vedakarahitaṃ, kevalaṃ pana tasmiṃ attano paccayehi pavattamāne dukkhaṃ vedetīti vohāramattaṃ hoti. esa nayo itaresupi.

[03] ``dukkhamevā''ti avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``na koci dukkhito''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^kiriyāva vijjatī^eb^ti samudayasaccaṃ sandhāya vadati. purimasaccadvayassa vipākavaṭṭakammavaṭṭasaṅgahato kārakassa vā dukkhasaccasabhāvamāha. kātabbāpi hi kiriyā kārakarahitā kevalaṃ attano paccayehi tāya pavattamānāya dukkhasaññite dhammappabandhe kiriyaṃ karotīti vohāramattaṃ hoti. nibbutagamakesupi eseva nayo. ``maggo atthī''ti vattabbe ^b^``maggamatthī''^eb^ti okārassa abhāvo katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^gamako^eb^ti nibbutiṃ gantā.

[03] kilesāsucipaggharaṇaṭṭhena sāsavatā ^b^asubhatā^eb^ti katvā anāsavattā nirodhamaggā subhā eva. dukkhādīnaṃ pariyāyena samudayādibhāvo ca atthi ^a^M2.0222^ea^, na pana nirodhabhāvo, nirodhassa vā na dukkhādibhāvoti nirodhāvasesattayānaṃ na aññamaññasamaṅgitāti āha ^b^``nirodhasuññāni vā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^samudaye dukkhassābhāvato^eb^ti ponobhavikāya taṇhāya punabbhavassa abhāvato. yathā vā pakativādīnaṃ vikārā avikāribhāvato, pubbe patipalīnā ca pakatibhāveneva tiṭṭhanti, na evaṃ samudayasampayuttampi dukkhaṃ samudayabhāvena tiṭṭhatīti āha ``samudaye dukkhassābhāvato''ti ^a^V2.0209^ea^. magge ca nirodhassa abhāvatoti sambandho. yathā avibhattehi vikārehi mahāhaṅkāratammattavisesindriyabhūtavisesehi pakatibhāveneva ṭhitehi pakati sagabbhā icchitā pakativādīhi, evaṃ na phalena sagabbho hetūti attho. ^b^``dukkhasamudayānaṃ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā''^eb^ti etaṃ vivaranto āha ^b^``na hetusamavetaṃ hetuphala''^eb^ntiādi. tattha ``idha tantūsu paṭo, kapālesu ghaṭo, bīraṇesu kaṭo dvīsu aṇūsu dviaṇuka''ntiādinā idha vuddhivohārajanako avisuṃ siddhānaṃ sambandho samavāyo, tena samavāyena kāraṇesu dvīsu aṇūsu dviaṇukaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ ekībhūtamiva sambaddhaṃ, tīsu aṇūsu tiaṇukanti evaṃ mahāpathavīmahāudakamahāaggimahāvātakkhandhapariyantaṃ phalaṃ attano kāraṇesu samavetanti ^b^samavāyavādino^eb^ vadanti. evaṃ pana vadantehi aparimāṇesu kāraṇesu mahāparimāṇaṃ ekaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ attano antogadhehi kāraṇehi sagabbhaṃ asuññanti vuttaṃ hoti. evamidha samavāyābhāvā phale hetu natthīti hetusuññaṃ phalanti attho.
[06] suññato vinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti magganiddesakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 568^b^.^eb^ ^b^pavattibhāvato^eb^ti saṃsārassa pavattibhāvato. ^b^catuāhārabhedato^eb^ti catuāhārappaccayavisesato. etena cattāro kabaḷīkārādiāhāravisese, ajjhoharaṇīyavatthu, saḷāyatana, avijjā, abhisaṅkhārasaṅkhāte tappaccayabhūtadhammavisese ca saṅgaṇhāti ^a^M2.0223^ea^, ojaṭṭhamakarūpa, vedanā, paṭisandhiviññāṇa, nāmarūpasaṅkhāte tannibbattadhammavisese ca.

[03] ^b^pavattakabhāvato^eb^ pavattidukkhassa. ^b^rūpābhinandanādibhedo^eb^ rūpakkhandhādiabhinandanabhedo, rūpārammaṇādivasenāpīti vadanti. rūpataṇhādīnaṃ paccekaṃ anekabhedattā ^b^cha taṇhākāyā,^eb^ tesaṃ ^b^bhedato^eb^.

[03] upādānehi upādīyatīti upādi, upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. tannissaraṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ, tassa vūpasamo taṃsantīti katvā tassa yāva pacchimaṃ cittaṃ, tāva sesataṃ, tato paraṃ anavasesatañca ^a^V2.0210^ea^ upādāya ^b^saupādisesanibbānadhātu, nirupādisesanibbānadhātū^eb^ti dvidhā voharīyati. yathā cāyaṃ bhedo vohārato, evamitarepīti te katipaye dassetuṃ ^b^``tividho''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. aññathā ekassa sato nibbānassa kuto bhedoti.

[03] ^b^samathavipassanābhedato^eb^ti ettha sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappā vipassanā, itare samathāti vadanti. sīlampi hi samathassa upakārakattā samathaggahaṇena gayhatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo. atha vā yānadvayassa vasena laddho maggo samatho vipassanāti āgamanavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^aya^eb^nti ariyamaggo. ^b^sappadesattā^eb^ti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ ekadesattāti attho. ekadeso hi padissati avayavabhāvena apadisīyatīti padeso, attano samudāyaṃ pati saha padesenāti ^b^sappadeso^eb^ti vuccati yathā ``sanidassanā dhammā''ti (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 9), sīlakkhandhādayo ca sabbalokiyalokuttarasīlādisaṅgāhakā, ariyamaggo lokuttaro evāti tadekadeso hoti.
[03] ^b^sajātito^eb^ti samānajātito, vacīduccaritaviratiādibhedesu samānāya sīlajātiyāti attho.

[03] ^b^onatasahāyo viya vāyāmo^eb^ paggahakiccasāmaññato. ^b^aṃsakūṭaṃ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati^eb^ apilāpanavasena niccalabhāvakaraṇasāmaññato. ^b^sajātito^eb^ti savitakkasavicārādibhedesu samānāya samādhijātiyāti attho. ^b^kiriyato^eb^ti samādhianurūpakiriyato. tato eva hi ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā samādhinimittā, cattāro sammappadhānā ^a^M2.0224^ea^ samādhiparikkhārā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.46) sativāyāmānaṃ samādhissa nimittaparikkhārabhāvo vutto.

[03] ^b^ākoṭentena viyā^eb^ti ``aniccaṃ anicca''ntiādinā paññākiccasadisena kiccena samantato koṭentena viya, ``aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhenā''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.48) ^b^parivattentena^eb^ viya ca ādāya ūhitvā dinnameva paññā paṭivijjhati. dvinnaṃ samānakālattepi paccayabhāvena sammāsaṅkappassa purimakālassa viya niddeso kato. ^b^sajātito^eb^ti ``dukkhe ñāṇa''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 5.8) samānāya paññājātiyā. ^b^kiriyato^eb^ti ettha paññāsadisaṃ kiccaṃ ``kiriyā''ti vuttaṃ, pubbe pana samādhiupakārakaṃ tadanurūpakiccanti ayamettha viseso.
[03] ``sabbaṃ ^a^V2.0211^ea^, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 4.46) vacanato cattāripi abhimukhaṃ paccakkhato ñātabbāni, abhivisiṭṭhena vā ñāṇena ñātabbānīti ^b^abhiññeyyāni^eb^.
[03] 569^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññamaññaṃ sabhāgānī^eb^ti aññamaññasamānabhāgāni, sadisarūpānīti attho.

[03] ^b^durabhisambhavatara^eb^nti abhisambhavituṃ sādhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyataraṃ, sattivighātena duradhigamanti attho. ^b^asana^eb^nti kaṇḍaṃ. ^b^atipāteyyā^eb^ti khipeyya. ^b^koṭiyā^eb^ti kaṇḍassa koṭiyā vālaggena. ^b^koṭi^eb^nti vālasseva koṭiṃ. ^b^paṭivijjheyyā^eb^ti paṭimukhabhāvena vijjheyya.

[03] bādhakapabhavasantiniyyānalakkhaṇehi vavatthānaṃ ^b^salakkhaṇavavatthānaṃ. duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā^eb^ti oḷārikā dukkhasamudayā. tiracchānagatānampi hi dukkhaṃ, āhārādīsu ca abhilāso pākaṭo. pīḷanādiāyūhanādivasena pana ``idaṃ dukkhaṃ, idamassa kāraṇa''nti yāthāvato ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ^b^gambhīrā^eb^. saṇhasukhumadhammattā nirodhamaggā sabhāvato eva ^b^gambhīraṭṭhena duravagāhā^eb^. teneva uppanne magge natthi nirodhamaggānaṃ anavagāhoti. nibbānampi maggena adhigantabbattā tassa phalanti apadisīyatīti āha ^b^``phalāpadesato''^eb^ti. vuttañhetaṃ ``dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā''ti (vibha0 719). maggopi nirodhassa sampāpakabhāvato ``hetū''ti ^a^M2.0225^ea^ apadisīyatīti āha ^b^``hetuapadesato''^eb^ti. vuttampi cetaṃ ``dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā''ti (vibha0 719).
[03] ^b^iti evaṃ pakārehī^eb^ti iti vijaññāti sambandho. tattha itisaddena vijānanakkamaṃ dasseti. ^b^evaṃ pakārehī^eb^ti evaṃ-saddena vijānanakāraṇabhūtena eva.
[06] sabhāgavisabhāgatovinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] indriyasaccaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti soḷasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 570^b^.^eb^ ^b^imissā^eb^ ^a^M2.0226^ea^ ^a^V2.0212^ea^ ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti imissā yathādhigatāya vipassanāya. ^b^bhūmibhūtesū^eb^ti pavattiṭṭhānabhūtesu. kāmañcāyaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannasamaññā pitāputtasamaññā viya apekkhāsiddhā, hetuphaladhammesu pana yathākkamaṃ vavatthitāvāti ^b^``paṭiccasamuppādo cevā''^eb^tiādinā vibhajja vuttaṃ. ^b^ādisaddenā^eb^ti ``paṭiccasamuppādādibhedā''ti ettha vuttāadisaddena. ^b^avasesā honti,^eb^ saṃvaṇṇanāvasenāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``tesaṃ vaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^avijjādayo dhammā paṭiccasamuppādo,^eb^ na samuppattimattaṃ. svāyamattho iminā suttapadena veditabboti dassento ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādiṃ vatvā paṭiccasamuppanne pana dassetuṃ ^b^``jarāmaraṇādayo panā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. kasmā panettha anulomato paṭiccasamuppādadhammā dassitā, paṭilomato paṭiccasamuppannā dhammāti? yato te paccayato uppannā, tassa samanantaradassanatthaṃ.

[03] na niccaṃ na sassatanti ^b^aniccaṃ^eb^. samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti ^b^saṅkhataṃ^eb^. paṭicca paccayārahaṃ paccayaṃ nissāya sahitameva uppannanti ^b^paṭiccasamuppannaṃ^eb^. khayanasabhāvaṃ ^b^khayadhammaṃ^eb^. vayanasabhāvaṃ ^b^vayadhammaṃ^eb^. virajjanasabhāvaṃ palujjanasabhāvaṃ ^b^virāgadhammaṃ^eb^. nirujjhanasabhāvaṃ ^b^nirodhadhammaṃ^eb^. sesaṃ yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
[03] 571^b^.^eb^ ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu yathāvuttesu suttapadesu. ^b^saṅkhepo^eb^ti atthasaṅkhepo.

[03] ^b^jātipaccayā^eb^ti jātisaṅkhātā paccayā. hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. ^b^ṭhitāva sā dhātū^eb^ti yāyaṃ jarāmaraṇassa idappaccayatā ``jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa''nti, esā dhātu esa sabhāvo. sā ^a^V2.0213^ea^ tathāgatānaṃ uppādato pubbe, uddhañca aviññāyamāno, majjhe ca viññāyamāno, na tathāgatehi uppādito, atha kho sambhavantassa jarāmaraṇassa sabbakālaṃ jātipaccayato sambhavoti ṭhitā eva. kevalaṃ pana sayambhūñāṇena ^a^M2.0227^ea^ abhisambujjhanato, ``ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena adhigato''ti pavedanato ca tathāgato ``dhammassāmī''ti vuccati na apubbassa uppādanato. tena vuttaṃ ``ṭhitāva sā dhātū''ti. sā eva ^b^jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa^eb^nti ettha vipallāsābhāvato evaṃ avabujjhamānassa etassa sabhāvassa, hetuno vā tatheva bhāvato ṭhitatāti ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā^eb^. jāti vā jarāmaraṇassa uppādaṭṭhiti pavattāayūhanasaṃyogapalibodhasamudayahetupaccayaṭṭhitīti taduppādādibhāvenassā ṭhitatā ^b^``dhammaṭṭhitatā''^eb^ti phalaṃ patisāmatthiyato hetumeva vadati.

[03] atha vā dhārīyati paccayehīti dhammo, tiṭṭhati tattha tadāyattavuttitāya phalanti ṭhiti, dhammassa ṭhiti ^b^dhammaṭṭhiti. dhammo^eb^ti vā kāraṇaṃ, paccayoti attho. dhammassa ṭhitisabhāvo, dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti ^b^dhammaṭṭhiti,^eb^ paccayo. tenāha ``paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa''nti (paṭi0 ma0 1.45). dhammaṭṭhiti eva ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā^eb^. sā eva dhātu ``jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa''nti imassa sabhāvassa, hetuno vā aññathattābhāvato ``na jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa''nti viññāyamānassa tabbhāvābhāvato niyāmatā vavatthitabhāvoti ^b^dhammaniyāmatā^eb^. phalassa vā jarāmaraṇassa jātiyā sati sambhavo dhamme hetumhi ṭhitatāti ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā^eb^. asati asambhavo dhamme niyatatāti ^b^dhammaniyāmatā^eb^ti evaṃ phalena hetuṃ vibhāveti. ^b^taṃ^eb^ ``ṭhitāva sā dhātū''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 2.20) vuttaṃ idappaccayataṃ ^b^abhisambujjhati^eb^ paccakkhakaraṇena abhimukhaṃ bujjhati yāthāvato paṭivijjhati. ^b^abhisametī^eb^ti tassa vevacanaṃ. ādito kathento ^b^ācikkhati,^eb^ uddisatīti attho. tameva uddesaṃ pariyosāpento ^b^deseti^eb^. yathāuddiṭṭhamatthaṃ niddisanavasena pakārehi ñāpentā ^b^paññapeti^eb^. pakārehiyeva patiṭṭhapento ^b^paṭṭhapeti^eb^. yathāniddiṭṭhamatthaṃ paṭiniddisanavasena ^b^vivarati vibhajati,^eb^ vivaṭañhi vibhattañca atthaṃ hetudhāraṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto ^b^uttānīkaroti^eb^. uttānīkaronto tathāpaccakkhabhūtaṃ katvā nigamanavasena ^b^passathāti cāha^eb^.

[03] 572^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccayalakkhaṇo^eb^ti paccayabhāvalakkhaṇo, paccayoti vā lakkhitabbo. pavattidukkhassa ^a^V2.0214^ea^ anubandhāpanakiccatāya ^b^dukkhānubandhanaraso^eb^. nibbānagāmimaggassa uppathabhāvato ^b^kummaggapaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M2.0228^ea^ ^b^panāyaṃ^eb^ paṭiccasamuppādo. yāvattakehi paccayehi yaṃ phalaṃ uppajjanārahaṃ, avikaleheva tehi tassa uppatti, tadaññena ca tassa payojanaṃ natthīti āha ^b^``anūnādhikehevā''^eb^ti. yathā taṃ cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi cakkhuviññāṇassa, etena taṃtaṃphalanipphādanena tassā paccayasāmaggiyā tapparatā ^b^tathatā^eb^ti dasseti. ^b^sāmaggi^eb^nti samodhānaṃ, samavāyanti attho. ^b^asambhavābhāvato^eb^ti anuppajjanassa abhāvato. paccayasāmaggiyañhi sati anuppajjane tassā vitathatā siyā. ^b^aññadhammappaccayehī^eb^ti aññassa phaladhammassa paccayehi. ^b^aññadhammānuppattito^eb^ti tato aññassa phaladhammassa anuppajjanato. na hi kadāci cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi sotaviññāṇassa sambhavo atthi, yadi siyā, tassā sāmaggiyā aññathatā nāma siyā, na cetaṃ atthīti ^b^``anaññathatā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^paccayato^eb^ti paccayabhāvato. ^b^paccayasamūhato^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03] 573^b^.^eb^ ^b^idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā^eb^ti ^b^tā^eb^-saddena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, na kiñci atthantaraṃ yathā devo eva devatāti. ^b^idappaccayānaṃ vā samūho idappaccayatā^eb^ti samūhatthaṃ ^b^tā^eb^-saddamāha yathā ``janānaṃ samūho janatā''ti. nanu ca ``atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya''nti (dī0 ni0 2.96) jātisaddapaccayasaddasamānādhikaraṇena kiṃ-saddena idaṃsaddassa samānādhikaraṇatādassanato idappaccayasaddassa kammadhārayasamāso dissati, na hettha ``imassa paccayā idappaccayā''ti jarāmaraṇassa, aññassa vā paccayato jarāmaraṇasambhavapucchā sambhavati viditabhāvato, asambhavato ca, jarāmaraṇassa pana paccayapucchā sambhavati. paccaya-saddena ca samānādhikaraṇatāya idaṃ-saddassa imasmā paccayāti paccayapucchā yujjati. sā ca samānādhikaraṇatā bāhiratthasamāsepi labbhati. tato ca aññapadatthavacanicchābhāve kammadhārayasamāso labbhati.

[03] sāmivacanasamāse pana samānādhikaraṇatā natthīti na kathañci kammadhārayasamāsasambhavoti? nayidamevaṃ vacanicchantarabhāvato. paṭiccasamuppādavacanicchā hesā ``idappaccayatā ^a^V2.0215^ea^ paṭiccasamuppādo''ti ettha. ``atthi idappaccayā ^a^M2.0229^ea^ jarāmaraṇa''nti ettha pana jarāmaraṇassa paccayamattaparipucchā, tasmā yathā idaṃ-saddassa paṭiccasamuppādavisesanatā, pucchitabbapaccayavisesanatā ca hoti, tathā samāsavikappo ettha, tattha ca kātabboti na samāsantaradassanaṃ sāmivacanasamāsabādhakaṃ. kasmā panetthāpi kammadhārayasamāso na icchitoti? hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti imassatthassa kammadhārayasamāse asambhavato, ``imassa attano paccayānurūpassa anurūpo paccayo idappaccayo''ti imassa ca atthassa icchitattā. yo panettha idaṃ-saddena gahito attho, so ``atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇa''nti ettha jarāmaraṇaggahaṇeneva gahitoti idaṃ-saddo paṭiccasamuppannato abhassitvā aññāsambhavato paccaye avatiṭṭhati, tasmā tattha kammadhārayasamāso. ettha pana idaṃ-saddassa tato pariccajanakāraṇaṃ natthīti sāmivacanasamāso eva. evampi na idappaccayo eva idappaccayabhāvo bhavituṃ yuttoti idappaccayatāya paṭiccasamuppādatānupapattīti? nāyaṃ doso atthantarābhāvatoti vuttovāyamattho.

[03] atha vā pana hotu idappaccayabhāvo idappaccayatāti. ^b^bhāvo^eb^ti cettha avinābhāviphalaṃ pati hetuno satvaṃ. tathā hi idappaccaya-saddo jātiādīsu niruḷho. tañca idappaccayasatvaṃ idappaccayato aññaṃ natthi. yadi aññaṃ siyā, taṃ avijjamānaṃ siyā. na hi satā aññaṃ vijjamānaṃ hoti. atha satvaṃ saṃ nāma, yassa sato bhāvo, taṃ asaṃ nāma siyā. na hi taṃ satvaṃ sabhāvaṃ satvato aññattā, tasmā sato bhāvo satvanti niddeso na yujjati. na ca saṃ-sambandhena asaṃ saṃ nāma hoti, pageva saṃ-sambandhena. asati ca saditiggahaṇaṃ viparītaggāhoti na gahaṇato saṃsiddhi. sadisakappanāyañca māṇavakassa sīhabhāvo viya na asato saṃ-sabhāvatā. yasmā pana idappaccayabhāvo yathāvuttaṃ satvaṃ, na asatvaṃ. nāpi yassa taṃ satvaṃ, tadasaṃ, tasmā idappaccayabhāvo idappaccayasarūpaṃ sabhāvantarehi vinivattabhāvadassanatthaṃ imassāyanti visesetvā idappaccayatāti vuttanti na idappaccayatāya paṭiccasamuppādabhāvāsambhavo.

[03] paṭicca samuppajjati etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādoti tassāpi hetuatthabhāvato jātiādipadānaṃ evameva hetubhāvavācakatāya hetupadhānatā yojetabbā hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti katvā ^a^M2.0230^ea^. tathā hi ``dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato catūhi vesārajjehi ^a^V2.0216^ea^ samannāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti, imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti yāva `evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī'''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.21-22) anena ^b^sīhanādasuttena^eb^ pakāsito evamattho. ``kiṃ vādī panāyasmato satthā kimakkhāyī''ti puṭṭhena āyasmatā ^b^assaji^eb^ttherena --
[21] ``ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha.
[22] tesañca yo nirodho, evaṃvādī mahāsamaṇo''ti.. (mahāva0 60; apa0 thera 1.1.286) --
[25] vutto. tena viññāyati hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti. sesamettha vattabbaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.

[03] 574^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭiccā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya. ^b^sammā^eb^ti aviparītaṃ aniccato aniccassa uppādoti katvā. niccato hi kāraṇato phalassa uppādo viparīto. tenāha ^b^``titthiya...pe0... nirapekkho''^eb^ti. ``uppādo paññāyatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.38; a0 ni0 3.47; kathā0 214) evaṃ vuttasaṅkhatalakkhaṇato añño ``paccayato khaṇato''ti ettha vuttapaccayalakkhaṇo eko ākāro uppādoti tesaṃ adhippāyo. yaṃ sandhāya te ``jātiādīnaṃ hetavo jātiādayo''ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, nibbattilakkhaṇavinimuttassa tādisassa kassaci abhāvato. tenāha ^b^``taṃ na yujjatī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^gambhīranayāsambhavato^eb^ti gambhīrānaṃ nayānañca asambhavato. ^b^saddabhedato^eb^ti saddavināsato saddāyogato. ^b^suttaṃ natthi^eb^ ``paṭiccasamuppādaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī''tiādisuttapadehi (saṃ0 ni0 2.1, 20) uppādamattassa appakāsitattā. ayameva hi attho heṭṭhā dassito idānipi dassīyati. ^b^taṃ^eb^ uppādamattaṃ. ^b^viharāmi^eb^ tasmiṃ paṭhamābhisambuddhakāleti adhippāyo. ^b^viharāmī^eb^ti vā kālavipallāsena vuttaṃ, vihāsinti attho. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ padesavihāre. ^b^paccayākāradassanenā^eb^ti yenākārena paccayadhammo paccayuppannassa paccayo hoti, so paccayākāro paccayabhāvo, tassa dassanena. idha pana vedanānaṃ paccayabhāvo adhippeto. tenāha ^a^M2.0231^ea^ ^b^``micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita''^eb^ntiādi. vedanānaṃyeva hi paccayaṃ passantena vuttavihāro paṭiccasamuppādassa ekadesameva passato vihāroti ^a^V2.0217^ea^ katvā padesavihāro jāto, anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānamanasikāro paṭhamābhisambuddhavihāro. tañhi nippadesato paccayākāradassananti eke. ^b^padesavihārasuttavirodho āpajjati^eb^ tassa vedanānaṃ paccayadhammamanasikāravibhāvanato.

[03] loko samudeti etasmāti ^b^lokasamudayo,^eb^ avijjādiko paccayagaṇo, na lokasamudayamattaṃ. tenāha ^b^``anulomapaṭiccasamuppādo''^eb^ti. ^b^natthitā^eb^ti sabbaso abhāvo, naranvayavināso ucchedoti attho. natthitāsahacaraṇato pana ucchedadiṭṭhi natthitāti adhippetā. ^b^paccayānuparamo^eb^ paccayānaṃ avicchedo. yathā hi atītahetupañcakasannissayena etarahiphalapañcakaṃ viya hetupañcakampi hoti, evaṃ etarahihetupañcakasannissayena āyatiṃphalapañcakampi bhavissati. tenāha ^b^``paccayānuparame phalānuparamato''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^taṃ^eb^ gambhīrattaṃ ^b^uppādamatte natthi^eb^ asabhāvadhammattā. ekattanayādayo nayā sabhāvadhammesu labbhamānato uppādamatte kathañcipi na labbheyyunti āha ^b^``nayacatukkaṃ uppādamatte natthī''^eb^ti.

[03] 575^b^.^eb^ ^b^samāne kattarī^eb^ti ekasmiṃyeva kattari uppajjanakiriyāya yo kattā, tasmiṃyeva paccayanakiriyāya ca kattubhūteti attho. yathā ``nhatvā bhuñjati, bhutvā sayatī''ti. ^b^``pubbakāle''^eb^ti idañca tvāsaddantānaṃ padānaṃ yebhuyyena purimakālakiriyāya dīpanato vuttaṃ, na idha paṭiccasaddassa purimakālatthattā. evañhi ``cakkhuṃ paṭiccā''ti nidassanavacanaṃ nidassitabbena saṃsandeyya. atha vā kāmañcettha ubhinnaṃ kiriyānaṃ samakālatā uppajjanakiriyāya pubbe paccayanakiriyāya asambhavato, tathāpi phalakiriyāya hetukiriyā purimakālo viya voharituṃ yuttā. evamettha hetuphalavavatthānaṃ supākaṭaṃ hotīti upacārasiddhaṃ purimakālaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``pubbakāle''^eb^ti. ^b^atthasiddhikaro^eb^ti vākyatthapaṭiviññattikaro. paṭiccasamuppādoti hi ettha vākyatthāvabodho idha atthasiddhīti adhippeto. ^b^payujjamāno^eb^ paṭiccasaddo uppādasaddena vuccamānassa ^a^M2.0232^ea^ samānassa ``kattu abhāvato''ti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. ayañhettha attho ``cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa''ntiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.204, 400; 3.421, 425-426; saṃ0 ni0 2.43-44; 2.4.60; kathā0 465) paccayanakiriyāya, uppajjanakiriyāya ca viññāṇameva kattāti samānakattukatā labbhati.

[03] ``paṭiccasamuppādo''ti ^a^V2.0218^ea^ ettha pana uppādasaddassa bhāvasādhanatāya kiriyāva vuttāti samānakattulakkhaṇo saddappayogo na sambhavatīti. tenāha ^b^``saddabhedaṃ gacchatī''^eb^ti, apasaddappayogo hotīti attho. na cettha parāvarayogo (pāṇinī 3.4.20) ``appatvā nadiṃ pabbato, atikkamma pabbataṃ nadī''tiādīsu viya, nāpi lakkhaṇahetuādipayogo ``sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hoti, ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ jāyate, `dha'nti katvā daṇḍo patito''tiādīsu viya. nevettha saddabhedo. na hi hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbaññeyyaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhitānaṃ mahesīnaṃ vacane akkharacintakānaṃ vippalāpo avasaraṃ labhati. labhatu, vākyatthena saddasiddhito ``nhatvā gamanaṃ, bhutvā sayana''ntiādīsu viyāti. evampi na ca kiñci atthaṃ sādheti. yadipi paccekaṃ padattho labbhati, vākyattho pana na yujjati, tasmā dasadāḷimādivākyāni viya asambandhatthatāya niratthakaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.

[03] nāmapade vutte appayuttānipi ``atthi, hoti, vijjatī''ti evarūpāni kiriyāpadāni ānetvā sambandhitabbānīti ñāyaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``hotisaddena saddhiṃ yojayissāmā''^eb^ti. ^b^imesū^eb^ti yathāvuttesu desanāpaṭiññāpucchānigamanavasena vuttesu paṭiccasamuppādapadesu. nidassanamattañcetaṃ, aññesupi ``paṭiccasamuppādameva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi kāroti. yadidaṃ idappaccayatā paṭiccasamuppādo (dī0 ni0 2.67; ma0 ni0 2.337; sa0 ni0 1.172; mahāva0 7). gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo''ti (dī0 ni0 2.95; saṃ0 ni0 2.60) evamādīsupi ekenapi saddhiṃ hoti-saddo sambandhaṃ na gacchati. ^b^yogaṃ na gacchati^eb^ tathā sambandhavasena avuttattā. ^b^``na ca uppādo hotī''^eb^ti idaṃ asabhāvadhammattā uppādassa nibbattilakkhaṇāyogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. yathā hi vināsassa vināso natthi, evaṃ uppādassa vināso viya uppādopi natthi. yadi siyā, yena uppādena uppādo uppādavā, sopi uppādavāti ^a^M2.0233^ea^ anavaṭṭhānameva āpajjeyyāti vuttovāyamattho. tenāha ^b^``sace heyyā''^eb^tiādi. yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ samudayo hotīti? nāyaṃ doso nibbattiyā anadhippetattā. evaṃ dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo pātubhāvo sambhavatīti ayañhettha attho, idha pana paṭiccasamuppādo hotīti tassa atthibhāvacodanāti katvā hoti, jāyatīti nibbatticodanā katā siyāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ ^b^``na uppādo hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] 576^b^.^eb^ imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, avijjādayo, tesaṃ bhāvo ^b^idappaccayatā^eb^ ^a^V2.0219^ea^. ko pana so bhāvoti āha ^b^``bhāvo ca nāmā''^eb^tiādi. tassattho -- yenākārena avijjādayo saṅkhārādipātubhāvahetū honti, tasmiṃ avijjādīnaṃ pavattiākāravisese vikāre paṭiccasamuppādoti ayaṃ samaññāti. ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ vādīnaṃ ^b^taṃ^eb^ maññanaṃ. ^b^hetuvacanato^eb^ti hetubhāvavacanato.

[03] 577^b^.^eb^ ^b^etthā^eb^ti paṭiccasamuppādapade. samuppādapadhānavacanaviññeyyo sasattiko hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ aññattha samuppādasaddassa bhāvasādhanassa dassanato tathā idhāpi ^b^byañjanacchāyāya uppādoyevāyaṃ^eb^ vutto, na hetūti yā ^b^saññā uppajjati, sā imassa^eb^ paṭiccasamuppādapadassa evaṃ idāni vuccamānākārena atthaṃ gahetvā vūpasametabbā vinodetabbā.

[03] ^b^dvedhā^eb^ti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- yasmā attano paccayavasena pavatto paccayuppannadhammasamūho paccetabbato paṭicco ca so saha uppajjanato samuppādo ca, paṭicca vā kāraṇasāmaggiṃ apaccakkhāya saha uppajjanato evāti ca evaṃ dvedhā ``paṭiccasamuppādo''ti idaṃ vacanaṃ icchitabbaṃ, tasmā tassa paccayadhammopi phalūpacārena paṭiccasamuppādo icceva vuttoti.

[03] ^b^paccayatāyā^eb^ti paccayasamūhato. ^b^pavatto^eb^ti nibbatto. ^b^dhammasamūho^eb^ti paccayuppannadhammapuñjo. ^b^patīyamāno^eb^ti ñāṇagatiyā abhimukhaṃ upeyamāno, abhisamiyamānoti attho. ^b^hitāya sukhāya cā^eb^ti lokuttarahitāya, lokuttarasukhāya ca. ^b^saha uppajjati^eb^ ekekassa kadācipi ^a^M2.0234^ea^ uppattiyā abhāvato. ^b^sammā uppajjati^eb^ ahetuto, visamahetuto ca anuppajjanato. ^b^saha uppajjatī^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ uppajjati antamaso aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ uppajjanato. ^b^na paccakkhāyā^eb^ti apaṭikkhipitvā, attano paccayabhūtadhammasamudāyena kenaci na vināti attho. ^b^tassā^eb^ti yvāyaṃ ``paṭiccasamuppādo''ti vutto paccayuppannadhammasamūho, tassa ayaṃ avijjādiko hetusamūho. ^b^``tappaccayattā''^eb^ti etena paṭiccasamuppādapaccaye paṭicca samuppādasamaññāti dasseti. tenāha ^b^``yathā loke''^eb^tiādi. yathā hi loke ``pittaṃ mathitaṃ, sūrā dadhi, tipusaṃ jaro, semho guḷo, āyu ghata''nti ca paccayo phalavohārena vuccati, evaṃ phalūpacārena paṭiccasamuppādo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] 578^b^.^eb^ paṭicca-sadde ^a^V2.0220^ea^ paṭi-saddo abhimukhattho, icca-saddo gammatthoti dassento āha ^b^``paṭimukhamito''^eb^ti. kassa pana paṭimukhaṃ, kena vā ito, ko vā itoti codanattaye pacchimaṃ vissajjento ^b^``hetusamūho''^eb^ti āha. tasmiñhi vissaṭṭhe hetusamūho nāma paccayasāmaggīti tattha aññamaññassa paṭimukhaṃ, aññamaññeneva ca itoti vissaṭṭhovāyamattho hotīti. ^b^sahite^eb^ti samudite avinibbhutte. ^b^so^eb^ti hetusamūho. samuppādo iti vuttoti yojanā.

[03] ^b^pātubhāvāyā^eb^ti uppādāya. kāmaṃ ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.1; udā0 1; mahāva0 1; netti0 24; vibha0 225) avijjāva paccayabhāvena vuttā, tathāpi na avijjā ekāva paccayo hoti, atha kho sahajātadhammavatthuārammaṇādayo, yonisomanasikārādayo, taṇhupādānādayo ca dhammā yathārahaṃ saṅkhāruppādane avijjāya sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hontiyeva. evaṃ saṅkhārādayopi viññāṇādīnanti āha ^b^``avijjādiekekahetusīsena niddiṭṭho hetusamūho''^eb^ti. ^b^sādhāraṇaphalanipphādakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti taṃsamūhapariyāpannānaṃ hetudhammānaṃ sādhāraṇassa phalassa nibbattakabhāvena. ^b^avekallaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anūnabhāvena. tasmiñhi hetusamūhe ekaccāsādhāraṇañcetaṃ phalaṃ, ekacceheva ca nibbattetabbaṃ siyā, sabbesaṃ tesaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ aññamaññāpekkhā natthīti paṭimukhagamanābhāvato paṭiccattho na paripūreyyāti. ^b^sāmaggiaṅgāna^eb^nti paccayasāmaggiyā aṅgabhūtānaṃ, samūhīnanti attho ^a^M2.0235^ea^. niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. phaladhammānaṃ sahitatā nāma visuṃ abhāvo, na hetudhammānaṃ viya aññamaññāpekkhāti āha ^b^``aññamaññaṃ avinibbhogavuttidhamme''^eb^ti avinibbhogaggahaṇañcettha rūpadhammānampi saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ. aññathā sampayuttadhammeti vucceyya.

[03] 579^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccayatā^eb^ti ayaṃ avijjādiko paccayasamūho. ^b^aññoñña^eb^nti aññamaññaṃ. ^b^paṭiccā^eb^ti nissāya sahakārīkāraṇaṃ laddhā. ^b^sama^eb^nti avisamaṃ avekallena. ^b^sahā^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti attano paccayuppannadhamme. yasmā uppādeti, ^b^tatopi^eb^ tasmāpi. evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti muninā bhagavatā bhāsitāti yojanā. ^b^na apaṭicca^eb^ paṭiccevāti avadhāraṇatthaṃ dassento gāthāyaṃ eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti dasseti.

[03] ^b^ekekadesa^eb^nti phalasamudāyassa ekadesekadesaṃ, bhāgasoti attho. ^b^pubbāparabhāvenā^eb^ti paṭipāṭiyā ^a^V2.0221^ea^. sabbametaṃ rūpārūpakalāpuppādanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^atthānusāravohārakusalenā^eb^ti paramatthadhammānugatavohāranipuṇena.

[03] 580^b^.^eb^ purimena padenāti yojanā. ^b^sassatādīna^eb^nti sassatabhāvādīnaṃ, sassatavādādīnaṃ vā. sassatasahacaritā hi vādāpi sassatādayoti vuccanti yathā ``dukkhadesanā dukkha''nti. ^b^ucchedādī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^vighāto^eb^ vināso, pahānanti attho. ^b^ñāyo^eb^ti antadvayavirahitā majjhimā paṭipatti.

[03] ^b^pavattidhammāna^eb^nti pavattibhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ, kilesavaṭṭādīnanti attho. ``sassato attā ca loko cā''tiādinayappavatto (dī0 ni0 1.31) ^b^sassatavādo^eb^. ``natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā''tiādinayappavatto (dī0 ni0 1.168; ma0 ni0 2.101, 227; saṃ0 ni0 3.212) ^b^ahetuvādo^eb^. pakati aṇukālādivasena loko pavattatīti evaṃ pavatto ^b^visamahetuvādo^eb^. issarapurisapajāpativādā ^b^vasavattivādā^eb^. ahetuvādaggahaṇeneva cettha sabhāvaniyati yadicchāvādānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. keci pana ``cakkhu eva cakkhussa kāraṇa''nti evamādiko ^b^visamahetuvādo^eb^. issarādivādo ahetuvādantogadho. sabhāveneva dhammā pavattantīti vādo ^b^``vasavattivādo''^eb^ti vadanti. kiṃ ^a^M2.0236^ea^ hi paccayasāmaggiyā payojananti adhippāyo. samuppādapadena paridīpito hotīti yojanā. paridīpanassa pana aviparītakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``paccayasāmaggiyaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattito''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^vihatā^eb^ti abbhāhatā. ^b^``purimapurimapaccayavasenā''^eb^ti iminā avicchedavasena pavattamānaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhinivattakaṃ hetuphalapabandhaṃ dasseti. tenāha ^b^``kuto ucchedo''^eb^ti. ucchedābhāvakathaneneva cettha ucchedavādassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^tassā tassā paccayasāmaggiyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ hetupaccayasamavāye. ^b^santatiṃ avicchinditvā^eb^ti hetuphalapabandhasaṅkhātassa santānassa avicchindanena. ^b^tesaṃ tesaṃ^eb^ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ sambhavato uppajjanato sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antadvayaṃ anupaggamma yathāsakaṃ paccayehi anurūpaphaluppatti idha majjhimapaṭipadāti adhippetā. kammavaṭṭassa, vipākavaṭṭassa ca bhinnasabhāvattā, bhinnakālattā ca ^b^so karoti so paṭisaṃvedetīti vādappahānaṃ^eb^. kusalākusalakkhandhappavattiyañhi kārakavohāro, vipākakkhandhapavattiyaṃ vedakavohāroti. yasmiṃ santāne ^a^V2.0222^ea^ kammaṃ nibbattaṃ, tattheva tassa phalassa nibbattanato ^b^añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvedetīti vādappahānaṃ^eb^. na hi katassa vināso, akatassa vā abbhāgamo atthi. ``itthī, purisā''ti vohārena janapadanirutti. tattha yasmā paṇḍitāpi loke ``pañcakkhandhe ānetu, nāmarūpaṃ āgacchatū''ti avatvā itthī, purisotveva voharanti, tasmā ``itthī evāyaṃ, puriso evāyanti apariññātavatthukānaṃ hoti abhiniveso. viddasuno pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ jānantassa tathā tathā pavattamāne dhamme upādāya paññattimattato tattha paramatthato na abhinivesoti āha ^b^``janapadaniruttiyā anabhiniveso''^eb^ti. ^b^samaññāyā^eb^ti lokasamaññāya. ^b^anatidhāvana^eb^nti anatikkamanaṃ. ``satto''ti hi vutte ``ko ettha satto, kiṃ rūpaṃ, udāhu vedanādayo''ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā lokasamaññāvaseneva lokiyehi viya lokiyo attho samaññaṃ avilaṅghantena voharitabbo.

[03] aparo nayo -- paccetumarahatīti paṭicco. yo hi naṃ pacceti abhisameti, tassa accantameva dukkhavūpasamāya saṃvattati. sammā, saha ca uppādetīti samuppādo. paccayadhammo hi attano phalaṃ uppādento sampuṇṇameva ^a^M2.0237^ea^ uppādeti, na vikalaṃ. ye ca dhamme uppādeti, te sabbe saheva uppādeti, na ekekaṃ. iti paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti ^b^paṭiccasamuppādo^eb^. atha vā paṭicca paṭimukhaṃ itvā kāraṇasāmaggiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā sahite uppādetīti ^b^paṭiccasamuppādo^eb^. paṭimukhagamanañca paccayassa kāraṇasāmaggiyā aṅgabhāvena phalassa uppādanameva. ^b^appaṭikkhipitvā^eb^ti ca na vinā tāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā, aṅgabhāvaṃ agantvā sayameva na uppādetīti attho. etena kāraṇabahutā dassitā, ^b^``sahite''^eb^ti iminā paccayuppannadhammabahutā. ubhayenāpi ``ekaṃ na ekato''tiādinā (visuddhi0 2.617) parato vuccamāno sāsananayo dīpito hoti.

[03] atha vā paṭicca paccetabbaṃ paccayaṃ paṭigantvā na vinā tena sambandhassa uppādo ^b^paṭiccasamuppādo^eb^ (udā0 aṭṭha0 1). paṭiccasamuppādoti cettha samuppādappadhānavacanaviññeyyo sasattiko hetūti veditabbo. tattha ``paṭiccā''ti vutte kiṃ paṭiccāti vattabbanti āha ^b^``paccetabba''^eb^nti. so ca paccayadhammoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``paccaya''^eb^nti. idāni paṭiccasaddassa atthamāha ^b^``paṭigantvā''^eb^ti. kāraṇassa sabhāvena tappaṭilābhagatiyā patvā. kathaṃ na vinā tena? sati eva tasmiṃ, tassa ca phalassa uppādato eva, na aññathā. asati, nirodhato cāti ^a^V2.0223^ea^ ayaṃ paccayaṭṭhiti paṭiccasaddassa attho. tenāyaṃ paṭiccasaddo yathā ``imasmiṃ sati imassuppādo''ti ete saddā bhummanissakkavacanajotanīyena idaṃ-saddavacanīyassa hetumato hetuāyattabhāvena bhāvuppāduttarakiriyāpekkhena yāyassa tadāyattatā, tāya samatthatāya hetuṃ vadanti, evaṃ gantvā-saddantaravacanīyena taṃviññeyyasseva paccayanakiriyākattuhetumato hetupaccayanena hetuāyattabhāvena samuppāduttarakiriyāpekkhena yāyassa tadāyattatā, tāya samatthatāya hetumāha. evañca katvā ``avijjā paṭicca, saṅkhārā paṭiccasamuppannā''tiādi (paṭi0 ma0 1.46) saṅkhārapiṭake vuttaṃ. ^b^samatthatā^eb^ cettha nidānādibhāvo. so ca tadavinābhāviphalaṃ pati satvameva. ^b^sambandhassā^eb^ti ca saṃyojanānurūpatāvasena jātiādinā sambandhassa jarāmaraṇādipaccayuppannassa. ^b^uppādo^eb^ti uppajjanaṃ. yadi evaṃ kathaṃ paṭiccasaddappayogo, nanu samānakattukānaṃ pubbakāle īdiso saddappayogoti? ``bhutvā gacchati, kasitvā vapatī''tiādīsu saccametaṃ, taṃ pana yebhuyyavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ ^a^M2.0238^ea^ samānāparakāle, asamānakattuke ca dassanato. samānakāle tāva --
[21] ``andhakāraṃ nihantvāna, uditāyaṃ divākaro.
[22] vaṇṇapaññāvabhāsehi, obhāsetvā samuggato''ti.. --
[25] udāharaṇaṃ. keci pana ``mukhaṃ byādāya sayati, akkhīni parivattetvā passatī''ti udāharanti. apare ``nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī''ti.

[03] tattha byādānaparivattanuttarakālabhāvisayanadassanakiriyāpekkhā pubbuttarakālatā atthi, sā ca bhedānupalakkhaṇā kehici na lakkhīyati. ``nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī''ti ca samānakālatāyapi ajjhenakathanehi pubbepi nisajjaṭṭhānāni hontīti sakkā pubbuttarakālatā sambhāvetuṃ, tasmā purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttāni. udayasamakālameva hi tannivattaniyanivattananti. aparakāle ``dvāramāvaritvā pavisati, āvaritvā nikkhamatī''ti. keci pana ``ḍakkacca patito daṇḍo''ti udāharanti. abhighātabhūtasahajātāya pana abhighātajasaddassa samānakālatā ettha labbhati, tasmā idhāpi purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttāni. purimatāvacanicchāvaseneva pana lakkhaṇahetukiriyānaṃ lakkhaṇahetubhāvavacanicchāti lakkhaṇabhāvato purimakālo icceva ``nihantvānā''ti saddasiddhi icchitā, evañca paccayanakiriyā ^a^V2.0224^ea^ samuppajjanakiriyāya purimikāvāti paṭicca-saddasiddhi. tattha yuttaṃ paccakkhato kattudassanato. idha pana tadabhāvato na yuttanti ce? nāyaṃ doso. idhāpi anumānato siddho. jarāmaraṇādiko kattā attheva ``ñatvā kiriyato vaya''nti evamādipayogadassanato avassaṃ anumiyamānena kattunā īdiso saddapayogo icchitabbo. asamāne pana kattari ``pisācaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hoti, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.271; 2.182; pu0 pa0 204) evamādi veditabbaṃ. yathā ca tattha pisācadassanādipurisabyāpāro, evamidhāpi paccayanaṃ paccayabyāpāro attano phaluppādanaṃ, tañca satvaṃ samuppādovāti ``paccaye sati, paccayassa uppādā''ti paccayanassa samuppādahetutāya gamako samānassa kattu abhāvepi paṭicca-saddo siddhoti veditabbo. yadi paṭiccasambandhassa uppādo paṭiccasamuppādo, kathaṃ paccayo ^a^M2.0239^ea^ paṭiccasamuppādoti? heṭṭhā vicāritovāyamattho. apica yoyaṃ samuppāda-saddavibhāvitānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ paṭiccasaddavibhāvito sasattiko hetu adhippeto, tassa samuppādābhimukhatāya padhānavacanaviññeyyasabhāvattā tathā vuttoti.

[03] kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ samuppādapadhānena vacanena samuppādassa hetu veditabbo, na pana sahetuko samuppādo evāti? vuccate -- diṭṭhassa dukkhassa yo paccayo paccayaniddesena tassa vibhāvitattā. kathaṃ? yathāha --

[02] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivīmaṃsamāno parivīmaṃsati `yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṃ, idaṃ nu kho dukkhaṃ kiṃ nidānaṃ kiṃ samudayaṃ kiṃ jātikaṃ kiṃ pabhavaṃ, kismiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kismiṃ asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī'ti. so parivīmaṃsamāno evaṃ pajānāti `yaṃ kho idaṃ...pe0... idaṃ kho dukkhaṃ jātinidāna'''miccādinā (saṃ0 ni0 2.51) --
[25] diṭṭhassa dukkhassa nidānaṃ ^b^parivīmaṃsasutte^eb^ vuttaṃ. taṃ pajānanañca nidānampi viññātabbanti. yathā cāha --

[02] ``pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi `kicchaṃ ^a^V2.0225^ea^ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca, atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa. kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā'ti...pe0... tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo `jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa'''nti (saṃ0 ni0 2.10) --

[25] ādinā diṭṭhassa dukkhassa paccayavīmaṃsābhisamayā vuttā. paccayo hi ñātabbo. tadabhisamayāyattañca dukkhanissaraṇapajānananti yo ca ñātabbo, so pavedetabboti paṭiccasamuppādasaddo yaṃ yadidaṃ samuppādasaddavibhāvitaṃ diṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ paccayaṃ paṭicceva, na aññathāti evaṃ paccayavibhāvanatthaṃ vuccati. bhavati hi ñātuṃ, pavedetuñca icchitabhāvena padhānassāpi kenaci visesena ñātabbatāya appadhānabhāvena niddeso yathā ^a^M2.0240^ea^ ``ko sotāpanno, yassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīnāni. ko devadatto, yassa uccatarāni gehānī''ti, evamidhāpi paccayapaccayanapavedanaṭṭhena niddese sattivisesena attano phalena paccanīyatāya ñātabbabhāvena ``paṭiccā''ti pariyāyena paccayo vutto.

[03] yo cāyaṃ ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''tiādiko niddeso, so ca sakalassa dukkhakkhandhassa mūlato paṭṭhāya paccayānaṃ pavedanāya niddiṭṭhoti pariyosānepi ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti evaṃ-saddena samugghātaṃ dukkhaṃ dassetvā tassa yathāvutte paccaye taṃsamudayābhimukhe katvā nigamitā paccayā. ^b^paṭipadāsuttepi^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 2.3) ``avijjāpaccayā...pe0... samudayo hotī''ti vatvā ``ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipadā''ti vuttaṃ. na ca paṭiccasamuppannabhāvena gahitaṃ dukkhaṃ micchāpaṭipadaṃ, atha kho dukkhasamudayabhūtā paccayāti. yathā ca ``pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi (dī0 ni0 3.335), pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.355) aṅgañāṇapaṭivedanatthattā desanāya sammāsamādhipadhānehi saddehi aṅgañāṇapaṭivedanaṃ kataṃ, evamidhāpi samuppādapadhānena saddena paccayapaṭivedanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 581^b^.^eb^ yā panāyaṃ tantīti sambandho. ^b^nikkhittā^eb^ti ṭhapitā, desitāti attho. yathādhippetassa atthassa tananato tanti, gantho. ``kiṃ vādī, bhante, sammāsambuddho''ti pucchitena ^a^V2.0226^ea^ ``vibhajjavādī, mahārājā''ti (pārā0 aṭṭha0 1ṭatiyasaṅgītikathā; kathā0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā) moggaliputtatissattherena vuttattā sammāsambuddhasāvakā vibhajjavādino. te hi satthārā venayikādibhāvaṃ vibhajja vuttaṃ anuvadanti, somanassādīnaṃ, cīvarādīnañca sevitabbāsevitabbabhāvaṃ. sassatucchedavāde vā vibhajja vadanti. ``sassato attā ca loko cā''tiādīnaṃ (dī0 ni0 1.31) ṭhapanīyānaṃ ṭhapanato, rāgādikkhayassa sassatassa, rāgādikāyaduccaritādiucchedassa ca vacanato, na pana ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyādike tayo pañhe apanetvā vibhajjabyākaraṇīyameva vadanti. vibhajjavādīnaṃ maṇḍalaṃ samūho ^b^vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ^eb^. vibhajjavādino vā bhagavato parisā ^b^vibhajjavādimaṇḍala^eb^ntipi vadanti, vibhajja vā sassatucchede ubho ante anupagamma majjhimapaṭipadābhūtassa paṭiccasamuppādassa desanato bhagavā, tadanuvādato tassa sāvakā ca ^b^vibhajjavādino^eb^ti. sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ.

[03] ^b^otaritvā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0241^ea^ ogāhetvā, vibhajjavādī hutvāti attho. na hi sayaṃ avibhajjavādī samāno vibhajjavādīnaṃ antare ṭhānamattena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti. ācariyehi avuttaviparītatthadīpanena te ^b^nābbhacikkhantena^eb^. avijjā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārānampi hetu paccayo hotīti vadanto, kathāvatthumhi paṭikkhitte puggalavādādike ca vadanto sakasamayaṃ vokkamati nāma, tathā ^b^avokkamantena. parasamayaṃ^eb^ dosāropanabyāpāravirahena ^b^anāyūhantena^eb^. ``idampi suttaṃ gahetabba''nti parasamayaṃ asampiṇḍentenāti keci vadanti. ``tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña''ntiādīni (ma0 ni0 1.396) vadanto suttaṃ paṭibāhati nāma, tathā ^b^apaṭibāhantena^eb^. ``tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāya (ma0 ni0 1.234; pāci0 417, 418), supinante kato vītikkamo āpattikaro hotī''ti ca evamādiṃ vadanto vinayaṃ paṭilometi nāma, tabbipariyāyena taṃ ^b^anulomentena^eb^. paṭilomento hi kammantaraṃ bhindanto, dhammatañca vilomento kuto kilesavinayaṃ anulometi. ^b^sutte^eb^ (dī0 ni0 2.187 ādayo; a0 ni0 4.180) vutte cattāro mahāpadese, ^b^aṭṭhakathāya^eb^ñca vutte suttasuttānulomāacariyavādāttanomatimahāpadese ^b^olokentena^eb^. tadolokanena hi sutte, vinaye ca santiṭṭhati nātidhāvati.
