[03] 641^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0301^ea^ nāmarūpaṃ. ^b^tassā^eb^ti saḷāyatanassa. ^b^tādisassevā^eb^ti katekasesasseva.

[03] idhāpi ^b^nāma^eb^nti khandhattayasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^niyamato^eb^ti idañca catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ, channaṃ vatthūnaṃ, jīvitassa ca yathāsambhavaṃ sahajātanissayapurejātaindriyādinā saḷāyatanassa pavattamānassa ekantena paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. rūpāyatanādīnaṃ pana sahajātanissayānupālanabhāvo natthīti aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ārammaṇārammaṇapurejātādibhāvo ca tesaṃ na sasantatipariyāpannānameva, na ca cakkhādīnaṃ viya ekappahārenevāti aniyamato paccayabhāvo. ^b^niyamato...pe0... jīvitindriyanti eva^eb^nti ettha ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddena vā rūpāyatanādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatana^eb^nti ettha yadipi chaṭṭhāyatanasaḷāyatanasaddānaṃ saddato sarūpatā natthi, atthato pana saḷāyatanekadesova chaṭṭhāyatananti ekadesasarūpatā atthīti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti veditabbo. atthatopi hi sarūpānaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ icchanti ``vaṅko ca kuṭilo ca kuṭilā''ti. tasmā atthato ekadesasarūpānañca ekasesena bhavitabbanti.

[03] atha vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca manāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatananti vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatanañca manāyatanañca manāyatananti vā ekasesaṃ katvā cakkhādīhi saddhiṃ ``saḷāyatana''nti vuttanti tameva ekasesaṃ nāmamattapaccayassa, nāmarūpapaccayassa ca manāyatanassa vasena kataṃ atthato dassento āha ^b^``chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti evaṃ katekasesassā''^eb^ti. yathāvuttopi hi ekaseso atthato chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañcāti evaṃ kato nāma ^a^M2.0322^ea^ hotīti. sabbattha ca ekasese kate ekavacananiddeso katekasesānaṃ saḷāyatanādisaddavacanīyatāsāmaññavasena katoti daṭṭhabbo.
[03] ^b^``na aññathā''^eb^ti etena tassa tassa nāmassa, rūpassa ca abhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ na hotīti byatirekaṃ vibhāveti.
[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0302^ea^ yaṃ yaṃ nāmaṃ, rūpañca. ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassa yassa āyatanassa. ^b^yathā^eb^ti sahajātādinā yena yena pakārena. ^b^neyya^eb^nti ñeyyaṃ.

[03] ^b^tassa vasenā^eb^ti tassa hetuādipaccayassa vasena. ^b^ukkaṃsāvakaṃso^eb^ti ettha sattadhā paccayabhāvato ukkaṃso aṭṭhadhā paccayabhāvo, tato navadhā, tato dasadhāti ayaṃ ukkaṃso. avakaṃso pana dasadhā paccayabhāvato navadhā paccayabhāvo, tato aṭṭhadhā, tato sattadhāti evaṃ veditabbo, na pana sattadhā paccayabhāvato eva dvepi ukkaṃsāvakaṃsā yojetabbā, tato avakaṃsābhāvatoti.
[03] vipākaṃ nāmanti sambandho. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti sahajātādivasena, sattadhā, hetuādivasena ca. ^b^itara^eb^nti avipākaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03] ^b^``hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā''^eb^ti etena arūpe viya asahāyaṃ nāmaṃ na hoti, hadayavatthu ca nāmena saha chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hotīti ettakameva dasseti, na pana yathā hadayavatthu paccayo hoti, tathā nāmampīti ayamattho adhippeto. vatthu hi nāmassa vippayuttapaccayo hoti, na nāmaṃ. nāmañca vipākahetādipaccayo hoti, na vatthūti. pavatte arūpadhammā kammajarūpassa ṭhitippattasseva paccayā honti, na uppajjamānassāti vippayuttātthiavigatā ca pacchājātavippayuttādayo eva cakkhādīnaṃ yojetabbā.

[03] ``tatthevā''ti iminā ``pavatte''ti idaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha ^b^``tattheva hi pavatte''^eb^ti. ``pañcavokārabhave''ti pana idaṃ ``pañcanna''nti iminā dīpitamevāti. pavattiyaṃ cakkhāyatanādikassa nāmaṃ vipākapaccayo na hoti, attanā janitarūpasseva hoti. paṭisandhiyaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānasadisaṃ, tasmā vatthunopi vipākapaccayo hotiyeva.
[03] ^b^rūpato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0323^ea^ rūpesu. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjatī^eb^ti paṭisandhiyaṃ aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ pañcasu āyatanesu kāyāyatanameva uppajjati. itaresaṃ yathārahaṃ itarānipi.

[03] ^b^avasesamanāyatanassā^eb^ti ettha ``pañcakkhandhabhave panā''ti etassa anuvattamānattā pañcavokārabhave ^a^V2.0303^ea^ eva pavattamānaṃ pañcaviññāṇehi avasesaṃ manāyatanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. nāmarūpassa sahajātādisādhāraṇapaccayabhāvo, sampayuttādiasādhāraṇapaccayabhāvo ca yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. ``rūpapaccayā pañcāyatanānī''ti ayampi nayo labbhati nirodhasamāpannānaṃ vasena, so pana apacurabhāvato yebhuyyena ca paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayabhūtasseva nāmarūpassa pavattiyaṃ paccayabhāvo vibhāvitoti na dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
[03] 642^b^.^eb^ bāvīsatiyā lokiyavipākaviññāṇehi sampayuttā ^b^bāvīsatilokiyaviññāṇasampayuttā^eb^. tato eva ^b^bāvīsati^eb^.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ saḷāyatane, tesu chasu āyatanesūti attho. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti sasantatipariyāpannameva gaṇhāti. tañhi sasantatipariyāpannakammanibbattaṃ tādisassa phassassa paccayo hoti. rūpādīni, pana bahiddhā anupādinnāni ca phassassa ārammaṇaṃ honti, na tāni cakkhādīni viya sasantatipariyāpannakammakilesanimittappavattibhāvena phassassa paccayā hontīti paṭhamācariyavāde na gahitāni, dutiyācariyavāde pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāve sati na sakkā vajjetunti gahitāni.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti saḷāyatanapaccayā phassapade. ye tāva ācariyā mahāvihāravāsinova yathā viññāṇaṃ, evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, phassaṃ, vedanañca paccayaṃ, paccayuppannañca sasantatipariyāpannaṃ dīpentā vipākameva icchanti. ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''ti ^b^abhidhammabhājanīya^eb^pāḷi (vibha0 243) āruppaṃ sandhāya vuttāti ^b^``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti pāḷianusārato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] sabbe phassā na sambhontīti yojanā. yadi sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhaveyya, ``saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso''ti ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya ^a^M2.0324^ea^, athāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhaveyyuṃ, tathāpi sabbāyatanehi sabbaphassasambhavato āyatanabhedena phassabhedo natthīti tadabhedavasena ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya, tathā pana asambhavato na yuttanti codeti ^b^``na sabbāyatanehī''^eb^tiādinā ^a^V2.0304^ea^. aññassāpi vā asambhavantassa vidhānassa bodhanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā''^eb^ti. ``na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhotī''ti idameva pana ekaphassavacanassāyuttattadīpakaṃ kāraṇanti veditabbaṃ. nidassanavasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhonti, evaṃ na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhoti. tasmā ekassa vacanaṃ ayuttanti. parihāraṃ pana anekāyatanehi ekaphassassa sambhavatoti dassento ^b^``tatridaṃ vissajjana''^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^avasesasampayuttadhammāyatanā^eb^ phassavajjitā taṃsampayuttacetasikā dhammā.
[03] ekopi anekāyatanappabhavo ^b^ekopanekāyatanappabhavo^eb^.
[03] chadhā paccayatte pañca vibhāvaye, ekaṃ navadhā paccayatte, bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ārammaṇādinā yathāsambhavaṃ paccayatte vibhāvayeti sambandho.

[03] ^b^anekabhedassā^eb^ti kusalavipākādipañcadvārādivasena anekavidhassa dvipañcaviññāṇasampayuttavajjassa vipākaphassassa. ^b^tāni cā^eb^ti rūpāyatanādīni. ``mano ca nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.455) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^tathā cā^eb^ti paccuppannāni rūpādīni paccuppannañca dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ rūparūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapaccayamattenā^eb^ti taṃ sabbaṃ apaccuppannaṃ, aññañca dhammāyatanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
[03] 643^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvārato saḷevā^eb^ti pabhavasāmaññato ekavidhāpi uppattidvārato cha eva hontīti chaḷeva vedanā vuttā.

[03] cittabhedena ekūnanavutividhāpi idhādhippetā eva dassetuṃ ^b^``vedanāsu panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ``sesāna''nti ettha sampaṭicchanasampayuttāya cakkhusamphassādayo pañca yadipi anantarādīhi paccayā honti, anantarādīnaṃ pana ^a^M2.0325^ea^ upanissaye antogadhattā santīraṇatadārammaṇānañca sādhāraṇassa tassa vasena ^b^``ekadhā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ekekasmiṃ dvāre hi cakkhudvārādīsu uppannacakkhuviññāṇādīhi ^a^V2.0305^ea^ sahajātā phassā sakasakavīthīsu sampaṭicchanādīhi sampayuttavedanānaṃ, manodvāre tadārammaṇavaseneva pavattānaṃ tebhūmakavipākavedanānampi sahajātamanosamphassasaṅkhāto so phasso aṭṭhadhā paccayo hotīti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] rūpārūpāvacaravipākavedanā paṭisandhiādivaseneva pavattanti, kāmāvacarāpi ekaccāti ^b^``tebhūmakavipākavedanānampī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tāsampi hi sahajātamanosamphasso aṭṭhadhāva paccayo hoti. paccayaṃ anupādinnampi keci icchantīti ^b^``yā panā''^eb^tiādinā manodvārāvajjanasampayuttaphassassa paccayabhāvo vutto. tañca mukhamattadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. etena nayena sabbassa anantarassa, anānantarassa ca phassassa tassā tassā vipākavedanāya upanissayatā yojetabbāti.
[03] 644^b^.^eb^ ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke, imasmiṃ vā sāsane cha taṇhā dīpitā. ^b^idhā^eb^ti vā imasmiṃ vedanāpaccayā taṇhāpade. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tāsu chasu taṇhāsu.

[03] ekekāya sassatadiṭṭhisahagatāya, ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya ca taṇhāya tadabhinandanānuguṇo rūpādīsu pavattiākāro, kevalaṃ kāmassādavasena pavattiyā visiṭṭhākārattā vuttappavattiākārato taṇhāya tividhatā.

[03] ^b^mamattenā^eb^ti sampiyāyanena, assādanataṇhāya icceva vuttaṃ hoti. tattha putto viya vedanā daṭṭhabbā, khīrādayo viya vedanāya paccayabhūtā rūpādayo, khīrādidāyikā dhāti viya rūpādichaḷārammaṇadāyakā cittakārādayo cha. tattha sukhasamphassavatthadāyako tantavāyo, vejjo rasāyatanojāvasena, tadupatthambhitajīvitavasena ca dhammārammaṇassa dāyakoti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^sabbāpesā^eb^ aṭṭhasatappabhedāpi.

[03] ārammaṇapaccayo uppajjamānāya ārammaṇamattameva hoti, na upanissayo viya uppādakoti uppādakassa upanissayasseva vasena ^b^``ekadhāvā''^eb^ti ^a^M2.0326^ea^ vuttaṃ. upanissayena vā ārammaṇūpanissayo ^a^V2.0306^ea^ saṅgahito. tena ca ārammaṇabhāvena taṃsabhāgo aññopi ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo dīpito hotīti upanissayavaseneva paccayabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^``yasmā vā''^eb^tiādinā na kevalaṃ vipākasukhavedanā eva, tissopi pana vedanā vipākā visesena taṇhāya upanissayapaccayo, avisesena itarā cāti dasseti. ^b^upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva bhāsitā^eb^ti tasmā sāpi bhiyyo icchanavasena taṇhāya upanissayoti adhippāyo. upekkhā pana akusalavipākabhūtā aniṭṭhattā dukkhe avarodhetabbā, itarā iṭṭhattā sukheti sā dukkhaṃ viya, sukhaṃ viya ca upanissayapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ. ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā''ti vacanena sabbassa vedanāvato paccayassa atthitāya taṇhuppattippasaṅge tannivāraṇatthamāha ^b^``vedanāpaccayā cāpī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] nanu ``anusayasahāyā vedanā taṇhāya paccayo''ti vacanassa abhāvā atippasaṅganivattiṃ na sakkā kātunti? na, vaṭṭakathāya pavattattā. vaṭṭassa ca anusayavirahe abhāvato anusayasahitāva paccayoti atthato vuttamevetaṃ hotīti. atha vā ``avijjāpaccayā''ti anuvattamānattā anusayasahitāva paccayoti viññāyati. ^b^vedanāpaccayā taṇhā^eb^ti cettha vedanāpaccayā eva taṇhā, na vedanāya vināti ayaṃ niyamo icchito, na vedanāpaccayā taṇhā hotiyevāti, tasmā atippasaṅgo ettha natthi evāti.

[03] ^b^vusīmato^eb^ti vusitavato, vusitabrahmacariyavāsassāti attho. vussatīti vā vusīti maggo vuccati, so etassa vuttho atthīti ^b^vusīmā,^eb^ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena arahā. aggaphalaṃ vā pariniṭṭhitavāsattā ``vusī''ti vuccati, taṃ etassa atthīti ^b^vusīmā^eb^.

[03] 645^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthavibhāgo^eb^ atthassa vibhajanā. ^b^vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāma^eb^nti kāmaguṇasaññitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇamāha. ^b^upādiyatī^eb^ti kāmavasena gaṇhāti, daḷhaṃ assādetīti attho. ^b^kāmaṃ upādiyatī^eb^ti ettha kammasādhano kāmasaddo ^a^M2.0327^ea^, ^b^kāmo ca so^eb^ti ettha kattusādhano kilesakāmassa adhippetattā. upādānasaddo pana ubhayatthāpi kattusādhanova. ^b^daḷhattho^eb^ bhusattho. yathā bhuso āyāso ^a^V2.0307^ea^ upāyāso, bhusaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ upakuṭṭhaṃ, evaṃ idhāpīti āha ^b^``upāyāsaupakuṭṭhādīsu viyā''^eb^ti. ^b^purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatī^eb^ti purimadiṭṭhiṃ sassatabhāvena gaṇhantī upādiyati, purimadiṭṭhiākārena vā uttaradiṭṭhi uppajjamānā teneva purimadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ karontī taṃ upādiyatīti vuttā. atha vā ^b^purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatī^eb^ti ``sassato attā''ti (dī0 ni0 1.31) idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ nidassetuṃ vuttaṃ. yathā hi esā daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ uttarā upādiyati, evaṃ ``natthi dinna''ntiādikāpīti (ma0 ni0 1.445; 2.94; 3.91, 116, 136; dha0 sa0 1221; vibha0 938). ^b^atta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ pana attavādupādānanti na idaṃ diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^loko cā^eb^ti vā attaggahaṇavinimuttaṃ gahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^sīlabbataṃ upādiyatī^eb^ti ettha asuddhimaggagosīlādisamādānavasena sīlaṃ, avītikkamanavasena vataṃ. ubhayathāpi vā sīlaṃ, tapokammabhāvena gahitatāya vataṃ, gavādipakatibhāvanā. attano vā gavādibhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ, ``gacchanto bhakkheti, tiṭṭhanto muttetī''tiādinā gavādikiriyākaraṇaṃ vataṃ. taṃtaṃakiccasammatato vā nivatti sīlaṃ, taṃsamādānavatovesa bhojanakiccakaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti vataṃ, taṃ sīlabbataṃ asuddhimaggaṃ ``suddhimaggo''ti parāmasanto tathā abhinivisanto upādiyati, taṃ gāhaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti attho. sīlabbatasahacaritaṃ parāmāsaṃ sīlabbatanti gahetvā āha ^b^``sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcā''^eb^ti. ^b^gosīlagovatādīnī^eb^ti ca tathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhiṃ vadati. tenevāha ^b^``sayameva upādānānī''^eb^ti. ^b^abhinivesato^eb^ti abhinivesabhāvato, abhinivisanato vā. ^b^attavādupādāna^eb^nti ``attā''ti vādassa paññāpanassa, gahaṇassa ca kāraṇabhūtā diṭṭhīti attho. ^b^attavādamattamevā^eb^ti attassa abhāvā ``attā''ti idaṃ vacanamattameva. ^b^upādiyantī^eb^ti daḷhaṃ gaṇhanti. kathaṃ? ``attā''ti. ``attā''ti hi abhinivisantā vacanamattameva daḷhaṃ katvā gaṇhantīti atthoti. evaṃ ``attavādamattameva upādiyantī''ti vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0328^ea^. ^b^attavādamatta^eb^nti vā vācāvatthumattamevāha. vācāvatthumattameva hi ``attā''ti upādiyanti attassa abhāvāti.

[03] ``dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre pana kāmupādānaṃ saṅkhepato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ, sesupādānattayaṃ diṭṭhimattameva, vitthārato panā''ti evaṃ dhammasaṅkhepavitthārasamudāyato tadavayavabhūtaṃ saṅkhepaṃ, vitthārañca niddhāretīti. ^b^dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ^a^V2.0308^ea^. ^b^kāmacchando^eb^ti kāmasaṅkhāto chando, na kattukamyatāchando, na ca dhammacchando. kāmanavasena, rañjanavasena ca kāmoyeva rāgo ^b^kāmarāgo,^eb^ evaṃ sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā kāmo eva nandanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmanandī,^eb^ taṇhāyanaṭṭhena kāmoyeva ^b^kāmataṇhā,^eb^ sinehanaṭṭhena kāmo eva ^b^kāmasneho,^eb^ paridayhanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmapariḷāho,^eb^ mucchanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmamucchā,^eb^ gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmajjhosānaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. ^b^appattavisayapatthanā taṇhā^eb^ ārammaṇe paritassanabhāvato, ^b^sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇe daḷhaggāhabhāvato. ^b^appicchatāpaṭipakkhā taṇhā^eb^ visayābhimukhabhāvato, ^b^santuṭṭhipaṭipakkhā upādānaṃ^eb^ taṇhādaḷhattaṃ hutvā atricchatābhāvato. ^b^pariyesanadukkhamūlā taṇhā^eb^ appattavisayapatthanābhāvato, ^b^ārakkhadukkhamūlaṃ upādānaṃ^eb^ sampattavisayaggahaṇabhāvato.

[03] ^b^natthi dinna^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^dinna^eb^nti dānamāha, taṃ aphalattā rūpaṃ viya dānaṃ nāma na hotīti paṭikkhipati. ^b^yiṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vuccati mahāvijitayaññasadiso mahāyāgo. ^b^huta^eb^nti āhunapāhunamaṅgalakiriyā. tattha āmantetvā havanaṃ dānaṃ ^b^āhunaṃ,^eb^ pāhunānaṃ atithīnaṃ atithikiriyā ^b^pāhunaṃ,^eb^ āvāhādīsu maṅgalatthaṃ dānaṃ ^b^maṅgalakiriyā,^eb^ dasa kusalakammapathā ^b^sukatakammāni^eb^ nāma, dasa akusalakammapathā ^b^dukkaṭakammāni^eb^ nāma, ^b^phalaṃ vipāko^eb^ti nissandādiphalañceva nippariyāyavipāko ca natthīti yojanā. yathā cettha, evaṃ ``natthi dinna''ntiādīsupi phalavipākapaṭikkhepova daṭṭhabbo. ^b^natthi ayaṃ loko^eb^ti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ ``natthī''ti gaṇhāti. imaṃ hi lokaṃ avekkhitvā paraloko, parañca lokaṃ avekkhitvā ayaṃ loko hoti gantabbato, āgantabbato cāti paralokato idhāgamanassa abhāvā tattheva ucchijjanato cittena paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ ``natthī''ti gaṇhātīti attho. na hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi paraloke ṭhitasseva hotīti. ^b^natthi paraloko^eb^ti idhaloke ^a^M2.0329^ea^ ṭhito paralokaṃ ``natthī''ti gaṇhāti. idhāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ayaṃ vā ettha attho -- saṃsaraṇappadeso idhaloko, paraloko ca nāma koci natthi saṃsaraṇassa abhāvā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti.

[03] purimabhavato pacchimabhave upapatanaṃ upapāto, so yesaṃ sīlaṃ, te ^b^opapātikā^eb^. te pana cavanakaupapajjanakasattā natthīti dassento āha ^b^``natthi sattā opapātikā''^eb^ti. ^b^natthi loke samaṇa...pe0... pavedentī^eb^ti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā ^a^V2.0309^ea^ lokasmiṃ natthi, ye imañca lokaṃ, parañca lokaṃ attanā eva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhato ñatvā pavedanasamatthā sabbaññubuddhā nāma natthīti dasseti. ^b^rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī^eb^tiādīsu vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] pakatiaṇuādīnaṃ sassataggāhapubbaṅgamo, sarīrassa ucchedaggāhapubbaṅgamo ca tesaṃ gāhānaṃ sāmibhūto koci sassato, ucchijjamāno vā attā atthīti attaggāho kadāci hotīti ^b^``yebhuyyenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. svāyaṃ attaggāho atthato khandhārammaṇo eva daṭṭhabbo. yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānantiādināva sambandho. yadipi bhavarāgajavanavīthi paṭhamaṃ pavattati gahitapaṭisandhikassa bhavanikantiyā pavattitabbattā, so pana bhavarāgo taṇhādaḷhattaṃ na hotīti maññamāno na kāmupādānassa paṭhamuppattimāha.
[01] taṇhā kāmupādānanti pana vibhāgassa akaraṇe sabbāpi taṇhā ^b^kāmupādānaṃ,^eb^ karaṇepi vā kāmarāgato aññāpi taṇhā daḷhabhāvaṃ pattā ^b^kāmupādāna^eb^nti tassa arahattamaggavajjhatā vuttā.

[01] uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā cittuppādā ^b^visayo^eb^. pañcupādānakkhandhā ^b^ālayo^eb^. tattha ramatīti ^b^ālayarāmā,^eb^ pajā. teneva sā ālayarāmatā sasantāne, parasantāne ca pākaṭā hoti. ^b^kāmāna^eb^nti vatthukāmānaṃ. ``sukhadukkhaṃ kammunā hotī''ti aggahetvā ^b^kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo hoti. sā^eb^ kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulatā. ^b^assa^eb^ kāmupādānavato. ^b^ta^eb^nti diṭṭhupādānaṃ, anattani dhammamatte ``attā''ti micchābhinivesassa sukhumataradhammupādānatāya sukhumatā vuttā. upanissayavacanena ārammaṇānantarapakatūpanissayā ^a^M2.0330^ea^ vuttāti anantarapaccayādīnampi saṅgaho kato hoti.

[03] 646^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthato^eb^ti vacanatthato. ^b^dhammato^eb^ti sabhāvadhammato. ^b^sātthato^eb^ti sātthakato, pubbe vuttassapi puna vacanassa sappayojanato. ^b^bhedasaṅgahā^eb^ti bhedato saṅgahato, vibhāgato ceva vibhattassa saṅkhipanato cāti attho. ^b^yaṃ yassa paccayo^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ upādānaṃ yassa yassa bhavassa paccayo hoti, tato cāti attho.

[03] ^b^bhavatīti^eb^ ^a^V2.0310^ea^ ^b^bhavo^eb^ti phalavohārena kammabhavo vutto. upapattibhavanibbacanameva hi dvayassapi sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, bhavati etasmā upapattibhavoti vā. dutiyo pana kammabhavo sattassa punabbhavabhāvena savisesaṃ bhavatīti ^b^bhavo^eb^. tato eva na sabbassa bhavantarassa, taṃhetuno vā bhavabhāvappasaṅgo. ^b^duvidhenā^eb^ti dvīhi ākārehi pavattitoti attho. ^b^duvidhenā^eb^ti vā paccattatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, duvidhoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^atthī^eb^ti saṃvijjati.

[03] 647^b^.^eb^ attano paccayehi karīyatīti kammaṃ, attano phalaṃ karotīti kammanti keci, ``kamma''nti evaṃ vattabbā ^b^kammasaṅkhātā. parittabhūmako^eb^ti kāmabhūmako. ^b^mahābhūmako^eb^ti mahaggatabhūmako. ^b^sabba^eb^nti anavasesaṃ. bhavaṃ gacchati, gameti cāti ^b^bhavagāmi^eb^. gacchatīti ca nipphādanasamatthatāvasena, attano pavattikāle bhavābhimukhaṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho, nibbattanameva vā gamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^``bhavagāmī''^eb^ti ca etena kammakkhayakaraṃ kammaṃ nivatteti. ayañhi vaṭṭakathā, tañca vivaṭṭanissitanti. ^b^apuññābhisaṅkhāroti dvādasa cetanā^eb^ti uddhaccasahagatacetanāyapi gahaṇaṃ ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''ti ettha viya veditabbaṃ. ``bhavapaccayā jātī''ti ettha pana ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa''nti (ma0 ni0 3.126; mahāva0 1; saṃ0 ni0 2.1; udā0 1; netti0 24) ettha viya sāpi apanetabbā. ^b^mandabahuvipākatā^eb^ti appamahāvipākatā.

[03] ^b^``sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā''^eb^ti etena ācayagāmitāya tesaṃ kammasaṅkhātatā vuttāti kammabhavapariyāpannataṃ ^a^M2.0331^ea^ pariyāyena vadati, nippariyāyena pana cetanāva kammabhavo. vuttañhi ``kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto, ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto''ti (dhātu0 244). upapattibhavo tīhipi tikehi vutto upādinnakkhandhova. yathāha ``upapattibhavo... kāmabhavo... saññābhavo... pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito''tiādi (dhātu0 67). yadi hi anupādinnakānampi gahaṇaṃ siyā, ``dvādasahi āyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhī''ti vattabbaṃ siyāti. kāmataṇhāya kāmetabbato kāmanissayatāya bhogā viya, kāmasahacaritatāya ``kuntā pacarantī''ti viya, kāmārammaṇatāya ``sukhaṃ rūpa''nti viya, kāmapaccayaṭṭhānatāya ``sukho saggo''ti viya kāmāti avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti ^a^V2.0311^ea^. rūpāvirāgato yaṃ nissitā, tadupacārena ``mañcā ghosantī''ti viya, ``phandanadevatā''ti viya ca ``rūpa''nti vuccanti brahmakāyikākaniṭṭhaparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā.

[03] rūpameva bhavo ^b^rūpabhavo,^eb^ tathā arūpanti ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaggaparicchinnā cattāro upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti. arūpameva bhavo ^b^arūpabhavo^eb^. kāmo eva bhavoti kāmabhavo, so pana yasmā yathāvuttenatthena ``kāmo''ti vattabbo hoti, tasmā ^b^``kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kāmāvacarasaññito vā bhavo ^b^``kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo''^eb^ti vutto. tathā rūpārūpabhavoti āha ^b^``esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū''^eb^ti. ^b^saññāvataṃ bhavo^eb^ti ettha vantu-saddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. tassa vā atthe akāraṃ katvā ``saññabhavo''tipi pāṭho. tenāha ^b^``saññāvā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^vokiṇṇo^eb^ti etena vokārasaddassa kammasādhanatamāha. vokirīyati pasārīyati vitthārīyatīti vokāro, vokiraṇaṃ vā vokāro, so ekasseva khandhassa vasena pavattattā ^b^``eko vokāro''^eb^ti vutto, pasaṭuppattīti attho.

[03] 648^b^.^eb^ kiñcāpi bhavaniddese ``sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo''ti (vibha0 234) iminā cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi vuttā. ^b^puññābhisaṅkhārādayovā^eb^ti pana avadhāraṇaṃ ^a^M2.0332^ea^ paccayadhammavisesepi atthappabhedena saṅkhārabhavaggahaṇesu attheva visesoti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ. tenāha ^b^``evaṃ santepī''^eb^tiādi. saṅkhārabhavānaṃ dhammabhedato na saṅkhārā eva puna vuttāti ^b^``sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana''^eb^nti etaṃ ayuttanti ce? na, bhavekadesabhāvena saṅkhārānaṃ bhavoti puna vuttattā. parena vā dhammavisesaṃ aggahetvā punavacanaṃ coditanti codakābhilāsavasena ^b^``sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 649^b^.^eb^ kāmabhavādinibbattakassa kammassa kāmabhavādibhāvo phalavohārena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. sahajātaviññāṇassapi paccayabhūtaṃ avijjāhetukaṃ saṅkhāraggahaṇena yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ, idha pana ``sabbampi bhavagāmikamma''nti (vibha0 234) vacanato bhavassa nibbattakaṃ upādānahetukaṃ vipaccanāya katokāsameva bhavoti adhippeto. yaṃ kāmupādānapaccayā rūpabhavanibbattakaṃ, arūpabhavanibbattakañca kammaṃ karīyati, so kammabhavo, tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavoti imamatthaṃ ^b^``esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū''^eb^ti atidisati. ^b^dve kāmabhavā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0312^ea^ kāmakammabhavo, kāmūpapattibhavoti dve kāmabhavā. evaṃ ^b^``dve rūpabhavā, dve arūpabhavā''^eb^ti etthāpi. antogadhe hi visuṃ aggahetvā abbhantaragate eva katvā kāmabhavādike kammūpapattibhavavasena duguṇe katvā āha ^b^``cha bhavā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti upādānavasena bhedaṃ akatvā. upādānabhedākaraṇeneva ca dvādasappabhedassa saṅgahavasena saṅgahato ^b^``cha bhavā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^anupagammā^eb^ti anissāya, anāmasitvāti attho.

[03] 650^b^.^eb^ gosīlena, kukkurasīlena ca samattena samādinnena gunnaṃ, kukkurānañca sahabyatā vuttāti ``sīlabbatupādānavato jhānabhāvanā na ijjhatī''ti maññamānā tena rūpārūpabhavā na hontīti keci vadanti. vakkhamānena pana pakārena paccayabhāvato ^b^``taṃ na gahetabba''^eb^nti āha. asuddhimagge ca suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ sīlabbatupādānanti suddhimaggaparāmasanena rūpārūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ nibbattanaṃ na na yujjatīti.

[03] ^b^anussavavasenā^eb^ti ``setavadhayajjaṃ ālabhate bhūtikāmo''ti ādinnānussavavasena, yathā ime manussaloke kāmā samiddhā, evaṃ devaloke ^a^M2.0333^ea^ ito samiddhatarāti diṭṭhānusārena vā. purāṇabhāratasītāharaṇapasubandhavidhiādisavanaṃ ^b^assaddhammassavanaṃ. ādi^eb^-saddena asappurisūpanissayaṃ pubbe ca akatapuññataṃ, attamicchāpaṇidhiñca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^kāyaduccaritādīnipī^eb^ti attano adhippetānaṃ kāmānaṃ anupāyabhūtānipi kāyaduccaritādīni ^b^karoti,^eb^ cirasaggādiatthaṃ yuddhādivasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^sandiṭṭhike vā pana^eb^ rajjasenāpatiṭṭhānādisaṅgahe ^b^kāme. tadantogadhā evā^eb^ti tasmiṃ duccaritanibbatte, sucaritanibbatte ca kāmabhave antogadhā evāti attho. ^b^antogadhā^eb^ti ca saññābhavapañcavokārabhavānaṃ ekadesena antogadhattā vuttaṃ. na hi te niravasesā kāmabhave antogadhāti.
[03] ^b^sappabhedassā^eb^ti sugatiduggatimanussādippabhedavato.

[03] kāmāvacarasampattibhave paṭhamadutiyaucchedavādavasena, rūpabhave tatiyaucchedavādavasena, arūpabhave sesaucchedavādavasena ayamattā sūcchinno hotīti tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karotīti āha ^b^``ayaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0313^ea^ ^b^attā nāmā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^sūcchinno^eb^ti sakalavaṭṭadukkhasamucchedena suṭṭhu ucchinno, apunabbhavuppattiko hotīti attho.

[03] ^b^``kāmāvacarasampattibhave''^eb^ti idaṃ paṭhamadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasena vuttaṃ, sesaṃ itaradiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasena. tattha kiñcāpi ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (dī0 ni0 1.93 ādayo) rūpāvacarajjhānavaseneva upari cattāro diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā āgatā, diṭṭhigatiko pana yaṃ kiñci gahetvā yathā tathā abhinivisatīti arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ, arūpajjhānānampi vā catutthajhānasaṅgahato arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ, santasukhatāya vā taṃsamaṅgino sukhitabhāvasāmaññato. ^b^vigatapariḷāho^eb^ti yathābhilāsitavisayūpahārena, pahānena ca vūpasantakāmarāgapariḷāho, diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattoti attho.

[03] suddhimaggaparāmasanavasena pavattitaṃ yaṃ kiñci lokiyaṃ sīlaṃ, jhānañca sīlabbatamicceva idhādhippetanti āha ^b^``idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāmā''^eb^tiādi. kamena avatvā sīlabbatupādānassa ante bhavapaccayatāvacanaṃ attavādupādānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ asamudācārato, attavādupādānanimittattā ca.

[03] ^b^kammabhave^eb^ti ^a^M2.0334^ea^ niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^hetupaccayappabhedehī^eb^ti ettha maggapaccayo ca vattabbo. diṭṭhupādānādīni hi sahajātakammabhavassa maggapaccayā hontīti, tasmā tāni sahajātādīsu hetupaccayaṃ apanīya maggapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā sattadhā paccayā hontīti veditabbāni. sabbāni pana anantarasamanantarānantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanapaccayehi paccayā honti. nānantarassa upanissayapaccayena paccayā honti. kadāci ārammaṇapaccayādināpi, taṃ pana upanissayapaccayeneva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``vippayuttassa pana upanissayapaccayenevā''^eb^ti.

[03] 651^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātītiādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ``jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavantī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.126; saṃ0 ni0 2.1; mahāva0 1; udā0 1; netti0 24) sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. tenāha ^b^``jātiādīna''^eb^ntiādi. upapattibhavuppattiyeva ^a^V2.0314^ea^ jātīti āha ^b^``na upapattibhavo''^eb^ti. jāyamānassa pana jāti jātīti upapattibhavopi asati abhāvā jātiyā paccayoti sakkā vattuṃ. jāyamānarūpapadaṭṭhānatāpi hi rūpajātiyā vuttā ``upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno upacayo, anuppabandharūpapadaṭṭhānā santatī''ti (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 641).

[03] jātānaṃ khandhānaṃ uññātatā, abhimatatā ca ^b^hīnapaṇītatā^eb^. aniṭṭhañhi hīnaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ paṇītaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇahīnuttamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^yamakānampi sata^eb^nti yamakabhāvena nibbattānampi samānānaṃ. ^b^so ca^eb^ sattānaṃ viseso. bhinnasantānikassa visesakāraṇassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato ^b^``ajjhattasantāne''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvato^eb^ti attasantānagatato aññassa visesakāraṇassa anupalabbhamānattā, sati ca tasmiṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ abhāvatoti pasaṅgassa dunnivāraṇato kāraṇe avisiṭṭhe phalavisesassa ayujjamānakattā. tenāha ^b^``kammabhavahetukovā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^tena tenā^eb^ti ñātibyasanādinā jarāmaraṇato aññena dukkhadhammena. jarāmaraṇanimittañhi uppannā sokādayo jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā, tadaññe anabhisambandhā. ^b^upanissayakoṭiyā^eb^ti upanissayaṃsena, upanissayalesenāti ^a^M2.0335^ea^ attho. yo hi paṭṭhāne anāgato sati bhāvā, asati ca abhāvā suttantapariyāyena upanissayo, so ``upanissayakoṭī''ti vuccati. paccayamahāpadeso kireso, yadidaṃ upanissayoti.

[03] 652^b^.^eb^ na kevalaṃ sokādīnaṃyeva jāti paccayo hoti, sokādīnaṃ pana paccayattā avijjāyapi paccayo evāti dassetuṃ ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^etthā^eb^ti paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyaṃ. ^b^aviditādi mida^eb^nti ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^satata^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ yāva aggamaggādhigamā. ^b^samita^eb^nti saṅgataṃ, abbocchinnanti attho.
[03] ^b^tesū^eb^ti sokādīsu. ^b^siddhesū^eb^ti labbhamānesu. ^b^siddhā hoti avijjā^eb^ avinābhāvato.

[03] ^b^kāmayānassā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0315^ea^ kāmayamānassa, kāmo vā yānaṃ etassāti ^b^kāmayāno,^eb^ tassa kāmavasena yāyamānassāti attho. ^b^chandajātassā^eb^ti jātataṇhāchandassa. ^b^parihāyantī^eb^ti vigacchanti. ^b^ruppatī^eb^ti sokādinā kuppati.

[03] pariyuṭṭhānatāya tiṭṭhanasīlo ^b^pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhāyī^eb^. ``pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino''ti vā pāṭho. tattha pariyuṭṭhātīti pariyuṭṭhaṃ, diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ, tena tiṭṭhatīti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyīti attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^pañca pubbanimittānī^eb^ti ``mālā milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, kāye vevaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati, devo devāsane nābhiramatī''ti (itivu0 83) vuttāni pañca maraṇapubbanimittānīti attho. tāni hi disvā kammanibbattakkhandhasaṅkhāte upapattibhave bhavacchandabalena devānaṃ balavasoko uppajjatīti.
[03] ^b^bālo^eb^ti avidvā. tena avijjāya kāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^tividhaṃ dukkha^eb^nti tassāruppakathāsavana, kammakāraṇādassana, maraṇakālakammopaṭṭhānanidānaṃ sokādidukkhaṃ.
[03] ^b^āsave sādhentī^eb^ti āsave gamenti bodhentīti attho.

[01] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0336^ea^ ^b^satī^eb^ti evaṃ bhavacakkassa aviditāditāya anādibhāve sati. ^b^ādimattakathana^eb^nti avijjāvasena ādisabbhāvakathanaṃ. ādi etassa atthīti hi ādimaṃ, bhavacakkaṃ. tassa bhāvo ādimattaṃ, tassa kathanaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ. visesanivattiattho vā mattasaddo, sati anādibhāve avijjā ādimhi, majjhe, pariyosāne ca sabbattha siyāti ādimattāya avijjāya kathanaṃ virujjhatīti attho. ``avijjā padhānā''ti vatvā tassā padhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``avijjāggahaṇenā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^avijjāggahaṇenā^eb^ti avijjāya uppādanena, appahānena vā, attano santāne sannihitabhāvakaraṇenāti attho. ^b^kammādīnī^eb^ti kammavipākavaṭṭāni. ^b^palibodhentī^eb^ti nānādukkhaparibyūḷhe saṃsāracārake nirodhenti. ^b^tehī^eb^ti kilesakammavipākavaṭṭehi. vaṭṭassa kāraṇabhāvena padhānattā ^b^``padhānadhammo''^eb^ti avijjā kathitā.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ avijjādito. ^b^brahmādinā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pajāpatissarapurisādike saṅgaṇhāti. vadatīti ^a^V2.0316^ea^ ^b^vado,^eb^ taṃ taṃ hitāhitaṃ pavattāti attho. vedeti, vediyatīti vā ^b^vedeyyo,^eb^ sukhādiṃ anubhavati, sabbavisaye vā jānāti, ``sukhito dukkhito''tiādinā attanā, parehi ca jānāti, ñāyati cāti attho. ^b^brahmādinā vā attanā vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo ^b^ca^eb^-saddattho. tenāha ^b^``kārakavedakarahita''^eb^nti ca-saddatthasamāsaṃ.

[03] ^b^dvādasavidhasuññatāsuñña^eb^nti avijjādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ suññasabhāvānaṃ suññatāya suññaṃ dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññaṃ, dhuvabhāvādisuññatāya vā catubbidhampi suññataṃ ekaṃ katvā dvādasaṅgagatattā dvādasavidhāti tāya dvādasasuññatāya suññanti attho.

[03] 653^b^.^eb^ ^b^pubbantāharaṇato^eb^ti pubbantato atītakoṭṭhāsato paccuppannavipākassa āharaṇato. vedanāvasānaṃ paricchinnaṃ ekaṃ bhavacakkaṃ hoti. bhavacakkekadesopi hi bhavacakkanti vuccati. vedanā vā taṇhāsahāyāya avijjāya paccayo hotīti vedanāto avijjā, avijjāto saṅkhārāti sambajjhanato vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkaṃ paripuṇṇamevāti ^a^M2.0337^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. avijjāggahaṇena vā taṇhupādānāni tadavinābhāvato. saṅkhāraggahaṇena bhavo, viññāṇādiggahaṇena jātijarāmaraṇāni, sokādayo ca gahitāti evampi vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkanti yuttamevetaṃ. evaṃ taṇhāmūlake ca yojetabbaṃ. dvinnampi hi aññamaññānuppaveso hotīti. avijjā dhammasabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā viparītābhinivesaṃ kārentī diṭṭhicarite saṃsāre nayati, tesaṃ vā saṃsāraṃ saṅkhārādipavattiṃ nayati pavattetīti ^b^saṃsāranāyikā^eb^ vuttā. taṇhāya taṇhācaritānaṃ saṃsāranāyikābhāve vattabbameva natthi.

[03] ^b^paṭhamaṃ^eb^ bhavacakkaṃ. ^b^phaluppattiyā^eb^ti kattuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, karaṇatthe eva vā. viññāṇādipaccuppannaphaluppatti hi idha diṭṭhā, adiṭṭhānaṃ purimabhave attano hetūnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ phalaṃ anuppādetvā anupacchijjanaṃ pakāseti, pakāsanassa vā karaṇaṃ hotīti. atha vā purimabhavacakkaṃ dutiyena sambandhaṃ vuttanti vedanāsaṅkhātassa phalassa uppattiyā taṇhādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ anupacchedaṃ pakāseti, tasmā phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya paṭhamassa bhavacakkassa hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanatoti attho. saṅkhārādīnameva vā phalānaṃ uppattiyā avijjādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ phalaṃ ajanetvā anupacchedameva, viññāṇādihetūnaṃ vā saṅkhārādīnaṃ anuppabandhameva pakāseti paṭhamaṃ bhavacakkaṃ, na dutiyaṃ viya pariyosānampīti ^b^``phaluppattiyā hetūnaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0317^ea^ ^b^anupacchedappakāsanato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^anupubbapavattidīpanatoti^eb^ ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.126; saṃ0 ni0 2.1; udā0 1) dhammānaṃ anupubbato pavattiyā dīpanato. ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa''nti hi ettha aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ kalalarūpaṃ vatvā tato uddhaṃ ``nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana''nti saḷāyatanappavatti vuttā. ^b^sahuppattidīpanato^eb^ti ``upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jātī''ti vā upapattikkhandhānaṃ ekajjhaṃ uppattiyā dīpanato. na hi ettha paṭhame viya bhavacakke āyatanānaṃ kamena uppatti vuttā.

[03] 654^b^.^eb^ hetuādipubbakā tayo sandhī etassāti ^b^hetuphalahetupubbakatisandhi,^eb^ bhavacakkaṃ. hetuphalahetuphalavasena catuppabhedo aṅgānaṃ saṅgaho etassāti ^b^catubhedasaṅgahaṃ^eb^. sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ ^a^M2.0338^ea^ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ^b^ākārā^eb^. atītahetuādīnaṃ vā pakārā ^b^ākārā^eb^. kilesakammavipākā vipākakilesakammehi sambandhā hutvā punappunaṃ parivattantīti tesu vaṭṭanāmaṃ āropetvā ^b^``tivaṭṭa''^eb^nti vuttaṃ, vaṭṭekadesattā vā ``vaṭṭānī''ti vuttāni.
[03] ^b^sandhīnaṃ ādipariyosānavavatthitā^eb^ti sandhīnaṃ pubbāparavavatthitāti attho.
[03] ^b^paritassatī^eb^ti taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ pariggahakaraṇavasena tassati, taṇhāyatīti attho. ^b^upādiyatī^eb^ti daḷhagāhaṃ gaṇhāti. ^b^purimakammabhavasmi^eb^nti purimakammabhave sati.

[03] tassa ca sabbhāvo kariyamānatā evāti āha ^b^``kammabhave kariyamāneti attho''^eb^ti. ^b^dukkhādīsu moho^eb^ti dukkhādīnaṃ ādīnavapaṭicchādako appahīno moho. ^b^āyūhanā^eb^ti sampiṇḍanakā dānādikiriyāya pavattanakā. ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ etesanti ekāvajjanā, tesu ^b^ekāvajjanesu. sattame^eb^ cetanā ^b^bhavo. ``yā kāci vā pana cetanā bhavo, sampayuttā āyūhanā saṅkhārā''^eb^ti idaṃ yathādassitāya dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇabhājanīye vuttāya paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā (paṭi0 ma0 1.45) vasena vuttaṃ. tattha hi ``cetanā bhavo''ti āgatā. bhavaniddese pana ^b^``sātthato''^eb^ti ettha ``cetanāva saṅkhārā, bhavo pana cetanāsampayuttāpī''ti ^b^vibhaṅgapāḷi^eb^vasena dassitaṃ. ``tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro? kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā''tiādinā hi saṅkhārānaṃ ^a^V2.0318^ea^ cetanābhāvo ^b^vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 226) vutto. tattha ^b^paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``cetanāsampayuttā vipākadhammattā savipākena āyūhanasaṅkhātena saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena saṅkhārā''ti vuttā. ^b^vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo''ti (vibha0 234) bhavassa paccayabhāvena bhavagāmibhāvato, kammasaṃsaṭṭhasahāyatāya kammabhāvato ca upapattibhavaṃ bhāventīti ``bhavo''ti vuttā. upapattibhavabhāvanākiccaṃ pana cetanāya sātisayanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā cetanā ``bhavo''ti vuttā. bhavābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ cetanāya sātisayanti vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ ``kusalā cetanā''tiādinā (vibha0 226) cetanā ``saṅkhārā''ti vuttā. tasmā tena tena pariyāyena ^a^M2.0339^ea^ ubhayaṃ ubhayattha vattuṃ yuttanti natthettha virodho. ^b^tassa phale upapattibhave nikāmanā^eb^ti ``tassa sutaṃ hoti `cātumahārājikā devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā'ti''ādisutānusārena bhāvini upapattibhave abhikaṅkhanā. ^b^gahaṇa^eb^nti kāmupādānaṃ kiccenāha. ^b^parāmasana^eb^nti itarāni. ^b^āyūhanāvasāne^eb^ti tīsupi atthavikappesu vuttassa āyūhanassa avasāne.

[03] ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave. bhavantarassa atītabhavassa iminā paccuppannabhavena paṭisandhānaṃ ^b^bhavantarapaṭisandhānaṃ,^eb^ bhavantarabhāvena vā paṭisandhānaṃ ^b^bhavantarapaṭisandhānaṃ,^eb^ tassa vasena. yaṃ paṭisandhīti vuccati, taṃ viññāṇanti sambandho. tathā hi viññāṇaṃ ``paṭisandhānapaccupaṭṭhāna''nti vuccati. ^b^gabbhe^eb^ti mātukucchiyaṃ, gabbhāvatthāyaṃ vā.

[03] dvīsu atthavikappesu vutte āyūhanasaṅkhāre ^b^``tassa pubbabhāgā''^eb^ti āha, tatiye atthavikappe vutte ^b^``taṃsampayuttā''^eb^ti. taṃsampayuttā avijjā gahitāva hotīti sambandho. daharassa cittappavatti bhavaṅgabahulā yebhuyyena bhavantarajanakakammāyūhanasamatthā na hotīti ^b^``idha paṭipakkattā āyatanāna''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^``kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito''^eb^ti etena kammassa paccayabhūtaṃ sammohaṃ dasseti, na kammasampayuttameva.

[03] ``tattha purimabhavasmiṃ pañca kammasambhārā, etarahi pañca vipākadhammā, etarahi pañca kammasambhārā, anāgate pañca vipākadhammāti dasa dhammā kammaṃ, dasa dhammā vipāko, iti dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ, kammavaṭṭaṃ, dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko, vipākavaṭṭanti kammasaṅkhepo ca vipākasaṅkhepo ^a^V2.0319^ea^ ca, kammabhavo ca vipākabhavo ca kammavaṭṭañca vipākavaṭṭañca, kammapavattañca vipākapavattañca, kammasantati ca vipākasantati ca, kiriyā ceva kiriyāphalañcāti --
[21] ``evaṃ samuppannamidaṃ sahetukaṃ,
[27] dukkhaṃ aniccaṃ calamittaraddhuvaṃ.
[26] dhammehi dhammā pabhavanti hetuso,
[22] na hettha attāva parova vijjati..
[21] ``dhammā dhamme sañjanenti, hetusambhārapaccayā.
[22] hetūnañca nirodhāya, dhammo buddhena desito..
[21] ``hetūsu ^a^M2.0340^ea^ uparuddhesu, chinnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ na vaṭṭati.
[27] evaṃ dukkhantakiriyāya, brahmacariyidha vijjati.
[22] satte ca nupalabbhante, nevucchedo na sassata''nti.. (vibha0 aṭṭha0 242).

[03] tattha kammāneva vipākaṃ sambharanti vaḍḍhentīti ^b^kammasambhārā,^eb^ kammaṃ vā saṅkhārabhavā, tadupakārakāni avijjātaṇhupādānāni ^b^kammasambhārā^eb^. paṭisandhidāyako vā bhavo kammaṃ, tadūpakārakā yathāvuttā āyūhanasaṅkhārā, avijjādayo ca ^b^kammasambhārā^eb^ti kammañca kammasambhārā ca ^b^kammasambhārā^eb^ti ekasesavasena kammasambhāraggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^dasa dhammā kamma^eb^nti avijjādayopi kammasahāyatāya kammasarikkhakā, tadūpakārā cāti ``kamma''nti vuttā. saṅkhippanti ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti ^b^saṅkhepo,^eb^ kammaṃ, vipāko ca. ``kammaṃ vipāko''ti evaṃ saṅkhipīyatīti vā ^b^saṅkhepo,^eb^ avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo ca. saṅkhepabhāvasāmaññena pana ekavacanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, saṅkhepasaddo vā bhāgādhivacananti kammabhāgo ^b^kammasaṅkhepo^eb^.

[03] ^b^evaṃ samuppanna^eb^nti kammatopi vipāko. tatthāpi ``avijjāto saṅkhārā''ti evaṃ samuppannaṃ, tisandhiādivasena vā samuppannaṃ idaṃ bhavacakkanti attho. ^b^ittara^eb^nti gamanadhammaṃ, vinassadhammanti ^a^V2.0320^ea^ attho. tena uppādavayavantatādīpakena ^b^anicca^eb^saddena, vikārāpattidīpakena ^b^cala^eb^saddena ca adīpitaṃ kālantaraṭṭhāyitābhāvaṃ vibhāveti. ^b^addhuva^eb^nti etena thirabhāvābhāvanissārataṃ. hetu eva sambhārā ^b^hetusambhārā^eb^. ``ṭhānaso hetuso''ti (kathā0 355; paṭi0 ma0 1.44) ettha evaṃ vuttaṃ vā ṭhānaṃ, aññampi tassa tassa sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ ^b^sambhāro,^eb^ asādhāraṇaṃ ^b^hetu. eva^eb^nti evaṃ hetuto dhammamattasambhave, hetunirodhā ca vaṭṭacchede dhamme ca taṃnirodhāya desite satīti attho. brahmacariyaṃ idha ^b^brahmacariyidha satte cā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo ``evaṃ brahmacariyañca vijjati, sassatucchedā ca na hontī''ti samuccayattho. evañhi hetuāyatte dhammamattasambhave satto nupalabbhati, tasmiñca upalabbhante sassato, ucchedo vā siyāti nupalabbhante tasmiṃ neva ucchedo na sassatanti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03] 655^b^.^eb^ ^b^saccappabhavato^eb^ti saccato, saccānaṃ vā pabhavato ca.

[03] ^b^kusalākusalaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0341^ea^ ^b^kamma^eb^nti vaṭṭakathāya vattamānattā sāsavanti viññāyati. ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti ``cetanā cetanāsampayuttakā''ti visesaṃ akatvā, sabbampi taṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ samudayasaccanti vuttanti attho. ``taṇhā ca...pe0... avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā''ti (vibha0 208-210) hi cetanācetanāsampayuttavisesaṃ akatvā vuttanti, ariyasaccavisesaṃ vā akatvā samudayasaccanti vuttanti attho. ^b^saccavibhaṅge^eb^ hi sabbepi kilesā sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ ``samudayasacca''nti vuttaṃ. dutiyasaccaṃ pabhavo etassāti ^b^dutiyasaccapabhavaṃ^eb^. upādānapaccayā bhavoti upapattibhavassa, kammabhavassa ca adhippetattā vuttaṃ ^b^``paṭhamadutiyasaccadvaya''^eb^nti.

[03] 656^b^.^eb^ ^b^vatthūsū^eb^ti ārammaṇesu, dukkhādīsu vā paṭicchādetabbesu vatthūsu. ^b^sammohetī^eb^ti dhammasabhāvaṃ jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ adentī tassa paṭicchādanavasena sammoheti. ^b^vatthu^eb^nti idha ārammaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^aññamaññañca upatthambheti^eb^ aññamaññasannissayena vinā ṭhātuṃ asakkontā dve naḷakalāpā viya. ^b^savisaye^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ visaye rūpāyatanādike. jāyamānānaṃ khandhānaṃ vikārabhāvena labbhamānā jāti te janentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``khandhe ca janetī''^eb^ti. tenāha ^b^``tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvena pavattattā''^eb^ti. ^b^pākabhedabhāvañca adhitiṭṭhatī^eb^ti etthāpi ``khandhe janetī''ti ettha vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo. pākabhedavasena vattaticceva attho ^a^V2.0321^ea^. paccatīti pāko, bhijjatīti bhedo, pāko ca bhedo ca ^b^pākabhedaṃ,^eb^ tassa bhāvaṃ paccanaṃ, bhijjanañcāti attho. ^b^sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā^eb^ti tesaṃ kāraṇattā, tehi siddhāya avijjāya sahitehi saṅkhārehi paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyāti adhippāyo. cuticittaṃ vā paṭisandhiviññāṇassa anantarapaccayo hotīti ^b^``paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. taṃ pana cuticittaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārarahitaṃ bhavantarassa paccayo na hotīti sasahāyattadassanatthamāha ^b^``sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā''^eb^ti. ^b^dvedhā^eb^ti attano attano sarasena, dhammantarapaccayabhāvena cāti dvedhā dvedhā. byāpanicchālopena hi niddeso.

[03] 657^b^.^eb^ ^b^``avijjāpaccayā^eb^ ^a^M2.0342^ea^ ^b^saṅkhārā''^eb^ti etena saṅkhārānaṃ paccayuppannatādassanena ``ko nu kho abhisaṅkharotīti esa no kallo pañho''ti dasseti, tenetaṃ kārakadassananivāraṇaṃ. attā bhavato bhavantaraṃ saṅkamatīti dassanaṃ ^b^attasaṅkantidassanaṃ,^eb^ taṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇuppattivacanena nivāritaṃ hoti. pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ abhedato eko attāti gahaṇaṃ ^b^ghanasaññā,^eb^ taṃ yamakatālakandaṃ bhindantena viya ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamattameta''nti vacanena nivāritaṃ hoti. ^b^``evamādidassananivāraṇa''^eb^nti etena ``socati paridevati dukkhito''tiādidassananivāraṇamāha. sokādayopi hi paccayāyattā avasavattinoti ``jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ soka...pe0... sambhavantī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.126; saṃ0 ni0 2.1; udā0 1) etena vuttamevāti. ^b^micchādassananivāraṇatopī^eb^ti kārakadassanādinānāvidhamicchābhinivesanivāraṇatopi.

[03] 658^b^.^eb^ ^b^``salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasenā''^eb^ti etena sabbappakārena dhammānaṃ yāthāvato adassanamāha tadubhayavinimuttassa dhammesu paramatthato passitabbabhāvassa abhāvato. ^b^upakkhalanaṃ viya^eb^ dukkhuppattihetuto. ^b^patanaṃ viya^eb^ bhavantarapapātato. ^b^gaṇḍapātubhāvo viya^eb^ dukkhatāsūlayogato, kilesāsucipaggharaṇato ca. ^b^gaṇḍabhedapīḷakā viyā^eb^ti bhedanatthaṃ paccamāne gaṇḍe tassa upari jāyamānā khuddakapīḷakā viya, gaṇḍassa vā anekadhābhede pīḷakā viya. ^b^ghaṭṭanaṃ viya^eb^ saṅghaṭṭanarasatāya phasso. ^b^ghaṭṭanadukkhaṃ viyā^eb^ti ghaṭṭanato jātaṃ dukkhaṃ viya tividhadukkhatāvasena tissannampi vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvato. ^b^paṭikārābhilāso viyā^eb^ti samudāyassa ekadesanidassanabhāvenāha. ^b^asappāyaggahaṇaṃ viya^eb^ bahuvidhānatthuppattinimittato. ^b^asappāyalepanaṃ viya^eb^ dukkhahetuno sasantāne sannidhāpanato. ^b^gaṇḍavikārapātubhāvo viya^eb^ attabhāvagaṇḍassa nibbattivikārabhāvato ^a^V2.0322^ea^, tannimittañcassa sūnabhāvādisambhavato. sūnatāsarāgapubbaggahaṇādayo hi ^b^gaṇḍavikārā^eb^. sarasato gaṇḍassa bhijjanaṃ pākena vinā na hotīti bhedaggahaṇenevassa pākopi gahitoti katvā āha ^b^``gaṇḍabhedo viya jarāmaraṇa''^eb^nti. gaṇḍassa vā visadisāpatti, bhijjanañca ^b^gaṇḍabhedo,^eb^ tattha visadisāpatti pākoti veditabbaṃ.

[03] upamāhi ^a^M2.0343^ea^ bhavacakkaṃ viññāpentena ekādhiṭṭhānehi upamāvisesehi taṃ viññāpetvā idāni nānādhiṭṭhānehi viññāpetuṃ ^b^``yasmā vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha paṭalābhibhūtacakkhuko rūpāni na passati, kiñci passantopi viparītaṃ passati, evaṃ avijjābhibhūto dukkhādīni na paṭipajjati na passati, micchā vā paṭipajjatīti ^b^paṭalaṃ viya avijjā. kosakārakimi viya^eb^ attanāva katattā, vaṭṭassa attano eva paribbhamanakāraṇattā ca ^b^kosappadesā viya saṅkhārā^eb^. saṅkhārapariggahaṃ vinā patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānaṃ ^b^viññāṇaṃ^eb^ pariṇāyakapariggahaṃ vinā patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamāno ^b^rājakumāro viyā^eb^ti pariggahena vinā patiṭṭhālābho ettha upamopameyyasāmaññaṃ. ^b^upapattinimitta^eb^nti kammādiārammaṇamāha. ^b^parikappanato^eb^ti ārammaṇakaraṇato, sampayuttena vā vitakkena vitakkanato. devamanussamigavihaṅgādivividhappakāratāya ^b^māyā viya nāmarūpaṃ^eb^. patiṭṭhāvisesena vuddhivisesāpattito ^b^vanappagumbo viya saḷāyatanaṃ^eb^. āyatanānaṃ visayivisayabhūtānaṃ aññamaññābhimukhabhāvo ^b^āyatanaghaṭṭanaṃ^eb^. tato āyatanaghaṭṭanato dvayasaṅghaṭṭanuppattito, vedanādukkhahetuto ca ^b^aggi viya phasso^eb^. sapariḷāhato ^b^dāho viya vedanā^eb^. uparūpari taṇhāpavaḍḍhanato loṇūdakapānaṃ viya visayānubhavanaṃ. ārammaṇe pātukamyatābhāvato ^b^pipāsā viya taṇhā. tadassupādāna^eb^nti taṃ abhilāsakaraṇaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanaṃ assa taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa, tadassa vā bhaveyya upādānaṃ. byasanāvahatāya ajānanato bhavupādānaṃ macchassa baḷisupādānaṃ viya. ettha ca saṅkhārādīnaṃ kosappadesapariṇāyakādīhi dvīhi dvīhi sadisatāya dve dve upamā vuttāti veditabbā.

[03] 659^b^.^eb^ koci agambhīro eva gambhīro viya khāyati purāṇatiṇapaṇṇādibharito pabbatasaṅkhepe jalāsayo viya, na evamayaṃ. ayaṃ pana gambhīrova hutvā obhāsati pakāsati dissatīti ^b^gambhīrāvabhāso. yathāraha^eb^nti atthādivasena yathānurūpaṃ.

[01] jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na na hoti, hoti evāti avadhāraṇe siddhe ``siyā nu kho jarāmaraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0323^ea^ jātito, aññatopī''ti āsaṅkāyaṃ tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ ^b^``na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha aññaggahaṇaṃ jātiyā paṭiyogīvisayaṃ, na aññamattavisayaṃ ^a^M2.0344^ea^ ``jātiṃ vinā''ti vacanato. tenassa nāññaṃ jātiyā sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ nivattitaṃ hoti. esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^ittha^eb^nti idaṃ pakāraṃ, iminā pakārenāti attho. ^b^jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho^eb^ti jātipaccayasambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ uddhaṃ āgatabhāvo, anuppavattaṭṭhoti attho. atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca ^b^sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho^eb^. ``na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotī''ti hi jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho vutto. ^b^itthañca jātito samudāgacchatī^eb^ti jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭho, yā yā jāti yathā yathā paccayo hoti, tadanurūpapātubhāvoti attho.

[03] tattha ``na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī''ti iminā jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayatāya avitathataṃ dasseti, ``na jātiṃ vinā aññato jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī''ti iminā anaññathattaṃ, ``itthañca jātito samudāgacchatī''ti iminā tathataṃ. tena ca yathā paccayadhammā attano paccayuppannānaṃ paccayabhāve, tathā avitathā anaññathā, evaṃ paccayuppannadhammāpi tabbhāveti dasseti. esa nayo sesesupi. ``hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā''ti etena vacanena atthassa hetuphalabhāvo kathaṃ ñātabboti? ``atthapaṭisambhidā''ti etassa samāsapadassa avayavapadatthaṃ dassentena ``hetuphale ñāṇa''nti vuttattā. ``atthe paṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā''ti ettha hi ``atthe''ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena ``hetuphale''ti vuttaṃ, ``paṭisambhidā''ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena ``ñāṇa''nti, tasmā hetuphalātthasaddā ekatthā, ñāṇapaṭisambhidā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito atthassa hetuphalabhāvo.

[03] ^b^yenākārenā^eb^ti yena pavattiākārena. sabhāvadhammā hi paccayavisesasiddhena pavattiākārena visiṭṭhākārā honti. tenāha ``sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī''ti (mahāni0 156; cūḷani0 mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85). ^b^yadavatthā^eb^ti yāya avatthāya avatthitā. avatthāvisesavanto hi dhammā tena tena avatthāvisesena taṃ taṃ atthakiccaṃ sādhetuṃ samatthā honti. svāyaṃ pavattiākāro, avatthāviseso ca avijjāyapi anupacitakusalasambhārehi duravabodhato eva ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho ^a^M2.0345^ea^ ^a^V2.0324^ea^ cāti āha ^b^``tassa...pe0... gambhīro''^eb^ti. ^b^tassa^eb^ ākārassa, avatthāya ca. ^b^hetumhi ñāṇa^eb^nti ettha hetuno dhammapariyāyatā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti paṭiccasamuppādassa. ^b^tena tena kāraṇenā^eb^ti tena tena veneyyānaṃ bujjhanānuguṇatāsaṅkhātena kāraṇena. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ desanappakāre. ^b^anulomapaṭilomato^eb^ti nayidha paccayuppādā paccayuppannuppādasaṅkhātaṃ anulomaṃ, paccayanirodhā paccayuppannanirodhasaṅkhātañca paṭilomamāha. ādito pana antagamanamanulomaṃ, antato ca ādigamanaṃ paṭilomamāha. ādito paṭṭhāya anulomadesanāya, antato paṭṭhāya paṭilomadesanāya ca ^b^tisandhicatusaṅkhepaṃ^eb^. ``ime cattāro āhārā kiṃnidānā''tiādikāya (saṃ0 ni0 2.11) vemajjhato paṭṭhāya paṭilomadesanāya, ``cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā''tiādikāya (ma0 ni0 1.204, 400; ma0 ni0 3.421, 425-426; saṃ0 ni0 2.43-45; 2.4.60; kathā0 465, 467) anulomadesanāya ca ^b^dvisandhitisaṅkhepaṃ^eb^. ``saṃyojanīyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, taṇhāpaccayā upādāna''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 2.53, 57) ^b^ekasandhidvisaṅkhepaṃ^eb^. katthaci ekaṅgopi ca paṭiccasamuppādo desito, so ``tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 2.62) dassito eva.

[03] avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvo paṭivijjhīyatīti ^b^paṭivedho^eb^. vuttaṃ hetaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo paṭivedho''ti (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā). jānanalakkhaṇassa ñāṇassa paṭipakkhabhūto avijjāya ^b^aññāṇaṭṭho^eb^. ārammaṇassa paccakkhakaraṇena dassanabhūtassa paṭipakkhabhūto ^b^adassanaṭṭho^eb^. yena panesā dukkhādīnaṃ yāthāvasarasaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti, chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati, so tassā ^b^saccāsampaṭivedhaṭṭho^eb^. apuññābhisaṅkhārekadeso ^b^sarāgo,^eb^ añño ^b^virāgo^eb^. rāgassa vā apaṭipakkhabhāvato rāgapavaḍḍhako apuññābhisaṅkhāro sabbopi ^b^sarāgo,^eb^ itaro ^a^M2.0346^ea^ tappaṭipakkhabhāvato ^b^virāgo^eb^. ``dīgharattaṃ hetaṃ, bhikkhave, assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ `etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.62) attaparāmāsassa viññāṇaṃ visesato vatthu vuttanti viññāṇassa ^b^suññataṭṭho^eb^ gambhīro. attā vijānāti saṃsaratīti sabyāpāratāsaṅkanti abhinivesabalavatāya ^b^abyāpāraṭṭhāsaṅkantipaṭisandhipātubhāvaṭṭhā^eb^ ^a^V2.0325^ea^ ca gambhīrā. ^b^nāmarūpassa^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe ^b^ekuppādo,^eb^ pavattiyaṃ visuṃ visuṃ yathārahaṃ ^b^ekuppādo,^eb^ nāmassa rūpena, rūpassa ca nāmena asampayogato ^b^vinibbhogo,^eb^ nāmassa nāmena, rūpassa ca rūpena, ekaccassa ekaccena ^b^avinibbhogo^eb^ yojetabbo. ekuppādekanirodhe hi avinibbhoge adhippete so rūpassa ca ekakalāpavuttino labbhati. atha vā ekacatuvokārabhavesu nāmarūpānaṃ asahavattanato aññamaññavinibbhogo, pañcavokārabhave sahavattanato avinibbhogo ca veditabbo.

[03] ^b^adhipatiyaṭṭho^eb^ nāma idha indriyapaccayabhāvo. ``lokopeso dvārāpesā khettampeta''nti (dha0 sa0 598-599) vuttā ^b^lokādiatthā^eb^ cakkhādīsu pañcasu yojetabbā. manāyatanassāpi lujjanato, manosamphassādīnaṃ dvārakhettabhāvato ca ete atthā sambhavanti eva. āpāthagatānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ pakāsanayogyatālakkhaṇaṃ obhāsanaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ ^b^visayibhāvo,^eb^ manāyatanassa vijānanaṃ. ^b^saṅghaṭṭanaṭṭho^eb^ visesato cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ, itare channampi yojetabbā. phusanañca phassassa sabhāvo, saṅghaṭṭanaṃ raso, itare upaṭṭhānākārā. ^b^ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṭṭho^eb^ rasavasena vutto, ^b^vedayitaṭṭho^eb^ lakkhaṇavasena. sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāvā yathākkamaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ sabhāvavasena vuttā. attā vedayatīti abhinivesassa balavatāya ^b^nijjīvaṭṭho^eb^ vedanāya gambhīro. nijjīvāya vā vedanāya vedayitaṃ nijjīvavedayitaṃ, nijjīvavedayitameva attho ^b^nijjīvavedayitaṭṭho^eb^. sappītikataṇhāya ^b^abhinanditaṭṭho,^eb^ balavatarataṇhāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanaṃ ^b^ajjhosānaṭṭho^eb^. itaro sādhāraṇavasena veditabbo. ^b^ādānaggahaṇābhinivesaṭṭhā^eb^ catunnampi upādānānaṃ samānā, ^b^parāmāsaṭṭho^eb^ vutto diṭṭhupādānādīnameva, tathā ^b^duratikkamaṭṭho^eb^. ``diṭṭhikantāro''ti (dha0 sa0 392) hi vacanato diṭṭhīnaṃ duratikkamatā, daḷhaggahaṇattā ^a^M2.0347^ea^ vā catunnampi ^b^duratikkamaṭṭho^eb^ yojetabbo. duratikkamatāyapi hi taṇhāya ^b^samuddaṭṭho^eb^ vutto. ^b^yonigatiṭhitinivāsesukhipana^eb^nti samāse bhummavacanassa alopo daṭṭhabbo. evañhi tena āyūhanābhisaṅkharaṇapadānaṃ samāso hoti. jarāmaraṇaṅgaṃ maraṇappadhānanti maraṇaṭṭhā eva ^b^khayādayo^eb^ gambhīrāti dassitā. navanavānañhi khayena khaṇḍiccādiparipakkappavatti jarāti, khayaṭṭho vā jarāya vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. navabhāvāpagamo hi khayoti vattuṃ yuttoti. ^b^vipariṇāmaṭṭho^eb^ dvinnampi. santativasena vā jarāya khayavayabhāvo, sammutikhaṇikavasena maraṇassa bhedavipariṇāmatā yojetabbā.

[03] 660^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthanayā^eb^ti atthānaṃ nayā, avijjādiatthehi ekattādī sakena bhāvena nayanti gamentīti ^a^V2.0326^ea^ ekattādayo, tesaṃ nayāti vuttā. nīyantīti hi nayāti. atthā eva vā ekattādibhāvena nīyamānā ñāyamānā ^b^atthanayā^eb^ti vuttā. nīyanti etehīti vā nayā, ekattādīhi ca atthā ``eka''ntiādinā nīyanti, tasmā ekattādayo atthānaṃ nayāti ^b^atthanayā^eb^.

[03] ^b^aṅkurādibhāvenā^eb^ti aṅkurapattanāḷakhandhasākhāpallavapalāsādibhāvena pavattamāne avayave ekajjhaṃ gahetvā santānānupacchedena bījaṃ rukkhabhāvaṃ pattaṃ rukkhabhāvena pavattaṃ tañca ekattena vuccatīti ^b^santānānupacchedo^eb^ yathā ekattaṃ, evaṃ idhāpi avijjāsaṅkhārādihetuhetusamuppannānaṃ santānānupacchedo ekasantatipatitatā ^b^ekattanayo^eb^ti dasseti. ^b^``hetuphalasambandhenā''^eb^ti etena santānānupacchedaṃ vibhāveti. satipi hi hetuphalānaṃ paramatthato bhede hetubhāvena, phalabhāvena ca tesaṃ sambandhabhāvoyevettha ^b^santānānupacchedo,^eb^ yato yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ nibbattaṃ, tattheva phaluppattīti katassa vināso, akatassa abbhāgamo ca natthīti. ^b^ekattaggahaṇato^eb^ti hetuphalānaṃ bhedaṃ anupadhāretvā hetuṃ, phalañca abhinnaṃ katvā ubhinnaṃ ekabhāvassa abhedassa gahaṇena. ``tadeva viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratī''tiādinā ^b^sassatadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati^eb^.

[03] ^b^lakkhaṇavavatthāna^eb^nti sabhāvavavatthānaṃ hetuno, phalassa ca bhinnasabhāvatāvabodho. ^b^bhinnasantānassevā^eb^ti sambandharahitassa nānattassa gahaṇato ^a^M2.0348^ea^ añño mato, añño jāto, tasmā ``sattantaro ucchinno, sattantaro uppanno''ti gaṇhanto ^b^ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati^eb^.

[03] amhehi uppādetabbanti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^byāpārābhāvo^eb^ anabhisandhitāya abyāvaṭatā. ^b^sammā passanto^eb^ti ``nirīhā nijjīvā dhammamattā''ti passanto. sabhāvo eva niyamo ^b^sabhāvaniyamo^eb^ ``sasambhāraggino uddhamukhatā, sasambhāravāyuno tiriyagamana''nti evamādi viya. tena siddho yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannassa ^b^hetubhāvo^eb^. ``kassaci kattuno abhāvā na kāci kiriyā phalapabandhinī''ti ^b^akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati^eb^.

[03] ``khīrato dadhi, na udakato, tilato telaṃ, na vālikato''ti sabbato sabbasambhavābhāvadassanena ^b^ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ^eb^ hetuanurūpameva phalaṃ passanto ^b^akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. yato kutocī^eb^ti yadi aññasmā aññassa uppatti siyā, vālikato telassa, ucchuto khīrassa ^a^V2.0327^ea^ kasmā uppatti na siyā, tasmā na koci kassaci hetu atthīti ^b^ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ,^eb^ avijjamānepi hetumhi niyatatāya tilagāvīsukkasoṇitādīhi telakhīrasarīrādīni pavattantīti ^b^niyativādañca upādiyatī^eb^ti viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.

[03] 661^b^.^eb^ kasmā? yasmā idañhi bhavacakkaṃ apadāletvā saṃsārabhayamatīto na koci supinantarepi atthīti sambandho. ^b^agādhaṃ^eb^ appatiṭṭhaṃ ^b^duratiyānaṃ^eb^ duratikkamaṃ. ^b^asanivicakkamivā^eb^ti asanimaṇḍalamiva. tañhi nimmathanameva, nānimmathanaṃ pavattati, evaṃ bhavacakkampi ekantadukkhuppādanatova ^b^``niccanimmathana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ñāṇāsinā apadāletvā saṃsārabhayamatīto natthīti etassa sādhakasuttaṃ dassento ^b^``vuttampi ceta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tantūnaṃ ākulakaṃ tantākulakaṃ, tantākulakamiva jātā ^b^tantākulakajātā,^eb^ kilesakammavipākehi ativiya jaṭitāti attho. kuliyā sakuṇiyā nīḍaṃ kulikaṃ, taṃ viya jātā ^b^kulikuṇḍikajātā^eb^. muñcā viya, pabbajā viya ca bhūtā jātā ^b^muñjapabbajabhūtā^eb^. tadubhayaṃ ^a^M2.0349^ea^ kira tiṇaṃ ākulaṃ jaṭitaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhati. vaḍḍhiyā abhāvato ^b^apāyaṃ,^eb^ dukkhagatibhāvato ^b^duggatiṃ,^eb^ sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā ^b^vinipātañca,^eb^ catubbidhaṃ apāyaṃ ``khandhānañca paṭipāṭī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 2.619; dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.95 āpasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.2.60; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.4.199; vibha0 aṭṭha0 226 saṅkhārapadaniddesa; dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; su0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.523; udā0 aṭṭha0 39; itivu0 aṭṭha0 14, 58; theragā0 aṭṭha0 1.67, 99; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.1.117; cūḷani0 aṭṭha0 6; bu0 vaṃ0 aṭṭha0 2.58) vuttaṃ ^b^saṃsārañca nātivattati^eb^. saṃsāro eva vā sabbo idha vaḍḍhiapagamādiatthehi apāyādināmako vutto kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhabhāvato.
[06] paññābhūminiddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti sattarasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 662^b^.^eb^ yā ^a^M2.0350^ea^ ^a^V2.0328^ea^ visuddhiyo sampādetabbāti sambandho. ^b^imesu^eb^ yathāvicāritesu khandhādīsu vipassanāya ^b^bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu^eb^. ganthassa uggaṇhanaṃ vācuggatakaraṇaṃ ^b^uggaho,^eb^ parito sabbathāpi atthassa ñātumicchā ^b^paripucchā,^eb^ savanupaparikkhādivasena tadatthassa manasikāravidhi, tadubhayavasena yasmā tatthapi ñāṇaṃ svāsevitaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā''^eb^ti, khandhādīsu sutamayaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādetvāti attho. ^b^vitthāritameva,^eb^ tasmā tattha vitthāritanayānusārena sīlavisuddhi sampādetabbāti adhippāyo. upacārasamādhipi appanāsamādhi viya vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato cittavisuddhiyevāti āha ^b^``saupacārā''^eb^ti. ^b^veditabbā^eb^ti attano santāne nibbattanavaseneva veditabbā. evañhi tā paccakkhato viditā nāma honti, tasmā veditabbā sampādetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^veditabbā^eb^ti vā samāpattisukhādhigamavasena anubhavitabbāti attho. na hi kevalena jānanamattena cittavisuddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhito nāma hoti, na ca tattha apatiṭṭhāya uparivisuddhiṃ sampādetuṃ sakkāti.

[03] ^b^nāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvadassana^eb^nti nāmassa, rūpassa ca vibhajja yathābhūtasabhāvadassanaṃ. nāmaggahaṇena cettha vedanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ tebhūmakānaṃ khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, na ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa''nti ettha viya viññāṇaṃ vinā, nāpi ``nāmañca rūpañcā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.304, 352; dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 109) ettha viya sanibbānehi lokuttarakkhandhehi saddhinti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 663^b^.^eb^ yāti pajjati etenāti yānaṃ, samathova yānaṃ samathayānaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti samathayāniko. jhāne, jhānūpacāre vā patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tena ^b^samathayānikena^eb^ ^a^V2.0329^ea^. ^b^``ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana''^eb^nti idaṃ bhavaggadhammānaṃ ādikammikassa duppariggahatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇarasādivasena pariggahetabbā^eb^ ñāṇena paricchijja gahetabbā, pariggahavidhi pana ^b^khandhaniddese^eb^ (visuddhi0 2.421 ādayo) vuttā evāti adhippāyo. ārammaṇābhimukhanamanaṃ ārammaṇena vinā appavatti, tena namanaṭṭhena, nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena ^a^M2.0351^ea^ vā. vedanādayo hi arūpadhammā sabbadāpi ca phassādināmakattā pathavīādayo viya kesakumbhādināmantarānāpajjanato attanāva katanāmatāya nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^``nāma''^eb^nti vuccanti. atha vā adhivacanasamphasso viya adhivacanaṃ nāmaṃ antarena anupacitasambhārānaṃ gahaṇaṃ na gacchantīti nāmāyattaggahaṇatāya vedanādayo ^b^``nāma''^eb^nti vuccanti, rūpaṃ pana vināpi nāmasavanaṃ attano ruppanasabhāveneva gahaṇaṃ gacchati. ^b^vavatthāpetabba^eb^nti asaṅkarato ṭhapetabbaṃ, aññamaññaṃ, rūpena ca amissitaṃ katvā citte ṭhapetabbanti attho.

[03] nāmarūpapariggaho ca nāma yāvadeva tassa paṭinissajjanatthanti tadanurūpameva nidassanaṃ dassento ^b^``yathā nāmā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^ruppanato^eb^ti ettha ruppanaṭṭho ``sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppattī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 mahāṭī0 2.432) ^b^khandhaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttoyeva. evaṃ visuṃ nāmapariggahaṃ, rūpapariggahañca dassetvā idāni ekajjhaṃ nāmarūpapariggahaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tato namanalakkhaṇa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 664^b^.^eb^ iti arūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpamukhena taṃ dassento ^b^``suddhavipassanāyāniko panā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha samathayānikassa samathamukhena vipassanābhiniveso, vipassanāyānikassa pana samathaṃ anissāyāti āha ^b^``suddhavipassanāyāniko''^eb^ti, samathabhāvanāya amissitavipassanāyānavāti attho. ^b^ayameva vā samathayāniko^eb^ti yathāvutto samathayāniko eva vā. tena samathayānikassāpi rūpamukhena vipassanābhiniveso labbhati, na arūpamukhenevāti dasseti. ^b^tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhāna^eb^nti ``yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ, ayaṃ pathavīdhātū''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.308) saṅkhepamanasikārādivasena vuttesu terasasu dhātupariggahamukhesu. kammasamuṭṭhāno nāma keso cammabbhantaragato. ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva kammasamuṭṭhāne kese. kāyappasādassa viya bhāvassāpi sakalasarīrabyāpitāya ^b^``bhāvassa atthitāyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. puna ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva kesasaññite rūpasamudāye. ^b^aparānipī^eb^ti pubbe vuttāni kammasamuṭṭhānāni vīsati, imāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādīni catuvīsati ^a^V2.0330^ea^ rūpānīti sabbānipi ^b^catucattālīsa,^eb^ tañca ^a^M2.0352^ea^ kho tattha labbhamānasantatisīsasāmaññena veditabbaṃ. ^b^``catucattālīsā''^eb^ti ca idaṃ saddassa aniyatattā vuttaṃ. na hi sabbakālaṃ utucittato rūpaṃ uppajjantaṃ sasaddameva uppajjatīti. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā kese, evaṃ lomādīsu catusamuṭṭhānikesu. ^b^catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesū^eb^ti dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu vakkhamāne aṭṭha koṭṭhāse apanetvā catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesu. sedādīnaṃ ātapūpatāpādinā, cittavikārena ca uppajjanato te ^b^utucittasamuṭṭhānā^eb^ vuttā.

[03] dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsagatesu rūpesu pākaṭesu jātesu tadaññānipi pākaṭāni hontīti tānipi dassetuṃ ^b^``apare''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^apare dasa ākārā^eb^ti tejovāyokoṭṭhāsavasena apare dasa ākārā. ^b^kammaje^eb^ti bhūtakathanaṃ, na visesanaṃ asitādiparipācakassa tejassa akammajassa abhāvato. ^b^tathā cittaje^eb^ti ca ekantacittasamuṭṭhānattā assāsapassāsānanti keci, taṃ na, acittajasantāne pavattānaṃ utujabhāvato. abbhantaraṭṭhā eva hi te cittajā, na bahiddhā, tasmā tattha ^b^``cittaje''^eb^ti idaṃ visesanameva, ayañca attho heṭṭhā ānāpānakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva. ^b^sesesū^eb^ti santappanādivasena ceva uddhaṅgamādivasena ca pavattesu tejovāyokoṭṭhāsesu.

[03] cakkhudasakādīsu padhānarūpaṃ cakkhādayoti tesu labbhamānaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ avayavakiccaṃ samudāye āropetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``vatthudvāravasena pañca cakkhudasakādayo''^eb^ti. vatthuvasena hadayavatthudasakañcāti yojetabbaṃ, ekayoganiddiṭṭhānampi ekadeso anuvattatīti. ^b^sabbānipī^eb^ti yathāvuttagaṇanāyaṃ catunnavuticatusatādhikāni sahassarūparūpāni. koṭṭhāsāvayavānaṃ pana tadavayavakalāpānañca bhede gayhamāne ativiya tato bahutaro rūpabhedo hoti, so pana bhedo idha ādikammikassa duppariggahoti na gahetabbo.

[03] kāmaṃ vatthuvasenāpi arūpadhammā pākaṭā honti, dvāravasena pana pariggaho anākuloti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā^eb^ ^b^hontī''^eb^ti ^a^M2.0353^ea^. sabbasaṅgāhikavasena ^b^``ekāsīti lokiyacittānī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, lābhino eva pana mahaggatacittāni supākaṭāni honti. ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti sādhāraṇato. phassādayo hi satta cetasikā cakkhuviññāṇādīhipi uppajjanato sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā. ^b^sabbepi te^eb^ti ekāsīti lokiyacittāni, taṃsampayuttaphassādayoti ^a^V2.0331^ea^ sabbepi te arūpadhamme. ārammaṇādivibhāgena pana cittuppādabhede gayhamāne tato bahutaro eva hoti, so pana idha nādhippeto.

[03] 665^b^.^eb^ assa cakkhupasādassa nissayabhūtā pana catasso dhātuyoti sambandho. sahajātarūpāni tassa cakkhupasādassa icceva sambandho. ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva sasambhāracakkhupadese. ^b^anupādinnarūpānī^eb^ti pubbe vuttarūpānaṃ upādinnarūpattā vuttaṃ, akammajarūpānīti attho. ^b^sesānī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ cakkhuno vuttattā tato sesāni, tena pana saddhiṃ catupaññāsa rūpāni honti. cakkhudasakādīsu ekassapi aggahetabbato ^b^``avasesāni tecattālīsa rūpānī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. saddassa aniyatattā taṃ aggahetvā ``tecattālīsa rūpānī''ti vatvā puna utucittasamuṭṭhāne dve sadde gahetvā ^b^``pañcacattālīsā''^eb^ti kecivādo dassito.

[03] ^b^avasesarūpānī^eb^ti ``dasa dhātuyo''ti vutte dvādasa rūpadhamme ṭhapetvā avasesāni cha nipphannarūpāni. rūparūpāneva hi idha pariggayhanti, na rūpaparicchedavikāralakkhaṇāni. cakkhusannissayarūpārammaṇabhāvasāmaññena, cittabhāvasāmaññena ca kusalākusalavipākatāya duvidhampi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cittantveva vuttaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti iminā ``cakkhuṃ nissāyā''tiādinā vuttaṃ, avuttañca ``sotaṃ nissāyā''tiādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^manoviññāṇadhātū^eb^ti etthapi ``ekā''ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ ``ekā manoviññāṇadhātū''ti. aḍḍhena ekādasa ^b^aḍḍhekādasa,^eb^ aḍḍhaṃ vā ekādasamaṃ etāsanti ^b^aḍḍhekādasa. aḍḍhaṭṭhamā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
[03] 666^b^.^eb^ ^b^cakkhudhātuyaṃ vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``yaṃ loko setakaṇhamaṇḍalavicitta''ntiādinā (visuddhi0 2.665) vuttanayena.

[03] 667^b^.^eb^ ^b^idha bhikkhu imasmiṃ sarīre^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ vipassanābhinivesadassanavasena vuttaṃ. teneva hi ekasseva bhāvassa gahitattā ^b^``sattarasa^eb^ ^a^M2.0354^ea^ ^b^rūpāni sammasanupagānī''^eb^ti āha. sammasituṃ sakkuṇeyyāni sammasanaṃ upagacchantīti ^b^sammasanupagāni,^eb^ sammasanīyānīti attho. ^b^ākāra^eb^-ggahaṇena viññattidvayaṃ vuttaṃ, ^b^vikāra^eb^-ggahaṇena lahutādittayaṃ, itarena ākāsadhātūti vadanti. ^b^ākāra^eb^-ggahaṇena pana viññattidvayena saddhiṃ lakkhaṇarūpamāha. tampi hi rūpānaṃ uppajjanādiākāramattanti. ^b^antaraparicchedo^eb^ti taṃtaṃkalāpānaṃ asaṅkarakāraṇatāya antarabhūto paricchedo ^a^V2.0332^ea^. yadi na sammasanupagāni, ākārādimattāni ca, kathaṃ rūpānīti āha ^b^``apica kho''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 668^b^.^eb^ evaṃ dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena vitthārato rūpapariggahaṃ tadanusārena vitthārato eva nāmapariggahaṃ vibhāvetvā tato saṃkhittasaṃkhittatarasaṃkhittatamavasena, aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena, dvādasāyatanavasena, pañcakkhandhavasena ca rūpārūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā atisaṃkhittanayenāpi dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ kiñci rūpa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] yathā ca dhātuādivasena, evaṃ indriyasaccapaṭiccasamuppādavasenapi rūpārūpapariggaho veditabbo. kathaṃ? indriyavasena tāva cakkhādīni pañca, itthipurisindriyāni cāti satta indriyāni rūpaṃ, manindriyaṃ, pañca vedanindriyāni, saddhādīni pañca cāti ekādasa nāmaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ nāmañca rūpañca, pacchimāni tīṇi idha anadhippetāni lokuttarattā. dukkhasaccaṃ nāmañca rūpañca, samudayasaccaṃ nāmaṃ, itarāni idha nādhippetāni lokuttarattā. paccayākāre ādito tīṇi aṅgāni nāmaṃ, catutthapañcamāni nāmañca rūpañca, chaṭṭhasattamāṭṭhamanavamāni nāmaṃ, dasamaṃ nāmañceva nāmarūpañca, pacchimāni dve paccekaṃ nāmañca rūpañcāti evaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayānusārena indriyasaccapaccayākāravasenapi nāmarūpapariggaho kātabbo. evaṃ pana nāmarūpapariggahassa vibhāgena kathane payojanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] 669^b^.^eb^ kāmaṃ vedanādīsu arūpadhammesu na uttaruttarā viya purimapurimā sukhumā, tathāpi saṅghaṭṭanena vikārāapajjanake rūpadhamme upādāya sabbepi te sukhumā evāti āha ^b^``sukhumattā arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhātī''^eb^ti. ^b^sammasitabba^eb^nti sammadeva lakkhaṇādito vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. ^b^manasikātabba^eb^nti tathā citte ṭhapetabbaṃ. ^b^pariggahetabba^eb^nti paricchedakārikāya paññāya paricchijja gahetabbaṃ. ^b^vavatthapetabba^eb^nti aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato vinicchitabbaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti yogino ^a^M2.0355^ea^. ^b^suvikkhālita^eb^nti suvisodhitaṃ. ādikammikassa hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggaṇhantassa yāva dhammā suparibyattaṃ na upatiṭṭhanti, tāva te tappaṭicchādakasammohabalena abhibhūtā avisuddhā nāma honti, asaṅkarato upaṭṭhānābhāvato aññamaññañca jaṭitā. yadā pana sammasanādividhinā taṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti, tadā te suvikkhālitā, nijjaṭā ca nāma honti. tenāha ^b^``yathā yathā hī''^eb^tiādi. ādikammikassa arūpadhammā yebhuyyena rūpadhamme ārabbha pavattanākārena ^a^V2.0333^ea^ gahaṇaṃ gacchantīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā''^eb^ti. teneva hi heṭṭhā ``tassevaṃ pariggahitarūpassa dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā hontī''ti vuttaṃ, na vatthuvasenāti.

[03] idāni rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahassa upāyo, upatthambho cāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāhi pakāsetuṃ ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^mukhanimitta^eb^nti mukhassa paṭibimbaṃ. tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ -- cakkhumā puriso viya yogāvacaro, tassa cakkhu viya yogino kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakañāṇaṃ, ādāsaṃ viya rūpapariggaho, mukhanimittaṃ viya arūpapariggaho, ādāsassa aparisuddhakālo viya rūpapariggahassa avikkhālitakālo, tadā mukhanimittassa apaññāyanaṃ viya rūpapariggahassa avisuddhatāya arūpadhammānaṃ anupaṭṭhānaṃ, ādāsassa punappunaṃ parimajjanaṃ viya rūpapariggahassa punappunaṃ visodhanaṃ, suparimajjite ādāse subyattaṃ mukhanimittassa paññāyanaṃ viya suvikkhālite nijjaṭe rūpapariggahe arūpadhammānaṃ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhānanti. iminā nayena ^b^telatthikopamā^eb^dīsupi yathārahaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^tilapiṭṭha^eb^nti tilacuṇṇaṃ. ^b^katakaṭṭhi^eb^nti katakabījaṃ. ^b^kalalakaddama^eb^nti tanukaddamaṃ.

[03] ^b^tappaccanīkakilesā^eb^ti tassa arūpadhammapariggāhakañāṇassa vibandhabhāvena paṭipakkhabhūtā sammohādikilesā. ^b^ucchu^eb^ādiupamāsu idaṃ mukhamattassa dassanaṃ -- yathā ucchurasaṃ gahetukāmo ucchūni ucchuyante pakkhipitvā ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ yantakkamanamattena ucchurase anikkhamante na ucchūni chaḍḍetvā gacchati, yathā vā core gahetvā tehi katakammaṃ jānitukāmo dvattippahāramattena tesu tamatthaṃ akathentesu na te muñcati, yathā vā pana godammako goṇaṃ dametukāmo dhure taṃ yojetvā ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ tasmiṃ pathena agacchante na vissajjeti, yathā ^a^M2.0356^ea^ ca dadhiṃ manthetvā navanītaṃ gahetukāmo dadhikalasiyaṃ manthaṃ pakkhipitvā sakiṃ, dvikkhattuṃ vā manthassa bhamanamattena navanīte anuppajjante na dadhiṃ chaḍḍeti, yathā vā pana macche pacitvā khāditukāmo ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ aggidānamattena macchesu apaccantesu na te chaḍḍeti. ``atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ parimajjatī''ti ettha vuttanayānusārena ``atha kho naṃ ucchuyante punappunaṃ uppīḷetī''tiādinā sabbattha upamattho yojetabbo.

[03] 670^b^.^eb^ ākirīyanti ^a^V2.0334^ea^ abhimukhā honti etehīti ākārā, arūpadhammānaṃ upaṭṭhānassa mukhabhūtā phusanānubhavanavijānanappakārāti āha ^b^``arūpadhammā tīhi ākārehi upaṭṭhahantī''^eb^tiādi. ārammaṇe pavattamānesu cittacetasikesu asatipi pubbāpariye phusanalakkhaṇo phasso, tattha sabbapaṭhamaṃ abhinipatanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``paṭhamābhinipāto phasso''^eb^ti. tenassa phusanākārena supākaṭabhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. phasse pana upaṭṭhite yasmiṃ ārammaṇe so phasso, tassa anubhavanalakkhaṇā vedanā, sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā, āyūhanalakkhaṇā cetanā, paṭivijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇanti imepi pākaṭā hontīti āha ^b^``taṃsampayuttā vedanā''^eb^tiādi. evaṃ salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato catudhātuvavatthānavasena phassamukhena arūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato catudhātuvavatthānavasena taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tathā kese''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kese pathavīdhātū^eb^ti kesasaṅkhāte pathavīkoṭṭhāse pathavīdhātu. lakkhaṇavibhattito hi dhātuvavatthānadassanametaṃ.

[03] punapi dvinnaṃ dhātuvavatthānānaṃ vasena vedanāmukhena arūpapariggahaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ekassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^tassa rasānubhavanakavedanā^eb^ti thaddhabhāvasaṅkhātassa phoṭṭhabbasabhāvassa anubhavanavasena pavattavedanā.

[03] ^b^aparassā^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayeneva sambandho veditabbo. tattha ^b^ārammaṇapaṭivijānana^eb^nti thaddhatāsaṅkhātaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇapaṭivijānanaṃ. kāyadvārābhinihataṃ, kevalaṃ vā manodvārikajavanaviññāṇamāha. tañhi ``pathavīdhātu ^a^M2.0357^ea^ kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā''ti paṭivijānāti, itaraṃ pana kakkhaḷalakkhaṇapaṭivijānanamattamevāti.

[01] ^b^eteneva upāyenā^eb^ti yvāyaṃ salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato, salakkhaṇavibhattito ca dhātuvavatthānavasena rūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā tattha ṭhitassa phassādimukhena arūpapariggaṇhanupāyo dassito, eteneva upāyena. ^b^kammasamuṭṭhānakese^eb^ti catusamuṭṭhānakesato niddhārite kammasamuṭṭhānakese. ^b^kakkhaḷalakkhaṇātiādinā nayenā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena na kevalaṃ ``paggharaṇalakkhaṇā āpodhātū''tiādinā lakkhaṇavisesena saddhiṃ dhātvantarāniyeva, atha kho ekasamuṭṭhānādibhedāni koṭṭhāsantarānipīti ^a^V2.0335^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesū''^eb^ti. ^b^sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ anugantvā^eb^ti yvāyaṃ dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādito vavatthāpanavasena nānāvidho rūpapariggahanayo vutto, taṃ sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ nayavisesaṃ anugantvā, cakkhudhātuādīsu rūpapariggahamukhesu arūpapariggahadassanavasena yojanā kātabbāti adhippāyo. tatridaṃ yojanāmukhamattadassanaṃ -- ekassa tāva ``cakkhudhātu rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇā, daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānabhūtappasādalakkhaṇā vā''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 600) nayena dhātuyo pariggaṇhantassa ``paṭhamābhinipāto phasso, taṃsampayuttā vedanā''ti sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. tathā ``yathāvuttalakkhaṇāya cakkhudhātuyā rasānubhavanakavedanā vedanākkhandho''tiādi yojetabbaṃ. tathā ``yathāvuttalakkhaṇā cakkhudhātū''ti, ``ārammaṇapaṭivijānanaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho''tiādinā sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. āyatanādivasena rūpapariggahamukhesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 671^b^.^eb^ yathā nāma heṭṭhimajhānaṃ subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitameva uparijhānassa pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, na paṭiladdhamattaṃ, evaṃ rūpapariggaho suvisuddho nijjaṭo niggumbo eva arūpapariggahassa pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, na avisuddho, tasmā rūpārūpassa ekadesepi anupaṭṭhite so avisuddho eva nāma hoti, pageva bahūsu anupaṭṭhitesūti dassento āha ^b^``sace hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^pabbateyyā gāvī viya^eb^ bālā abyattā akhettaññū.

[03] ^b^khaggenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0358^ea^ khaggaggena. ^b^samugga^eb^nti mañjūsāsadisaṃ mahāsamuggaṃ. apariggahitakammaṭṭhānassa avibhattaṃ viya upaṭṭhahantampi nāmarūpaṃ vibhattasabhāvameva, tassa ca vibhāgo kammaṭṭhānapariggahesu pākaṭo hotīti ca dassanatthaṃ samuggavivaraṇaṃ, yamakatālakandaphālanañca nidassanabhāvena vuttaṃ. yamakatālakandañhi bhinnasantānampi abhinnaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti, evaṃ rūpārūpadhammāti. ^b^sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā vavatthapetī^eb^ti ettha kiñcāpi sabba-saddo anavasesapariyādāyako, nāmarūpabhāvo pana aññamaññavidhuroti na tadubhayaṃ samudāyavasena parisamāpayetabbaṃ, tasmā ``yadettha namanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ nāmaṃ. yaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ rūpa''nti evaṃ dvedhā vavatthapetīti attho. evaṃ vavatthapentoyeva ca tadubhayavinimuttassa tebhūmakadhammesu kassaci dhammassa abhāvato ``sabbepi tebhūmakadhamme nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā vavatthapetī''ti vuccati. ``nāmañca rūpañcā''ti eteneva ^a^V2.0336^ea^ tassa duvidhabhāve siddhe ``dvedhā vavatthapetī''ti idaṃ nāmarūpavinimuttassa aññassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``nāmarūpamattato uddha''^eb^ntiādi. ``sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme''ti pana sabbaggahaṇañcettha sammasamanupagassa dhammassa anavasesetabbatāya vuttaṃ. tañhi anavasesato pariññeyyaṃ ekaṃsato virajjitabbaṃ, tato ca cittaṃ virājayaṃ pamocetabbaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --

[02] ``sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya. sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.26-27).

[03] yadi tebhūmakaṃ dhammajātaṃ anavasesato gahitaṃ ``nāmarūpa''nti, yaṃ ito bāhirakehi padatthabhāvena parikappitaṃ, seyyathidaṃ -- pakatiādi drabyādi jīvādi kāyādi. tattha kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? ummattakavipallāsasadise asammāsambuddhapavedite kā tattha aññā paṭipatti aññatra ajjhupekkhanato. atha vā tepi nāmarūpantogadhabhāvābhāvavasena nicchitā evāti veditabbā. kathaṃ? pakati, mahā, ahaṃkāro, tammattāni, indriyāni, bhūtāni, purisoti ete pakatiādayo. tattha samabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sattarajatamasaṅkhātānaṃ sukhadukkhamohānaṃ samudāyo ^b^pakati, padhāna^eb^nti ca vuccati. sattamattasampavedanīyo ^b^mahā,^eb^ buddhīti keci. sattarajādīsu ^a^M2.0359^ea^ abhimāno ^b^ahaṃkāro,^eb^ asmimattāti keci. saddaphassarūparasagandhā ^b^tammattāni^eb^ aññamaññavisiṭṭhānaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ ekuttaratādassanato ekuttarāni tammattānīti vijjhavāsiekalakkhaṇehi tammattehi ekalakkhaṇā visesā sajiyanti, sukhumabhāvena pana nesaṃ sampavesanato ekuttaratāti keci. sotādīni pañca savanādivuttikāni ^b^buddhindriyāni,^eb^ vacanādānavicaraṇussaggānandakiccāni vācādīni pañca ^b^kammindriyāni^eb^. mano antokaraṇaṃ, itaraṃ bāhirakaraṇaṃ. gandhādīhi āraddhāni pathavīudakāggivāyuākāsāni ^b^bhūtāni,^eb^ cetanāsabhāvo ^b^puriso^eb^ti evaṃ pakatiādīni sarūpato veditabbāni.

[03] tattha hi ^b^pakati^eb^ tāva sukhadukkhamohamattatāya nāmaṃ, samavisamabhāvāpattito aniccā, dukkhā, saṅkhatā ca āpannā. ^b^mahā^eb^pi ``tasmā aliṅgato liṅgavisesāmatto mahā uppajjatī''ti vacanato, buddhibhāvānujānanato ca nāmaṃ, aniccaṃ, saṅkhatameva ca āpannaṃ. ``tasmā ^a^V2.0337^ea^ mahato cha visesā sajiyantī''ti sakkate vacanato ``asmī''ti gahaṇanimittabhāvānujānanena ^b^ahaṃkāro^eb^ abhimānoti katvā nāmaṃ, tato eva aniccasaṅkhatabhāvāpatti cassa siddhā. itaraṃ ^b^tammattapañcakaṃ^eb^ gandharasarūpaphassasaddabhāvānujānanato rūpaṃ, arūpanti pana kāpilānaṃ micchābhinivesamattaṃ. te hi soḷasa visesā pañca bhūtāni, ekādasindriyāni bhūtehi bhūtavisesānīti gandhāditammattehi tannissayāni pathavīāpotejovāyoākāsasaṅkhātāni bhūtāni icchitāni. ``tabbisesā ca nānājātikā ahaṃkārato ca indriyānī''ti vacanato sotakāyacakkhujivhāghānavācāpāṇipādapāyūpatthāni ceva mano cāti ^b^ekādasindriyāni^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^mano^eb^ nāmaṃ, itarāni sabbāni rūpaṃ. ^b^vācā^eb^ti cettha atthāvajotakassa akkharasamudāyassa gahaṇaṃ. imesaṃ pana dhammino dhammassa anaññatthassa icchitattā siddhāva aniccatā pariṇāmapakkhe, abhibyattipakkhepi yadi tabbisayañāṇuppādena abhibyañjanaṃ siddhāva aniccatā, atha tato pubbepi ñāṇaṃ attheva. akkhabyattivādo pana siyāti idamettha disāmattaṃ. drabyaguṇakammasāmaññavisesasamavāyā ^b^drabyādikā^eb^. tattha pathavī āpo ^a^M2.0360^ea^ tejo vāyu ākāso kālo disā attā manoti nava ^b^drabyāni^eb^. sadda rūpa rasa gandha phassa saṅkhā parimāṇāni puthūtva saṃyoga viyoga paratvā paratva buddhi sukha dukkha icchā dosa payatta gurutva dravatva sneha vegā saṅkhārā diṭṭhā ceti evamete tevīsati ^b^guṇā^eb^. ukkhepanaṃ avakkhepanamākucanaṃ pasāraṇaṃ gamanamiti pañca ^b^kammāni^eb^. aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu avisiṭṭhamabhidhānaṃ paccayo hoti. saṃ-iti yato drabyaguṇakammesu sā atthi evāti etaṃ ^b^mahāsāmaññaṃ^eb^. pathavīādīsu anuvattibyāvuttibuddhinimittaṃ drabyatvādi, taṃ yathā drabyatva guṇatva kammatva ghaṭatvādi, eso ^b^sāmaññaviseso^eb^. iha tantesu paṭo, kapālesu ghaṭoti iheti yato hetuhetuphalānaṃ sambandho samavāyoti vutto, ^b^samavāyo^eb^ti evamete ^b^drabyādikā^eb^.

[03] tattha pathavī āpa teja vāyū bhūtarūpaṃ, ākāsaṃ tesaṃ abhāvamattaṃ, paricchedo vā, candasūriyādiparivattanaṃ, dhammappavattiñca upādāya paññattimattaṃ ^b^kālo^eb^. tathā ^b^disā, attā^eb^ ca. ^b^mano^eb^ nāmaṃ. ^b^saddarūparasagandhā^eb^ rūpameva. tathā ^b^phasso^eb^ bhūtattayasabhāvato. ^b^saṅkhā^eb^ ekādikā taṃ taṃ upādāya paññattimattaṃ. tathā avayavasamudāye guṇavisesavasena, saṇṭhānavisesavasena vā mahantaṃ dīghaṃ, tabbipariyāyato aṇu rassanti bhinnalakkhaṇadesesu ^b^puthutva^eb^nti. bhinnadesajānaṃ sahabhāve ^b^saṃyogo^eb^ti. tadapāye ^b^viyogo^eb^ti. samānadisādesagatānaṃ rūpānaṃ mahadabbantarānaṃ vasena paramaparanti ^a^V2.0338^ea^ paññattimattaṃ. ^b^buddhisukhadukkhaicchādosapayattā^eb^ nāmameva. ^b^gurutva dravatva snehavegā^eb^ rūpadhammānaṃ pavattivisesato gahetabbākārā. itaro ^b^saṅkhāro^eb^ ñāṇassa pavattiviseso. ^b^adiṭṭho^eb^pi dhammādhammabhāvato nāmameva. ^b^ukkhepanaṃ avakkhepanaṃ ākucanaṃ pasāraṇaṃ gamana^eb^nti rūpadhammānaṃ pavattimattaṃ. sadisāsadisatāyaṃ sāmaññavisesasaññā, ayuttasambandhe samavāyasamaññāti drabyādīnampi nāmarūpantogadhatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] jīvājīvabandha puñña pāpāsava saṃvaranijjaravimokkhā ^b^jīvādikā^eb^. tattha ^b^jīvo^eb^ti attā. puggaladhammādhammākāsakālesu ^b^ajīvasaññā^eb^. tesu saddaphassarūparasagandhasaṇṭhānabandhabhedasukhumaparāparāghātappabhācchāyojjākatamāni puggalalakkhaṇanti ^b^puggalo^eb^ rūpaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ pavattiākāramattato. ^b^dhammādhammā^eb^ jīvapuggalānaṃ gatiṭṭhitimattatāya tadavisiṭṭhā ^a^M2.0361^ea^. ^b^ākāsakālā^eb^ paññattimattaṃ. ^b^bandho^eb^ ``kammapuggalantarasaṃyogo''ti vacanato tehi anañño. ^b^puññapāpāni^eb^ nāmanti pākaṭameva. ``kammapuggalānamāsavo''ti vacanato puññāpuññasambhave āsavasamaññāti tato avisiṭṭho ^b^āsavo^eb^. ``āsavanirodho saṃvaro''ti vacanato paṭipakkhena puññāpuññanirodho ^b^saṃvaro^eb^. ``kammaphalappavattiyā pakatiyā appavatti nijjaro''ti vacanato vipākanirodhanimittaṃ ^b^nijjaro. mokkho^eb^pi ``sabbakammavimokkho''ti vacanato kammapuggalajīvaviyogo. tattha ^b^kammapuggalānaṃ^eb^ saddādilakkhaṇatāya rūpamattatā puññāpuññamattatāya arūpatā. ^b^jīvo^eb^ ca arūpamattamevāti ayaṃ drabyamokkho. bhāvamokkho pana jīvassa rāgādibhāvāpariṇāmo rāgādayo nāmamevāti jīvādayopi nāmarūpantogadhā eva.

[03] kāyappavattigatijātibandhāpavaggā ^b^kāyādikā^eb^. tattha pathavīāpatejavāyuattasukhadukkhesu ^b^kāyasamaññā^eb^. tadavisiṭṭhā pavattigatijātibandhāpavaggā, ``bhāvoti attho, kāyoti anatthantara''nti vacanato kāyato aññaṃ kiñci natthi. ``pavattisaññā kiriyāsaṃyogavibhāgesū''ti vacanato gatiādippakārena pavattā pathavīādayo eva ^b^pavatti^eb^ upacāro. ``tasmiṃ anatthantara''nti vacanato kāyato anaññā suramanujapetatiracchānanarakūpapattiyo ^b^gatiyo^eb^. tāsu purimāpurimāvisiṭṭho gatīsu jātassa nicchayopi pavattimattanti tato anaññā kaṇhanīlarattapītasukkātisukkasaṅkhātā ^b^jātiyo^eb^. tā uttaruttaravisiṭṭhā aññāṇamoharāgadosatatvāsandassanappāyā ^b^sukkajāti,^eb^ antā accantavimuttā avagāhitatvā cāti ^b^sukkajāti^eb^ ^a^V2.0339^ea^. ``dosesu bandhasamaññā''ti vacanato aññāṇādilakkhaṇassa ^b^bandhassa^eb^ jīvato anaññatā. aññāṇādidosābhāvato apavaggasiddhīti ^b^kāyādayopi^eb^ nāmarūpamattameva.
