[03] 702^b^.^eb^ ^b^janakājanakā matā^eb^ti purimakā tikoṭṭhāsasaṅgahitā janakā, pacchimakoṭṭhāsikā ``soḷasā''ti vuttā ajanakāti matā ñātā. ^b^kusalakiriyato^eb^ti kusalato ca kiriyato ca. iriyāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya pathabhāvato ^b^iriyāpatho,^eb^ gamanādi, atthato tadavatthā rūpappavatti. kāmañcettha rūpavinimutto iriyāpatho, viññatti ca natthi, tathāpi na sabbaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ, viññattivikāruppādakañca hoti. yaṃ pana cittaṃ viññattijanakaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsato itarassa janakaṃ avinābhāvato, tathā iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ rūpassa. etassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ^b^``rūpaṃ, iriyāpathaṃ, viññattiñcā''^eb^ti samuccayo kato. ^b^vipākavajjānī^eb^ti ettha vipākābhiññādvayavajjānīti vattabbaṃ tadaññesaṃyeva sesaggahaṇena gahetabbattā. na vā vattabbaṃ sesaggahaṇeneva abhiññācittānampi nivattetabbato. ^b^na viññattiṃ janaya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0377^ea^ mahaggatakusalādīnaṃ santabhāvena avipphārikabhāvato. vipphārikameva hi kāmāvacarakusalādiviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, iriyāpathūpatthambhakāni pana honti satipi santabhāve jhānavegena saussāhattā, yato tesaṃ javanakiccatā. pañca bhavaṅgacittānīti ^a^M2.0402^ea^ sambandho. ^b^rūpameva janayanti, na iriyāpathaṃ^eb^ nirussāhasantabhāvena paridubbalabhāvato. kiriyāmayacittehi avimissabhavaṅgappavattikāle khandhādisarīrāvayavānaṃ niccalabhāvenāvaṭṭhānaṃ. tathā hi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti paviṭṭhāni viya honti. ``dvattiṃsā''ti pana ādinā vuttesu jāgaraṇacittesu vattamānesu aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattairiyāpathabhāveneva pavattantīti. ^b^dvepañcaviññāṇāni^eb^ sabbadubbalatāya rūpaṃ na janenti. ^b^paṭisandhicittaṃ^eb^ vatthudubbalatāya. ^b^khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticitta^eb^nti ettha --

[02] ``kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ, ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatī''ti (yama0 2.saṅkhārayamaka.88) --

[25] pana vacanato aññesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyati. na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa gabbhagatatādivibandhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpane kāraṇaṃ atthi, na ca yuttaṃ cuto ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañcassa pavattati, nāpi ``cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī''ti pāḷi atthi, ``khīṇāsavāna''nti, pana visesanaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodhena nirujjhantassa tesaṃ cuticittassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ pākaṭanti katvā katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^soḷasa cittānī^eb^ti paricchijja gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ rūpajanane ekaṃsato niyametabbattā, aññāni pana bahūni arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na janentiyeva. na ṭhitikkhaṇe, bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā rūpaṃ janentīti sambandho. ^b^uppādakkhaṇe pana balavaṃ^eb^ anantarādipaccayalābhato.

[03] yathā pathavīādayo rūpadhammā cittahetukā cittasamuṭṭhānā, evaṃ vedanādayopīti vuttaṃ ^b^``cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma tayo arūpino khandhā, saddanavaka''^eb^ntiādi. tenevāha -- ``katame dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā? vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho kāyaviññatti vacīviññattī''ti (dha0 sa0 1201, 1535). tattha ^a^V2.0378^ea^ kāyaviññattiādīnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatā pariyāyato vuttāti veditabbā tesaṃ anipphannattā. ^b^``evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpa''^eb^nti iminā ataṃsamuṭṭhānasseva cittajarūpassa cittapaccayatā dassitā. yathā pana kammapaccayaṃ dassitaṃ ^a^M2.0403^ea^, evaṃ cittapaccaye gayhamāne taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa, sahajātavedanādīnañca cittapaccayatā siyā. cittasamuṭṭhānacittapaccaye pana asaṅkarato dassetuṃ pacchājātapaccayavaseneva cittapaccayaṃ uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. cittasamuṭṭhānautuāhārehi kammasamuṭṭhānautuāhārā balavanto hontīti tesaṃ vasena catupañcapavattighaṭanaṃ vuttaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ pana vasena dvattippavattighaṭanaṃ taṃpākatikacittavasena, mahaggatānuttaracittavasena pana bahutarāpi pavattiyo icchitabbā. taṃnibbattānaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ uḷārapaṇītabhāvato.

[03] 703^b^.^eb^ ^b^``upādinnaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā''^eb^ti etena bahiddhā anupādinnaojā rūpāharaṇakiccaṃ na karotīti dasseti. paccayalābho cassa kammajabhūtasannissayatāvasenāti āha ^b^``tattha patiṭṭhāyā''^eb^ti. tattha kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānādirūpassapi kammamūlakattā siyā kammajapariyāyoti taṃnivattanatthaṃ ``upādinna''nti visesetvā vuttaṃ. āhārapaccayassa āhāro na kevalaṃ upatthambhakova, atha kho janakopīti dassetuṃ ^b^``catusamuṭṭhānarūpa''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ``dasa dvādasa vāre''ti vatvā kathaṃ imasseva dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``ekadivasaṃ paribhuttāhāro''^eb^tiādi. ^b^dārakassa sarīraṃ pharitvā^eb^ti nābhimūlānugatāhi rasaharaṇīhi pharitvā, aññathā jalābuantarike kāye makkhanāvasena na sammāviniyogo āhārassa sambhavatīti.

[03] upādinnako anupādinnakoti duvidhe āhāre pubbe anupādinnako āhārapaccayāahāro dassitoti itaraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``kammajāhāro''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ kammapaccayāhārasamuṭṭhāne vuttanayameva. tenāha ^b^``catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭetī''^eb^ti. āhārapaccayautunopi utupaccayāhārassa viya dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanā veditabbā. vuttanayattā na uddhatanti vadanti. ^b^sesāna^eb^nti kammacittautusamuṭṭhānānaṃ tisantatirūpānaṃ. kabaḷīkārāhāro hi aññāhārasamuṭṭhitassa, tisantatirūpānañca upatthambhakavasena attanā uppāditassa janako hutvā paccayo hoti. evaṃ āhārapaccayo hontoyeva atthiavigatavasenāpi paccayo hoti, nissayabhāvo pana paṭṭhānanayena natthi. āhārapaccayā pavattamānāni rūpāni āhāranissayāni ^a^M2.0404^ea^ ^a^V2.0379^ea^ nāma hontīti suttantanayena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. parato utuno nissayajotanāyapi eseva nayo.

[03] 704^b^.^eb^ kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catubbidhāyapi tejodhātuyā rūpuppādane samatthabhāvato ^b^``utu nāma catusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātū''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^esa duvidho hotī^eb^ti esa utu tejodhātubhāvāvisesepi tikkhamandatāvisesena uṇho, sītoti duvidho hoti. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vicāritameva. yadipi utu upādinnakena vināpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, indriyabaddhe pana tena vinā tassa rūpuppādanaṃ natthīti āha ^b^``upādinnakaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā''^eb^ti. tenāha ``catusamuṭṭhāno utū''ti. utusamuṭṭhānoyeva hi utu upādinnakena vinā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. ^b^utupaccayaṃ^eb^ nāma catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpaṃ. yañhi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pannarasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ, yañca tadaññatisantatirūpaṃ, tassa sabbassapi sabhāgo utūpatthambhakapaccayo hotīti. yasmā visabhāgo utu himādi viya padumādīnaṃ visadisarūpuppattihetubhūtaṃ purimarūpaṃ vināsentaṃ viya hoti, tasmā sabhāgaṃ, visabhāgañca ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``utu catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^dīghampi addhāna^eb^nti ``dasa dvādasa vāre''ti aññassa vuttaparicchedato dīghampi kālaṃ. utu hi sabhāgasantativasena laddhapaccayaṃ ciratarampi kālaṃ sadisākāraṃ rūpappavattiṃ santāneti upādinnakasannissayena vinā, pageva itarathā. tenāha ^b^``anupādinnapakkhe ṭhatvāpī''^eb^ti, maṃsavinimuttakesalomanakhacammakhilatilakādivasena jīvamānasarīre aññattha matakaḷevarādivasenāti adhippāyo. rūpassa nibbattiyā diṭṭhāya tassa bhaṅgopi diṭṭhoyeva hoti ittarakālattā dhammappavattiyāti āha ^b^``nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati nāmā''^eb^ti. na hi nibbattimattadassanaṃ sammasanaṃ nāma hoti, udayabbayadassanañca adhikatanti. esa nayo ito paresupi nibbattiggahaṇesu.
[03] 705^b^.^eb^ ^b^lokiyacittuppādavasenevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ itarassa avisayattā.

[03] ^b^nibbattati^eb^ ^a^M2.0405^ea^ ^a^V2.0380^ea^ taṃtaṃbhavavasena. tadeva ekūnavīsatippabhedaṃ cittaṃ bhavaṅgavasena nibbattatīti sambandho. tathā ^b^cutivasena tadārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu ekūnavīsaticittuppādesu. ^b^anantaracittato paṭṭhāyā^eb^tiādināpi pavattiyeva vuttā.

[03] so pana paṭisandhicittānaṃyeva pavattiyaṃ pavattanākāroti suddhappavatticittānaṃ uppattiṃ dassento ^b^``pavatte panā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^asambhinnattā^eb^ti avinaṭṭhattā. ``asambhinnattā cakkhussā''tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``cakkhupasādassa hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^``ṭhitippattamevā''^eb^ti iminā yathā nirujjhamānaṃ rūpaṃ kassaci paccayo na hoti, evaṃ uppajjamānampīti dasseti. cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. evaṃ sesesupi. kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyacittesu ekaṃ vā pañca, satta vā javanāni hutvā uppajjatīti sambandho. upekkhāsahagatāhetukaṃ cittaṃ vāti vā-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. voṭṭhabbanañhi sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana dutiyamoghavāravasena veditabbaṃ. ^b^pañca javanāni^eb^ suttamucchitādikāle, ^b^satta^eb^ pākatikakāle veditabbāni. ^b^javanārammaṇānurūpa^eb^nti ``tihetukaṃ ce javanaṃ, tihetukaṃ, dvihetukaṃ vā''tiādinā, ``iṭṭhaṃ ce ārammaṇaṃ, somanassasahagata''ntiādinā ca javanassa, ārammaṇassa ca anurūpaṃ. ^b^sesadvāresū^eb^ti sotadvārādisesadvāresu.
[03] ^b^anukkamenā^eb^ti udayabbayañāṇādhigamānukkamena ^b^paññābhāvanaṃ sampādeti^eb^ arahattaṃ adhigacchati.

[03] 706^b^.^eb^ rūpesu manasikārasattakaṃ ^b^rūpasattakaṃ,^eb^ rūpadhammesu sattahākārehi manasi kārotīti attho. evaṃ arūpasattakampi veditabbaṃ. ^b^imehi ākārehī^eb^ti imehi ādānanikkhepanamanasikārādippakārehi, imehi vā yathāvuttakoṭṭhāsehi. ^b^āropetvā^eb^ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā.

[03] ^b^ādānanikkhepanato^eb^ti bhavassa gahaṇavissajjanato, jātito, maraṇato cāti attho. ^b^vayovuḍḍhatthagāmito^eb^ti vayasā vuḍḍhassa atthagāmibhāvato, atthaṅgamato icceva attho. ^b^āhārato^eb^ti āhārahetu ^a^M2.0406^ea^ ^a^V2.0381^ea^, rūpassa paccayabhūtāahāratoti attho. ayalohādibhūmipāsāṇādibhedaṃ vividhavaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ kammānapekkhaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ rūpaṃ ^b^dhammatārūpaṃ. sattā^eb^ti sattadhā sattahākārehi. ^b^vipassatī^eb^ti taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassati sammasati.

[03] ``bhārādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke''ti vacanato khandhabhārassa ādito gahaṇanti katvā ^b^``ādānanti paṭisandhī''^eb^ti āha. ``sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya''nti (dī0 ni0 2.220; saṃ0 ni0 1.186) pana vacanato khandhabhāranikkhepoti katvā ^b^``nikkhepananti cutī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ``yo ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasata''nti (dī0 ni0 2.7; saṃ0 ni0 1.145-146; a0 ni0 7.74) vacanato tato ūnādhikabhāvo appamāṇanti vuttaṃ ^b^``ekaṃ vassasataṃ paricchinditvā''^eb^ti. ^b^etthantare sabbe saṅkhārā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ādānanikkhepantare pavattā sabbe bhūtupādāyarūpappabhedā saṅkhārā. rūpadhammesu hi idaṃ sammasanavidhānanti. ``aniccā''ti gahitamattaṃ yuttito hadaye patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ^b^``kasmā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^uppādavayavattito^eb^ti uppajjanavasena, nirujjhanavasena ca pavattanato, ahutvā sambhavato hutvā vayūpagamanatoti attho. ^b^vipariṇāmato^eb^ti santānassa purimuttaravisadisabhāvatoti vadanti. taṃ vassasataparicchinne rūpe idaṃ sammasananti adhippāyeneva vuttaṃ siyā, jarāmaraṇena vipariṇāmetabbatoti attho. asatipi dhammabhede avatthābhedo icchitabbo. na hi uppādāvatthā eva bhaṅgāvatthāti yuttā. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāyā''ti. sabhāvavigamo eva vā ettha vipariṇāmo. khaṇikatā ^b^tāvakālikatā^eb^. niccasabhāvābhāvo eva ^b^niccapaṭikkhepo^eb^. aniccadhammā hi teneva attano sabhāvena jānantānaṃ niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma. yato na niccanti aniccaṃ, uppādakkhaṇe yadavatthā saṅkhārā, na tadavatthā ṭhitikkhaṇeti avatthantarappattiyā ñāyati tesaṃ kilamanākāroti āha ^b^``ṭhitiyaṃ jarāya kilamantī''^eb^ti, svāyamattho pākaṭajarāya veditabbo. ye pana saṅkhārānaṃ ṭhitiṃ na sampaṭicchanti, tattha vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. dhammānaṃ sabhāvo nāma duratikkamo jarānantaraṃ bhaṅgoti āha ^b^``jaraṃ patvā avassaṃ bhijjantī''^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā uppādajarābhaṅgavasena ^a^M2.0407^ea^ saṅkhārānaṃ nirantarabādhatā, tato ca nesaṃ dussahatāya dukkhamatā, tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ, saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānatāya dukkhavatthutā, tasmā. abhiṇha...pe0... dukkhāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^``sukhapaṭikkhepato''^eb^ti ^a^V2.0382^ea^ idaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇantu,^eb^ uppajjamānākāreneva pavattantūti adhippāyo. ^b^``uppannā''^eb^ti iminā uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitā vuttā. ^b^ṭhānappattā mā jīrantū^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu atthato ṭhiti eva jarāti? saccametaṃ, jarāvasena pana yo kilamatho, so idha jarāggahaṇena gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^mā bhijjantū^eb^ti niccataṃ āsīsati. kassaci dhammissarassāpi bhagavato vasavattibhāvo natthi. na hi lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ kenaci kātuṃ sakkā. bhāvaññathattameva hi iddhivisayo. ^b^suññā^eb^ saṅkhārā ^b^tena^eb^ tīsu ṭhānesu ^b^vasavattanākārena. tasmā^eb^ti vuttakāraṇaparāmasanaṃ. ^b^suññato^eb^ti nivāsīkārakavedakādhiṭṭhāyakavirahena tato suññato, na nissabhāvatoti ekaccaparikappitasabhāvasuññato. ^b^assāmikato^eb^ti sāmibhūtassa kassaci abhāvato. etena anattaniyataṃ dasseti. ^b^avasavattito^eb^ti yathāvuttavasavattibhāvābhāvato. ^b^attapaṭikkhepato^eb^ti paraparikappitassa attano paṭikkhipanato. ``suññato''tiādinā hi dhammānaṃ bāhirakaparikappitāttaviraho vutto, iminā pana ataṃsabhāvato attā na hotīti.

[03] 707^b^.^eb^ ettha ca ``uppādavayavattito''tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi aniccā, ``abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato''tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhā, ``suññato''tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi anattāti rūpadhamme niruḷhaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ pubbe attanā asallakkhitaṃ sallakkhetvā sammasanto taṃ tattha āropetīti vuccati. tathā panānena ādānanikkhepanavasena sammasitattā āha ^b^``rūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ca yasmā aniccalakkhaṇaggahaṇapubbakaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ, dukkhalakkhaṇaggahaṇapubbakaṃ vā anattalakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ. aniccalakkhaṇañcettha rūpabhedena dassiyamānaṃ yathoḷārikato dīpetabbanti taṃ vassasataparicchedena paṭhamaṃ dassentena vassasataṃ ṭhitassa ``dasa vā vīsati vā''tiādinā ^a^M2.0408^ea^ vibhajitvā anukkamena yāvauddharaṇādikoṭṭhāsavasena rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā tato ``aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā''ti tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato sammasananti dassetuṃ ^b^``tameva vassasata''^eb^ntiādinā vayavasena rūpassa sammasanavidhi āraddho. tattha yasmā oḷārikavasenevāyaṃ ādito rūpabhedo gayhati, tasmā na vassasataṃ samakoṭṭhāsavasena vibhattaṃ, majjhimāvatthāya vā tathārūpattā majjhimavaye ekaṃ vassaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
[03] 708^b^.^eb^ mandatābāhullena ^a^V2.0383^ea^ pavattaṃ vassānaṃ dasakaṃ ^b^mandadasakaṃ^eb^. esa nayo sesesupi.

[03] ^b^tadā^eb^ti paṭhame vassadasake. ^b^so^eb^ti puggalo. ^b^capalo^eb^ti anavaṭṭhitakiriyatāya taralo. tena momūhabhāvato viseseti. na hesa navamadasake viya momūhabhāvena mando, atha kho capalatāyāti. tenāha ^b^``kumārako''^eb^ti. tatiye dasake maṃsapāripūriyā yathārahaṃ chavivaṇṇo vippasīdatīti āha ^b^``vaṇṇāyatanaṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātī''^eb^ti. catutthe dasake aṭṭhīnaṃ, nhārūnañca thirabhāvappattiyā ^b^balañca thāmo ca vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti^eb^. pañcame dasake yobbanamadassa dūrībhāvena yebhuyyena kilesatanutāya paññā yathārahaṃ suvisadā hoti. khiḍḍāya rati ^b^khiḍḍārati^eb^. kapallikādinissayavisesena padīpassa suddhatādi viya nissayavisesena pañcamachaṭṭhadasakesu paññāya buddhihāniyo veditabbā. ^b^purato pabbhāro hoti^eb^ kaṭisandhigīvāsandhīnaṃ vasena rassassāpi, pageva dīghassa. ^b^pabbhāro^eb^ti ca garubhāvena palambako. ^b^momūho hoti^eb^ satipaññāvippavāsato. ^b^sayanabahulova hoti^eb^ ṭhānādivasena sarīrabhāraṃ vahituṃ asakkonto.
[03] 709^b^.^eb^ ^b^tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassāna^eb^nti yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ. catuvassikopi hi eko koṭṭhāso hotīti. dvisataṃ koṭṭhāse katvā ekekāyanavasenātipi veditabbaṃ.
[03] vassāne pavattarūpanti sambandho.

[03] taṃ ^a^M2.0409^ea^ pana vassānaṃ dvidhā samattaṃ, na pubbe viya catumāsanti āha ^b^``dvemāsa''^eb^nti. accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. so pana ^b^vassāno^eb^ utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā ^b^sarado,^eb^ migasiraphussamāsā ^b^hemanto,^eb^ māghaphaggunamāsā ^b^sisiro,^eb^ cittavesākhamāsā ^b^vasanto,^eb^ jeṭṭhāsaḷhamāsā ^b^gimho^eb^ utūti veditabbo. ^b^cha koṭṭhāse katvā^eb^ti dasadasanāṭikāvasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā.

[03] 710^b^.^eb^ abhimukhaṃ purato kamanaṃ ^b^abhikkamo^eb^. paṭinivattanavasena kamanaṃ ^b^paṭikkamo^eb^. āmukhaṃ lokanaṃ ^b^ālokanaṃ^eb^. vividhaṃ ito cito ca lokanaṃ ^b^vilokanaṃ^eb^. hatthapādānaṃ saṅkucanaṃ ^b^samiñjanaṃ^eb^. āyamanaṃ ^b^pasāraṇaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^pāduddharaṇakāle^eb^ti ^a^V2.0384^ea^ dutiyapāduddharaṇakāle. ^b^pādassā^eb^ti uddhaṭapādassa. ^b^omattā^eb^ti sattito hīnappamāṇā. tenāha ^b^``mandā''^eb^ti. ^b^itarā^eb^ti tejovāyodhātuyo. yathā pādassa uddharaṇaṃ sijjhati, tathā pavattacittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ekaṃsato tejovāyodhātūnaṃ adhimattatā icchitabbā sallahukasabhāvatāya tāsaṃ. tato eva ca itarāsaṃ omattatā garusabhāvattā. taṃsambandhattā pana sesaṃ tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ taggatikameva hoti. kāyavacīviññattipavattiyaṃ vāyopathavīadhimattatā imassa atthassa nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. purato haraṇe, pacchato haraṇe ca uddharaṇe viya sallahukasabhāvarūpappavattīti tāsaṃyeva dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ adhimattatā icchitabbāti āha ^b^``tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū''^eb^ti. yathā uddharaṇādīsu sallahukasabhāvattā pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ hīnaṃ, evaṃ vossajjanādīsu tīsu garusabhāvattā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ hīnanti dassento āha ^b^``vossajjane''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^tadupādāyarūpānī^eb^ti tā dhātuyo nissāya pavattaupādārūpāni. ^b^etthevā^eb^ti uddharaṇeyeva. tenāha ^b^``atiharaṇaṃ appatvā''^eb^ti. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ. ^b^tattha tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse. ^b^pabbaṃ^eb^ ^b^pabba^eb^ntiādi ^a^M2.0410^ea^ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ koṭṭhāsantarasaṅkarābhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^taṭataṭāyantā^eb^ti taṭataṭāyanti viya, tena nesaṃ pavattikkhaṇassa ittarataṃ dasseti.

[03] 711^b^.^eb^ ^b^assā^eb^ti sammasanassa. ^b^dārutiṇukkādīsū^eb^ti dārūkkātiṇukkādīsu. ``kiṃ andhabāla ekaghanaṃ satataṃ sabbadābhāviṃ ekanti maññasī''ti adhippāyenāha ^b^``kimettha manāpa''^eb^nti. ^b^idampī^eb^ti yadidaṃ telavaṭṭikkhayena padīpassa apaññāyanaṃ vuttaṃ, idampi. ^b^aṅgulaṅgulantare^eb^ti aṅguliyā mitaṃ aṅgulanti aṅgulappamāṇe padeseti attho. tantuno avayavalesabhūtaṃ paramasukhumabhāvappattaṃ aṃsuṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^tiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. tattha kāmaṃ upameyye viya upamāyaṃ pākaṭo kālabhedo natthi, ekakoṭṭhāsagataṃ pana koṭṭhāsantaraṃ na pāpuṇātīti ettāvatā upamābhāvo veditabbo. upamāyampi vā tāva yāvāti kālassa bhedamattā labbhatevāti tassā gahaṇe kālabhedavasenāpi upamā yojetabbā.

[03] 712^b^.^eb^ pubbe ādānanikkhepādivasena catusantatirūpaṃ saṅgharitvā dassitaṃ, idāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādivasena ^a^V2.0385^ea^ bhinditvā dassento ^b^``tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^visaṅkharitvā^eb^ vibhajitvā. ``visaṅgharitvā''ti vā pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^āhāramaya^eb^nti āhārena nibbattaṃ. ^b^jhatta^eb^nti milātaṃ. ^b^kilanta^eb^nti khinnaṃ. ^b^dhāta^eb^nti tittaṃ. ^b^pīṇita^eb^nti maṃsūpacayasampattiyā pīṇitaṃ. tato eva ^b^mudu. siniddha^eb^nti siniddhacchavitāya saṇhaṃ. tato eva ^b^phassavantaṃ^eb^.
[03] 713^b^.^eb^ ^b^uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpa^eb^nti uṇhasantāpena santattaṃ rūpaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^sītautunā^eb^ti sappāyena sītautunā.

[03] 714^b^.^eb^ ^b^āyatanadvāravasenā^eb^ti āyatanasaṅkhātadvāravasena. kammadvāranivattanatthaṃ āyatanaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^kāyadvāre^eb^ti pasādakāyadvāre. ^b^manodvāraṃ^eb^ nāma sāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. tassa nissayabhāvato hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya nissitavohārena ^b^``manodvāre''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, yattha manodvāruppatti.
[03] 715^b^.^eb^ ^b^somanassitadomanassitavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0411^ea^ somanassitadomanassitapuggalavasena, somanassitadomanassitakālavasena vā.
[03] ^b^ayamattho^eb^ti ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno saṅkhārānaṃ atīttarakhaṇatāsaṅkhāto attho.

[03] ^b^jīvita^eb^nti jīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^sukhadukkhā^eb^ti sukhadukkhavedanā. upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^attabhāvo^eb^ti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā vuttā. saññāti keci. ^b^kevalā^eb^ti attanā niccabhāvena vā avomissā. ^b^ekacittasamāyuttā^eb^ti ekekena cittena sahitā. ^b^lahuso vattate khaṇo^eb^ti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atīttaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.

[03] ^b^cullāsītisahassāni kappa^eb^nti caturāsītisahassaparimāṇaṃ kappaṃ, accantasaṃyoge etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^kappa^eb^nti ca sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ. ^b^marū^eb^ti devā. ^b^dvīhi cittehi samohitā^eb^ti evaṃ cirajīvinopi te dvīhi cittehi sahitā hutvā na tiṭṭhanti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ^a^V2.0386^ea^ -- tesampi santāne jīvitādīni dvīhi cittehi saha na tiṭṭhanti, ekena cittena saha uppannāni teneva saha nirujjhanato yāva dutiyā na tiṭṭhantīti.

[03] ^b^ye niruddhā marantassā^eb^ti cavantassa sattassa cuticittena saddhiṃ niruddhāti vattabbā ye khandhā. ^b^tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhā^eb^ti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhakkhandhā. ^b^sabbe^eb^pi ^b^sadisā^eb^ te sabbepi ekasadisā atthaṅgatā ^b^appaṭisandhikā^eb^ puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. yathā hi cutikkhandhā na nibbattanti, evaṃ tato pubbepi khandhā. tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^anantarā ca ye bhaggā^eb^ti ye saṅkhārā anantarameva bhaggā niruddhā. ^b^ye ca bhaggā anāgate^eb^ti ye ca saṅkhārā anāgate bhaggā bhañjanasīlā bhijjissanti. ^b^tadantarā niruddhāna^eb^nti tesaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ antarā vemajjhe paccuppannataṃ patvā niruddhānaṃ bhaggānaṃ. ^b^vesamaṃ natthi lakkhaṇe^eb^ti tesaṃ tividhānampi bhaṅgalakkhaṇanimittaṃ visamatā visadisatā natthi.

[03] ^b^anibbattena^eb^ ^a^M2.0412^ea^ ^b^na jāto^eb^ti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti, ajāto nāma hoti. ^b^paccuppannena^eb^ vattamānena cittena ^b^jīvati^eb^ jīvamāno nāma hoti. ^b^cittabhaṅgā mato loko^eb^ti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma hoti niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā. evaṃ santepi ^b^paññatti paramatthiyā^eb^ yāyaṃ taṃ taṃ santaṃ sanissayaṃ cittaṃ upādāya ``tisso jīvati, phusso jīvatī''ti evaṃ vacanappavattiyā visayabhūtā santānapaññatti, sā ettha paramatthiyā paramatthabhūtā. tathā hi vadanti ``nāmagottaṃ na jīratī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.76).

[03] ^b^anidhānagatā bhaggā^eb^ti ye bhaggā, na te katthaci nidhānaṃ gatā, atha kho abhāvameva gatā. ^b^puñjo natthi anāgate^eb^ yato āgaccheyyuṃ vattamānabhāvaṃ. ^b^nibbattā yepī^eb^ti ye paṭiladdhattabhāvā paccuppannā, tepi ^b^āragge sāsapūpamā tiṭṭhanti^eb^. yathā nāma sūciyaṃ ṭhitāyaṃ sāsapo khitto tassā sikhaṃ phuṭṭhamatto vigacchati na tiṭṭhati, evaṃ saṅkhārā uppajjitvā bhijjanti, na tesaṃ avaṭṭhānaṃ atthīti.
[03] ^b^bhaṅgo^eb^ ^a^V2.0387^ea^ ^b^nesaṃ purakkhato^eb^ti tesaṃ nibbattadhammānaṃ bhaṅgo nāma purato eva kato, ekaṃsabhāvī na apasakkatīti attho. ^b^purāṇehī^eb^ti purimakehi atītehi.

[03] ^b^adassanato^eb^ti apassitabbato. ^b^āyantī^eb^ti āgacchanti. ^b^``uppajjantī''^eb^ti imināpi kutoci rāsito āgamanābhāvamevāha. ^b^bhaggā gacchantudassana^eb^nti bhaggāpi katthaci upagamanābhāvato sabbena sabbaṃ adassanaṃ abhāvameva gacchanti. tattha nidassanamāha ^b^``vijjuppādo...pe0... vayanti cā''^eb^ti.

[03] 716^b^.^eb^ ^b^``vivaṭṭakappato paṭṭhāya uppajjanakarūpa''^eb^nti iminā sayameva uppajjanakadhammatāya ^b^``dhammatārūpa''^eb^nti anvatthanāmataṃ dasseti. ayalohādīsu ^b^ayo^eb^ nāma kāḷalohaṃ. ^b^lohaṃ^eb^ nāma jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ. tattha ayo rajataṃ suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta ^b^jātilohāni^eb^. nāganāsikalohaṃ ^b^vijātilohaṃ^eb^. kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ ^a^M2.0413^ea^ hārakūṭanti tīṇi ^b^kittimalohāni^eb^. morakkhakādi ^b^pisācalohaṃ^eb^. tattha tambalohaṃ vekantakanti imehi dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha ``loha''nti gahitanti. ^b^tipū^eb^ti setatipu. ^b^sīsa^eb^nti kāḷatipu. ^b^suvaṇṇaṃ^eb^ ākaruppannarasaviddhādibhedaṃ. ^b^muttā^eb^ sāmuddikamuttādi. ^b^maṇī^eb^ti veḷuriyalohitaṅgamasāragallāni ṭhapetvā avaseso sabbo maṇiviseso. ^b^veḷuriyo^eb^ vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi. ^b^saṅkho^eb^ sāmuddikasaṅkho. ^b^silā^eb^ti kāḷasilāpaṇḍusilādibhedā sabbāpi ratanasammatasilā. ^b^pavāḷaṃ^eb^ nāma vaṭṭumaṃ viddhamaṃ. ^b^lohitaṅgaṃ^eb^ rattamaṇi. ^b^masāragallaṃ^eb^ kabaramaṇi. ^b^bhūmi^eb^ādayo pākaṭāva. ^b^tadassā^eb^ti taṃ dhammatārūpaṃ assa yogino.

[03] ^b^taruṇapallavavaṇṇa^eb^nti ambādīnaṃ taruṇapallavena samānavaṇṇaṃ. ^b^sabhāgarūpasantati^eb^nti vaṇṇādinā samānabhāgaṃ rūpasantānaṃ. ^b^anuppabandhāpayamāna^eb^nti hetuphalaparamparāya sambandhanavasena pavattanti.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ti yogī. ^b^ta^eb^nti asokarukkhapaṇṇaṃ. ^b^pariggahetvā^eb^ti ñāṇena paricchijja gahetvā. ^b^iminā nayenā^eb^ti iminā asokapaṇṇe vuttena nayena. ^b^sabbampi^eb^ ayalohādibhedaṃ ^b^dhammatārūpaṃ^eb^. tampi hi sītakāle sītalaṃ, uṇhakāle sūriyasantāpena uṇhataraṃ hoti. tattha sītabhāvena pavattaṃ ^a^V2.0388^ea^ rūpaṃ uṇhaṃ uṇhabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ sītaṃ na pāpuṇāti. tattha tattheva taṭataṭāyantaṃ bhijjatītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
[03] 717^b^.^eb^ ^b^kalāpato^eb^ti arūpadhammakalāpato.

[03] yasmā tattha phassapañcamakā dhammā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā supākaṭā, suviññeyyā ca, tasmā tesaṃ vasena dassento ^b^``kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā''^eb^ti āha. ye ime sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā, sabbe te vinaṭṭhāti sambandho.

[03] ^b^pavattaṃ citta^eb^nti sattasu ṭhānesu sammasanavasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ. ^b^sammasanto^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā sammasanto. ^b^taṃ yuttatara^eb^nti taṃ ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ yuttataraṃ āsannabhāvena vibhūtataraṃ rūpasattake sammasanaṃ saha gahetvā sammasanassa vuttattā. apica rūpasattake sammasanassa ^a^M2.0414^ea^ rūpadhammesu sātisayaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā pavattattā tabbisayaṃ arūpasammasanaṃ sātisayaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇappaṭivedhāya sampavattatīti taṃ yuttataraṃ, na pana apubbakesādisammasanaṃ katvā tabbisayaṃ pavattitaṃ. tathā sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ navaṃ navaṃ eva siyā, pubbe gahitaṃ sammasanavisayaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññassa sammasanavisayassa gaṇhanato. ^b^sesānipī^eb^ti yamakato sammasanādīnipi. ^b^tenevā^eb^ti ariyavaṃsakathānayeneva.

[03] 718^b^.^eb^ ^b^tampi citta^eb^nti ādānanikkhepato sammasanavasena pavattacittuppādampi. cittasīsena hi niddeso. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^yamakato sammasati nāma^eb^ nāmarūpadhamme ārabbha yugaḷavasena sammasanassa pavattanato. ayañhi pubbe rūpasattakavasena sammasitvā ṭhitopi idāni ādānanikkhepādivasena sammasitvāva taṃ sammasati. khaṇikato sammasanādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03] 719^b^.^eb^ ^b^etampī^eb^ti etaṃ catutthasammasanacittampi. ^b^paṭhamacitta^eb^nti ādānanikkhepādivasena rūpaṃ ^a^V2.0389^ea^ sammasitacittaṃ, yaṃ rūpapariggāhakacittanti adhippetaṃ. sammasitasammasitacittasammasanena tesaṃ khaṇikabhāvassa vibhāvanato idaṃ sammasanaṃ ^b^``khaṇikato sammasana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 720^b^.^eb^ idameva ca sammasanaṃ diguṇitaṃ anekasammasanapaṭipāṭisambhavato ^b^``paṭipāṭito sammasana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^vaṭṭeyyā^eb^ti sambhaveyya. tathā sati paṭipāṭisammasanapasutā eva bhāvanā siyā, na mūlakammaṭṭhānupakārī, na cāyaṃ samāpatticāro. yasmā ca tattakena rūpadhammesu, arūpadhammesu ca aniccādilakkhaṇāni suṭṭhu vibhūtāni honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``yāva dasamacittasammasanā...pe0... ṭhapetabba''^eb^nti. ^b^ṭhapetabba^eb^nti ca na ekādasamaṃ dvādasamena sammasitabbanti paṭipāṭito sammasanassa paricchedadassanaparaṃ, na tato sammasanato oramanadassanaparaṃ, tasmā punapi rūpaṃ pariggahetvā yāva dasamacittasammasanā bhāvanamanuyuñjateva. ^b^vutta^eb^nti ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 721^b^.^eb^ ^b^visuṃ sammasananayo nāma natthī^eb^ti aniccādimanasikāravinimutto añño vipassanāmanasikāro natthi. vipassanāya ca diṭṭhiādivikkhambhanā idha diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayoti adhippetā. vipassanāya eva hi pavattivisesena ^a^M2.0415^ea^ diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayo ijjhantīti dassento ^b^``yaṃ paneta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^sattasaññā^eb^ti sattā atthīti uppajjanakasaññā. dubbalāya attadiṭṭhiyā sahagatasaññātipi vadanti. ^b^sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭitacittenā^eb^ti sattasaññāya vikkhambhanavasena pavattacittena diṭṭhi nuppajjati, saññāvipallāsahetūppajjanakā cittadiṭṭhivipallāsā tadabhāvena hontīti. ^b^māno^eb^ nāma yo diṭṭhūpanissayo apāyagamanīyo, so diṭṭhiyā vikkhambhitāya vikkhambhito eva hoti, diṭṭhiyā samucchinnāya samucchijjanatoti āha ^b^``diṭṭhiugghāṭita...pe0... māno nuppajjatī''^eb^ti. māno vikkhambhiyamāno taṇhāya pavattiṃ nivāreti, abhimatavisayesu eva taṇhāya pavattanatoti vuttaṃ ^b^``mānasamugghāṭita...pe0... taṇhā nuppajjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti idha sukhumā nikanti adhippetāti āha ^b^``taṇhāya...pe0... pariyādinnā nāma hotī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^ayaṃ nayo^eb^ti idāni vuccamāno sammasanavidhi.

[03] ^b^mama vipassanā^eb^ti imassāpi attaniyasaññitāya vipassanāya sāmibhūto attā parāmasīyatīti ^a^V2.0390^ea^ diṭṭhigāhatāti tathā ^b^``gaṇhato hi diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma na hotī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kāmañcāyaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisamadhigamena visuddhadiṭṭhiko, maggena pana asamugghāṭitattā anoḷārikāya ca diṭṭhiyā vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03] ^b^suṭṭhū^eb^ti sammā. ^b^manāpa^eb^nti ca kiriyāvisesanaṃ, manavaḍḍhanākārenāti attho. ubhayenāpi vipassanāvisayaṃ adhimānamāha. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``mānasamugghāṭo nāma na hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^vipassituṃ sakkomī^eb^ti tattha samatthatāpadesena guṇavisesayogato vipassanāya assādetabbatā dassīyati, cittaṃ vipassituṃ sakkomi. tasmā vipassanto eva kālaṃ vītināmessāmīti vipassanaṃ assādentassāti yojanā.

[03] yasmā diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāmettha visesato anattānupassanāya hoti, tasmā taṃ dassentena ^b^``sace saṅkhārā''^eb^tiādinā anattānupassanāvidhiṃ vatvā yasmā pana anattato anupassantena saṅkhārā aniccatopi ^a^M2.0416^ea^ dukkhatopi anupassitabbā eva tadupabrūhanato, tasmā ^b^``hutvā abhāvaṭṭhenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03] yasmā mānasamugghāṭanaṃ nāma aniccānupassanāya hoti. khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanake saṅkhāre passantassa kuto mānassa avasaro. aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghāṭāyāti hi vuttaṃ.

[03] yasmā nikantipariyādānaṃ nāma dukkhānupassanāya hoti. na hi sabhāvato, dukkhavatthuto ca dukkhabhūte saṅkhāre passantassa tattha īsakampi abhirato hoti. assādānupassino hi tattha taṇhā uppajjeyya. sesaṃ anattalakkhaṇe vuttanayameva. ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho -- vuttanayena paṭipāṭito sammasanaṃ pasutassa yogino yadā anattānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati, itarā dvepi tadanugatikā, tadānena diṭṭhiugghāṭanaṃ kataṃ hoti. attadiṭṭhimūlikā hi sabbā diṭṭhiyo. anattānupassanā ca attadiṭṭhiyā ujupaṭipakkhā.

[03] yadā pana aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati, itarā dvepi tadanugatikā ^a^V2.0391^ea^, tadānena mānasamugghāṭanaṃ kataṃ hoti. sati hi niccagāhe mānajappanā ``idaṃ niccaṃ, idaṃ dhuva''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.501) ^b^bakabrahmuno^eb^ viya. aniccānupassanā ca niccagāhassa ujupaṭipakkhā.

[03] yadā pana dukkhānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati, itarā dvepi tadanugatikā, tadānena nikantipariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti. sati hi sukhasaññāya taṇhāgāhova, dukkhānupassanā ca nikantiyā ujupaṭipakkhā. evaṃ tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ kiccavisesavasena diṭṭhiugghāṭanādīni honti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``iti ayaṃ vipassanā attano attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatī''^eb^ti. anupassanānaṃ yathārahaṃ sakakiccakaraṇañhi sakaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhānaṃ, tasmā visuṃ sammasananayo natthīti na vattabbanti adhippāyo.

[03] 722^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbākārato^eb^ti idha viya ekadesena avatvā sabbākārato sarūpato, kiccato ca anavasesato vattabbā. ^b^idhevā^eb^ti tīraṇapariññāyameva. ekaccānaṃyevettha anupassanānaṃ paṭilābhoti āha ^b^``ekadesaṃ paṭivijjhanto''^eb^ti, tā pana sayameva sarūpato dassessati ^a^M2.0417^ea^. ^b^tappaṭipakkhe dhamme^eb^ti yā anupassanā idha sambhavanti, tāsaṃ paṭipakkhe dhamme niccasaññādike ^b^pajahati^eb^ vikkhambheti.

[03] ^b^khayānupassana^eb^nti saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṃ. ^b^bhāvento^eb^ti vaḍḍhento. ^b^ghanasañña^eb^nti santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^khayānupassana^eb^nti hutvā abhāvānupassananti vadanti. yāya paññāya ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā ``aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.48) passati, sā ^b^khayānupassanā^eb^. bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya tassā pāripūrīti ghanasaññāya pahānaṃ hoti, tato pubbe aparipuṇṇatāya taṃ na hoti. evamaññatthāpīti paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇatā pahānatīraṇapariññāsu vipassanāpaññāya daṭṭhabbā. paccakkhato, anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgaṃ disvā tattheva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā ^b^vayānupassanā,^eb^ tāya ^b^āyūhanaṃ pajahati^eb^. yadatthaṃ, yāya ca āyūhati, tasmiṃ pavatte taṇhāya cassa cittaṃ na namatīti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``vayānupassanaṃ bhāvento āyūhanaṃ pajahatī''^eb^ti. jātassa jarāmaraṇehi dvidhā pariṇāmadassanaṃ, rūpasattakādivasena vā pariggahitassa taṃtaṃparicchedato paraṃ aññabhāvadassanaṃ ^b^vipariṇāmānupassanā,^eb^ tāya ^b^dhuvasaññaṃ^eb^ thirabhāvagahaṇaṃ ^b^pajahati^eb^.

[03] ^b^animittānupassanā^eb^dayo ^a^V2.0392^ea^ aniccānupassanādayo eva. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti santatiyaṃ, samūhe ca ekattasaññāya gayhamānaṃ kālantarāvaṭṭhāyibhāvena, niccabhāvena ca saṅkhārānaṃ sakiccaparicchedatāya saviggahaṃ viya upaṭṭhānamattaṃ. ^b^paṇidhi^eb^nti sukhapatthanaṃ, rāgādipaṇidhiṃ vā, atthato taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnataṃ. ^b^abhinivesa^eb^nti attābhinivesaṃ. etesañhi nimittādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena aniccānupassanādayo animittādināmehi vuttāti aniccānupassanādīhi pahātabbā niccasaññādayo viya nimittaggāhādayova paṭipakkhāti daṭṭhabbā. rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ñatvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā saṅkhārā eva bhijjanti, saṅkhārānaṃ maraṇaṃ, na añño koci atthīti bhaṅgavasena suññataṃ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā adhipaññā ca sā dhammesu ca vipassanāti ^b^adhipaññādhammavipassanā,^eb^ tāya niccasārādiādānavasena pavattaṃ abhinivesaṃ sataṇhaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahati. ^b^yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ^eb^ nāma sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ. tena ``ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna''nti ^a^M2.0418^ea^ (ma0 ni0 1.18; saṃ0 ni0 2.20) evamādikaṃ, ``issarato loko sambhavatī''ti evamādikañca ^b^sammohābhinivesaṃ pajahati^eb^. bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppannaṃ sabbabhavādīsu ādīnavadassanañāṇaṃ ^b^ādīnavānupassanā,^eb^ tāya kassacipi ālayanissayādassanato ^b^ālayābhinivesaṃ^eb^ tathāpavattaṃ taṇhaṃ ^b^pajahati^eb^. saṅkhārānaṃ muñcanassa upāyabhūtaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭisaṅkhānupassanā,^eb^ tāya aniccādīsu appaṭisaṅkhātattā paṭisaṅkhānassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ avijjaṃ pajahati. saṅkhārupekkhā, anulomañāṇañca ^b^vivaṭṭānupassanā^eb^. tassā hi vasena tassa padumapalāse udakabindu viya sabbasaṅkhārehi cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati, tasmā tāya ^b^saṃyogābhinivesaṃ^eb^ kāmasaṃyogādikilesappavattiṃ ^b^pajahati^eb^. aniccānupassanādayo satta anupassanā heṭṭhā atthato vibhattāti, parato ca saṃvaṇṇīyantīti idha na vuttā.

[03] ^b^tāsū^eb^ti aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu. ^b^iminā^eb^ti yoginā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti aniccādilakkhaṇattayavasena saṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhattā. taṃdassanañhi aniccādianupassanāti. ^b^paṭividdhā^eb^ti paṭiladdhā. yadaggena hi ñāṇena savisayo paṭividdho, tadaggena taṃ paṭiladdhaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^byañjanameva nānaṃ^eb^ yathā ``rukkho pādapo tarū''ti. ^b^tāpi^eb^ animittāpaṇihitasuññatānupassanā.

[03] ^b^sabbāpi vipassanā,^eb^ tasmā ekadesena paṭividdhā hontīti adhippāyo. ^b^kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā^eb^ ^a^V2.0393^ea^ ^b^eva saṅgahitaṃ,^eb^ tasmā taṃ pageva siddhanti attho. tenāha ^b^``idampi dvayaṃ paṭividdhameva hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^sesesu^eb^ nibbidānupassanādīsu dasasu. ^b^``kiñci paṭividdhaṃ kiñci appaṭividdha''^eb^nti iminā tesaṃ ekadesapaṭivedhamāha. aniccānupassanāya hi siddhāya nirodhānupassanā, khayānupassanā, vayānupassanā, vipariṇāmānupassanā ca ekadesena siddhā nāma honti, dukkhānupassanāya siddhāya nibbidānupassanā, ādīnavānupassanā ca, anattānupassanāya siddhāya itarāti.

[03] 723^b^.^eb^ parato ^a^M2.0419^ea^ paṭipadāñāṇadassanakathāyaṃ abbhādivigamena ākāsassa viya, paṅkamalavigamena udakassa viya, kāḷakāpagamena suvaṇṇassa viya saṃkilesavigamena ñāṇassa parisuddhīti āha ^b^``niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānena visuddhañāṇo''^eb^ti. anekākāravokārasaṅkhāresu lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇasammasanassa katattā vuttaṃ ^b^``sammasanañāṇassa pāraṃ gantvā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^sammasanañāṇassā^eb^ti nayavipassanāsaṅkhātassa kalāpasammasanañāṇassa. tasseva hi thirabhāvāya itare sammasanavisesāti vadanti. ^b^sammasanañāṇassā^eb^ti vā kalāpasammasanādisammasanañāṇassa. anupadadhammavipassanāya sadisā hi sā. tāya hi diṭṭhiugghāṭanādi sambhavatīti. vitthārato bhāvanāvidhānaṃ parato vattukāmo ^b^``saṅkhepato tāva ārabhatī''^eb^ti āha. saṅkhepato hi ārambho ādikammikassa sukaro. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti saṅkhepena ārambhe.

[03] ^b^katha^eb^nti kathetukamyatāpucchā. yaṃ ``paccuppannānaṃ...pe0... udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa''nti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ ñātabbanti ceti attho. santatipaccuppanne, khaṇapaccuppanne vā dhamme udayabbayadassanābhiniveso kātabbo, na atītānāgateti vuttaṃ ^b^``paccuppannānaṃ dhammāna''^eb^nti. udayadassanañcettha yāvadeva vayadassanatthanti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vipariṇāmānupassane paññā''^eb^ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti āha ^b^``udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa''^eb^nti.
[03] ^b^jāta^eb^nti nibbattaṃ paṭiladdhattabhāvaṃ. ayaṃ hi jātasaddo khaṇattayasamaṅgitaṃ sandhāya vutto ``ye dhammā jātā bhūtā''tiādīsu (dha0 sa0 1046) viya, na atītaṃ
[21] ``ye ^a^V2.0394^ea^ te jātā na te santi, ye na jātā tattheva te.
[22] laddhattabhāvā no bhaggā, teva santi sabhāvato''ti.. --

[25] ādīsu viya, nāpi jātatāmattaṃ ``yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhata''ntiādīsu viya. tenāha ^b^``jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna''^eb^nti (dī0 ni0 2.207; saṃ0 ni0 5.379), paccuppannarūpaṃ nāma jātaṃ khaṇattayapariyāpannanti attho. taṃ pana ādito duppariggahanti santatipaccuppannavasena vipassanābhiniveso kātabbo. ^b^tassā^eb^ti rūpassa. paccayalakkhaṇapapañcaṃ ^a^M2.0420^ea^ anāmasitvā ^b^nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo^eb^ti nibbattanasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ udayo uppādo. ^b^vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo^eb^ti vipariṇāmasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ vayo vināso. ^b^anupassanāñāṇa^eb^nti yā udayassa, vayassa ca anupekkhanā, taṃ ñāṇaṃ. kiñcāpi kalāpasammasanādīsu jātijarāmaraṇasīsena jātijarāmaraṇavanto dhammā vuttā, idha pana udayabbayañāṇaniddese ``jāti paccuppannā, tassā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.49) vuccamāne jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇavantatā, nipphannatā ca anuññātā viya hotīti taṃ pariharituṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu bhavapariyosānāva desanā katā.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ti yogī. ^b^iminā pāḷinayenā^eb^ti imāya ``jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna''ntiādinā dassitāya pāḷigatiyā. ^b^jāti^eb^nti na pasūtiṃ, na ca paṭhamābhinibbattimattaṃ, atha kho uppādaṃ nibbattivikāraṃ. svāyaṃ vikāro yasmā saṅkhārānaṃ abhinavāvaṭṭhānajarā viya navabhāvāpagamoti āha ^b^``abhinavākāra''^eb^nti. samanupassatīti sambandho. ^b^anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi^eb^ yato āgaccheyya uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā. tenāha ^b^``uppajjamāna...pe0... natthī''^eb^ti. yathā anāgate addhani ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi, evaṃ atītepi addhanīti dassento ^b^``nirujjhamānassāpī''^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā avijjamānānaṃyeva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ hetupaccayasamavāye uppādo, uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``yathā panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^rāsito^eb^ti rāsibhāvena samussito puñjo rāsi. yathā tathā piṇḍibhūto ^b^nicayo^eb^. bhūmiyaṃ nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃ ^b^nidhānaṃ^eb^. upavīṇeti etenāti ^b^upavīṇaṃ,^eb^ vīṇāvādanaṃ.

[03] 724^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0395^ea^ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^``puna yānī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^avijjāsamudayā^eb^ti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho. nirodhavirodhīhi uppādo atthibhāvavācakopi hotīti vuttovāyamattho. tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa uppādo hotīti ^a^M2.0421^ea^ attho. ^b^paccayasamudayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti paccayassa uppannabhāvena, atthibhāvatoti attho. avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikāni tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāni upādānādīnipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito ^b^``āhārasamudayā''^eb^ti. tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa paccayato udayadassanaṃ vibhāvitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. avijjātaṇhupanissayasahiteneva kammunā rūpakāyassa nibbatti. asati ca avijjupanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavo evāti. yathā ca rūpassa avijjātaṇhupanissayatā, evaṃ vedanādīnampi daṭṭhabbā. āhāro pana uppannassa rūpassa posako, kabaḷīkārāhārassa adhippetattā, kāmadhātādhiṭṭhānattā ca desanāya. ukkaṃsaniddesena vā āhāraggahaṇaṃ. ^b^``nibbattilakkhaṇa''^eb^ntiādinā kālavasena udayadassanamāha. tattha addhānavasena pageva udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. ^b^pañca lakkhaṇānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0396^ea^ avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti imesaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhātalakkhaṇāni ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni. tesaṃ atthitā hi rūpassa udayo lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti. nibbatti pana saṅkhatalakkhaṇamevāti.

[03] ^b^avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho^eb^ti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. ^b^paccayanirodhaṭṭhenā^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhātassa anāgate uppajjanakarūpapaccayassa niruddhabhāvena. ^b^taṇhānirodhā kammanirodhā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^āhāranirodhā^eb^ti pavattipaccayassa kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāve. ^b^rūpanirodho^eb^ti taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hoti. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. ^b^vipariṇāmalakkhaṇa^eb^nti bhaṅgakālavasena tesaṃ vayadassanaṃ. tasmā taṃ addhāvasena pageva passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. ^b^pañca lakkhaṇānī^eb^ti idha avijjādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho, rūpassa khaṇanirodho cāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni. tesañhi anuppādanirodho, rūpassa accantanirodho lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^vipariṇāmo^eb^ ^a^M2.0422^ea^ saṅkhatalakkhaṇameva. esa nayo vedanākkhandhādīsu. ayaṃ pana viseso -- ``phuṭṭho vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.93), ``phassapaccayā vedanā, cakkhusamphassajā vedanā, saññā, cetanā''ti, ca vacanato phasso vedanā (vibha0 231) saññā saṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ pavattipaccayo, taṃnirodhā ca tesaṃ nirodho, ^b^mahāpadāna^eb^ (dī0 ni0 2.60) ^b^mahānidāna^eb^suttesu, ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ ca aññamaññapaccayavāre ``nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa''nti (kathā0 719) vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa pavattipaccayo, taṃnirodhā tassa nirodhoti vuttaṃ ^b^``phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ettha ca keci tāva āhu ``arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ addhāsantativaseneva, na khaṇavasenā''ti. tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva na siyā. apare panāhu ``paccayato udayabbayadassane atītādivibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā sabbasādhāraṇato avijjādipaccayā vedanāsambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati, na uppādaṃ. avijjādiabhāve ca tassā asambhavaṃ alabbhamānataṃ passati, na bhaṅgaṃ. khaṇato udayabbayadassane paccuppannānaṃ uppādaṃ, bhaṅgañca passatī''ti, taṃ yuttaṃ. santativasena hi rūpārūpadhamme udayato, vayato ca manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā khaṇato udayabbayā upaṭṭhahantīti. ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto avijjādike paccayadhamme vissajjetvā udayabbayavante khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato udayabbayadassanamukhena khaṇatopi udayabbayaṃ manasi karoti.

[01] tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati, tadā rūpārūpadhammā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantā, bhijjantā ca hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``evampi rūpassa udayo''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^evampi rūpassa udayo^eb^ti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayāpi. taṇhā...pe0... kamma...pe0... āhārasamudayāpi rūpassa sambhavo. ^b^evampi rūpassa vayo^eb^ti evaṃ vuttanayeneva avijjānirodhāpi taṇhā...pe0... āhāranirodhāpi rūpassa vayo anuppādoti ^b^paccayato vitthārena manasikāraṃ karoti^eb^ ^a^V2.0397^ea^. ^b^evampi rūpaṃ udetī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttanayena nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi udeti uppajjati nippajjatīti. evaṃ vuttanayeneva vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passanto kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi ^a^M2.0423^ea^ ^b^veti^eb^ nirujjhatīti khaṇato vitthārena manasikāraṃ karotīti yojanā.

[03] 725^b^.^eb^ evaṃ manasi karoto na yāva udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppajjati, tāva udayabbayā suṭṭhu pākaṭā na hontīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``iti kirime dhammā...pe0... paṭiventī''^eb^ti, nayadassanavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. paṭhamañhi paccuppannadhammānaṃ udayabbayaṃ disvā atha atītānāgate nayaṃ neti. dukkhādisaccappabhedā, anulomādipaṭiccasamuppādappabhedā, ekattādinayappabhedā, aniccatādilakkhaṇappabhedā ca ^b^saccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇappabhedā^eb^. paṭiccasamuppādaggahaṇeneva cettha paṭiccasamuppannadhammānampi gahaṇaṃ, tesampi attano phalaṃ pati paṭicca samuppādabhāvato.

[03] 726^b^.^eb^ ^b^ya^eb^nti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, yena ñāṇenāti atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^ya^eb^nti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. ^b^khandhānaṃ samudayaṃ passati, khandhānaṃ nirodhaṃ passatī^eb^ti ettha yadetaṃ dassananti attho. ^b^yaṃ panā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ettha ca yathā avijjādisamudayanirodhato khandhānaṃ samudayanirodhassa aññattā ``avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo''tiādivacanabhedo (paṭi0 ma0 1.50) kato, na evaṃ nibbattivipariṇāmalakkhaṇehi khandhānaṃ udayabbayassa bhedo atthi abhinnādhikaraṇattāti ^b^``nibbattilakkhaṇavipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni passanto khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passatī''^eb^ti vacanabhedaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ. ^b^uppattikkhaṇeyeva hī^eb^ti ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetuattho. yasmā uppādakkhaṇeyeva nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, bhaṅgakkhaṇeyeva ca vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā tāni passanto khaṇato khandhānaṃ udayabbaye passati nāmāti ^b^``yaṃ panā''^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.

[03] 727^b^.^eb^ ^b^iccasseva^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo hetuattho. yasmā ``avijjā samudayā''tiādi paccayato khandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ, ``nibbattilakkhaṇa''ntiādi khaṇato, tasmāti attho. ^b^assā^eb^ti yogino. ^b^eva^eb^nti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. ye pana ^b^``iccassa paccayato''^eb^ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ ^b^itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. ^b^janakāvabodhato^eb^ti khandhānaṃ janakassa avijjādipaccayassa avabujjhanato ^a^V2.0398^ea^. ^b^jātidukkhāvabodhato^eb^ti jātisaṅkhātassa dukkhassa avabujjhanato. ^b^dukkhasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti^eb^ ekadesadassanena pabbatasamuddādidassanakānaṃ ^a^M2.0424^ea^ viya. ^b^maraṇadukkhāvabodhato^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^``paccayānuppādenā''^eb^ti etena paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho idha paccayanirodhoti dasseti. ^b^paccayavata^eb^nti paccayato uppajjanakānaṃ. ^b^yañcassa udayabbayadassana^eb^nti yaṃ assa yogino paccayato, khaṇato ca udayabbayānaṃ dassanaṃ. tattha asammoho, tappadhāno vā vitakkādidhammapuñjo ^b^maggo vāyaṃ lokiko^eb^ti niyyānānulomato lokiko maggo evāyaṃ. ^b^iti^eb^ tasmā ^b^maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti^eb^ sabhāvāvabodhato. tenāha ^b^``tatra sammohavighātato''^eb^ti, tadaṅgavasenāti attho. atha vā yathāvutto sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto maggo ariyamaggassa upāyabhūto asammohasabhāvo attānampi pakāseti padīpo viyāti maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. svāyaṃ pākaṭabhāvo mohandhakāravidhamanenāti āha ^b^``tatra sammohavighātato''^eb^ti.

[03] 728^b^.^eb^ ``avijjāpaccayā''tiādiko ^b^anulomo paṭiccasamuppādo^eb^ pavattiyā anulomanato. ``avijjāsamudayā''tiādinā avijjādīsu santesūti ayamattho vuttoti āha ^b^``imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti avabodhato''^eb^ti. pavattiyā vilomanato ``avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā''tiādiko ^b^paṭilomo paṭiccasamuppādo. te ca^eb^ saṅkhatā ^b^paṭiccasamuppannā^eb^ ``jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna''ntiādivacanato (saṃ0 ni0 2.20). paṭiccasamuppannassa ca pākaṭatā paccayākārapākaṭatāya eva ``imassetaṃ phala''nti avabodhato.

[03] 729^b^.^eb^ purimapurimānaṃ nirodho uttaruttarānaṃ uppādānubandhoti ayamattho paccayato udayadassanena sijjhamāno ekattanayādhigamāya hoti. yato ``añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 2.17) vohārasiddhiyā ucchedadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā. tenāha ^b^``hetuphalasambandhenā''^eb^tiādi. saṅkhārā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantīti ayamattho khaṇato udayadassanena sijjhamāno nānattanayādhigamāya hoti. yato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sabhāvabhedāvabodhato ``so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedayatī''tiādinayappavattāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā. tenāha ^b^``khaṇato udayadassanenā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^paccayato^eb^ ^a^M2.0425^ea^ ^b^udayabbayadassanena^eb^ paccaye sati phalassa bhāvo, asati abhāvoti imassa atthassa siddhiyā atthitāmatteneva te dhammā kāraṇanti ^b^abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti^eb^. yato attadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā vasavattitāya alabbhaneyyato ^a^V2.0399^ea^. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``dhammāna''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^avasavattibhāvo^eb^ parāyattatā, sā ca sappaccayatāya veditabbā. ^b^paccayato udayadassanena^eb^ tehi tehi paccayehi ime dhammā uppajjanti, uppajjamānā ca paccayānurūpameva uppajjantīti hetuphalassa hetuanurūpato siddhiyā akiriyadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatāvāti āha ^b^``paccayato panā''^eb^tiādi. sati kāraṇe kuto akiriyavādo. karotīti hi ^b^kāraṇaṃ^eb^.

[03] 730^b^.^eb^ paccayato udayaṃ passato paccaye sati sabhāve sati phalassa sambhavoti atthitāmattena upakārakatāti saṅkhatānaṃ nirīhatā, asati ca abhāvoti paccayādhīnavuttitā ca viññāyamānā attasuññataṃ vibhāvetīti āha ^b^``paccayato cassa...pe0... tāvabodhato''^eb^ti. ^b^aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti^eb^ khaṇato udayabbayadassanena saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayato paricchinnatāya viññāyamānattā. tenāha ^b^``hutvā abhāvāvabodhato''^eb^ti. uppajjitvā nirujjhanañhi ^b^hutvā abhāvo. pubbantāparantaviveko^eb^ atītānāgatabhāvasuññatā. na hi saṅkhārā khaṇattayato pubbe, pacchā ca vijjanti, tasmā ^b^pubbantāparantavivekāvabodhato^eb^ti ādiantavantatāpaṭivedhatoti attho. ^b^dukkhalakkhaṇampi pākaṭaṃ hoti^eb^ udayabbayadassanenāti sambandho. uppajjitvā bhijjantā saṅkhārā uppādato uddhaṃ jarābhaṅgāvatthantaruppattiyā nirantaraṃ vibādhīyanteva. sā ca nesaṃ vibādhiyamānatā sammā udayabbayadassanena vibhūtā hotīti āha ^b^``dukkha...pe0... bodhato''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^sabhāvalakkhaṇampī^eb^ti udayabbayadassanena na kevalaṃ aniccadukkhalakkhaṇameva, atha kho pathavīphassādīnaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādisaññitaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇampi pākabhāvaviddhaṃ sabhāvāvacchinnaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. tenāha ^b^``udayabbayaparicchinnāvabodhato''^eb^ti. ^b^sabhāvalakkhaṇe^eb^ti sabhāvasaññite lakkhaṇe, taṃtaṃdhammānaṃ salakkhaṇe. ^b^saṅkhatalakkhaṇassa tāvakālikattampī^eb^ti uppādādisaṅkhatalakkhaṇassa uppādakkhaṇādiparittakālikatāpi khaṇantarānavaṭṭhānato ^a^M2.0426^ea^ tassa. tenāha ^b^``udayakkhaṇe''^eb^tiādi. ^b^udayavaya^eb^mattaggahaṇañcettha udayabbayadassanavaseneva imassa ñāṇassa pavattanato, na ṭhitikkhaṇassa abhāvā.

[03] 731^b^.^eb^ ^b^na kevalañca niccanavā,^eb^ atha kho parittakālaṭṭhāyino. kathanti āha ^b^``sūriyuggamane''^eb^tiādi. tattha udake daṇḍena katalekhā ^b^udake daṇḍarāji. ussāvabindu^eb^ādayo pañca kiccāpi uttaruttari atiparittaṭṭhāyibhāvadassanatthaṃ nidassitā, tathāpi te dandhanirodhā eva ^a^V2.0400^ea^ nidassitā, tatopi lahutaranirodhattā saṅkhārānaṃ. tathā hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca bandhakhuradhārā sannipātatopi sīghataro rūpadhammānaṃ nirodho vutto, pageva arūpadhammānaṃ. na kevalaṃ niccanavā, nāpi parittakālaṭṭhāyinova, atha kho asārā. kathanti āha ^b^``māyā''^eb^tiādi. māyādayo hi maṇiādivasena dissamānā ataṃsabhāvatāya ^b^asārā^eb^. tattha mantosadhabhāvitā indajālādikā ^b^māyā^eb^. migataṇhikā ^b^marīci^eb^. supinameva ^b^supinantaṃ^eb^. maṇḍalākārena āvijjhiyamānaṃ alātameva ^b^alātacakkaṃ^eb^. gandhabbadevaputtānaṃ kīḷanicchāvasena nagaraṃ viya ākāse upaṭṭhānamattaṃ ^b^gandhabbanagaraṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti yvāyaṃ ``jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna''ntiādipāḷinayānusārena (paṭi0 ma0 1.49), ``yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna''ntiādipāḷinayānusārena (ma0 ni0 1.347, 361; 2.113; 3.86, 89; paṭi0 ma0 1.48) vā yāva udayabbayapaṭivedhā bhāvanāvidhi āraddho, ettāvatā. kalāpasammasanādikopi hi sabbo bhāvanāvidhi udayabbayañāṇuppādanasseva, na parisaparisarīrakarabandhoti. ^b^vayadhammamevā^eb^ti bhijjanasabhāvameva. ^b^vayaṃ upeti^eb^ attano dhammatāya. yañhi upakkamena vinassatīti vuccati, tampi attano dhammatāya eva vinassati ahetukattā vināsassa. upakkamahetu pana visadisuppādo hoti. ^b^iminā ākārenā^eb^ti ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti (saṃ0 ni0 5.1081; mahāva0 16; paṭi0 ma0 2.30) hi vuttaṃ, tasmā vayaṃ anālambitvāpi ``vayadhammameva uppajjatī''ti udayassa, ``uppannañca idaṃ vayaṃ upetī''ti vayassa ca iminā yathāvuttena paccakkhakaraṇākārena. adhunā uppannaṃ, na tāva balappattanti āha ^b^``taruṇavipassanāñāṇa''^eb^nti. kalāpasammasanādivasena pavattaṃ ^a^M2.0427^ea^ sammasanaṃ na nippariyāyena vipassanāsamaññaṃ labhati, udayabbayānupassanādivasena pavattameva labhatīti āha ^b^``yassādhigamā āraddhavipassakoti saṅkhaṃ gacchatī''^eb^ti.

[03] 732^b^.^eb^ ^b^imāya^eb^ udayabbayānupassanāsaṅkhātāya ^b^taruṇavipassanāya^eb^ vasena, na āraddhavipassanānaṃ bhaṅgānupassanādisaṅkhātāya taruṇavipassanāya, nāpi nibbidānupassanādisaṅkhātāya ^a^V2.0401^ea^ balavavipassanāya vasenāti attho. na hi tadā vipassanupakkilesā uppajjantīti. ^b^āraddhavipassakassā^eb^ti ca āraddhavipassakassevāti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭho. tenāha ^b^``vipassanupakkilesā hī''^eb^tiādi. diṭṭhigāhādivatthubhāvena vipassanaṃ upakkilesantīti ^b^vipassanupakkilesā. ``ariyasāvakassā''^eb^ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena vuttaṃ balavavipassanāpattassāpi anuppajjanato. ^b^vippaṭipannakassā^eb^ti sīlavipattiādivasena yathā tathā vippaṭipannakassa. tassa pana paṭipattiyā garahitabbataṃ dassento ^b^``vippaṭipannakassā''^eb^ti āha. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo uparipadadvayepi yojetabbo. ^b^nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassā^eb^ti vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā antarā vosānaṃ āpannassa. ^b^kusītapuggalassā^eb^ti sīlasampannasseva kosajjena bhāvanaṃ ananuyuñjantassa. atha vā ^b^vippaṭipannakassā^eb^ti vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātāya sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvena vigarahitapaṭipattikassa. vipassanāpaṭipattiyeva hi sasambhārā pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipatti, tadaññā vippaṭipatti, sā ca tattha nikkhittadhurassa hoti. nikkhittadhuratā ca kosajjenāti vuttaṃ ^b^``nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassa kusītapuggalassā''^eb^ti. ^b^yuttappayuttassā^eb^ti yogena ñāṇena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa. sā pana yuttappayuttatā samathavasenāpi hotīti āha ^b^``āraddhavipassakassā''^eb^ti. ^b^uppajjantiyeva^eb^ na nuppajjanti aññathā maggāmaggañāṇasseva asambhavato.

[03] obhāsādīsu ``ariyadhammo''ti pavattaṃ uddhaccaṃ vikkhepo dhammuddhaccaṃ, tena dhammuddhaccena vipassanāvīthito ukkamanena virūpaṃ gahitaṃ pavattitaṃ mānasaṃ ^b^dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṃ. obhāso dhammo^eb^ti kāraṇūpacārenāha, īdisaṃ obhāsaṃ vissajjento mama ariyamaggoti attho. obhāsaṃ āvajjati ``nibbāna''nti vā ``maggo''ti vā ``phala''nti vā. ^b^nibbāna^eb^nti gaṇhanto ^a^M2.0428^ea^ tattha pavattadhamme maggaphalabhāvena gaṇhāti, ñāṇādike pana maggaphalabhāveneva gaṇhāti. ^b^tato vikkhepo uddhacca^eb^nti tato obhāsahetu yo vikkhepo, taṃ uddhaccanti attho. ^b^``uddhaccena viggahitamānaso''^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``aniccato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03] tattha ^b^anicca...pe0... nappajānāti^eb^ ``maggaṃ pattosmī''ti saññāya aniccatādivasena manasikārasseva abhāvato. ayañca attho --

[02] ``yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ ^a^V2.0402^ea^ byākaroti, sabbo so catūhi maggehi, etesaṃ vā aññatarena. katamehi catūhi? idhāvuso, bhikkhu samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāveti, tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati, so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato...pe0... karoto saṃyojanāni pahīyanti anusayā byantīhonti.
[02] ``puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāveti...pe0... samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti...pe0....

[02] ``puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti, hoti so, āvuso, samayo yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati, tassa maggo sañjāyati...pe0... anusayā byantīhontī''ti (a0 ni0 4.170) --

[25] iminā suttapadeneva veditabbo. ettha hi catutthamaggavissajjane yathāvuttamaggaphalanibbānadhammā ^b^dhammo^eb^. tattha ^b^uddhaccaṃ^eb^ ``adhigatamaggādikohamasmī''ti amaggādīsu vikkhepo dhammuddhaccaṃ, tena upaddutaṃ ^b^viggahitamānasaṃ^eb^ hoti. ^b^nikanti^eb^ obhāsādīsu apekkhā sukhumarūpā taṇhā, sā vipassanābhiratiākārena upaṭṭhahantī adhimānikena ``dhammo''ti gayhatīti āha ^b^``nikanti `dhammo'ti nikantiṃ āvajjatī''^eb^ti.

[03] 733^b^.^eb^ ^b^vipassanobhāso^eb^ti vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ, sasantatipatitaṃ utusamuṭṭhānañca bhāsuraṃ rūpaṃ. tattha ^b^vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ^eb^ yogino ^a^M2.0429^ea^ sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pattharati, taṃ tasseva paññāyati, tena phuṭṭhokāse rūpagatampi passati, passanto ca cakkhuviññāṇena passati, udāhu manoviññāṇenāti vīmaṃsitabbanti vadanti. dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti vuttaṃ viya dissatīti. ^b^vipassanāvīthi^eb^ nāma paṭipāṭiyā pavattamānā vipassanāva. ^b^ukkantā nāma hoti^eb^ yoginā ``maggappattomhī''ti adhimānena vissaṭṭhattā, tassa vā ^a^V2.0403^ea^ yogino vipassanā tato eva vīthi ukkantā nāma hoti. ^b^mūlakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti vipassanamevāha.

[03] ^b^vemattatāyā^eb^ti appavipulatāvasena visadisatāya. ^b^assā^eb^ti obhāsassa. dvīhi kuṭṭehi paricchinnaṃ gehaṃ ^b^dvikuṭṭagehaṃ^eb^. tassa kira abbhantarepi ekā bhitti hoti bahipi, ubhinnaṃ antare anupariyāyapathaṃ hoti, sāyanhe tattha santharitāni ^b^pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni,^eb^ visadañāṇassa obhāsena pharitaṭṭhāne rūpagatañca dibbacakkhuno viya ^b^paññāyanti^eb^. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``bhante mayha''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] evaṃ obhāsassa vemattatāya vatthuṃ dassetvā cirakālavippalambane vatthuṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ayaṃ panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ayaṃ pana vipassanupakkileso^eb^ti vakkhamānappakāraṃ sandhāyāha, na sabbaṃ. ^b^so^eb^ti so samathavipassanālābhī adhimāniko.
[03] ^b^divāsane^eb^ti divāṭṭhāne nisīditabbāasane. paṭhamaṃ ``pañhaṃ pucchissāmī''ti cintitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``pañhaṃ, bhante, pucchituṃ āgatomhī''^eb^ti.

[03] pacchā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ viññāpetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojessāmīti cintitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṃ āgato''^eb^ti, tassa ca padhānattā sāvadhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^ayaṃ dhammo^eb^ti ayaṃ ariyamaggānugato paṭisambhidādhammoti therassa ajjhāsayavasena vadati. ^b^samādhi^eb^nti abhiññāsamādhiṃ. ^b^añcitakaṇṇo^eb^ti niccalaṭṭhapitakaṇṇapuṭo. ^b^palāyituṃ āraddho^eb^ bhayena. tenāha ^b^``thero kira dosacarito''^eb^ti. dosacaritassa hi sūrassāpi sahasā bhayaṃ uppajjati. tenassa khīṇāsavatthero ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ``iminā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī''ti ^a^M2.0430^ea^ hatthinimmāpanādimakāsi. dosacaritattā hi thero khippaṃ paṭivijjhi. khippavirāgī hi dosacarito.

[03] 734^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassā^eb^ti udayabbayañāṇaṃ matthakaṃ pāpentassa yogino. ``evampi rūpaṃ udeti, evampi rūpaṃ vetī''tiādinā udayabbayānupassanamevettha tulanaṃ, tīraṇañca veditabbaṃ. yathā devānamindena khittaṃ vajiraṃ amoghaṃ, appaṭihatañca hoti, evamidampi ñāṇaṃ nipuṇaṃ udayabbayadassaneti ^a^V2.0404^ea^ vuttaṃ ^b^``vissaṭṭhaindavajiramivā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^tikhiṇa^eb^nti akuṇṭhaṃ. ^b^sūra^eb^nti tejavantaṃ. ^b^ativisada^eb^nti nisitabhāvena ativiya paṭutaraṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. tathā hinena yogī ``maggappattosmī''ti maññati.

[03] ^b^vipassanāpītī^eb^ti vipassanācittasampayuttā pīti. khuddakādayo pītiyo heṭṭhā vaṇṇitā eva. yasmā udayabbayānupassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya anukkamena pañca pītiyo uppajjanti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``ayaṃ pañca...pe0... uppajjatī''^eb^ti. matthakappattena pana udayabbayañāṇena saddhiṃ pharaṇāpītiyeva hoti. upacārappanākkhaṇato aññadāpi hi pharaṇāpīti hotiyeva. tenāha ^b^``sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā uppajjatī''^eb^ti.

[03] passaddhiādīni cha yugaḷakāni aññamaññāviyoginīti passaddhiyā uppannāya itarāpi uppannā eva hontīti kiccadassanamukhena tā sabbāpi dassento ^b^``kāyacittānaṃ neva daratho, na gārava''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha kāyaggahaṇena rūpakāyassapi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, na vedanādikkhandhattayasseva. kāyappassaddhiādayo hi rūpakāyassāpi darathādinimmaddikāti. ^b^kāyacittāni passaddhāni...pe0... ujukāniyeva honti^eb^ tesaṃ apassaddhādibhāvassa hetubhūtānaṃ uddhaccādithinamiddhādidiṭṭhimānādisesanīvaraṇādiassaddhiyādimāyāsātheyyādisaṃkilesadhammānaṃ vidhamanavasena tadā vipassanācittuppādassa pavattanato. ^b^tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti tasmiṃ udayabbayañāṇuppattisamaye. manussānaṃ ayanti mānusī, manussayoggā kāmasukharati, tādisehi manussavisesehi anubhavitabbatānativattanato dibbā ratipi saṅgahitā, mānusīsadisatāya kāmasukhabhāvena dibbā ratipi vā, tassā atikkantatāya na mānusīti ^b^amānusī^eb^.

[03] ^b^suññāgāra^eb^nti ^a^M2.0431^ea^ yaṃ kiñci vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ, vipassanaṃ eva vā. sāpi hi niccabhāvādisuññatāya, yogino sukhasannissayatāya ca ``suññāgāra''nti vattabbataṃ labhati. cittassa anupassanakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ vigamena ^b^santacittassa^eb^. saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanena ^b^bhikkhuno. sammā^eb^ ñāyena rūpārūpadhammānaṃ udayabbayānupassanādivasena ^b^vipassato^eb^. sammasato anāraddhavipassanānaṃ manussānaṃ avisayatāya ^b^amānusī^eb^. vipassanāpītisukhasaññitā ^b^rati hotī^eb^ti ayamettha gāthāya saṅkhepattho. dutiyagāthā pana udayabbayañāṇameva sandhāya vuttā. tattha ^b^yato yato^eb^ti rūpato vā arūpato vā.

[03] ^b^vipassanāsukha^eb^nti ^a^V2.0405^ea^ vipassanācittasampayuttaṃ cetasikasukhaṃ. yasmā taṃsamuṭṭhitehi atipaṇītarūpehi sabbo kāyo pariphuṭo, paribrūhito ca hoti. tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``sakalasarīraṃ abhisandayamāna''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^adhimokkhoti saddhā,^eb^ na yevāpanakādhimokkhoti adhippāyo. sā cettha na kammaphalaṃ, ratanattayaṃ vā saddahanavasena pavattā, atha kho kilesakālussiyāpagamena sampayuttānaṃ ativiya pasannabhāvahetubhūtā. tenāha ^b^``vipassanāsampayuttā...pe0... saddhā uppajjatī''^eb^ti.
[03] purimuppannabhāvanābalasaṃsiddhaṃ samappavattaṃ vīriyaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhato kosajjato paggaṇhanato ^b^paggaho^eb^. tenāha ^b^``paggahoti vīriya''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] ^b^supaṭṭhitā^eb^ti sabhāvasallakkhaṇena ārammaṇe suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā. ^b^supatiṭṭhitā^eb^ti paṭipakkhavigamena tena acalanīyatāya suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. tato eva nikhātā viya ^b^acalā^eb^. acalabhāveneva ^b^pabbatarājasadisā^eb^ti tīhipi padehi supatiṭṭhitameva dasseti. ^b^so^eb^ti yogāvacaro. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti yaṃ yaṃ attano upatiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā. ^b^okkhanditvā^eb^ti anupavisitvā. ^b^pakkhinditvā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍabhūtassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa upaṭṭhahante paralokasaññite satte sandhāyāha ^b^``dibbacakkhuno paraloko viyā''^eb^ti na dibbacakkhuno paralokavisayattā. vaṇṇāyatanavisayañhi tanti. ^b^assa^eb^ sati ^b^upaṭṭhāti^eb^ khāyati, upatiṭṭhatīti vā attho. yadaggena hi sati ārammaṇaṃ okkhanditvā ^a^M2.0432^ea^ upatiṭṭhati, tadaggena ārammaṇampissa okkhanditvā upatiṭṭhatīti vuccati.

[03] vicinitavisayattā saṅkhārānaṃ vicinane majjhattabhāvena ṭhitā ^b^vipassanupekkhā^eb^. sā pana atthato tathāpavattā tatramajjhattupekkhāva. manodvārāvajjanacittasampayuttā cetanā āvajjane ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā ^b^``āvajjanupekkhā''^eb^ti vuttā. udayabbayānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhānato tadanupassanāyaṃ majjhattabhūtā idha ^b^vipassanupekkhā^eb^ nāma. te pana udayabbayā sabbasaṅkhārānanti āha ^b^``sabbasaṅkhāresu majjhattabhūtā''^eb^ti. āvajjanāya indavajiratattanārācasadisatā, sūratikkhabhāvo ca sabbaññutaññāṇapurecarā viya tadanucarañāṇassa tathābhāvena daṭṭhabbā.

[03] ^b^vipassanānikantī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0406^ea^ vipassanāya nikāmanā apekkhā. obhāsādayo vipassanāya vijambhanabhūtā tassā alaṅkāro viya hontīti āha ^b^``obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^ālaya^eb^nti apekkhaṃ. ^b^sukhumā, santākārā^eb^ti sukhumākārā, santākārā ca, sā cassā sukhumasantākāratā bhāvanāya sātisayappavattiyā, yato kilesabhāvopissā duviññeyyo hoti. tenāha ^b^``yā nikanti kilesoti...pe0... hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^etesupī^eb^ti yathādassitesu ñāṇādīsupi. ^b^``aññatarasmiṃ uppanne''^eb^ti idaṃ uppanne aññatarasmiṃ ``maggappattomhī''tiādiggahaṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na aññataraññatarasseva uppajjanato. na vāpi hi upakkilesā ekakkhaṇepi uppajjanti, paccavekkhaṇā pana visuṃ visuṃ hoti. ^b^``na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā nikanti uppannapubbā''^eb^ti idaṃ dhammasabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ, na pana tadā yogino tathācittappavattivasena. na hi so tadā taṃ ``nikantī''ti jānāti, tathā sati tabbisayassa ``maggappattomhī''tiādiggahaṇassa asambhavo eva. tasmā evamassa siyā ``na vata me evarūpā bhāvanābhirati uppannapubbā, addhā maggappattomhī''ti.

[03] 735^b^.^eb^ ^b^upakkilesavatthutāyā^eb^ti nippariyāyato diṭṭhimānataṇhā idha upakkilesā tesaṃ vatthutāya uppattiṭṭhānatāya. na sabhāvatoti āha ^b^``na akusalattā''^eb^ti. yathā pana obhāsādayo, evaṃ nikantipi diṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ^a^M2.0433^ea^ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``upakkilesavatthu cā''^eb^ti. ^b^vatthuvasenevā^eb^ti gāhe anāmasitvā gāhānaṃ vatthutāvaseneva. attavādī hi ``ahaṃbuddhinibandhano''ti parikappito attā obhāsassa sāmibhūto ``mamā''ti sāmivacanassa visayabhāvena gahitoti āha ^b^``mama obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhigāho''^eb^ti. obhāsassa manāpaggahaṇamukhena tena attānaṃ seyyādito dahatīti vuttaṃ ^b^``manāpo vata obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato mānagāho''^eb^ti. ^b^assādayato^eb^ti sampiyāyato. ^b^tesa^eb^nti diṭṭhigāhādisaññitānaṃ upakkilesānaṃ vasena. ^b^obhāsādīsū^eb^ti obhāsādinimittaṃ. kampanaṃ yathāraddhavipassanāya aṭṭhatvā vikkhepāpatti, sā ca obhāsādīsu taṇhādigāhoti dassento ^b^``obhāsādīsu kampati...pe0... samanupassatī''^eb^ti āha.

[03] obhāsanimittaṃ cittaṃ vikampatīti sambandho. obhāse vā visayabhūte upakkilesehi cittaṃ ^a^V2.0407^ea^ vikampatīti yojanā. tenāha ^b^``yehi cittaṃ pavedhatī''^eb^ti. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^upaṭṭhāne^eb^ti satiyaṃ. ^b^upekkhāya cā^eb^ti vipassanupekkhāya ca.

[03] 736^b^.^eb^ ^b^kusalo panā^eb^tiādīsu kammaṭṭhānakosallayogena ^b^kusalo^eb^. paripakkañāṇatāya ^b^paṇḍito^eb^. āgamabyattiyā ^b^byatto^eb^. upakkilesatabbisodhanesu ādīnavānisaṃsāvabodhayogato ^b^buddhisampanno. ayaṃ kho so^eb^ti yo so ācariyena kammaṭṭhānadānakāle udayabbayañāṇuppattisamaye uppajjatīti vutto, ayaṃ kho so obhāso uppannoti upakkilesavatthubhāvavavatthānaṃ dassetvā idānissa vipassanāya visayabhāvūpanayanavidhiṃ dassento ^b^``so kho panā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha paṭhamanaye aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanameva dassitaṃ, tasmiṃ siddhe itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti. dutiyanaye pana obhāsādike nissāya uppajjanakadiṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ugghāṭanasamugghāṭanapariyādānavasena manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sace obhāso attā bhaveyyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. arūpasattake ``sace saṅkhārā attā bhaveyyu''ntiādi ^a^M2.0434^ea^ (visuddhi0 2.721) sabbasaṅkhārasaṅgaṇhanavasena sāmaññato vuttaṃ, idha obhāsādivasena saṅkhāre vibhajja vuttaṃ. seso manasikāravidhi tattha vuttanayovāti āha ^b^``sabbaṃ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabba''^eb^nti.

[03] obhāsaṃ ``netaṃ mamā''ti samanupassanto taṇhāgāhato cittaṃ visodheti, ``nesohamasmī''ti samanupassanto mānagāhato, ``na meso attā''ti samanupassanto diṭṭhigāhato. tenāha ^b^``obhāsaṃ netaṃ mamā''^eb^tiādi. esa nayo ñāṇādīsupi.

[03] ^b^imāni dasa ṭhānānī^eb^ti imāni yathāvuttāni obhāsādīni dasa upakkilesakāraṇāni. ^b^paññā yassa pariccitā^eb^ti yassa yogino paññā obhāsādīsu aniccatādiggahaṇavasena paricitavatī pariggahetvā upaparikkhitvā ṭhitā. dhammuddhaccassa samaggabhāvajānanena ^b^dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti^eb^.
[03] ^b^vīthipaṭipanna^eb^nti udayabbayānupassanāvasena vipassanāvīthipaṭipannaṃ.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhivisuddhiya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0408^ea^ diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṃ adhigatāyaṃ, diṭṭhivisuddhiñāṇena vā diṭṭhiyā visodhane dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti dukkhasaccapariyāpannassa nāmarūpassa vavatthānato. nāmarūpassa paccayā nāmarūpasamudayapakkhiyāti āha ^b^``kaṅkhā...pe0... samudayasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kata''^eb^nti. abhidhammanayena hi sabbakilesā, kammañca samudayasaccaṃ. ^b^imissa^eb^nti imāyaṃ. ^b^sammā^eb^ti aviparītaṃ. ^b^maggassā^eb^ti ariyamaggassa upāyabhūtamaggassa.
[06] maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti vīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 737^b^.^eb^ vipassanācārassa ^a^M2.0435^ea^ ^a^V2.0409^ea^ matthakappattiyā saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ ^b^sikhāppattā vipassanā^eb^. sikhāppatti panassa udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ attaṭṭhamānaṃvasena jātāti āha ^b^``aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā''^eb^ti. oḷārikoḷārikassa saccapaṭicchādakamohatamassa vigamanena saccappaṭivedhānukūlattā ^b^``saccānulomikañāṇa''^eb^nti anulomañāṇamāha. tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``aṭṭhannanti cā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha udayabbayadassanena saṅkhārānaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, tadanusārena itaralakkhaṇāni ca vibhāventīyeva udayabbayānupassanā pavattatīti katvā ^b^``vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ udayabbayānupassanāñāṇa''^eb^nti vuttanti keci. tayidaṃ tassa sabbaso tīraṇapariññābhāvameva maññamānehi vuttaṃ. kiñcāpi hi udayabbayañāṇaṃ tīraṇapariññantogadhameva, udayabbayādīnaṃ pana jānanaṭṭhena, paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena ca ñāṇadassanāni, udayabbayañāṇādīni. tāniyeva paṭipakkhato visuddhattā ñāṇadassanavisuddhi, sā eva ariyamaggo paṭipajjati etāyāti paṭipadā cāti ^b^paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhī^eb^ti vuttaṃ. taṃ pana uppannamattaṃ appaguṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. paguṇañhi niccasaññādipahānasiddhiyā pahānapariññāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. yato tadavigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatā eva honti. na hi udayabbayānaṃ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṃ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhapahānaṃ sambhavati. asati ca paṭipakkhapahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṃ vajiramiva avihatavegatā, tikhiṇavisadāditā vā. tasmā paguṇabhāvappattaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ pahānapariññāpakkhiyameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgasseva anupassanā bhaṅgānupassanā, tadeva ñāṇaṃ ^b^bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ^eb^. yathābhūtadassāvī bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ, tebhūmakadhammā, tesu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu bhāyitabbākāragāhiñāṇaṃ ^b^bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ^eb^. muñcituṃ icchatīti muñcitukamyaṃ, cittaṃ, puggalo vā, tassa bhāvo muñcitukamyatā ^a^V2.0410^ea^, tadeva ñāṇaṃ ^b^muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ^eb^. puna ^a^M2.0436^ea^ paṭisaṅkhānākārena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ^eb^. nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṃ upekkhanavasena pavattañāṇaṃ ^b^saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ. tasmā^eb^ti yasmā upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇādinavavidhañāṇaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi, tasmā.

[03] 738^b^.^eb^ ^b^``upakkilesavimutta''^eb^nti visesanena vibhāvitamatthaṃ anavabujjhanto codako ^b^``puna udayabbayañāṇe yogo kimatthiyo''^eb^ti pucchati. tattha ^b^kimatthiyo^eb^ti kiṃ payojano niratthako, pageva nibbattitattā pakkassa pacanaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. atha vā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇādihetupaṭipāṭiggahaṇavasena tamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo ācariyova kathetukamyatāvasena ^b^``kimatthiyo''^eb^ti pucchati. ^b^lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇattho^eb^ti aniccādilakkhaṇānaṃ sammadeva upadhāraṇattho. tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^``udayabbayañāṇaṃ hī''^eb^tiādimāha. nanu ca udayabbayañāṇaṃ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayameva passati, na aniccādilakkhaṇattayaṃ, tena kathaṃ aniccatādilakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇaṃ hotīti? na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ``udayabbayañāṇaṃ lakkhaṇattayavisayaṃ hotī''ti. udayabbaye pana paṭividdhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. tato ``yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.15; 45, 77; 4.1, 4; paṭi0 ma0 2.10) itaralakkhaṇampi. atha vā udayabbayaggahaṇena hutvā abhāvākāro, abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanākāro, avasavattanākāro ca vibhūtataro hotīti kāraṇabhāvena udayabbayañāṇe yogassa lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇatthatā veditabbā, na sammukheneva. ^b^heṭṭhā^eb^ti maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhito heṭṭhā. tañhi obhāsādiuppattihetutāya tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattampi diṭṭhiādīhi upakkiliṭṭhattā kuṇṭhaṃ avisadameva jātaṃ. tenāha ^b^``dasahi...pe0... nāsakkhī''^eb^ti.

[03] 739^b^.^eb^ ^b^amanasikārā^eb^ti hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. ^b^``kissa amanasikārā''^eb^ti hi idaṃ ``kena paṭicchannattā''ti pucchitassa paṭicchādakassa hetupucchā. santatiyā hissa paṭicchannattā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, sā ca santati udayabbayāmanasikārena paṭicchādikā jātā. iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, te ca iriyāpathā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātā. ghanena paṭicchannattā anattalakkhaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0437^ea^ na upaṭṭhāti, te ca ghanā nānādhātuvinibbhogāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātāti. udayabbayaṃ passato ^a^V2.0411^ea^ na udayāvatthā vayāvatthaṃ pāpuṇāti, vayāvatthā vā udayāvatthaṃ. aññova udayakkhaṇo, aññova vayakkhaṇoti ekopi dhammo khaṇavasena bhedato upaṭṭhāti, pageva atītādikoti āha ^b^``udayabbayaṃ pana...pe0... upaṭṭhātī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^santatiyā vikopitāyā^eb^ti pubbāpariyena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ aññoññabhāvasallakkhaṇena santatiyā ugghāṭitāya. na hi sammadeva udayabbayaṃ sallakkhentassa dhammā sambandhabhāvena upaṭṭhahanti, atha kho ayosalākā viya asambandhabhāvenāti suṭṭhutaraṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasi katvā^eb^ti yathāpariggahitaudayabbayavasena saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ paṭipīḷiyamānataṃ vibādhiyamānataṃ manasi karitvā. ^b^iriyāpathe ugghāṭite^eb^ti iriyāpathe labbhamānadukkhapaṭicchādakabhāve ugghāṭite. ekasmiñhi iriyāpathe uppannassa dukkhassa vinodakaṃ iriyāpathantaraṃ tassa paṭicchādakaṃ viya hoti, evaṃ sesāpīti iriyāpathānaṃ taṃtaṃdukkhapaṭicchādakabhāve yāthāvato ñāte tesaṃ dukkhapaṭicchādakabhāvo ugghāṭito nāma hoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ dukkhābhitunnatāya pākaṭabhāvato. tenāha ^b^``dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhātī''^eb^ti. ^b^nānādhātuyo^eb^ti nānāvidhā pathavīādidhātuyo nānāvidhe sabhāvadhamme. ^b^vinibbhujitvā^eb^ti ``aññā pathavīdhātu, aññā āpodhātū''tiādinā, ``añño phasso, aññā vedanā''tiādinā ca visuṃ visuṃ katvā. ^b^ghanavinibbhoge kate^eb^ti samūhaghane, kiccārammaṇaghane ca pabhedite. yā hesā aññamaññūpatthaddhesu samuditesu rūpārūpadhammesu ekattābhinivesavasena aparimadditasaṅkhārehi gayhamānā ^b^samūhaghanatā,^eb^ tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccabhedassa satipi paṭiniyatabhāve ekato gayhamānā ^b^kiccaghanatā,^eb^ tathā sārammaṇadhammānaṃ satipi ārammaṇakaraṇabhede ekato gayhamānā ^b^ārammaṇaghanatā^eb^ ca, tā dhātūsu ñāṇena vinibbhujitvā dissamānā hatthena parimajjiyamāno pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilayaṃ gacchanti, ``yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā suññā ete dhammā dhammamattā''ti anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ hoti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``nānādhātuyo...pe0... upaṭṭhātī''^eb^ti.

[03] 740^b^.^eb^ dhuvabhāvapaṭikkhepato ^a^M2.0438^ea^ na niccanti ^b^aniccaṃ,^eb^ khandhapañcakaṃ. yathāha ``rūpaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ, vedanā... saññā... saṅkhārā... viññāṇaṃ anicca''nti (saṃ0 ni0 3.172). tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanto ^b^``uppādavayaññathattabhāvā''^eb^ti āha. ^b^uppādo^eb^ nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, ^b^vayo^eb^ vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ, ^b^aññathattaṃ^eb^ jarā, tesaṃ sabbhāvatoti attho. ^b^hutvā abhāvato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0412^ea^ uppajjitvā vinassanato. ettha ca purimena jātijarāmaraṇasabbhāvato ^b^anicca^eb^nti dasseti, dutiyena pākabhāvaviddhaṃsābhāvato. yassa bhāvena khandhapañcakaṃ ``anicca''nti vuccati, taṃ aniccalakkhaṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^``uppādavayaññathatta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tena hi taṃ ``anicca''nti lakkhīyati. ^b^ākāravikāro^eb^ti ākāravikati. abhāvākāro hi vikatirūpena labbhati, virūpattā na uppādākāro. ^b^ākāravikāro^eb^ti vā ākāraviseso. hutvā abhāvo hi pākabhāvato bhinno viddhaṃsābhāvattā tattha ca aniccalakkhaṇaṃ niruḷhaṃ. aniccākāro hi dukkhānattākārehi viya uppādākārato ca visiṭṭho. tathā hi saddassa viddhaṃsābhāvo saṅkhatabhāvenapi sādhīyati.

[03] ^b^saṅkhatabhāvo^eb^ ca atthato uppādavantatā. ^b^uppādo^eb^ ca pākabhāvasādhitā dharamānāvatthā. iminā nayena dukkhānattālakkhaṇāni veditabbāni. apica yathā niccapaṭikkhepato aniccanti niccākārapaṭikkhepato yathāvutto abhāvākārasaṅkhāto aniccākāro ^b^aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,^eb^ evaṃ sukhapaṭikkhepato dukkhanti sukhākārapaṭikkhepato abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanākārasaṅkhāto dukkhākāro ^b^dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ,^eb^ tathā attapaṭikkhepato anattāti attākārapaṭikkhepato avasavattanākārasaṅkhāto anattākāro ^b^anattalakkhaṇa^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. te yime tayopi ākārā asabhāvadhammattā khandhapariyāpannā na honti. khandhehi vinā anupalabbhanīyato khandhavinimuttāpi na honti. khandhe pana upādāya vohāravasena labbhamānā tadādīnavavibhāvanāya visesakāraṇabhūtā tajjāpaññattivisesāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^tayidaṃ sabbampī^eb^ti yathāvuttalakkhaṇattayañceva lakkhitabbañca khandhapañcakaṃ. ^b^``udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkhetī''^eb^ti idaṃ tadatthe tabbohāravasena vuttaṃ. udayabbayañāṇatthañhi lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā ``udayabbayañāṇa''nti kathitā. na hi udayabbayañāṇaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇādivisayaṃ ^a^M2.0439^ea^. tabbisayatte vā udayabbayañāṇameva na siyā, udayabbayañāṇaṃ pana tikkhaṃ, visadañca kātukāmena lakkhaṇattayatīraṇameva kātabbaṃ. parikammasadisañhetaṃ tassa. esa nayo sesañāṇesupīti.
[06] upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 741^b^.^eb^ ^b^vahatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0413^ea^ pavattati. ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvena. paguṇā ca bhāvanā vikkhepābhāvato ārammaṇe appitā viya pavattatīti ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvena saṅkhārānaṃ lahūpaṭṭhānatā dassitā. ^b^saṅkhāresu^eb^ pana udayabbayavasena ^b^lahuṃ lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu^eb^ udayadassanañca ``uppādavato vināso''ti yāvadeva vayadassanatthaṃ tassa nibbidāvahattāti vaye evassa ābhogasamannāhāro manasikāro pavattati, tena uppādādiṃ muñcitvā vayamevārabbha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``uppādaṃ vā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^uppāda^eb^nti nibbattivikāraṃ. ^b^ṭhiti^eb^nti ṭhitippattaṃ, jaranti attho. ^b^pavatta^eb^nti upādinnakappavattaṃ. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti saṅkhāranimittaṃ. yaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ samudayādighanavasena, sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saviggahānaṃ viya upaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ. keci pana ^b^``pavattaṃ^eb^ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ avicchedena pavattanaṃ uppādova, ^b^nimittaṃ^eb^ nāma uppannānaṃ vijjamānatā ṭhānaparamparā, tasmā uppādameva gaṇhāti ce, pavattaṃ gaṇhāti nāma. ṭhitiṃyeva gaṇhāti ce, nimittaṃ gaṇhāti nāmā''ti vadanti, taṃ ^b^``uppādaṃ vā''^eb^tiādivacanena virujjhati. na hi asati bhede vikappo yutto. ^b^na sampāpuṇāti^eb^ aggahaṇato. kiṃ pana sampāpuṇātīti āha ^b^``khaya...pe0... santiṭṭhatī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^nirodha^eb^saddo anuppādepi dissatīti bhedasaddena visesitaṃ, ^b^bheda^eb^saddo visesavācakopi hotīti vayasaddena visesitaṃ, sopi anirodhavācakopi atthīti khayasaddena visesitaṃ, khayavayabhedasaṅkhāte khaṇikanirodheti attho. ^b^sati santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti satisīsena ñāṇamāha. ^b^etasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti upakkilesavinimuttassa udayabbayañāṇassa tikkhabhāvāpattiyaṃ vuttanayena udayampi muñcitvā vayasseva manasikārakāle.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti rūpavedanādiārammaṇaṃ khayavayavaseneva paṭisaṅkhāya. yakāralopena hi niddeso ``sayaṃ abhiññā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.28, 405) viya. yathāvuttassa ^a^M2.0440^ea^ vā ārammaṇassa khayavayabhedavasena paṭisaṅkhā ^b^ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā. bhaṅgānupassane^eb^ti yo tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgo, tassa anupassane. ^b^paññā^eb^ti pakārato jānanā. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ idāneva saṃvaṇṇīyati.

[03] 742^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇa^eb^nti rūpaṃ yāva jarāmaraṇanti vipassitabbabhāvena gahitaṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhāragatamāha ^a^V2.0414^ea^. paṭisaṅkhānaṃ nāma jānanaṃ, tañca bhaṅgānupassanāya adhippetattā bhaṅgato dassanamevāti āha ^b^``jānitvā khayato vayato disvāti attho''^eb^ti. tassa ñāṇassāti sambandho.

[03] rūpārammaṇameva ^b^rūpārammaṇatā^eb^ yathā ``devo eva devatā''ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``rūpārammaṇaṃ citta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^rūpārammaṇatā^eb^ti vā bhummatthe paccattavacananti dassento ^b^``atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve''^eb^ti āha. ^b^aparena cittena bhaṅgaṃ anupassatī^eb^ti vipassanāvisayaṃ bhaṅgānupassanamāha. evañhi bhaṅgānupassanā paguṇā hoti, ārammaṇañcassa vibhūtataraṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. ^b^ñāta^eb^nti ārammaṇamāha anupassanāvasena ñātattā. ^b^ñāṇa^eb^nti anupassanāñāṇaṃ. ^b^ubhopi vipassatī^eb^ti tadubhayampi khayato vayato vipassatīti. ayaṃ hettha saṅkhepattho -- rūpassa yāva jarāmaraṇassa khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhātaṃ, dassanakañāṇassa khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāya bhaṅgassa anupassananti ubhayattha paññā. purimaṃ vā tadabhāve abhāvato pacchimāyaṃ pakkhipitvā pacchimā eva paññā vipassane ñāṇanti.

[03] ^b^etthā^eb^ti ``tassa cittassa...pe0... bhaṅgaṃ anupassatī''ti ettha. ^b^anekehi ākārehī^eb^ti aniccato anupassanādīhi anekehi ākārehi. ^b^anu^eb^-saddo ``bhiyyo''ti etasmiṃ attheti āha ^b^``punappunaṃ passatī''^eb^ti.

[03] idha saṅkhatadhammo nāma jātijarāmaraṇapakatiko, tassa jāti ādikoṭi, jarā majjhimakoṭi, maraṇaṃ osānakoṭi. tattha kiñcāpi uppādāditividhampi saṅkhatalakkhaṇatāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, tathāpi jātijarāsu diṭṭhāsu na tathā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti yathā vayakkhaṇeti āha ^b^``bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭī''^eb^ti, uttamā koṭi ^a^M2.0441^ea^ pariyosānakoṭīti attho. yathā hi jarādhammaṃ, maraṇadhammameva ca jāyatīti ^b^jāti^eb^ aniccatāya ādi koṭi, tathā jātidhammaṃ, maraṇadhammameva ca jīratīti ^b^jarā^eb^ majjhimā koṭi, jātidhammaṃ, jarādhammameva ca bhijjatīti ^b^bhaṅgo^eb^ paramā koṭīti. ^b^aniccato anupassatī^eb^ti na kalāpato sammasanto viya ``aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.48) anumānavasena, nāpi āraddhavipassako viya udayaggahaṇapubbakavayadassanavasena, atha kho udayabbayañāṇānubhāvena paccakkhato upaṭṭhitesu udayavayesu vuttanayena udayaṃ muñcitvā bhaṅgadassanavaseneva aniccato anupassati, evaṃ anupassato panassa niccagāhassa lesopi natthīti ^a^V2.0415^ea^ āha ^b^``no niccato''^eb^ti. tathā hesa niccasaññaṃ pajahatīti vuccati. ettha ca ``aniccato eva anupassatī''ti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``no niccato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā, eva-kārassa upari desanāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ. ^b^dukkhato anupassatī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo.
